1.content:
You are a Pokemon trainer who aspired to become the greatest one in the Pokemon world. Everyday, you battled with countless trainers, strong and weak, only to win all of them. Today, you decided that you should take a long, deserved break from all the challenges. You are taking a stroll in a quiet forest to enjoy the pristine natural sights around you. You hear the random rustling of leaves in the wind. When you looked toward the ground, the sun casts dappled shadows onto the grassy grounds, creating the illusion of a intricate, moving carpet.

You were enjoying yourself when suddenly, a strange feeling appeared upon. You felt dizzy, nauseous and disorientated. The forest around you started to blur, rendering you unable to distinguish the sky from the ground. You feel yourself falling unto the ground, cringing at unknown pains. You blacked out..............

When you waked up again, you feel a lot better but when you look at your surrounding something is very different. Around you, grasses become as tall as trees, soft winds become hurricanes, a small forest clearing becomes a wide meadow. The sight has you flabbergasted and distressed.

"I've been shrunk", you said out loud, "What in world has happened to me?"

Before you can further comprehend your situation, the ground below you started to tremble. The shaking got more and more intense; something huge is approaching you.

When the tremors finally stopped, you realized that a long shadow casts over you. You couldn't help but look up at the thing that is blocking the sun. Your jaws dropped, the creature is so tall that you couldn't see its face. From the size of the creature, you estimate that you are now the size of an tiny insect.

Although fear has gripped you, you unknowingly started shouting and screaming, attempting to get the attention of whatever the thing is.....To your surprise, it seems to notice you and started to bend its body over to check on the source of the screaming.

As it puts it face closer to you, you realized that it's a Pokemon albeit far larger than normal from your perspective. You started to cower in fear, unable to process the image before you. Out of nowhere, a booming voice suddenly emerges.

"What's this? I've never seen any creature like this before.", the voice said.

You slowly looked up and see that the Pokemon is a.....
1.title: The Beginning of an Adventure!

11.content:
It's a Lucario, the Aura Pokemon. In your current size, the jackal-like Pokemon is more than 160 feet tall. You also realize that Lucario is moving toward you, seemingly thinking that you're some exotic critter of this forest. The towering figure gradually lowered it head toward you, eventually getting on all four (essentially lying) to get a clearer look at you. It's unmistakable, the tall, blue ears, the bright, red eyes, and the protruding, aura organs.

You've encountered Lucarios belonging to various trainers along your journey, but this time it's dozens of time your size. The occurrence has left you speechless and, frankly, frightened. You eventually find yourself surrounded by its huge paws, each with a long spike on it. You look up and find that Lucario's snout just hovers a few feet above you. The Lucario looks at you with its typical blank face. However, its eyes immediately give away the indication that he is curious about you. You see your awe-struck reflection in Lucario's ruby-red eyes.

"Strange, you look like a human trainer but you are so small.", Lucario suddenly speaks.

"Hi....hi there. You... must be the Lucario from around this forest.", you managed to say without realizing that the Pokemon was actually talking.

"So, you really are a human.", the Pokemon said, "But...how do you happen to be so small?"

"I don't know...I can't even explain., it all happened so fast and......wait a minute...You can talk?", you asked Lucario.

"Well, of course I can. Haven't you heard of something called ESP? Extra-sensory perception? Simply put, I'm 'talking' to your mind.", Lucario said.

"Hmm. Psychic, right?...", you said, "Anyway, Lucario, do you have any idea what causes me to shrink.", you asked.

"You haven't really heard about the mystery of this forest, do you?", said Lucario, "This forest has some mysterious powers capable of random effects on both humans and Pokemons. It has many unknown powers that are beyond comprehension. In your case, you're shrunk but you seem to be normal overall. In an extreme case, I saw a Pokemon literally transformed into completely different stuffs. In your current form, any Pokemon could have easily made a meal of you. But seeing and recognizing that you are a human trainer, I wouldn't do such things, yet. Even if I do eat you, I cannot digest you."
11.title: Lucario

choices: Stay in the stomach for the time
112.content:
"Alright, let's save the questions for later. Now, enter me if you wish.", said Lucario.

".......Okay. But I hope you keep your promise about not digesting me.", you said as you enter Lucario's mouth, catching sight of his glimmering fangs and fleshy tongue. You slowly moved toward the "cavern" before you, pondering for a moment before you move down.

You traveled relatively smoothly downward through Lucario's gullet and into his esophagus. The rhythmic moving of the walls leaves no doubt that your "new home" is in a living creature. Eventually you landed in Lucario's stomach. Upon first sight, you realize that the stomach is completely empty of any liquids, save perhaps the slippery coatings of the stomach wall. The interior of Lucario is dimly lit for some reason but you have no idea of the light source.

"Make yourself comfortable in there because you'll be staying for the long term. If you want to, you may explore my body. You can take any of the holes in my stomach to start.", you heard Lucario said.

You look around and see that there are indeed several holes leading to other parts in Lucario.

What are you going to do?
112.title: Down into Lucario

choices: Accept Lucario's Power and continue exploring
1121.content:
Seeing that you will probably stay within the Pokemon for a long time, you decided to try one of the holes in Lucario's stomach to know your 'host' better. You remember that ever since you were a kid, you alwaus have the fascination about being eaten by a Pokemon and made to explore their interiors. But that used to exist only in your fantasies. Now, you are in the stomach of your favorite legendary Pokemon, Lucario, thinking about what this rare opportunity means for you despite being shrunk to microscopic size. What has surprised you further is that this Lucario has some very unconventional interior; how is it possible for a stomach to have more than one hole? It's so strange yet a very interesting thing to check out.

The sound of the Pokemon's heartbeat can be heard all around you like a gentle music, as if it's luring you to explore the unknowns in the giant Lucario.

Believing that continued wondering in the stomach won't get you anywhere, you move across the soft stomach floor to one of the holes. There must be at least two dozens of them all around this huge stomach. There is no way of telling where each of the hole will lead to so it'll be up to you to find out.

You pick the hole nearest to you and enter it. The passage way is a bit tight but it is just large enough to allow you to walk through. The feeling you experienced can be described as walking in a damp tunnel made of extremely soft silk. The passage twist and turn, going upward then downward as if it is never ending. After what seems like half an hour worth of travel, you finally reached the end of the fleshy tunnel. When you got out of the tunnel, you find yourselve in a wide chamber that is dimly lit. There is apparent light source but you think the walls might be giving off light themselves. When your eyes adjusted to the environment, you realize that there is a glowing blue ball at the center of the chamber. The 'ball' is fixed in place by a pillar and it is connected with several blood vessel-like tubings. The sight mesmerized you, it's so beautiful.....

"Hi again, trainer.", Lucario's voice blared overhead, "It looks like you've started your little adventure in me. You're now at my "Aura Maker", that's the part of me that allows me to use my supernatural powers for both weapons and meditation."

You move yourself closer to the ball of energy. When you approach it, you can feel the intense energy it gives off; it feels like a strange tingle throughout your body. The glowing ball continously swirls with a faint static sound.

"Feel free to touch my energy. I'd like to share it with.", Lucario said.

"What do you mean?", you asked the Pokemon curiously.

"Well, since you will be living in me for the forseeable future, why don't we just be personal friend, just between you and me.", Lucario explained, "Once you touched my Aura Maker, you will also be granted some of my powers which you could only use in my body. I hope that you can accept it as a symbol of our new, unique, and special friendship."

What would you do?
1121.title: Exploring Lucario's Interior

choices: Try to walk to your headquarters
11211.content:
The idea of receiving powers from your new friend was irresistible. You daydream and let your imagination fly for a while, until you realize that Lucario is trying to communicate with you.

"Are you still there, trainer?"

"Uh, yeah. I just...got distracted", you said sheepishly. "I'm going to take the powers now."

"Excellent! You won't regret it, I'll make sure of it! Just touch the sphere and you will have powers in a few seconds."

You eagerly approach to the sphere, and you touch it with your hand. Instantly, you feel energy going through your fingers, and you start to glow with some sort of blueish aura. You are amazed, and when it ends, you're too stunned to even move or remove your hand from the sphere.

"How do you feel, my friend?" You hear Lucario asking.

"It is...awesome. I feel full of energy, thanks for this". You say cheerily.

"I should explain better what sort of effects my Aura Maker had on you. Now we have a bond that will protect you and let me know exactly where you are, even if you leave my body. You also have a few powers that only have effect while you're inside me, or even touching me. You now can breath in any environment inside my body, meaning that you could be submerged in anything and you wouldn't feel a difference. You can get to virtually any place in my body, something that was impossible before, even with your size. Now if you find any obstacle in your path, you'll always be able to go through it, whether it is a small hole or a wall blocking the way. Your last power is that now can teleport anytime to the place where you will live inside my body, let's call it...your headquarters. You only have to concentrate on it, and you'll be there instantly."

"I...think I understand everything. Thanks, Lucario". You feel happy to know that you'll be safe inside him.

"It is getting dark out here." Lucario said "I know you humans need to sleep many hours, more than me. Would you like to teleport to your headquarters? It is easy, just clear your mind of any thought and focus on your headquarters. You haven't seen it yet, so an image doesn't work. However, wondering about that place should work"

you think it is worth trying, but you also would like to try to find your way walking through Lucario's body, just to see what other surprises are around. Besides, exploring would help you figure the location of many things by yourself. Then you think again about the convenience of teleporting and not having to spend any time trying to find it. After all, you didn't know how far you was from the headquarters.
11211.title: Accept Lucario's Power and continue exploring

112111.content:
After carefully considering your options, you think that walking to your headquarter is currently the more preferable choice. Besides the inherent risk of teleporting through unknown grounds, walking might just allow you to take in more of the gargantuan Lucario.

"I think that I want to stay on the safe side of things", you said, "You'll never know what will happen if you teleport without knowing your destination."

There was a brief silence, then Lucario spoke: "I understand what you mean......If that's the case, then take the original path back to my stomach, you should see another tunnel that leads up from there. By taking that tunnel, you should be able to reach the "headquarter" in no time. There will be many splits along the way, but the headquarter is at the very end of the tunnel which should be easy for you."

Being the curious person always are, You followed Lucario's instruction and made your way back to the vast stomach. Indeed, another tunnel is visible at the other end of the soft chamber. The only difference is that this seems to lead upward the body.

You walked toward the tunnel and started ascending it. The twists and turns of the passage disorients you, the softness of the ground made it even more of a challenge to properly scale your way through. For some odd reasons, the ground gradually resembles  a long flight of stair the higher you went. You felt gushes of warm air as you continue to ascend the tunnel.

Somewhere at the midpoint of your trip upward, you begin to see splits along the way. Some of them are marked with simple pictograms. You recognized some of them as the lungs and heart. The rest of them makes no sense to you. Because you are exhausted from day's ordeal, you decided to explore them the next morning.

After a total of fifteen minutes, the tunnel seems to end at a larger area. You assumed that this is the headquarter Lucario mentioned. You entered the area and take the sight before you.

You are in a room-sized chamber that is blue and has a faint glowing aura to it. On one side of the chamber, there is a raised rectangle that is covered in what looks like fur.   The colors on them match those of Lucario. It is big enough is fit you comfortably.  You walked there and tried sitting on it. It's extremely soft and warm. This is when you noticed another thing across the chamber: a large viewing window. The elliptical opening is currently showing a beautiful star-filled sky. It must've gotten dark during my trip here. The shimmering amid the dark sky mesmerized you. Throughout your travel across the land, this is the first time you have seen this many stars appear all at once. 

You moved toward the window, speechless........

"Enjoying the night sky like I do?", Lucario suddenly asked. The closeness of the voice surprises you.

"Where am I exactly?", you asked the Pokemon.

"You're in my head, silly", Lucario said with a chuckle. "I don't call it the "headquarter" without a reason. In case you're wondering, you are currently looking out from my left eye. Do you like the setup of the chamber?"

"Yes, of course!", you exclaimed.

"I'm glad that you like it, but I think maybe you should get some rest after such a long day.", Lucario said.

"You're right", you said as you lie down on the bed.

"Good Night, I hope that you have a nice dream. Tomorrow will be another adventurous day for you.", Lucario said softly.

You immediately feel drowsy as you adjusted yourself in the bed. Staring out the 'window' at the stars aided you and you fell into a deep sleep.......
112111.title: Try to walk to your headquarters

choices: You decide to visit one of the places Lucario suggested
You decide to be random and find something new.
1121111.content:
The first thing that cross your mind when you wake up is the forest. Without opening your eyes, you reminisce everything that happened recently, and you wonder if that was just a dream and you're in your bed, about to start your vacation. You try to focus and listen, expecting to hear anything that could tell you where you are. Then you hear it, very softly. It is a heartbeat. You open your eyes and you see trees and a river, but everything is surrounded by a blue wall, forming an ellipse that looks like a window. Then you realize it wasn't a dream or an hallucination.

You bolt out of the bed and Lucario instantly greets you.

"Good morning, my friend. How was the first night in your temporal home?" Lucario says cheerfully.

"Excellent!"

"Glad to hear that. While you slept, I meditated about the situation and about what we can do to return you to normal size. I'll tell you my conclusions while we eat. I hope you understand that only somebody with extraordinary powers can help you, and it may take a long time to find. Some weeks, maybe even more than a month."

"I don't mind how long it takes, as long as I'm inside you" you reply. Somehow, it is pretty obvious to you that Lucario is smiling now.

"Okay. I'm looking for breakfast right now, but it seems it will take a while. There is a special chamber near that will be your food area, so don't wander too far. When it is time for breakfast I'll tell you, meanwhile, you're free to do whatever you want. I recommend you don't go lower than where the tunnel you used to arrive here splits for the first time. There are many things to see just in the small area between that point and my head."

"Fine with me. Do you recommend any place?"

"Well, above each new road there is a sign that will show you what to expect to find. There are most obvious organs in my chest, which are my heart and lungs. However, seeing how just the day started, there is also a place for you to relax and take a bath, and there is another that will allow you to get acquainted with the rest of my body, just outside the headquarters."

"Acquainted?"

"It is a big map that points to every destination in my body, meaning you can see every organ and every room. Keep in mind that I can change it anytime to adjust my body to your necessities, you just need to ask."

You smile and get outside of the headquarters, and you glance to the tunnel and try to see as far as you can.
1121111.title: The next morning

11211111.content:
After allowing yourself sufficient time to process what Lucario had told you, you decided to go to the Map Room to get yourself acquainted with his body. You exited your room and went through the tunnel, looking for the Map Room. As Lucario had previously mentioned, you saw tunnels that leads to an eating area, a bath room, and so on. But as of now, you are more concerned with familiarizing yourself with the locations in the Pokemon's body.

It took you less than a minute to discover a tunnel marked "Map". The sign has a depiction of an paper map with a compass rose on it. Without any further delay, you headed into the passageway. Surprisingly, it didn't take long for you to arrive in another chamber.

On one side of the chamber there is what looks like a large screen made of gel-like substance. There is an outline of Lucario embedded on the screen that is filled with countless circles and lines (resembling a map like those you would encounter on a subway). You also noticed that there seemed to be a panel located on a raised platform at the center of the chamber.

You walked slowly toward the center, your body trembling with curiosity. It is impossible for Pokemon to have electricity within their body and a display screen. The various contraception within Lucario just confused you further as to what he is fully capable of doing.

When you stepped onto the platform, you notice that there is an impression of a hand print on a stump of flesh. You placed your hand onto it and the large screen in the room instantly refreshed itself. It now shows a couple of recommended location based on your preference.

.....Wait a minute...does that mean that Lucario can read my thoughts now?.......Pokemons are so mysterious.....

You take a look at the available options presented to you on the display along with a short description:

Dining Area- In this area, you can enjoy the food that Lucario ate. Beside that, there are various things that allows you prepare your own meal from the available ingredients.

Bathroom- This is the place where you take a bath after you daily activity in Lucario. Besides that, you can also use this area when nature calls.

Lucario's Store- This is a shop where you can find Lucario-related merchandises at no cost to you.

Play Room- The play room is filled with countless sort of games and devices that Lucario created exclusively for you. You will have to visit this place yourself to find out what I prepared for you.


Before you could read the next destination, you heard the Pokemon's voice around you.

"Well, it's breakfast time and I have found more food than usual today.", Lucario said, "Come on over to the Dining Area and enjoy your meal."

"I'll be right over!!!", you said.
11211111.title: You decide to visit one of the places Lucario s...

choices: I think I have something better to do...
112111111.content:
You memorized the location of all the four options in the screen, even thought you had seen the entrances of two of them. When you was sure you wouldn't forget, you got out of the Map Room, and tried to find the Dining Area. Remembering the map, you was glad to confirm that everything you needed for your everyday life was very close to the headquarters, leaving the rest of the body up to exploration. You was pretty excited to start your day after breakfast.

You entered the Dining Area, and looked around. It was a small dome-shaped room. There was a something that looked like a set of table and chair near to a wall, and a hole above them. On the other side was many squares and rectangles, and when you approached them, you realized it was many appliances made of fleshy material. Amazed, you sit on the chair and wait, and soon enough, a piece of cooked meat falls through the hole, directly on the table. It was like a piece of meat looked through a magnifying lens, you could see every detail of it, reminding you of your size. You know that the same meat would not be considerate enough for breakfast if you had your normal size.

"I managed to find some meat, and thought you may like it. I'll just have some berries for myself" Lucario says. You're just too grateful to answer. Some minutes later, you remember to ask:

"There was something you wanted to tell me, Lucario. What is it?"

"Oh, right. I meditated about you and your situation and I think I remember something similar that happened once. Looks like it only affects the foreigners to this forest. It was a Pokémon, that got shrunk."

"And what happened?"

"...It drowned. Somebody found its body laying on a puddle after it rained".

You was silent, thinking how lucky you was to be under Lucario's care.

"After that I heard somebody say that that Pokémon could have obtained help if he had tried to contact our local Psychic-type. He is the only one around here, but I think he doesn't have enough power to help you. However, I think he may direct us to the one that can help you."

"And where does he live?" You asked.

"He doesn't live too far. I think we may talk with him tonight or tomorrow morning. But you will be the one to talk, to explain how you felt and that kind of stuff. Then he may give an adequate answer." Before you have a chance to ask how, Lucario says: "I'll tell you how it will happen when we get there. Don't worry, you won't have to leave my body to do it".

At this point you had finished breakfast, and was eager to walk around. You are so excited you feel like Lucario could feel it, and you are right.

"Do you have any plan? I may guide you around. Just wait a minute".

Shrugging, you sit on the chair again. You wait and then see the entrance to the Dining Room opening and you see a Lucario. It walks directly to you, and you're too surprised to move. The Lucario smiles. "It is me, my friend. I'm using my aura to create a replica of me." Then you see the Lucario extend its paw and touch your arm. You can feel it. Looking back to the Lucario, you realize he is translucent, even if it doesn't seem like that at first glance.

"When I said I would guide you, I meant it literally" Lucario says cheerily. "Do you have something in mind?" you ask. "Well, I was thinking to give you a tour. I thought of a couple tours, taking today and tomorrow, just so you know better me whole body. I assure you it will be worth it.

Today I may take you on a tour through every system in my body, so you see how it works."

"And what would we visit?" -you ask curiously.

"I won't spoil the surprises, but I'll tell you that we'll start in the lungs. And from there, we'll visit my circulatory, nervous, digestive, urinary, reproductive and a system that only Steel type Pokémon have, located along with our bones, in that order. I'll be with you in every part of the tour." Lucario smiles. "Are you ready for it?"
112111111.title: Let's get some breakfast

choices: "Maybe we should just continue the tour"...
1121111111.content:
"Uh, sure. I guess you know your body better than I will". You reply.

Lucario seemed to smile. "Good. First I'll need to do something, wait for a while. Then meet me in front of the map room". Then the aura representation of Lucario leaves. You obey, playing with your thumbs until you consider you waited enough. You get out of the Dining Area, and arrive to the map room. You arrived just in time to see Lucario coming out of the map room, with a thin rectangle of something that looks like plasma on its paws. "Take this, you'll see its utility when we arrive to my lungs. Now follow me"

You two walk for a while until you arrive to two tunnels you had seen before, last night. You recognized the pictograms that are on the entrances, one going to the heart and the other one to the lungs. Lucario opens the one leading to the lungs. You walk until you arrive to a very tall, large and soft chamber. It had a gray-ish color, besides the common pink tone that dominated Lucario's insides. The whole room was moving, with a steady rhythm. It is obvious to you why.

Lucario stood on what seemed the center of the room, and said "This is the first stop. Touch the screen I gave you." Aftger you touch the rectangle, it seems to turn on and another outline of Lucario appears. Shortly after that, a blinking dot and another outline appears. It takes the shape of Lucario's respiratory system, and the blinking dot stays on the right lung. You are amazed.

"We Fighting types have a bigger than normal pulmonary capacity. It helps us to protect the heart and other possible organs while we're in battle. Besides, it helps us to oxygenate the whole body, increasing our resistance. The lung doesn't look big because you're tiny, it looks big because it is actually huge." Effectively, you look up and you realize you can't see the ceiling, or whatever replaces the ceiling.

"Why don't you have some fun? Jump." A bit stunned, you jump slightly and notice you bounce a little. Lucario smiles and says "You can jump as high as you want and for as long as you want. It won't bother me." So you try to jump higher every time. There is something exciting in the whole jumping activity, and you quickly start to enjoy it. After some time of jumping, you realize you have reached a high point in the lung, and you are able to see what is on top. A series of tubes protrude from the top of the lung, and you don't need to look to the map to know that it leads to the rest of Lucario's respiratory system.

"Would you like to take a challenge, human?" You hear Lucario's telepathy speaking to you "Those tubes that are on my lungs are pretty thin, even you at your actual size wouldn't fit in them. At least you wouldn't if you hadn't received my powers and friendship, now you'll be able if you want to. I challenge you to climb my whole trachea and larynx, until you arrive to my throat."

"Wait, what? I'm not sure...the air currents won't help..."

"I'll make sure that nothing happens to you, even if it means breathing very softly. I'll be waiting you in my throat, too."

You're confident on your strength and ability, and feel compelled to accept Lucario's dare and climb. It sounds like a nice way to spend time. At last, you decide to...
1121111111.title: Let's do it.

11211111111.content:
"Well....I'll do it! Consider the challenge accepted, Lucario.", you said, I always wanted to see what it is like to race inside a body.

"Let's see if you can arrive at my throat within 10 minutes. If you could do it, I'll let you visit my Lucario Store. Consider that a little detour from your trip. Over there, you'll find countless types of merchandise to your liking!  ALRIGHT then......on your mark. Get set....... GO!!!!!!!!"

As soon as Lucario shouted, a counter on the portable plasma screen started counting down from 10 minutes. You quickly stowed the device into your trainer's bag and jumped for the highest point in the lung.

At first it's slightly difficult for you to keep in rhythm with the air flow in the lung, but then a particularly strong gust blew you toward one of the entrance at the top of the lung. When you approached the hole, you felt your body shrink in size to accommodate itself into the narrow opening.

'This must be one of the special abilities that Lucario shared with you.', you thought.

With your new size, you arrived in what seem to be an organic cavern with countless openings and entrances.  You tried to follow the airflow since you know that you will eventually arrive at the meeting point between the two lungs. 

After running into several dead ends and loops in the lung branches you arrived at a larger tube like structure that extends all the way up. 

You assumed that you have arrived at the trachea. Looking around for something that may aid your ascent, you realized that the walls around the trachea are ridged and perfect for climbing. You latched yourself onto the ridges and started climbing. It was a steep climb, far steeper than the rockiest path on Mt. Chimney. Occasionally, due the slippery nature of the trachea, you sometimes slipped down a few notch, slightly hindering your progress.

The higher you climbed, the brighter it seems to get. You though that you must be getting close to the throat and to the finish line. Your surrounding turned brighter and you could make out the shape of an arch  at the top.

You quickened your pace as you finally reached the end of the tongue. You collapsed onto the squishy tongue and decide to rest for a while. Looking up at the ceiling, you see the humongous uvula gangling overhead and the fleshy pink roof of the mouth. Turning your head, you looked at the "entrance", and saw closely for the first time the sparkling white teeth of Lucario. Some of them look razor-sharp while others have a smoother shape. Lights peaked out from various openings between the teeth, forming several rays that shone on you.

A sudden loud beep from your plasma device sends your mind reeling back. You removed it from your bag and saw that you spend a total of 7 minutes and 12 seconds climbing.

"Not bad!", you heard Lucario said.

You looked around and saw the holographic Pokemon leaning against his own molars with a playful smirk on his face.

"You did far better than I expected", Lucario said, "now, keeping my part the deal, I'll take you to the store. Wanna check it out now?"
11211111111.title: "I'll do it."

112111111111.content:
"I don't know where it is, so please tell me". you said.

"We'll have to go back down. As I said before, most things for your everyday life are near the headquarters, and the store isn't an exception. Follow me". he said.

Lucario starts walking back to his throat, and stops near the edge of the humongous emptiness that leads deep inside Lucario. "You should hold my paw. There is a shortcut here, and it is kind of risky. Not that you would get hurt, but it would be a waste of time if you fall down." You grab his paw, still amazed that despite he being n holographic representation of your host, it still feels very real.

You and your companion start walking along the edge of the throat and find a narrow ledge on a side of the throat. Lucario starts walking carefully on it, and you follow as close as you can. Looking to the front of you, you can see a small entrance at the end of the ledge. When you are almost done and almost reach the entrance, you slip and almost fall down the esophagus, but Lucario is able to keep you on the road. You recover quickly nd continue walking, until you find yourself in front of a small sphincter. You press on it and it opens.

A few steps in front of that, you enter a brightly iluminated room. There are many flesh-like formations, resembling shelves, and they're filled with varied forms of merchandise, all of them with Lucario's trademark blue and black. "How did you make or obtain all this stuff?" "You'll never know" he says with a smile. "Take anything you want, everything is freen and made for you.

You walk around the room, picking random stuff. The variety is amazing, you find stuff for everyday life, mere toys and figurines of Lucario and even what seems like a costume. You keep grabbing until you aren't able to take any other things. You walk around trying to find where to put them, and there is a fleshy table on a corner. You put your stuff there and se it dissapearing. "What the..."

"Everything was moved to the headquarters. You can't walk around my whole body with all those things, it would be a burden for you and me."

"Eh, whatever you say. Interesting place. Will you seriously never tell me how you made them?"

"Never". he replies. You shrug and stop thinking about it.

"Say, will there be challenges and rewards in every system?" you ask.

"In most of them, yeah. There are a couple that has detours that I'll let you check without any other requeriments other than being near to them".

A quick assessment of your own body removed all doubts that you are now in control of Lucario.

"Hi, again.", said a voice in your head, "You have successfully assumed control. The experience later on will be amazing for you. Before we do anything else, I think I should familiarize you will several things first. First of all, since you are now in control of my body, you have all of my abilities and power. This means that you will be able to use Aura and Psychic moves. Secondly, I made my left paw into an organic controller for your convenience. As you can see, I have a total of three fingers and one central palm.

By pressing your first finger, you will be able to access a virtual map of the area you're in. The map will be superimposed over your field-of-vision but it won't be obstructive. The second finger will act as an info button. By pressing it, I can give you new information when you need help. The third finger will activate the aura scanner which will allow you to locate any of interest in the near proximity. Finally, by pressing on the palm, you will start the next challenge that i have design just for you. If you got bored with controlling me and wanted to return within my body, just hold done the palm button for 6 seconds.

"So, are you ready for the game?"
1121111111111111111111.title: "Take me there now, I want to start".

choices: Yes, I'll see what you have here.
11211111111111111111111.content:
"Excellent. You will only have two objectives, and you need to complete both in less than an hour. If the time ends and you haven't finished, I'll take control if my body instantly and you'll lose. Understood?"

"Yes" you think. You hope that it is enough to communicate with your host, and it seems so.

"The first thing you'll have to do is to find a certain black rock in the forest. Once you find it, you have to destroy it using any kind of attack you want. You can start now".

The first thing you do is activating the map. It seems that you can control it with your mind, so you try to find anything that can mean there is a rock near. The forest is really big, and you hope you don't have to spend a lot of time looking at the map. Yo take mental note of three or four possibilities of the map, after seeing strange shapes, meaning that maybe there was rocks in there. You run through the forest to each of the marks, and effectively, every one of them ended being rocks, but not of the color you was searching. You activate the map again and try to focus on a further part of the forest, thinking that maybe Lucario wouldn't make it so easy placing the rock near your original position. You memorize another three locations and run, and luckily, the first one was the one you needed to find.

The first thing you do is punching it, like that were enough to do some sort of attack. The only thing you manage to do is slightly hurting your friend's fist, meaning that you felt the pain too. You keep yourself from swearing loudly and think about how you could activate the powers. After a while, you figure that maybe focusing on the attack you're trying to do may help. You imagine it in your mind, and surprising enough, you kind of feel Lucario's body moving by itself and throwing a ball of aura at the rock. Pieces of rock fall, and you stop in shock for a moment. Then you repeat what you had done before, until the rock is completely gone.

"Well done, but it took you forty minutes to achieve this. Not finding this place quickly really hurt your performance". You feel your confidence falling. "Okay, for the second part. While you was busy with this, I contacted an acquaintance, and he agreed to help. You'll have to catch that bug over there". Your head turns around automatically until you see a Mothim. He is far, but you can see him perfectly. The Mothim starts to fly away, and you hear Lucario shouting in your mind. "Go! You only have twenty minutes".

You start running around the trees, trying to localize your target. You use aura to help you in the task, and you faintly see many shapes, obviously belonging to other habitants of the forest. Annoyed, you turn it off. The bug kept moving fast, and soon you lost him. You kept running around the forest, hoping you would be lucky enough to spot him. After some time, you manage to hear a noise behind you and see your target flying near, high in the air. You react quickly, and jump as high as you can. Somehow, you catch one of its wings with your paw. You both fall, you not being used to falling from those heights. You let the Mothim go, and your vision blackens.

Some sort of force throws you out of the lighted area, and you see Lucario near to you. "You was successful. Some minutes more, and it would be over. Not bad for a beginner. Now you have learnt the basics of this function."

You just stand, and nod. Lucario keeps praising you for your success, while informing you that your former target was unharmed and left. After walking a while through another floor of the brain, you arrive to the entrance of another area.

"After this point, there is everything about me or my life. You'll find anything, even memories or dreams. I just thought you would like to know me better."
11211111111111111111111.title: Yes

choices: "The prize is too good. I'll try."
112111111111111111111112.content:
"Thanks for the offer, Lucario. I think I'll check it later, if you don't mind." Lucario nods, and guides you around his brain, until you're back to the elevator. You enter, and Lucario presses one of the buttons. The elevator starts moving, and you ask Lucario where you are going. "I have you two options, don't you remember?" he says with a smirk "You chose to go to my brain first, so now we go to my intestines".

The elevator soon stops, and you and your host exit. You're in a round tunnel, nicely illuminated. You look to both sides, and only see the walls going for a few feet, before turning into a curve. You reach your bag and grab the tablet with the map, and try to make it work. An outline of Lucario's digestive system appears and, effectively, you're in middle of his small intestine. Yet it isn't small to you, it has 25 feet of diameter from your point of view.

You put away the map and look at Lucario, and ask him what way you'll be going. He points to your left, and you two start to walk. Your friend and you spend a long time walking through the intestine, talking about trivial things and your experiences so far inside Lucario. In some moment, Lucario decides it is time for talking about your location.

-"I don't have to explain to you the digestive process, do I?"

-"Of course not. But I can't avoid feeling we shouldn't be here. We had lunch like three hours ago, wouldn't the food be coming to this exact point?" - you ask worried.

-"I control almost everything in my body. The food is still in my stomach. It is ready for the next step of the process, but I thought you wouldn't like to be swimming in digested berries. When we're done here I'll empty my stomach."

You laugh, and focus on what is around you. The environment is almost pretty. The villi is strange, and is constantly moving, and everything has a nice shade of pink. Lucario explains to you that if you ever went through the villi you would get to part of the circulatory system that aren't connected to the Heart Concourse you had visited hours ago.

A while later, Lucario speaks again.

-"Okay, do you want to take the challenge I have for you here?" -he says.

-"Depends. I don't see what I could do here, so impress me." He stays silent for a minute and then replies.

-"What would you say if I told you that you could get your senses amplified permanently?". You are stunned. How could that be possible? Lucario is pleased with your expression.

-"There is a place in my body that has an orb like the one that gave you part of my Aura. If you touch that orb, your senses will be amplified instantly to match mine, in terms of strength and ability. These effects will be permanent, and you'll be able to control them. I think you'll like it".

Your excitement grows. It is something you had never expected, even after seeing what Lucario is capable of doing. Gaining something like that just by touching a sphere of energy...

-"That is the reward if you complete the challenge successfully."

-"I...what do I have to do?"

-"You'll just have to find the entrance to the room. There is only one in my whole body."

You start having a bad feeling. "And...where is that?"

-"In my large intestine."

Now your excitement is falling. Going that far inside the bowels of Lucario wasn't in your plans. "It is an important room, and I'm afraid I can't modify it. The only thing you have to do is to find the entrance." you hear him say.

-"But at least it is clean down there, right?" you ask anxiously.

-"It is as clean as a colon can be. I'm not a perfect host, you know. Sorry. At least the air is breathable, considering what is around." he says, almost with guilt.

You think about it. You really don't want to go too far. But the temptation of obtaining the reward is strong. Almost desperate, you beg Lucario to give you clues about its exact location. After a while, he finally answers. "I'll say it once: If you start seeing large amounts of waste, then you have gone too deep" he says annoyed. You don't know if he is serious or not.

After another curve, you see a ring of muscle. You know what is behind it. Lucario turns to you and asks: "Okay, you had time to think about it. Will you try to complete the challenge?"
112111111111111111111112.title: Let's continue with the tour.

1121111111111111111111121.content:
"Okay. I'll stay here. Good luck". Lucario said.

You slowly walked to the entrance, and unconsciously stop breathing. You touch the ring of muscle, and it opens quickly. You run into the large intestine while the entrance sealed behind you.

The tunnel is brightly illuminated, and it is pretty wide. Much to your surprise, you don't see anything nasty around, so you start walking. A few steps later, you're forced to breath. And although the air does have a smell that reminds you of your location, it isn't like the overpowering stench you had imagined it to be. You slowly get used until you don't note it.

You keep walking, and checking your portable map every once in a while. This place isn't as terrible as you thought, the biggest difference is that it has much more slime on the floor and the walls (it almost covers your shoes) than any other place you had visited, but you haven't seen any waste or other remains of food. The yellow-ish walls move constantly, and it is a strange feeling to watch it. The walls are full of veins in strange patterns, and sometimes to run to the wall thinking you had found the entrance, but when you look closer and touch the wall you find out that it was just veins. You're getting a bit frustrated, as you can't find it. You consider contacting Lucario so you don't get bored, but you have no idea what to say.

When you check the map again, you find out that you have seen a bit more than half of the colon, yet you haven't found the entrance to the room you're looking for. Your pride is telling you to keep searching, it is telling you to not to give up. You look in front of you and focus on the long tunnel in front of you, which goes into a curve, the first you see in this place. You're calm, now you know that Lucario wasn't serious about the waste part. You consider going deeper, as you're sure that your host would make it impossible for you to exit his body accidentally, even if you get to the end of the road. But your legs are starting to tire out.

You find a part where there is no slime and sit. Maybe you already got past your objective. After a while of thinking, you decide to...
1121111111111111111111121.title: "The prize is too good. I'll try."

choices: turn into a giant buff lucario
turn into a giant buff machoke
11211111111111111111111211.content:
You continue walking through Lucarios bowels. soon you sigh and think you might never find it. but the prize is too good you have to continue! you keep going until you get tired and decide to rest. you find a spot where its completely dry and sit there. soon you start to think about where it could be. you lean back against the dry wall and suddenly realise something. up until this point everything was wet, but this one section was dry.

You jump up and feel the wall. sure enough it opens into a corridor. You run into it and come to a big room. Lucarios hologram is waiting for you smiling.

"You made it." Lucario said

"Yeah i did." You say, "I was worried that i wasnt. what is this place?"

"This is the heart of my aura." Lucari osaid and points to a big pulsing blue ball of light.

"So you said now i can use your powers? and have your stregnth?" you ask

"Yes and since you got here faster then i thought i;ll throw in something extra i know you'll like." lucario said, "just touch my aura heart. you can just touch it with your hand or even jump into it if you want, you just need to make contact with it."

You run towards it and jump inside. Lucario smiled and jumps in after you. Finally the light flashes and the two of you are out. but oddly lucario was holding a black speedo with a gold belt. it looked exactly like a machokes belt.

"What is that?" You ask

"This is your gift." Lucario said, "When you put it on you can turn into any pokemon you wish and you will recieve and know how to use that pokemons full power. the default form is a lucario so i'll have to modify it if you want to become something else. and also if you press the belt bulcke all your muscles will increase in size and stregnth. but ive limited to how big you can get inside me so you dont make me explode or anything."

"Thats amazing!" You say grabbing it

"Wait i have to warn you" lucario said, "your clothes wont be affected at all so their'll rip off if you get too big. you want to strip down if you want to use it."

"Ok. lets see what should i do first." You say holding it, "I could use it to turn into a huge hulking lucario and have the powers, or i could turn into a big and buff machoke to see the raw muscle."
11211111111111111111111211.title: ...keep going deeper.

choices: Decide on how to help around.
112111111111111111111112111.content:
With the speedo on, you think about a Lucario and in less an a minute you have transformed into a muscle strong Lucario.

Your host Lucario congratulates you on your success and the suggest "In your current form, I think it would be safe that I could let you out in this field I am in."

You are beyond excited to venture out side again. So being so far from his mouth, you decide to try out your gift for teleportation. You think really hard about the mouth and in a second you were worped on his tongue.
You open your eyes to see the light of day. Then you jumped onto his paw and he brought you to the ground. Then you focus really hard about size and you grew to the size of a small preemie Lucario baby.

The Lucario laughs at your success seeing the maximum size that you grew. He says that he has a challenge for you...You shout "I accept" before he finished. He laughs at your enthusiasm knowing you would probably say yes anyway.

"OK, now that you are excited about your transformation. I want you to find the biggest rock in this field and destroy it. This is similar to when you tuck me over, but now you are not as strong. So go and have fun.

You agree, but "what is the reward?" The Lucario though for a second and said "I know of a hot spring not to far from hear. If you win I will take you there."

As soon as he finished, you tuck off running. You tried the Lucario vision, but it was not a big field of vision, but more than you had a second ago. After five minutes of running around you find a nice size rock and then avoided to punch it. That did not work last time so you focused on your aura. You struggled to think of a power ball to throw. After some frustration you tried to focus on clearing your mind since that is how to use "aura". A minute later you feel a little power and tried to throw a ball and a few small chips of rock flew off. Not getting to excited to loss focus you try it again. After a while you throw the last ball exhausted the rock is gone.

The Lucario came over and congratulated you on your success and you smile. He picked you up and when to the hot spring for the rest of the day. Two men and a hot spring. At last it was night, it was time to go back in.

After getting back in bed, you tough how wonderful it was today. With a sigh you wondered about what will happen when this vacation is over and you are still living in your friend. Then about how to repay your friend for all he has done for you. You think he would not accept it, but you are going to do something for him, but what?
112111111111111111111112111.title: Be a Lucario for a day. (Literally)

11211112.content: Where did you decide to go to?
11211112.title: You decide to be random and find something new.

choices: Ask the Arcanine about the holes.
12.content:
It's an Arcanine, the Fire Pokemon. Its reddish fur and black stripes on it body look like ember under the sunlight. The dog-like creature looks at you with curiously with its dark eyes. The giant Arcanine is more than 200 ft tall.

"Hmm...this thing smells like a human but how does it get so small?", Arcanine exclaimed.

"Hey........", you screamed, trying to get its attention. You saw the Pokemon raised it ears a little, apparently hearing your faint call.

"So, you really are a human, but why is it that you're so small? You wouldn't last long out here.", the Arcanine asked you.

"I don't know what happened. I somehow got shrunk walking alone in this forest. For now, I don't know what I can do about my problem.", you said.

The Arcanine looked at you for some time before speaking again: "I can understand your feeling. But then again, you're highly unsafe out here. But don't worry I got an idea. Why don't you live in my body for the time being until we can find out the source to your problem. My body can sustain you with food, water, shelter, and any thing you need."

"That's preposterous!", you exclaimed, "Am I not going to be digested just by entering your stomach, let alone live in your body?"

The Arcanine suddenly give you a little smirk: "You don't have to worry about it. My acids won't affect you because I can control almost everything in my body, so I can "tell" my body to recognize you as a guest, not some food. So you can just allow me to do the rest for you."

The Arcanine opened its mouth and signal for you to enter it. Despite being a little scared about being swallowed down,the Arcanine is right, you wouldn't live long this size alone. Well, you thought, it's better to be with this seemingly nice Arcanine than to venture on in your current form in this mysterious forest. You enter the mouth and you immediately feel the soft tongue beneath you moving. You have a clear view of the Arcanine's rows of sharp teeth glistening with saliva. Moving farther, you come toward the huge gullet where you take a deep plunge into Arcanine. The esophagus is constantly pulsating and moving you toward the stomach.

After traveling for an unknown time, you arrived at the Pokemon's stomach. The stomach is quite huge, the equivalent of huge lobby. There's no acid in the stomach confirming that Arcanine's statement that he won't hurt you. What makes you realize that this Arcanine isn't some ordinary one is the fact that its stomach have more than two holes; you roughly estimate that there are at least 6 holes in here, where could they lead to.

You're thinking about asking the Arcanine or going on alone?
12.title: Arcanine

choices: Stay for while where you are
121.content:
You decided that it's best to ask the Pokemon before trying enter any of the passageways in the stomach.

"Arcanine, I'm now in your stomach, obviously, and I find it quite comfortable in here. The wide space and softness is something I find rather....good. But I have to ask you a few questions? You said that I can live in you and you can sustain me with food and water among many other things,right? I'm just wondering how come you have so many holes in your stomach, do they lead somewhere?" , you asked the Pokemon.

"Well, human. It'll be a long story to explain everything in detail....", Arcanine answers, "But basically, I'm one of the more special Arcanines that you may encounter in this world: I have internal organs that are vastly different from an ordinary Pokemon and I can alter them at my own will. Those holes you're seeing in my stomach now will take you to various parts of my body that I have made to accommodate your stay within me for the time being until we can figure out a solution to your shrunken state. And don't worry, my body is extremely resilient so you won't have to be concerned about hurting me when moving around inside."

"Can you give me some idea about where I can go in your body? I'm getting a little stuffy and bored in this stomach despite it being so huge.", you said.

"From your current location, you should be able to see 6 holes that leads to various tunnels throughout my body.", Arcanine said, "They will take you to the following locations from left to right."

Eyes- My eyes can be used as an observation area for you if you ever want to see the outside world after some time. That chamber will also function as an "Arcanine POV experience" if you ever want to try it.

Brain- The most important part of my body. You can visit this location to have a clearer picture of my inner thoughts or to share with me any of your private thoughts or secrets. I can also allow you to take control of me for some time under certain conditions.

Secondary Stomach- This is the place where you'll be living for the time in me. This stomach contains a living quarter, an eating area and a restroom for your own convenience.

Leisure Place- This is the room where you can do a variety of games, entertainment, etc. with me. In here, you can interact with a virtual 'avatar' of me.

Intestines- This is where the food I ate before goes. It is a long winding path down there. But, in order to keep you safe from outside danger, I won't allow you to travel to the large intestines or exit my body.

Testicles- My reproductive organ. You can visit two of my lovely and huge 'balls'; they are more than able to accommodate you. In that place we can engage in more 'intense' activities if we ever have the urge.

"What do you want to do now, human?"
121.title: Ask the Arcanine about the holes.

choices: Ask Arcanine what else you could do in his eyes.
1211.content:
Presented with a lot of choice to choose from, you tell Arcanine about your decision to go for his eyes since you are interested in Pokemon anatomy.

"Okay, Arcanine, I decided to visit your eyes.", you said, "Umm...Before I go, is there anything that I will find something fascinating there?"

"You sure will.", the Arcanine replied, "Just use the first tunnel from the left to get there. We'll talk again once you get there."

You quietly nodded in agreement as you enter the first and leftmost tunnel in Arcanine's stomach and make your way upward toward it's head. The way up is filled with countless twist and turns, and near-vertical pathways that you have to climb using a lot of strengths. Along your way up you, you encounter what seems to be "floors" and each of them has a hole which no doubt leads to other parts within Arcanine. Maybe, this passageway also allows me to visit the Arcanine's hearts, lungs, and spines, you thought to yourself. You decided to explore them later once you visited the eyes.

After moving through the fleshy tunnel for up to half an hour, you arrived at a puckered-up opening. You move toward the opening and pried the pink fleshy pucker with your hand. It opened with ease, as if Arcanine intended to welcome you into a new part of his body. When you get your body completely within the hole, you find yourself in a large chamber surrounded by fleshy walls, purple veins, and a strange, slimy liquid. The most astounding features that you see in this elliptical space are two extremely huge, white spheres. The size of the spheres are so tremendous that it made the observatory sphere you saw months ago small in comparison (think about the EPCOT ball). There are also several wide strand of flesh that are holding the spheres in their place. Those strands of muscle attached themselves, in a web-like fashion, to the walls of the chamber you're in. You approached one of the spheres, completely fixated and amazed by its size.

'Could this be......', you thought, '....the eyes...? But how did they get this huge?'

"It's due to the fact that you're so small, it makes my body parts looks rather gargantuan from your perspective.", Arcanine suddenly spoke, "Those spheres you see before you are my beautiful eyes. Obviously, they are one of the important parts of my body. If you want to, you can enter one of them and see the surprises within. It's safe for you to move around, you won't hurt me in the process."

The way the Arcanine said the word 'surprises' has caught your curiosity. You move yourself even closer to Arcanine's eyeball. You choose the left one since there wouldn't be a difference which one you enter. When viewed closer, you realized that the eyes are covered in a think mucus-like substance. You touched the surface with your bare hand. It feels slimy and warm and it has a faint pulse to it.

Then...the strangest of things happened. Despite its solid appearance, you feel that you can push your hand deeper into the eyeball. For some reasons, the fleshy just dissipate where your body comes into contact with it.

"This....has...to be one, weird 'inside story' exploration you're taking me through, Arcanine.", you thought as you pushed you're body against the slime-covered 'eye-wall' and travel deeper into the eye itself.

Eventually, all that remains outside the eyes are you feet, which you quickly pulled in without much effort. You find yourself in a spherical room that resembles a large auditorium. Strangely enough, there is also a stair made of flesh near the edge that allows you to move to a high place within the eyeball. Certainly, the Arcanine has an extraordinary body to make it easier for you to access.

Shrugging, you took the stairs upward. When you came to the end of the staircase, you find yourself on some kind of "observation deck" that has enough room for only one-person. From this vantage point, you can see a circular opening that is showing the forest you were just in hours ago. You assumed that Arcanine is still in the woods moving toward who-knows-where.

"Ahh...so you have finally arrived at the Observation deck.", you hear the Arcanine said, "If you ever got bored, this is the place for you to enjoy 'live' images of the outside world; occasionally, it will be refreshing to see something other than fleshes and veins."

"Uhmm..certainly.", you said.

The view Arcanine is seeing continue to change before you, from wide meadows to pristine creeks to sun-mottled woods. They're beautiful, beyond human description. Seeing thing through the eyes of a Pokemon is a tantalizing experience and it made you think whether you could do something else in the eye.

"So, what would you do now?"
1211.title: In the Eyes

12111.content:
After sitting on the 'observation deck' and indulging yourself in seeing Arcanine's POV, you gradually become bored at the repetitive scenes before you. Plains, forests, meadows, flowers.........It made you a bit sleepy seeing the same stuffs over and over again despite the fact that Arcanine is traveling deeper into the forest.

Out of curiosity, you ask the Arcanine what else you can do in his eyes.

"Many other things", Arcanine replied, "I knew you would be bored in there. So, why don't you try out the "Vision Capture" on the observation deck. It could be fun for you, human."

"What's that?", you asked, "Sounds like some kinda interesting stuff."

"It is, indeed. I often used that innate function to record my daily activities so I can create a log of what I've done. I often used it to remember the Pokemons that I have encountered, the roads I have taken, and many other track-keeping purposes."

"That's cool, how did you come to have that ability?", you inquired.

"Arcanines are often described to have good memories and senses.", Arcanine said, "The "Vision Capture" is a Pokemon technique that all Arcanines naturally have at its birth. It basically works like this: Once I used the move, from that point on, everything I see will be 'recorded' and transmitted into my brain for storage. If you're interested, you can access the database at your 'bedroom', which I'm going to lead you to later."

You getting to like this Arcanine more and more with each passing minute. Maybe being inside a Pokemon isn't a bad thing at all, you thought.

"You've had me curious.", you tell Arcanine, "So how do we start this "Vision Capture" experience, then?"

"It's relatively easy. I'll be the one who activate the move. But ...don't get disappointed from your lack of control. For your amusement, you can capture any images and films with my eyes while I'm doing the "recording". Those images and "videos" will be sent to your "bedroom" where you can view them in private."

"So, do you want to try it out, now?", the Arcanine asked you.
12111.title: Ask Arcanine what else you could do in his eyes.

121111.content:
"Yeah, I'll give it a try." You replied. "Great! Just go to that console on the observation deck." Arcanine Instructed. You do as instructed and you see what looks like a huge computer screen on front of you.

A computer screen....within a Pokemon? That's unheard of, you thought. When you moved closer to the the computer screen, you realized that it is made of some kind of soft membrane that is soft to the the touch. It's slightly slippery and wet, in some ways similar to what you would feel when you touch a plastic wrapper. The instance you touched the screen, it refreshes and a few words materialized on it.

"Hi there, human. This screen is the "Vision Capture" I talked about earlier.", the words said, "While I often performed the "Vision Capture" move myself, the screen allows you to use my move at will."

The screen before you again changed its content. It is now showing two buttons: "Take Snapshot" and "Record".

You don't know were to begin.

"Just press either "Take Snapshot" Or press "Record" to start the vision capture." You looked at the panel for a few moments before making your decision. You waited for Arcanine to look at something interesting. All of a sudden, Arcanine came to a large lake in the forest. The pristine, blue water of the lake gleams in the sunlight, shimmering harmoniously along with the wind. A picturesque environment that is only known to wild Pokemons. You quickly pressed the "Take Snapshot" Button and waited for a few seconds before seeing an image of your snapshot appear on the panel. There was a message reading "Would you like to save this snapshot?" You pressed yes and the screen read "Snapshot saved to brain-databank." Presumably, you thought, Arcanine is probably able to store up to billions if not more of videos and snapshots based on his need to keep track of his record.

Once you tried "Vision Capture", you were having a bit of fun. You then Started to record the vision on the "Vision Capture" The recording showed Arcanine walking around the lake and back into the forest and even encountered another Pokemon. You kept recording. The Pokemon was a Chikorita. The Chickorita used razor leaf. Arcanine easily dodged it and countered with flame-thrower. The Chokorita was engulfed in flames. After the smoke settled the Chickorita had already fled. You stopped recording and pressed yes to save it to the brain.

"So, what do you think?" Arcanine asked. "It's awesome, it's like making your own movie!" You replied with glee. Arcanine smiled again and then asked. "What do you want to do next?"

You think for a moment before finally deciding to......
121111.title: Using "Vision capture"

1211111.content:
You used the vision capture for a little while longer, but eventually there wasn't anything interesting on screen to record or capture. You decided to ask Arcanine about were the images and videos were saved. "So, were are the vision captures saved?" you asked. "They are saved to your personal bedroom like I said before." Arcanine said. "You can view images and videos in HD in your bedroom." He finished. You traveled back to your "Room" and thought about what to do next. You could sit in your room and see that things you saved on "Vision capture." Or you could explore more of Arcanines massive body.

After thinking for a while, you decide to......
1211111.title: Decisions, decisions

choices: Take a Quick Bath and Explore
12111111.content:

13.content:
As you squint you eyes, you see that the huge Pokemon before you is a Luxray, the Gleam Eyes Pokemon. You have seen this Pokemon a dozen of times on your journey but this is the first time that you have seen one this huge and up close. You look at your surrounding and discovered that you are standing right next to one of its huge black paws. Its claws shimmer in the dappled sunlight of the forests.

The Luxray trained its gold-crimson eyes upon you curiously.

"That is strange, I never seen a bug like this before", the Luxray said.

".....You...can.... talk?", you managed to exclaimed.

"Whoa...What a surprise! This bug can talk?", the Pokemon replied.

"I'm not a bug, I'm a Pokemon trainer. And I should be the one to ask you the same question...How can you talk?.", you yelled in response.

"Oh..easy there, little guy. If you really are a human and a trainer then why are you so small? And by the way, I'm not talking, I'm using telepathy.", the Luxray asked as it tilts its head in wonder.

"I don't know. I was walking in this forest for some rest when I just abruptly shrunk without any apparent reasons.", you said., "Do you have any idea?

As you said so, you find a small rock and climb onto it.

"Unfortunately, I don't...But I do know that in your current form, you are a rather attractive prey to the wild Pokemons in this forest. They would eat you right away without any hesitation", the Luxray replied.

That answer sends a shiver down your spine.

"But, you're in luck today.", the Pokemon said, "I'm not the kind who randomly eat things and I'm full right now....So, let's make a little deal. I can keep you safe from those dangers. You won't have to worry about anything. In those time, we will figure out how to make you normal again."

You look at the Luxray with some suspicion. "This is getting very very bizarre", you thought, "First, I got shrunk in the middle of the forest and now, this Pokemon wants to protect me for the time being.....It's beyond my comprehension."

Luxray's request has left you a bit struggled.

"Are you still doubting my intentions? If I were lying to you, I'd probably would have already made you my supper.", the Luxray says.

"Um.....al...right. What do you mean by protection?", you asked.

"This will surely interests you, the lion-like Pokemon says, " I'm going to protect you by allowing you to live inside my body. I can provide the food, water, and all other necessities."

Your face went a bit pale...."But... but.....doesn't that mean that I'm going to be eaten by you and die? That's just.... extremely disagreeable to say the least."

"I assure you that it won't end that way. Well you see, despite my mundane appearance outside, I have very different internal anatomy capable of sustaining a human. I will not digest you. Trust me.", the Luxray says in a genuine manner.

"Okay, whatever you say."

The moment the Luxray heard your reply, he crouches down onto the ground, bringing its face to your level. Right in front of you, you saw the Pokemon opened its cavernous mouth. Almost immediately, you the warm, moist air emanating from the mouth. You also saw Luxray's short white fangs coated with drools before you. From their appearance, it looks they can easily bite something in half. Despite Luxray's assurance, you still hesitate a little. Without knowing it, you brought your eyes in contact with Luxray's. The excited and firm expression in those gold-crimson eyes have somehow convey to you the message that the Pokemon is telling the truth.

"Just stop worrying already. I'll keep you safe, there's absolutely no need to be afraid", the Luxray says.

"Are you ready?", the Pokemon asks.
13.title: An encounter with Luxray

131.content:
Looking the Luxray's wide-open mouth, you still ponder about whether to enter. You have just met this Pokemon for a little more than half an hour ago and you are still unclear with the situation surrounding you. But you realized that the Luxray has a point: you are now small and vulnerable, and the fact is you'll make a good prey among the many wild Pokemons in this forest.

After thinking about all the other possible options, many of which are unrealistic in your opinion, you decided to take your chance with the Luxray. Together, you both with find time to figure out the why you were shrunk?

"Here I go.", you said.

"Enter...and enjoy..human.", the Luxray said enigmatically.

Slowly, you walked toward the Luxray's mouth and onto the pink tongue before you. It is soft, slimy, and cover with drools. You feel yourself slightly trembling because you have never literally 'enter the belly of a beast' before. You eventually come to the gullet. You looked down and saw a dark fleshy cave that extends deep down into the Pokemon. Normally, this passage is reserved for food and other unsuspecting preys to meet a gruesome end in the stomach . But today, it will become the entrance to your new, organic "home" in Luxray.

You gathered your courage and started to walk down the slippery floor of the gullet. Before going deeper, you turned your head back to the entrance. From this vantage point, Luxray's fangs and teeth framed the forest outside, making you wonder whether this is the last sight that preys would see before they die.

Realizing that you are fully in his mouth, the Luxray slowly closed its gaping jaw, engulfing you in near darkness. You continue to descend down esophagus, feeling the walls around you pulsating to the sound of gentle heartbeats. From your perspective, the "passage way" is about 15 feet wide and 7 feet tall. As a way of mitigating your uncertainty, you imagine that you are just traveling in one of the countless dark tunnels that you encountered on your journey to be a Pokemon Master.

You traveled downward for another 5 minutes before you finally reached the stomach. The end of the esophagus is so slippery that you lost your balance and slide right down into the stomach, falling onto spongy floors and some liquids. Besides that, there is nothing else. No acids, no undigested stuffs, spotless.

"Hi, trainer, are you finding my stomach rather comfortable? Again, I will not digest you in there. Feel free to explore around and if you got questions, feel free to ask me.", said the Luxray.

"Wait a minute, didn't you just said that you are already full? Then why is your stomach completely empty?", you asked.

The Luxray gave you a little laugh..:"Ha ha....I was just using a figure of speech you humans would understand. As a Luxray, my primary source of food is sunlight and electricity. That leaves my 'extra' organs like my stomach capable of other uses, like allowing a human to live in me."

"That explains a lot.", you said.

You take a closer look at Luxray's stomach. It's the size is about a large bedroom. You decided to lie down for a short rest on the soft floor. Then, something strange caught your attention.....There are three holes in Luxray's stomach. Seeing this, you inquire the Pokemon.

"I forgot to tell you something", said Luxray, "There are three areas you can go in my body: A Personal Stomach, My "Center", and some parts of my bowels and reproductive organ. In short, here are some basic info:

--Personal Stomach: Your private living quarter.

--My "Center": An 'observation deck' for a Pokemon experience. Experience Luxray first hand.

--The third part is self-explanatory


"Are you going to rest for while or do you want to know me a little better?", asked Luxray affectionately.
