1311.title: Your new bedroom.

13112.content:
You decided to check out some other parts of Luxray's body because you are just waaaay too excited to sleep. Being in a Pokemon is something you have never dreamed of happening. Maybe being shrunk isn't so bad after all, you thought. After traveling back to the First Stomach, you look at the three passageways before you again. This time, you decided to take the one on the left. You make your way across the spongy floor to reach the entrance. Although it basically looks the same as the tunnel you used to travel to the Personal Stomach (bedroom+restroom), you have a feeling that this one is heading upward in an inclined fashion through Luxray's interior. You decided to ask Luxray about where the holes lead to before making your way further up.

"There are many things for you to see along this passage way, all of them probably of interest to you. Do you want me to talk more about them?"

"I want to know more about your awesome interiors", you said.

"Well, human, there are many things along this passage, but I recommend you first visit these 3 places along the way up", the Luxray says.,"That way, It'll make your stay within me even more enjoyable.

Food Area- A place within me that can be used to store food for you. Berries, fruits, vegetables,waters, and so on. If you got tired of having those, I can provide you with some meats if you ever need them. And, as a plus for you, you're able to use the electricity to cook up the materials I've stored in there to make yourself some meals resembling your typical human foods. Don't worry about the effects of heat and smoke on me, they will be exhausted along with waste air from my lungs. Be sure to take a look.

Water Room - If you ever felt dirty and tired, this is the place you should go to. It is basically a small chamber with warm water for you to take a bath when you need it. I have added some elements into the water to make it very effective at cleaning you up; it's the same stuffs that I use in my saliva. But the water in this room is safe for you to use.

Eyes- As a trainer, you may know that we Luxrays have very good vision that can virtually see through everything. This ability has helped me find you in the first place. By visiting this part, you can see the world from my point-of-view, what the life of a Pokemon is like. And, of course, this place includes my famous Luxray Vision. Other than that, I know places where we can find lots of female trainers,sometimes when we are truly bored, maybe we can ...heh...heh...I definitely hope you check it out.

"Hmm...those 2 places sound kinda fun", you said.

"Once you visit those places, I'm sure it'll be more than just fun for you.", the Luxray said.

So where do you like to go first?
13112.title: More things in Luxray's body

choices: Ask Luxray to modify your Pokedex.
131121.content:
I want to check out your eyes first, you tell the Luxray.

"Excellent choice", the Luxray replied happily, "You would most definitely find my beautiful eyes to be somthing worth exploring. Alright then, let's make your way upward to my head."

Immediately, you take the tunnel on the left hand side, sqeezing yourself through its soft opening and into a long fleshy tunnel that leads up toward Luxray's eyes. On your way up, you saw two other holes that without doubt either leads to the "Food Area" or the "Water Room". You made the decesion that you will explore them some times later. The passageway is extremely steep, even more than that volcano you climbed while you're in Hoenn, battling an annoying bunch of slipshod trainers during your ascent. The brief recollection brought back good memories of your adventures. But now, you're on a new adventure. This time, instead of fighting to become the Pokemon Master of each region, you get to explore the endless 'inner World' of a Pokemon thanks to your mysterious shrinking

Eventually, you got to the end of the fleshy passage and saw a puckered 'portal'. What's beyond is still a mystery to you. You gather up your courage and go forward to stretch open the pickered hole. It gave way with rlatovely little effort as if Luxray's body is expecting you to enter the chamber beyond. Within a minute, you made yourself comfortabke in the new chamber.

As you gradullay settle down, you take a good look at your new surrounding. The room is about 8 ft wide and 9 ft tall, a moderately-sized one within Luxray. The room is brightly lit from natural light. You see two large semicircle windows in front of you. Both of them have golden and crimson tints to it. You believe that you have reached the eyes of Luxray, which to your surprise contains no eyeballs. Rather, the chamber has more resemblence to a central computer control room.

With your curiosity intensifying by the second, you move yourself closer to one of the "windows" and look out. From the Pokemon's 'eye-window', you now can see that Luxray is on a narrow forest route that is between a plain and the forest itself, traveling at a casual pace. You recognize the road as "Route 42" which connects your hometown with the next city. At the speed Luxray is traveling, you will arrive at a vast lake where you have to use a surf in a few minutes.

"Hi there , human.", Luxray said, "Isn't it nice to see roadways and nature from my perspective?"

"uhmm...yeah, quite so.", you said, "There is one thing I have to ask you. How can I use you 'Luxray Vision' in this chamber?"

"Well....it's easy.", said Luxray, "You can either tell me to activate it or you can use your Pokedex to do it, with many more features in the latter. But in order to do so, you'll have to allow me to modify and 'sync' your Pokedex to be compaitable with my body's electrkcity and functions."

"So, what will it be for you?", Luxray asked.
131121.title: Luxray Vision Live

choices: Ask Luxray for other places to visit.
1311211.content:
"I guess that modifying my Pokedex will be a better idea" you say. You look around for a clue of how Luxray could do it, yet you don't see anything. "But how can you do that?"

"I'm an electric Pokémon. I have a natural ability, I can work with your human technology with my own electricity. Some...sparks in the right parts of the machines and they will work differently. I can't explain it, it just comes with my type" Luxray replies with a chuckle "Just leave your Pokédex on the floor and step back. You won't want to get shocked, it would hurt as hell".

You obey and go to the entrance to the eye. In just seconds, you see sparks of electricity jumping to the Pokédex, hitting it. The last one hit it so hard that the machine jumped high, and fell on the soft floor again, unharmed.

"It is done. I'm afraid the changes are permanent, so you'll have to buy a new Pokédex when you have your normal size again. But it has many options that will be useful on your stay in my body. The Pokédex is now synchronized with my own brain, so you can see your own location on a map installed. You also can check data about the organ you're in, and if there are any possible activities in there. Finally, its search function was modified so you can type something and your machine will give you results related to what you typed".

You're amazed at what Luxray can do. You recover quickly and ask "But what happened about your vision? It was supposed to be modified just for that".

"Turn on your Pokédex, and select the eyes. There are some organs where you now can perform an action for your own enjoyment without needing to ask me, and this is one of them."

You open the map, and effectively see that it was replaced with a silhouette of Luxray. You tap on the head and it zooms in, and you're able to see the eyes. You tap on the eyes and a new window opens, with information about the eyes and what they can do. On the side, there is one button that is glowing, and you press it. The screen of the Pokédex changes and turns into the same scenery Luxray is seeing. Instructions appear on the screen: "Tap on the screen to use the Luxray vision".

You tap on a random point of the screen and everything turns gold, except a circle on the exact point you tapped. You move your finger through the screen and the circle moves. You tap on a nearby tree, and the circle moves there. You note that you can see inside the tree. There are some Bug Pokémon, and many shapes close to them. You zoom in and you note that those shapes are berries.

You take some minutes directing Luxray to places you wanted to check with the Luxray vision, and you examine everything. Finally, you get bored about it and close the Luxray vision. Wanting to explore more, you activate the search function. You see that, besides a place where you can type, there are other options, where you can tick the options you want to use.
"Places for everyday life" "Places to train Luxray" "Places within Luxray's systems" between other options.

You decide to...
1311211.title: Ask Luxray to modify your Pokedex.

13112111.content:
You decided to use your Pokedex to do a search on where you could go next. You typed "nearest destination" onto the search bar and allowed the Pokedex to run through the available locations. The search bar returned one result: the brain. Curious, you click on the icon. Almost immediately you see the screen on your Pokedex refresh and display new information about Luxray's brain:

Luxray's brain is composed of dozens of areas each with its own function and secrets. Areas that you may visit include behavior, memory, regulatory, and "moves". When you visit each of these areas, you will learn more about Luxray. If necessary, Luxray's brain also has an spare region to allow you to live there.

From what you see on your Pokedex, Luxray still has a lot of places to show so you headed for the brain.

You left the Eye Chamber and headed back to the main tunnel. You continued upward on the soft inclined path. Along the way, you wondered how is it possible the Luxray make his brain accessible to you. Does that mean that he could share his memory with you? You decided that is something that you want to find out when you accessed Luxray's memory later on.

It didn't take up much time for you to get there with the proximity of the eyes to the brain. When you entered the brain, you see a massive chamber before you. There is veins running all across the ceiling, floor, and walls around you. Surprisingly, there seems to be tunnels that branch to other areas in the brain.

Suddenly, you felt your Pokedex rumbling. You brought the screen up to you face to see what is going on. "Hello again, human.", the voice on the Pokedex said. You immediately recognized the voice as that of Luxray. When you take a more careful look at the screen, you see that your location has been updated to "Luxray's Brain" with a blinking blue dot at the relevant location. There is also a program called LuxTalk that is open on your Pokedex device.

"You can talk to me through my Pokedex?", you asked.

"Yea, of course.", Luxray replied, " I was thinking that the brain wave around here might be too strong for you to handle; imagine yourself hearing my voice like it is now. Multiply that by 100 and you'll get the idea of the intensity of my brain power.....With the LuxTalk I installed on your Pokedex, that problem is instantly solved. Additionally, if you got tired of speaking all the time, you can also text your message to me and I'll be more than happy to reply to you in typed form."

"Well, back to the main topic.", Luxray said, "You are now currently at teh main room of my brain. As you can see, there are tunnels that branch out into various other parts of my brain. The first one to your left will take to the Behavior Area. Over there, you will learn more about my predatory, character, and even sexual behavior in very interactive ways."

"How?", you asked.

"Why don't you go there and discover for yourself.....I've saved just for you....", the Luxray said with a smirk.
13112111.title: Make a search.

131121111.content:
"Why not? After all, it isn't like I won't have time to check everything here. Let's start with this" you thought. Shrugging, you start to walk to the tunnel where you would find the Behavior Area. It was a pretty short walk, and you entered into a dome-shaped room. It wasn't as big as he stomach, but it still was huge, at least to you.

There was a strange shape in the center, and in the frontal part the texture of the wall was different. It didn't have the trademark texture of the brain, it didn't have any folds or even a pink color. It was gray and smooth. You approach the strange blob in the center, and you realize it is some sort of chair, when looked from the front. You sit on it, and the wall in front of you lights up and turn into lighter color, meaning it is a screen.

Your Pokédex lights up, and you realize you're still holding it. You look at it and see text. The Pokédex was in a section where it explained the activities you could do in the brain, and had a part highlighted. "You can use the Pokédex for many things. Use its buttons." Puzzled, you press on and the screen changes again. It shows some sort of menu, listing five or six possible options. You select "Predatory Behavior", and press a button again. Then behind you, something emerges from the chair and envolves your head and hands.

"Relax, those are sensors that will turn this more interesting. You will receive slight shocks that will affect your own brain and you'll feel like you're the one performing the actions". The thught of being shocked doesn't sound fun, but it isn't like you have other options. "Eh...okay, whatever" you say nervously. Luxry may have noted soemthing in your voice, because he immediately asks "Are you uncomfortable? Maybe you would rather to watch it like, say, a movie. Just watching it".
131121111.title: Enter the Behavior Area

choices: You hesitate, and ask for more explanations before getting in
1312.content:
-"Okay, the "Center" sounds good"
-"Walk straight until the middle of the stomach and then look at your right. There is the entrance to it. You'll have to ascend to my head, but it'll be worth it."

You don't like the idea of having to go up all the way to Luxray's head, but you're too curious about the "experience" Luxray offered you. You get up and go to the entrance. The path to the Center is very titled, and you again feel like leaving the exploration of the head for later or maybe tomorrow. After breathing deep you start to walk. You're not used to the spongy floor of Luxray's body yet, and in some parts it is so inclined that you have to use your hands to advance without falling back to the stomach, but you keep going.

While climbing what you suppose is some passage in Luxray's neck, you see some tunnels and entrances, and you decide to explore them after you see everything in the "Center". "Anatomically, at least one would lead to Luxray's respiratory system, but who knows what surprises there could be around here", you think just before seeing one last ring on top of the road, and you hope it is the end of the passage. You calculate it took you nine or ten minutes to go from the stomach to where you are now.

You open the ring, and take a look to the new room you entered. It is rounder than the stomach, and bigger. It seemed to have two floors, and some small stairs at one side of the room. The ground floor was hard and flat, and the room was ful of natural light, but it didn't have much in it. However, it had two big window-like objects, which you suppose are Luxray's eyes. You approach to them, and try to look through the "glass". You see the forest, but feel a bit dissapointed that Luxray's vision seems so...normal. Then you notice that the floor near the eyes sounds different than the rest of the floor of Luxray's head, and you deduce that directly below of where you're standing there must be another chamber, hopefully one where you can experience the advantages of Luxray's enhanced eyes.

You hear something above you, so you look up. You're impressed of what you see. Above you there is what you suppose is Luxray's brain, on the second floor. It is much bigger than you, and seems to be full of activity, controlling everything in Luxray's body. You slowly go upstairs, always looking at the brain. When you stand at 10 feet of it, you hear noises again, this time louder. Listening more carefully, you recognize the noise as the sounds of nature, the wind, etc. Even higher there are two holes, each at one side. They seem to be from the ears, but you don't see how to get to them for now, so you look again to the brain. Luxray seems to feel your presence, and his telepathy almost sounds like he is yelling at your ear, and you suppose he sounds so loud because you're so close to his brain. Going back to the stairs you stop there and request the Luxray to repeat what he said.

-"Are you curious about my brain?"
-"Of course yes"- you reply-"It is an amazing sight"
-"Want to get in it? It is the source to my power, all my senses are intensified there and you could even control me for a while"-Luxray said.
-"Wow...is that even possible? I mean, how would I be able to control you?"
-"Get in my brain and you'll see how"
1312.title: Luxray's Center

choices: Check out more of what's in Luxray's brain.
13121.content:
"Alright, I'll check out your brain right now.", you said, "I'm sure there will be a lot to see in there."

"Go ahead. You'll be blown away by the sight..", Luxray said playfully.

From the second floor of Luxray's 'head chamber', the brain is huger than you imagine, possibly able to accommodate a large Pokemon gym you visited a few months ago. The second floor also gave you a good view of the two windows (Luxray's Eyes) you saw earlier. The Luxray now seem to be traveling in a beautiful meadow within the forest. You momentarily paused to see the beautiful flowers and trees before continuing your way toward the brain. Arriving at the front of it, you see no apparent placed from where you can enter.

"Uh-mm...Luxray, how exactly can I enter your brain to control you since I see no entrance around here?", you asked.

"You can enter it by using the countless folds outside my brain, any of them would do the trick.", replied Luxray.

"Thanks for telling me.", you said as you approach a large fold near you. You entered the crevice and make your way literally toward the center of Luxray's brain. The brain walls sort of squish you tightly, but it allows just enough room for you to move sideways. After traveling for what you think is 5 minutes, you arrived at a small room somewhere in the brain. You take your time to look at your new surrounding. The floor of the room is kinda squishy and has a lot of small crevices from the fact that the chamber is in the brain. The room is lit by the same kind of light bulb-like fixtures you saw throughout Luxray's body, powered by the Pokemon's internal electricity. Near the center of the room, there seems to be a circular dome of a darker shade of pink. You went over to take a closer look at it. From the size of the dome, you believe that it probably can only allow for one person to stand on and use. Before you can open your mouth to ask the Luxray, the Pokemon's voice reached you head, sounding loud from the fact that you are at the "center" of Luxray.

"I sensed that you have arrived at the 'command center' in my brain.", the Luxray said, "And you were asking about how you can control for some time, right? Well step onto the 'control dome' and I'll tell you more."

You made your way toward the dome you saw previously and you making your way to the top. The flesh and the slime has made it a bit difficult for you to ascend the dome. Once you reaced the top, you find that there is a small depression that you can get into. You move yourself toward that place. Almost immediately, several strands of 'brain muscle' materialize from the wall of the brain chamber. The cord-like strands are about 1ft in diameter and covered with red veins. The next thing you saw is the strands are latching unto your hands and legs, completely surrounding them as if you are wearing gloves and socks. Strangely enough, the "gloves" and "socks" gradually change their shapes into Luxray's paws and hindlegs, complete with black and blue fur. Despite the addition of the strands, you discover that you can still freely move around on the dome. Then, the Luxray begin to speak again.

"Okay, it looks like you're ready.", said the Luxray telepathically, "Don't worry about those things that i've attached to you. They are for sensing your movement to control me. Both the dome and those muscle strands are part of the control mechanism within me. All you have to do now is to get down on all four and you're good to go.

You did as Luxray instructed, falling down on your legs and arms, making it look that you're crawling. Immediately, the chamber around you suddenly brighten up and you saw a wide (180o) view of Luxray's vision, showing the field you saw previously; you assumed that the images are transmitted from the 'head chamber' outside and merged to form this "IMAX screen". But you can also feel and hear the winds around you as if you're actually a Luxray.

"Let me explain a little about how to control me. To move me around, you just have to move your arms and legs in the desired direction; all my movements at this point will be exactly what you are doing right now.", you hear the Luxray said, "Basically, you're now temporarily me. But for your and my safety, you can only control my movement and you have to remain in this field; currently, you cannot use any of my powers and abilities. We'll get to that when you familiarize yourself with me over the long term."

Despite being unable to use any of Luxray's ability, you are already excited about controlling the Pokemon. After a few tries, you learned to walk and run on four legs. The experience is awesome. It gives you a sense of being "wild". You run around the fields for an hour, chasing some Bug Pokemons and randomly sprinting about. Eventually you got exhausted and tired. you tell Luxray that you want to rest. Almost immediately, the Pokemon re-assumed control of his body.

"You are kinda good at running and sprinting; you probably even be an excellent Pokemon if you ever were one.", the Luxray said, "There are many other parts in my brain that contains a lot of things you would like or do you wish to explore other parts of my body."
13121.title: Luxray's Brain

choices: Enter through one of the nearest entrances.
131212.content:
You decide to continue exploring. After all, you only have seen a very small part of Luxray's body, and who knows what other surprises you may find around.

You get out of the brain and go back to the entrance of the Center. You look around to see if there are other entrances but you don't see any. You finally decide to continue. After you are again in the path you used to get in the Center, you choose the entrance nearer to you. It was going to the left (from your point of view) and although there are many other possibilities to explore, you decide to do it in some sort of order.

You open the entrance. You walk for a short while until you arrive to a large tunnel, and it seemed to be made of bones. It was brightly iluminated, but not by the bulb-like objects you had already found in some parts of Luxray's body. Above you there was large sections of bone. Above you, there is some sort of thick wire-like object, the spinal cord. Due to your actual size, it was humongous. You see constant sparks of electricity going through it, iluminating the road. You look to your right and see it stops in front of a wall, meaning the brain is directly at the other side of the wall. You decide to go to your left, since you had no interest on going back to the brain for now. "So, I'm inside the spine...it is supposed to be a long path, from the head to the tail." Then you notice many entrances at both sides of the tunnel. You look as far as you can and see more and more entrances. You realize there are dozens of organs you could go, most of them unexplored. You also wonder if you could go all the way until the tail, and if there was rooms too. You decide to...
131212.title: Explore other areas

choices: Go explore through the abdominal passage
1312122.content:
There seemed to be countless options, and you are anxious to explore all of them. However, you decide to keep walking, just to know how big is Luxray's body, and to try to calculate how much time would it take you to explore everything he had to offer. Your head spins at the thought of all the surprises you could find.

Looking back, you calculate that there are approximately 106 feet from where you started, the brain. Then you look to the rest of the spine, or as far as you can. You can't see the end of it yet, even with the electricity of the spine. You start walking and try to ignore all the entrances you see. You try to imagine what would you find through them and what organs are close to you right now, but you know you won't be able to know what is behind the many possibilities if you don't explore.

Snapping out of your imagination for a moment, you notice that you still can't see the end of the spine. You look back again and try to count how many feet you have walked by now. You think you have walked 2600 feet, yet you keep walking. You're sure that if the spine was so long (for your point of view) then there would be lots of places to visit. And seeing how you won't be getting out of Luxray's body (or too far from it) for a while, you have lots of free time.

10 minutes later, you notice the wire-like spinal cord seemed to be ending. It narrowed and finally ended, but the bone path continued. After a while you find two new roads, strangely enough, both with signs above them. You don't pay any attention to the fact of there being signs inside a living being and concentrate on where you could go now. Both paths seems to be going down.

Directly in front of you, the spine continues, without spinal cord. It goes down, yet seems to slightly move. The sign above it has an arrow pointing forward and says "Tail". There is more text, but the first word is enough for you to know where it is going, but you can't avoid wondering if there is something to find down there. You don'r read the rest of the sign, just to make it more exciting to explore.

Then you look to your left. It is a slightly lower than the spine tunnel, but it is still pretty big for you. The sign above you says: "Abdominal Passage. A tunnel from your actual location, ending in the chest" You walk into it, just to explore a bit of it. It seems to continue in some sort of curve, and it is difficiult to not to fall down and roll to wherever it goes. Later, it turns to be easier to walk. Remembering where you are, you deduce the tunnel goes down the side of the large intestine, making the big curve, then around other organs. You walk back to the spine, counting eight entrances. It is hard, but you finally get back to the spine. You try to deduce which organs you could access from that passage, and think three possible organs, making you even more curious as to what you could find.

Before picking, you remember to calculate how long is the spine. You finally stop at 5000 feet, not wanting to keep adding more numbers, even if you knew there was much more than it.

After a while, you decide to...
1312122.title: Keep walking.

13121221.content:
You decide to explore the tail. You know there are many other options through the abdominal passage, but first you wan to know if there is any possible destinations in the tail. And you don't want to ask Luxray, you want it to be a surprise. Even if you don't find anything you would have explored and that is enough for you right now.

You put a hand in the bone wall of the spine and start walking. Back to when you was a trainer, you had noticed that pokemon seemed to move their tails a lot, yet the one you're exploring isn't moving very much. You think that either the bones in the tail doesn't move as much as the rest, or Luxray felt you and wanted to make it easier for you to explore. It still moves sometimes, and when it moves you stop and try to grab to the bone, so you don't fall down. The risk of falling adds some emotion to the walk, but you still can't avoid to curse when you hit the hard floor.

Suddenly, the tail moves harder and you trip. You can't stop rolling, the floor is very tilted. You go too fast to appreciate the enviroment around you. After a while, you finally stop. You stand and look around. The floor isn't tilted anymore, it is almost straight. Above you there is where you came, the rest of the spine. You can't think of a way for you to go back to the body, at least without Luxray's help.

Then you notice there is an entrance in front of you. You approach to it and look around to try to find a sign or something that could tell you what is behind it. You don't find any, so you open the door-like wall, and with your eyes closed you enter. After the entrance closes you see you're in a round room, with some sort of dome in it. There are sounds of electricity, and it seemed to come from the dome. You approach to it and you notice it is almost transparent, yet it has a slight purple color. Inside it, there are sparks and you can feel static electricity around you. It doesn't hurt, but is a very strange experience, hard to describe. You decide to ask Luxray where are you.

"You're inside one of my Electric Generation Organs. Every electric pokemon has some of these scattered through their body, most of them concentrated in the part of their bodies that uses most of the electricity. You may use the electricity from them for many uses, depending of your location. Right now there isn't practical use for it in the tail, though. The dome in it is what produces electricity. Go ahead, touch it"

You try to process the information, specially the "touch it". If it is an electricity generator, wouldn't it hurt? After all, it was electricity, and electric attacks are very strong. Then you remember that Luxray wouldn't hurt you, so you touch the dome. Your hair stands and you feel the electricity through your body, but it still doesn't hurt. You feel the same thing you felt when you was approaching it, but it was much stronger and felt strangely good. You close your eyes and just focus on the feeling. You finally open your eyes, and realize you touched the dome for many minutes, yet you don't care. You walk around it to know its size, keeping your hands on it so the sensation doesn't stop. It is pretty big, and it takes you a while to go around it. You find some sort of entrance to the dome. You stop and look into it, it seemed to go down and to the center of the dome.

You enter, still with your hands on the wall. You're inside the dome, and see sparks flying around you. It is pretty surreal. You get in the center, into some sort of chamber. You notice smaller holes in it, each with marks that resembled a + and a -. There is something written in some sort of panel above you. "Put your hands on the marks and move them".

You do as the sign says. Strangely enough, the feeling of electricity is different in each hand. Then you start moving them. Around you, the sparks and electrical figures seemed to intensify, and one particularly strong electric wave hits the walls of the room, breaking into smaller waves. You keep moving your hands faster, and the electricity gets stronger. You're amazed with the electricity around you, and you continue producing electricity until you feel your arms tired. You finally remove your hands from the marks and the electricity seems to return to normality. You walk outside of the dome, amazed of your experience.

-Thanks for that, human. It was nice from you to recharge me, even if I didn't need it. Want to get out of my tail?
-Sure, I think there is nothing more to see here.- you reply.
-Okay, get back outside of the organ and let me help you.

Without a word, you open the entrance again and look again to the hole above you. You see the spine, yet you can't get back to the road. Then you see everything around you moving. You feel yourself falling to the floor and it lifts until the entrance to the Electric Generation Organ is above you, and the spine tunnel is in front of you. Then it moves again and you almost roll into the bone. You position yourself and feel Luxray lifting his tail, making it much easier to move. You finally get back to the spine, just in front of the abdominal passage.

It has been a very strange day, yet you have enjoyed it. You decide to try to find the way to your bedroom, but you could also continue exploring instead of going to sleep.
13121221.title: Continue down the tail

131212211.content:
Luxray's body surely is a fun place to be in. There are countless locations to visit and even more ways to "play" with him. So far, you feel that being shrunk and inside a Luxray is something of a wild dream come true.

But you feel quite tired from your continuous exploration since the morning, so you decided to go to the "bedroom" Luxray mentioned earlier to take some rest.
