Since she said that there are stuffs worth exploring within her, why waste the opportunity? You continue to crawl around the stomach until you found several large holes on one end of the stomach. The discovery sort of shocks you because it completely defies the "rules of anatomy."

"Congrats.", you heard Lugia said boastfully, "You are about to start your little adventure in me. To begin, there are two places I would recommend you visit first. First, you can take the hole on the left that will take you to my Eyes. In that area, you can refresh yourself from the constant strain of fleshes and its red color by submerging yourself into my world. You can see spectacular sights like you never seen before. If you want to, I can be a guide of some sort; I can tell you about the stats of anything I'm seeing like cities, Pokemons, islands, etc."

"The second place is the "Water Generation Organ". In that chamber, you'll get to see how I can convert water vapors or seawater into a drinkable state. in addition to supplying me, you can also use the water both for drinking or washing. When you arrive at this organ, I will tell you the basic process of how Lugias do the impossible feat of making water out of thin air."

"After a preliminary introduction, how do you think about my innards?", Lugia asked.

Both choices sound extremely interesting. You are having some difficulty in making a firm decision. After minutes of pondering you decide to explore.......
1411.title: Explore the stomach

14112.content:
You make your choice and look around the stomach, trying to find the way by yourself. Even if somehow you enter the wrong path surely you'll find something interesting! You walk around the stomach and choose one of the holes. Your host surely feels you, because as soon as you get through it you hear her voice in your head. "If you continue through this path, you'll get to my Water Generation Organ. It is a good starting point for your exploration. I'm a very large Pokémon, and seeing how you're tiny, it may take you a while to get there. I'll think try to create something for you to move faster, but it will be ready later."

You keep walking through the tunnel, noticing that despite you're inside another creature, you can see as if you were outside, you could see every detail of your surroundings. You rejoice at this fact, knowing that it means that your journey will be enjoyable and epic. After half an hour or so of walking your path is blocked by a ring of muscle, and you worriedly looked at it trying to find a way to get through it, as it looked much tighter than the ones in the stomach. You put your hand on it and, much to your surprise, it slowly opens.

You enter the room, and look around. It isn't very big, but it has some sort of fleshy cude of transparent membranes. You approach it, trying to find its purpose. You find a hole on the membranes, and enter. Looking closer, you see a small sphincter on the ceiling, barely big enough for you to fit through it, but you can't reach it. There is also a big hole on the floor. You carefully stand on the edge and try to see what is in the bottom. It is pretty deep, so you can't see the bottom. On the other side of the room, there is another hole on the ceiling, and another one directly on the floor under it. Remembering where you are, you ask Lugia for an explanation of this process, not knowing if she will be able to hear you from this point of her body. Surprisingly, she does and you hear her reply.

"I can obtain drinkable water by using water vapors or seawater. Each one needs a different process. If I choose the first one, I breath water vapors. The oxygen and the rest of the air goes directly to my lungs, while the vapor goes through a different path towards this organ. The vapors fill the cube, until the vapor forms droplets and fall down that hole, to another organ, where I store the water until it needs to be used. You can visit it later if you want!

If I use seawater, I just drink some. My body immediately detects the salt and sends it here, where it falls through the hole on the ceiling and continues through the one in the floor, until it reaches the rest of the water. It has to pass through this room because the walls of the holes can absorb the salt and send the excess of salt to its expulsion."

"Very interesting, I didn't know it."

"There are many things you don't know about Pokémon. Soon you'll know how my whole body works, and what I can do" Lugia says cheerily. "There is another path over there. If you go through it, you'll find a hall. I linked the most important or interesting parts of my body there, so you're able to visit them easier."

You nod and locate the path, until you get to a long hall with many possibilities
14112.title: The Water Generation Organ

141121.content:
Looking at the path laid out before you, you can see that are countless places to choose from. This Lugia is truly humongous, you thought, but it's innards could qualify as another world itself and you have it entirely to yourself. Because of the sheer number of destinations to choose from, you decided that you should randomly choose a hole to begin your exploration of this gargantuan Pokemon.

You chose a hole on the right hand side of the hallway and prepare to move deeper into the vast, fleshy confines. The route was long and winding and extremely soft. At certain locations, you have to crawl or else you risked slipping all the way to the start of the passage. An hour later, you reached another one of those ringed valves that blocked your entrance. As you moved closer, Lugia opened the entrance for you, welcoming the tiny trainer into a new part of the body. 

The chamber is dim, with only a soft ocean blue glow being emitted a small hole in the ceiling. When you walked farther in, you noticed that the floor is no longer slippery and slimy, it now feels like your walking on a soft carpet. You looked down and realized that you're walking on some kind of feathered surface. You guessed that it may be the same material as Lugia's coat. A further inspection of the room revealed a circular bed-like structure in the center of the chamber. It's blue and white like the exterior of Lugia. Out of curiosity, you tried to sit on it. It extremely comfortable and soft. You almost felt tired at the moment but the silence was interrupted by Lugia's telekinetic voice.

"Did you like the new guest room I made for you?", the Pokemon inquired

"Umm...yeah, it quite nice.", you said, "but how did you know how to create all these kinds of stuffs?"

"I have observed humans very often and I'm otherwise very familiar with their habits. I figured that you would prefer the comforts of a conventional room to that of a moist and dark area in my body.", Lugia said.

"That explains it.", you said s you continue to look around.

You noticed that there is what seem like another smaller chamber on one side of the room. You entered it to discover a little raised hole in the ground. You went over to inspect it. The hole is too small for you pass through.

"That'll be the bathroom for you", you heard Lugia said, "Use it whenever you feel convenient."

"So..... Got anything else in here?", you said as you returned to the room.

"That you have to look around a bit more.", Lugia said, a grin evident in its voice.
141121.title: Continue

choices: ...when it is time, how will I get out of your body?
...is there any place in your body I'm not allowed to go?
1411211.content:
Having Lugia's confirmation, you look around until you see a narrow passage on the other side of the room. You enter and you're instantly greeted by the outside world, behind what seemed a crystal. Besides, you could hear the sounds of the nature outside, amplified. It is a beautiful sunset, and nothing that Lugia isn't moving, you deduce that your host must be at her nest.

"This is a place for you to relax. You may have fun inside me, but I thought you would need a place to sit and do nothing." You agree, and decide to spend some time in there. "You're not in my head, I'm giving you an image of the outside world and sounds with my psychic powers."

"Do you have an idea of how I can return to my normal size?"

"I can do it by myself, but not here. Far from here there is a place where my powers will be amplified and everything will be like before. It will take many days, maybe weeks for me to get there, even if I fly as fast as I can, but I'll make sure you don't get bored easily. I'll go to sleep soon, so I have enough energy to fly nonstop.

The hall you used to arrive here is divided in sections, and each has a sign on the ceiling indicating what surprises await you. The holes that are closer to your guest room are rooms for your normal life, the usual things. If you keep going lower, you'll find holes connected to the most important organs of my body. After that, there are other rooms I thought you may like, and I'm sure you'll be surprised with them. And the last section has many organs that I think will interest you."

"How can there be so many things inside you?" you ask amazed.

"There are many things you don't know" Lugia says cheerily "I may be asleep, but you can go explore whenever you want. The only difference is that you won't have my voice talking to you or guiding you, but I'm sure that you'll still enjoy. Good night."

The image in front of you dims a little, and you take that as that your host closing her eyes or something. You stay enjoying the sunset until the moon and the stars appears in the sky, thinking about everything that happened in the day. You process everything, and soon you realize that you have a question to ask Lugia, but you forgot. You call your host, hoping that she is awake enough to answer you. Lugia replies, even if the voice sounds like she is close to falling asleep.

"I have a question that I would like to have answered...then I'll leave you alone. I was wondering...
1411211.title: Look around more.

14112111.content:
"....once you find the way to return me to my normal size, how will I leave you're body?", you asked.

There was a brief silence before Lugia gave you an answer.

"When that time comes, you can just simply exit through my mouth; that is, the way you came in.", the Pokemon replied, "But the prospect of you regaining your normal size is still quite far off. Maybe we can use this time to better know each other."

"Oh, that sounds fine for me. At least I'm leaving through the grand entrance and not your back door.", you said.

"Oh my, no!", Lugia exclaimed, "I'll never put you through those parts of my body....unless you  like that.."

You suddenly felt dizzy imagining what things are like 'down there'. Disgusting odor, the repulsive sight of undigested food items......You make a mental note to remind yourself to look out where you're going.

" Well, if that's all, I'm gonna take a much needed nap. You can go on and do your exploring around some more.", Lugia tiredly said, "if you need any infos, just read through the signs I've posted at the entrance to each location."

You heard Lugia yawned which vibrated throughout your new room. 
There was a soft thud and a few twisting movement.

After a few minutes, you begin to heard rhythmic breathing. Since you're not really tired yet, you decided to continue down the hallway of body parts.

The next hole you encountered has a sign that reads "Personalized Store and Supplies". There also a description affixed that tells you that Lugia has everything personalized based on the need of the human resident.

You wonder what lies beyond this hole....
14112111.title: ...when it is time, how will I get out of your ...

141121111.content:
You enter the hole with high expectations. The entrance wasn't anything that you hadn't already seen in the few hours you have been inside Lugia, just another ring of muscle. But the description had intrigued you, so when you finally arrived to a small room at the end of a short tunnel, you couldn't avoid feeling a bit disappointed at the size of the room. And it was completely empty, with one exception: some sort of platform at the center of the room, barely big enough for you to stand on it. You approach the center of the room and see a mark on the floor. You stand on it and feel a force going through you.

On the platform a few items appear, between them a laptop, a chair and a few beverages, all of them with Lugia's trademark colors. You take as many things as you can and step off the mark, and note how the supplies you had left on the platform dissapeared. You stand on the mark again and different things appear. You shrug at it, supposing that sooner or later you'll see again the things you left. You also think that maybe Lugia makes them appear because she thinks you'll like them or need them.

You leave everything in your room, and exit the room again. You had already entered the hole next to you, what is deeper inside Lugia's body? You soon reach the division between the paths that lead to the usual stuff you expected to encounter, and the paths that lead towards important organs, with one exception, a different hole that had a greenish tint inside it. The sign said "?????? An unexplored passage inside my body. Enter to discover new places". There was others with normal signs, like "Personal Interactions. Interact with me as if I were with you.". There was others that didn't need any explanation, likeone that had a sign with "Water Storage" and the last one you could see close to you was "Heart". The path that lead to the Water Generation Organ was there, along with the one to the stomach, but you didn't plan to return to any of them yet.

You analyze every possibility, and finally enter in
141121111.title: Enter

1411211111.content:
Seeing a "??????" on the sign made you extremely curious as to what might be in it. The words 'new places' also boosted your sense of adventure in Lugia. The greenish color looks out of the ordinary among the orange tint of the the surrounding flesh. You moved toward the entrance and into the passageway. As you're accustomed to, the ring of muscle opened automatically at your presence.

The walls in the tunnel is opaque, lit only by occasional bio-luminescent orbs in the ceiling. Along your way, you can hear Lugia's gentle snoring like a constant companion by your side. You wondered to yourself what might you encounter in this passageway that Lugia has left unexplored and unexplained. Will it be some new chambers? Or a previously uncharted Pokemon organ? Or will it be something else entirely?

While you're immersed in thoughts, you suddenly bumped against a wall of flesh. You suddenly regained awareness of your surrounding. You looked up to find that you are staring at an entrance far larger than the one; you estimate it to be at least 3 times larger than the one you entered from. A large sign above it has the same "??????" on it. Nevertheless, you touched the ring of muscle which opened fairly easily.

When you entered the area you are greeted by the sight of a vast beach at night time. You can hear the sounds of the ocean crushing against the sands. The bright glow of the moon and the countless shimmering stars in the sky cast a gentle, ambient glow on the environment around you. Out the sea, you can see distant islands that stood out prominently with their tall peaks and dark blue glow under the moonlight. The wind is fairly warm and gentle in here. From your several previous experience with Lugia's other organs, you surmised that this is probably a virtual environment built by psychic powers. Wow, you thought, this Pokemon sure knows a real good scenery.

This is when you noticed that there is something near the center of the beach. It's a raised stone pedestal in the center with a something on it. In comparison to your current size, the structure appears gargantuan; it felt as if the thing is larger than the Pokemon itself. As you walked up the pedestal, you slowly make out the shape of a living thing. Something there is bobbing up and down. When you are close enough mere feet away from the thing, you are shocked to find out that it there is a Lugia curled up asleep. The Lugia looks like a perfect recreation of the one that allowed you to live in her body. You quietly went over to the sleeping Pokemon, nearing it's head. It's fur looks so soft to the touch.

Without knowing, you stroke an area near the edge of its eye. The Lugia stirred a bit before slowly opening her eyes to look at who touched her. When her sight fell upon you, the Pokemon stretch one of its wings and slowly brought you toward an area near its neck until you are comfortably between the wing and body. Lugia curled her head back with her large eye right in front of you. You can see your reflection and your surroundings in the ocean blue orb. But there is something else you can see in there........

eyes
1411211111.title: ???? / Personal Interactions

14112111111.content:
You focus on every point of the eye you can see and see many spots resembling eyes. It is strange and you're a bit frightened. For a moment the whole ordeal seemed an innocent exploration more, but now you are wondering if you didn't make a mistake exploring without Lugia's supervision. Maybe she didn't expect you to find this place this soon?

Soon the eyes vanish and you start to relax again. Lugia is falling asleep again, and you close your eyes too. Everything around you is pleasant and nice, and it doesn't take long before you fall asleep too, against your will. You had wanted to continue exploring!

When you open your eyes, you note that you're back to your guest room. You're laying on the bed, and the things you had picked up a few hours ago was in a pile at the other side. You try to remember what happened last night, and wonder what was that place you had stumbled upon. Asking Lugia seems the best way to find out, so you call her. When she replies, you describe her everything that happened, and eagerly await for explanations.

"What you saw was a recreation of my surroundings. There is an organ that works as some kind of storage for my subconscious. I can't keep control of it all the time, so for my own health in the nights, while I sleep, it will be kept there. Normally it adopts the shape of any dream I'm having, but when my mind is completely empty, it displays my surroundings at home or wherever I am and myself sleeping. I want to protect you, so the projections of myself will too. When I'm awake it is completely empty."

"And what was that I saw in your eye? It seemed like...more eyes" -you ask.

"As I said, it is my subconscious, or a part of it. It is made of my life and my experiences, what you saw was the rest of forgotten creatures and other experiences, trapped deep where it can't hurt me or you. If my subconscious weakens and you're there, who knows what may happen.to you. It is not used to have somebody in there, so there will be a risk." - she says. - "I didn't think you would be there so early. I had planned to show it to you later, so I left it unmarked so you could check it later with my protection."

You fall silent and don't know what to say. "I'm going to see what else I can explore before breakfast" you think.
14112111111.title: Continue

141121111111.content:
You got out of your bed and returned to the vast hallway that leads elsewhere in Lugia. This time, you choose another random hole to enter and discover. You started your way down the dimly-lit tunnel wondering what kind of mysterious location will it lead to. Hopefully, you thought, it would be something other than Lugia's subconscious.

When you reached another entrance, it opened up for you to enter. Unlike other locations you encountered so far, this room is looks like one you would find in an ordinary house. It is a "bedroom-sized" room that resemble a cross between a living room and a study. Much to your astonishment, the room has a blue and white wood flooring arranged in alternating patterns. The walls are a pale blue that matches that of the sky. To your left, you see a variety of books lined up on a shelve. How could there be books in here?, you thought, Either Lugia likes to gobble up books or the Pokemon has found some ways to make books out of thin air. Given that she is already able to make virtual environment that you can see, touch, and feel, that idea isn't really far-fetched. There is also a small reading desk beside the shelves. On the other side of the room, you see a single cushioned chair that is placed in front of what looks like a large display. You wondered what is the point of having a TV inside a Pokemon since you cannot receive channels or do anything else with it.

Just then, the TV suddenly turned on and started displaying some statics before it revealed a message displayed in bold letterings.

"HELLO AND WELCOME TO YOUR PRIVATE ENTERTAINMENT ROOM"

The screen refreshes again.

IN HERE, YOU CAN ENJOY A COLLECTION OF BOOKS THAT I HAVE WRITTEN FOR FUN AND SOME OF TV SIGNALS THAT CAN BE RECEIVED WHILE IN FLIGHT

Wow, you thought, Lugia could write books? This is getting interesting. It wasn't long before a new message appeared on the display.

JUST RELAX, I AM NOT ALLOWED TO CONTACT YOU IN ANY WAYS. IN OTHER WORDS, YOU ARE ENJOYING TRUE PRIVACY IN HERE

IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS, YOU CAN MESSAGE ME WITH THE KEYBOARD BUILT INTO THE CHAIR

With that, the screen changes to display several options you could do in the room....
141121111111.title: Continue

1411211111111.content:
You take a look at the options and the screen, and don't see anything that you couldn't have already thought. You walk towards the books and pick the biggest one you saw, and, kind of predictable, it was about Lugia, mostly about the biology of the species. While browsing through the book something falls down and you pick it up. It is several maps inside a envelope, each map and diagrams about a different part of Lugia. Between the mass of organs depicted in the maps, there are many blank parts, however, looking closer, you can see that there are paths leading to those blank spaces. You suppose that those are places that either are new and just for you or places you shouldn't see yet.

You take a look at the other books, and don't see anything special. Books about places of the world, history, and other things, maybe from Lugia's own knowledge. However, you don't feel like reading any of them right now.

You go towards the TV again, and sit on the chair. On one arm there is a set of buttons for communicating with Lugia, and in the other one there is a control for the screen. You mess around until somehow you are able to see channels you had already known and some you like. You're baffled, but you quickly dismiss it. After the few things you have seen inside Lugia you shouldn't be surprised of this!. Normally you would spend a noticeable amount of time in front of a TV, but the novelty of the recent events eliminated any wish you could have of wasting time. You press some buttons again until you reach a channel that you're sure isn't on any broadcast.

It seems to be a channel you can control, and it seems you can use it to see any part of the world instantly. You play around for an hour or so, seeing places you had never thought you would see. Soon you note that you're very hungry, and you press the buttons of the other arm of the chair. You type about breakfast, and receive a confirmation from Lugia that she already ate and that yours is ready. Lugia offers to guide you towards your eating area, but you tell her that you're able to find it by yourself. You exit the room, and look up and down the hall, and soon find the eating area.
1411211111111.title: Continue

14112111111111.content:
You entered the eating area which is located just a few holes down from the entertainment room.

When you entered the chamber you see a table with a plate and some utensils for your use. The room is an oval shaped and is colored pure white.The table faces a large opening that allows you the view the sky and clouds outside.You sit down on a chair made from Lugia's fur to admire the scenery. It reminds you of your frequent traveling and blank stares you often do on an airplane. There is even the familiar rumbling around this chamber. Occasionally, you caught sight of Lugia's mighty wings, which flapped with astounding intensity.

In your dazed thought, you didn't realized that you plate is already filled with an assortment of berries and fruits. What's even more surprising, you found that there is also a fully cooked fish, sliced and all. Your stomach growled at the wide variety of food on the plate.

"Hope you have a good morning here", Lugia said, "These are some of the foods I caught in the morning. Please take your time to enjoy them."

You immediately begin to dig into the foods. They are much more tasty than the bland food you get from those hotels in Johto. You sorta felt frustrated when you think about those places again.....the poor services, clumsy staffs, the rooms.... The berries are particularly sweet and juicy. After a half an hour or so, you finished your breakfast and you thanked Lugia for the treat.

You reentered the hallway and began planning the place you would like to visit next.
14112111111111.title: Continue

141121111111111.content:
You are clueless where to go. There are too many possibilities and although you have a lot of time, you can't decide what to visit first. The only places you knew was common organs, and you had the feeling that there was more than that inside Lugia. You consider calling Lugia to suggest you something, and decide that it is the best course of action right now.

"Uh...Lugia? I don't know what to do now. Where can I go?"

Lugia seems to ponder for a moment. "Walk to your right until you reach the end of the hall. I'll open a new path for you. It will go through my neck and up to my head. Keep walking and I'll tell you where to stop."

You obey, knowing that there has to be something good. The possibility of it being Lugia's brain crosses your mind, and you feel excited to see what you could do there. The path to Lugia's head is very long, and soon you start to feel the vibrations of Lugia's flight, stronger in your actual location, making it harder for you to walk. You finally start to see something different in the path, a series of entrances. Remember that Lugia told you to keep walking, you continue until Lugia's voice tells you to stop. She tells you to enter through the hole that is closer to you, and you obey. Soon you come across a small chamber, completely empty. You don't know what to do or say, you had expected more than this. Feeling your awkwardness, Lugia talks to you.

"Wondering why I brought you here? I just thought that you might like a change of scenery." Lugia said cheerily.

"What do you mean?"

"It is hard to explain how, but I can make you be here outside with me, while I fly. I don't mean you'll be flying, just that you can be outside my body without being outside. It will be some sort of image that you can freely control, as long as you stay inside this room."

"Keep telling me more, please" you request, interested on what Lugia is saying.

"I propose that you take a rest off the inside of my body and enjoy this experience. I'll use my psychic powers to create an image of you that will be on top of my head. It will have your actual size, though. I'll also create a gravity force around me so you're always on me. This way you'll be able to walk through the outside of my body. An example of how it would be: if you stand on my belly, you won't fall, and you won't feel any difference than if you were on my back. You'll be able to explore me in the outside."
141121111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111.content:
"That sounds like a great plan to me.", you said, "Maybe you're right, I haven't really been outside for some times already. The fresh air will probably give me some idea about what to do next."

Instantly, the room around you transformed and you are now on top of Lugia's head. From atop, you can see the glistening ocean beneath. You feel the heat of the noontime sun on your body.....something you haven't felt for days. What makes the experience even more real is that there are winds blowing against you. Since Lugia told you that she will You tried standing up and to your amazement you didn't fall over; instead, your feet clings to Lugia's body. Assured that you are actually still in the Pokemon's body, you began to explore the huge exterior of Lugia. Although you would say huge, but it is nothing compared with the interior. You started traveling down Lugia's neck and toward her underside.

The underside of Lugia is a blue expanse of soft fur. You walking around the belly some more. Along the way, you've had an awkward encounter with Lugia's private as you carefully made your way around the organic crevice to ward the tail. When you reached the tail, it gets dizzying for you because you are basically seeing things upside down and the tails is constantly flailing about in mid-flight. It got so nauseous for you that you resorted to crawling to return to the body.

Several minutes later, you made your way across Lugia's back, spending you time admiring that majestic protrusions on her back. By this point you decided that you have freshened up enough to return to the interior so you made your way back to the head where you feel yourself being transported metaphysically back into the room.

"Did you enjoy the walk outside?", Lugia asked you.

"I sure did!", you exclaimed in a relaxed voice.

"So, have you gotten any inspirations on the next part of my body we should explore next?"
1411211111111111.title: "It sounds good."

choices: You decide to skip and go to some other place
14112111111111111.content:
You take a few seconds to think. The experience was great and you're willing to do it often, but it didn't give you many ideas of where to go next. The only things you had seen was her private parts, her tail, belly and the protrusions on her back. You are too shy to ask her for any directions towards her more intimate side, you decide to visit them only if you stumble upon the entrance. You suppose there is nothing inside the tail and there are too many things inside her belly, most of them unknown to you. So you ask her about the protrusions on her back.

"They're extensions of a special tissue. They help me to fly or swim faster, as the air or water goes around it, giving me speed."

"Is there something else they can do here in your inside?" you ask, hoping that there is more, or else you would be back to not knowing where to go.

"All of them are connected to the floor of a room directly beneath it. Inside that room there is a place where you could experience how flying feels. Currents of air enters through tiny passages around the protrusions, so there you could literally jump and fly".

When Lugia finishes the sentence, a new hole appears on the side, where just moments ago there was solid flesh. You enter the new tunnel, and walk through the dark path until you reach another sphincter. You squeeze yourself through it, and at the other side you find a long room. A strong gust of air hits you in the face, you're stunned, but you still see several thin columns of blue bone-like tissue. You correctly guess these are the base of the protrusions on her back.

"If you want to fly, just jump forward. You'll be carried by the wind, and you can control the direction of your flight. To stop just crash against the floor or against the tissue. When you're done you can either exit from where you came, take the passage in middle to some parts of my belly or use the one at the other side of the room, which goes straight into my tail."

You mutter your approval of the possibilities.
14112111111111111.title: Continue

141121111111111111.content:
Being a thrill seeker, you waste no time in jumping up against the wind in the chamber. Immediately, you felt your entire body being lifted up by the air currents around you. You tried moving around by flailing your arms as if you're swimming. The experience is awesome! You've always had a fear of falling from high places. But experiencing it inside Lugia is different for two reasons: one, the perception of falling is emulated by the winds. Two, you have been with Lugia for long enough to trust her.

After doing a few more somersaults and random spinning in the air, you decided that you've had enough of flying. You bumped yourself against one of the soft walls which allowed you to land safely on the ground. You went for the exit in the middle of the chamber since there isn't any new places to see in Lugia's head or tail.

You entered the tunnel and made you way down to the regions near the belly. Somewhere in the middle of your way down, you discovered a sign with information about what's next.

It reads:

DESTINATION AHEAD

Food Storage- this is the place where foods for Lugia and you are stored. While most of what Lugia eats is sent directly to the stomach for sustenance, excess food are sent to this area for preservation. The storage area contains a freezer "stomach" with tons of different foodstuffs, a berry juice cellar, and a  
small cooking area. If you are lucky you might even get to taste Lugia's tasty and secret Berry Wine. 

The description greatly piqued your curiosity as you reached another sphincter entrance.
141121111111111111.title: You jump and fly around

choices: You're in an organ you wouldn't like to be in.
You're in an organ you didn't plan to see yet.
1411211111111111111.content:
You open the sphincter and enter a room. You're almost instantly pressed against the wall. There is amazing amounts of varied food here. You see berries, fishes and from time to time, stuff you couldn't eat, but you guess that Lugia is capable of digesting them. You wander around the food, trying to see the rest of the possibilities this room has. The only thing you don't like is the low temperature, and you don't have the correct clothes for this type of environment. In some parts of the floor you see large spots, you touch them. They feel exactly like the sphincters you have used to enter Lugia's organs.

"Be careful, if you fall through them you'll fall into my stomach. And it isn't empty right now, you wouldn't like to be there". Lugia warns you. You leave the spots alone, and find two new entrances in the room. You peek through one and see another big organ, divided by zones. You can't see everything from your position, but you guess that every zone has a different function on cooking the food . "The food you ate earlier came from here. You can cook it by yourself anytime, if you want." Lugia tells you. You don't know to cook very well, but you may as well learn. "Maybe later" you reply.

You choose the other entrance, and try to see what is inside, but you don't see anything. You look in your pockets for something that could help you, and find a torch. When you turn it on you realize you are standing on the edge of a round pit, filled with a purple liquid you identify as berry juice. There are other pits in the room, each of them filled with a different liquid. In the furthest corner of the room the pit is different. It is much smaller and is filled with a deep blue liquid.

"That is my own personal wine. I create it using different berries and leaving it for years. I drink it every night, it is relaxing." Lugia explains. "What does it taste like?" you ask. "Why don't you check it by yourself? You have my permission to drink as much as you want. I warn you, this is a strong wine."

You take a small cup-like object there is near, and use it to try the wine. It is bitter and strong, but you like it. You spend hours there, telling Lugia about your life, until you realize that it must be nighttime. You leave the cup on the floor and stand, your head feels funny. You stumble around the cellar until you return to the storage area, and try to find the exit. You want to get back to your guest room, and the thought of asking Lugia for help doesn't even cross your mind.

You don't know where you're walking, until you reach another organ. You try to focus and look around, your head still clouded by the wine.
1411211111111111111.title: The Food Storage

14112111111111111111.content:
You are stumbling about in the unknown organ, bumping against walls and dragging yourself on the floor. Suddenly, you tripped and landed in some kind of liquid. With your hazy vision, you took your first good look at the place. The chamber is huge and round in shape. In the center there is a huge pool of liquid being fed by several tubes on the ceiling.

You felt the strong urge to jump in the pool and swim around in it. Without further thinking, you removed all of your clothing and run toward the pool, plunging into its depth. When you surfaced, you began to swim in random directions in a drunken state. Occasionally, you would accidentally swallow some of the liquids which tasted strange, but you didn't care. You continue swimming around until you heard Lugia's voice calling you out.

"Thank goodness, I've finally found you. I shouldn't have let you drink that much of my wine.", she exclaimed.

You turned your head toward Lugia's voice.

"Wha....What are you doing swimming in my bladder?!!", the Pokemon said wide-eyed. If you could see her expression, it would most likely be a deep red blush.

"Huh?"....You around you for a moment, trying to register in your inebriated mind what Lugia said. Then, the realization struck you hard. The effects of the alcohol simply evaporated....replaced by sheer awkwardness of what you've done for the past half hour. You yelped loudly as you leaped out of the pool of urine, desperately trying to shake off any of the remaining liquids. But now you smelled completely of Lugia's urine.

"Oh no! This is all my fault. I'm so sorry. We better return to the guest room to give you a proper bath.", Lugia said as she opened a shortcut passage.
14112111111111111111.title: You're in an organ you wouldn't like to...

141121111111111111111.content:
You take your clothes and enter the passage, and walk in silence. You're too ashamed to say a thing. How could you do this to yourself? The mere thought of swimming in urine is revolting to you, yet just few minutes ago that is what you was doing. You cringe at the thought, and try to think about other matters. You feel gratitude towards your host and friend for rescuing you, and you feel guilty for making her think that was her fault. You don't know what to say to make her feel better.

Soon you arrive to your room, and step into your bathroom, to the part of it that works as a shower. You take of your clothes, and you're instantly doused with water. It doesn't feel like normal water, though, it has a different texture, but there is no doubt that Lugia knows what is better for you. When the bath ends, you are satisfied to see that there is no trace from the bitter smell of Lugia's urine. You go back to the main room and look for a towel in the pile of stuff you had brought from the Store, and find some new clothes, some of them with the blue and white colors you had expected, and the rest are colors you like.

You take the wet clothing, and deciding that you never want to wear them again you throw them through the hole in the bathroom. You have the feeling that they'll end in the same place you visited one hour ago.

"I'm sorry for this. I didn't think you would go there, much less...eh...it could have been worse, right? I mean, you could have tried to go further in my urinary tract..." Lugia says awkwardly.

You apologize to Lugia for all the troubles you caused her, and decide to go to sleep now to avoid getting in more trouble. After all, it was a lot of wine, and its effects are returning. Who knows what you would be doing now if Lugia hadn't called you out?

You wake up later than you usually do. Your clock says it is almost noon, and when you focus you can clearly hear the sound of the wind outside. Obviously Lugia is flying again. You get dressed and get breakfast. When you're done, you wonder what you could do today. Your host clearly felt your thoughts, since then she offers you...
141121111111111111111.title: Back to the guest room

1411211111111111111112.content:
"You haven't visited my subconscious while I'm awake, right?" she asks. You reply that you haven't. After all, you didn't have a reason, as it supposedly only worked when Lugia was sleeping. But now a new thought comes to you: Lugia wouldn't have said something about it if there weren't something more.

You decide to pay a visit to that place again. You wander through the hall, looking for the green tunnel, but for some reason you can't find it. You focus on the signs over the entrances of the tunnels, until you find the familiar "??????" sign. It is over a normal tunnel, pink like the flesh surrounding you, no trace of green. You enter the tunnel and walk. until you reach the end. You open it, and step inside Lugia's subconscious.

It is surreal. The room you're in is completely empty, there is nothing, not even walls. All you see is an endless white void. The only object inside is the sphincter you used to enter, just behind you. You walk around it until you're facing the back of it, it is like a thin round wall. When you open it you see a different tunnel, this one different, as you feel a large amount of heat emanating from it.

You close the sphincter, and walk around the void. Your steps echo, and you don't see any limits. You deduce that the green tunnel and the images inside Lugia's subconscious only happen when she is asleep...either that or she is making the room empty. You suddenly hear something behind you. Startled, you turn around and see Lugia. She has her normal size, but once again it is like you weren't shrunk. You touch Lugia's head, she closes her eyes and smile, clearly liking your touch.

You spend a long time in the void of Lugia's subconscious, playing with her. From time to time she takes you on her back and fly around, although there is nothing to see, you like to fly. You're having fun, and lose track of the time. You feel tired, but Lugia is still as energetic as always. It is clear she wants to continue playing. You wave at her and walk towards the fleshy disc that is the entrance/exit, still floating in middle of the void. You open the side that lead to the unknown hot tunnel, when Lugia tackles you. She is heavy, so you need time to recover your strength.

You try to yell "What are you doing!", but then you look at her eyes. Lugia, for some reason is looking at you...
1411211111111111111112.title: ...some sort of event.

14112111111111111111121.content:
You suddenly find Lugia looking at you with a very affectionate gaze. With you pinned down by her body which is surprisingly light for a Pokemon her size, there is no way for you to move away. Lugia started moving her head closer to your face, her blue eyes seemed to focus entirely on you with love. You completely froze at the implication she's giving you.

"Over the past few days, I really enjoyed you exploring my interior, trainer. Feeling you traveling through every part of my body gives me a feeling that I have a company with me. I never really had many other Pokemons to talk to because of my relative isolation and the lack of other Psychic Pokemon that for me to communicate with. Before meeting you in that forest, I have very few understandings about humans and their habits. I was just a Legendary Pokemon that soar the skies; something that was merely a myth to those below. But then, you suddenly showed up before me. I realized that this may be my first chance at getting to know one of your kind.....and several days later, I found out that I was right. With you at my side, even though you're a human, this may be the first time that a Legendary Pokemon has this much of a contact and affection for a non-Pokemon, a very good-looking and, frankly, attractive one that is."

"Ummm...", you tried to say something.

Without warning, you felt her mouth touched yours. You closed your eyes in shock. Being kissed by a Legendary Pokemon. This is weirdest experience you ever had. Even though it seemed wrong on so many levels, you find it strangely appealing. Slowly, you opened your eyes and saw Lugia's blue ones right in front of you. You never noticed how beautiful the blue was before, because in your previous visit to her sub-conscious, it was 'nighttime'. This is first time you notice how they sparkle like sunbeams on a rippling ocean. Slowly, you lost yourself in her eyes and unknowingly started to reply to her kiss. You felt her huge lips rubbing against yours. Lugia kissed even deeper. You know that this is merely a creation in Lugia's subconscious, but the experience is very real for you. It was minutes later when you and Lugia finally broke the kiss and look at each other.

"Wow. That was quite......", you tried to say something but was still speechless from the kissing.

"Vivid?", Lugia offered.

"Considering that this is the subconscious, yeah, that makes sense.", you said, "So, what should we do next?"

"Why don't we take a little detour from our destination?", Lugia said.

"A detour? As in taking a detour off to the place where it's possible to restore me back to my size?", you asked.

"That is correct. We'll be traveling to a secret island that no humans have been to but I frequented often. I was thinking that maybe we both need some times to focus something else other than this 'restoring-you-to-normal-size' issue. Don't you think that's a great idea. Besides, you can consider this as an 'apology' for my mistake yesterday. And I promise you, you will surely enjoy it more than this encounter.", Lugia replied, placing an emphasis on her last sentence.

"In the mean time....want to continue down that tunnel you want to enter.....?"
14112111111111111111121.title: ...in a VERY affectionate way.

choices: Yes, whatever it is, let's do it. Do I have to go outside?
First tell me what is the deal, then maybe.
141121111111111111111211.content:
"Uh...yes, I will." You stand, and try not to show your emotion, but you barely can contain the joy you're feeling right now. The kiss was like a revelation, and you was starting to consider Lugia as a more intimate friend than before. Could she be more than that to you?

"Go ahead. I'll start flying to the island. We'll be there in an hour or so."

You open again the flat sphincter, and enter the hot tunnel. it was like walking inside a pipe filled with steam. Soon you're sweating, and you're starting to regret your decision. The sphincter wasn't connected to anything, where are you? You look at your clock, wondering what time is it. It is almost 6:00 PM, and while you're wondering how did you spend so long inside Lugia's subconscious, you hit another entrance. You open it as fast as you can, and you're instantly greeted with steam.

When your vision clears, you see a small room, with a hole occuping almost all of it. It has some stairs that descend into a clear hot liquid. Steam is coming out of it, and you descend and touch it carefully. It is seemed hotter than it actually was, it felt very good. Your new clothes seem to be waterproof, so you submerge on the liquid. The hole isn't very deep, barely enough for you to submerge completely. On a side there is a narrow tunnel. You also find out you can breath, despite being underwater.

"You're in what will be your own thermal waters. It is a perfect place to relax, isn't it?" -Lugia says. cheerily.

"It is perfect" you reply.

"Don't take this wrong, but this place is inside my salivary glands, so the liquid around you is...." your host says softly. You find out that you don't care, it feels too good for you to be a bother, you don't care if it is saliva. You quickly tell that to Lugia, and try to relax. You float lazily, and swim around. You feel invigorated, thanks to the temperature. You wonder how you could come back here.

an hour later, you hear Lugia again. "We're on the island. It is a beautiful place. You'll like it."

"Now what?" you ask.

"Well...I said you would enjoy this more than our little encounter we had...do you want to know what it is?"

You think for a moment. It seems logical to you that you'll spend some time outside. Sure, maybe you could convince Lugia to let you be outside using her psychic powers in that room you had visited before, the one that had transported your body outside while your mind was still inside Lugia. Although you're close to her mouth, you suppose that taking the underwater tunnel near to you will take you to her mouth and to an easy exit.

What would she want to do with you?

You reply to her...
141121111111111111111211.title: Enter the unknown hot tunnel

choices: You decide to go to sleep.
1411211111111111111112111.content:
"it is better for us if you come outside." you hear her reply.

You submerge yourself in the liquid and look for the hole. Once you find it, you try your best to swim as fast as you can, but the saliva is sticky and hinders your progress. You're getting tired, until you finally reach the end of the tunnel and find yourself under a large muscle. You crawl under it until you are finally out, and realize that it is Lugia's tongue. You climb over it, hoping that Lugia can feel you. She does, and sticks her tongue outside, so you step outside your host for the first time.

It is getting dark, but you can see the trees around you. They're strangely illuminated, and you had never seen so many stars in the sky before. You're mesmerized, and don't know what to say. You turn around to face Lugia, and you can't avoid feeling intimidated by her size.

"Listen...I'm starting to think of you as more as a friend, human. As far as I know, this hasn't happened before to a Legendary, so I don't know what to do. This island is where I was born, so I thought this was the best place to discuss the future. Do you feel the same thing for me? Do you think I'm more than a friend? - she says.

You ponder for a second before nodding. You are feeling attraction towards Lugia, and it is nice to know she feels it too. But how far will it go? Even if you weren't shrunk, it would be strange.

Lugia lays her head on the floor before continuing. "I don't know how to say this...but I asked you to come out of my body so I could see your reaction. I'm happy to see that you agree with my feelings" she smiles. "I know nothing definite will come out of this for obvious reasons, but we should make it as good as we can. Listen, I'm willing to have a more intimate moment with you."

You can't believe what you're hearing. "Wait, are you saying we should...uh...mate?"-you ask nervously, hoping that the answer is no.

Lugia laughs. "Of course not, it would be too awkward, wouldn't it? I mean, you're a human and I'm a Lugia, we aren't even remotely compatible." You sigh, relieved. "No, I mean that I want both of us to have a more intimate experience. It won't go as far as you fear, but I'll make sure it will be something you never imagined you would do with me. Let's call it a...close encounter."

"Meet me in my subconscious again. I hope you don't mind, but I think it is the best place for this. I won't be offended if you don't go, it is up to you." Without saying another word, she opens her mouth again, and you enter her body again. You manage to get to the hall, and wander around deep in your thoughts. This day was certainly taking a turn you had never imagined, and you didn't know if you liked it.

Soon you find yourself in front of the tunnel that leads to her subconscious, and despite everything, you're feeling curious. Do you dare to check in?
1411211111111111111112111.title: Yes, whatever it is, let's do it. Do I have...

choices: I'll save it for another time
14112111111111111111121111.content:
After balancing between your uncertainty and curiosity, you ventured forward into the subconscious part of Lugia once again. The chamber looks substantially different than your previous visits here. You are currently in a cave made purely out of blue crystals. The hung stalactites hung above you like natural chandeliers within a palace. They shimmer with all the spectrum of the rainbow; like guiding lights, the glittering walls draws you deeper into the passage. You can also see through the transparent walls of the cavern toward the sandy beach you were on just moments ago. You noticed that it is a full moon tonight which explains why you can see so clearly in this subconscious world. Walking deeper into the cavern, you eventually reached a larger chamber that resembles a large hall, complete with stalagmite columns. Your footsteps echoes off the walls, creating the impression of sheer vastness. Lugia reclined gracefully in the center and beckoned with her psychic power for you to come closer.

You did as she instructed, approaching her massive form with each step. When finally get to her, Lugia looks at you with the same affectionate expression she always wear. "It seems that you have made your decision.", the Pokemon said, "I am truly amazed by your curiosity for me. Tonight, you're going to have some real close encounter."

"Umm. This close encounter, what did you mean by that, certainly it won't go too far, right?", you asked.

"Of course not! Why are you so worried about it? It's not that I'm going to pin you down and start mating or something. Even if I were to do that, this is my subconscious and anything we did here never physically happened. The place you see here is another one of my caves, and the most beautiful one at that."

"I think it'll be safe, then.", you said.

Lugia stood up and stretch her wings, changing the scenery around you so that it darkens and the ground becomes soft. A large circular bed similar to the one in your personal bedroom materializes. You suddenly shuddered as you felt the feathers of her wings brushing you in very intimate ways. Her blue eye glinted with mischievous affection. As if your mind is on automatic mode, you stretched you hands and started plowing your hand into Lugia's thick fur as if brushing them. The Pokemon look down toward you and brought her head closer, nudging and licking your entire body. Her tongue felt warm, slender, and slippery. Each time you managed to look at her between the lickings, you see a wide grin on her face. No doubt Lugia enjoys doing this.

After several more lickings, kissings, and embracing, you two lie down side by side, exhausted by the intensive play.

"That was amazing!", you said, "I didn't know that a close encounter with you can be so tantalizing."

"I know. But you haven't seen the even more awesome stuffs I have in store for you down there in the reproductive area.", the Lugia said pantingly, "Do you want to take a look at it or save it for a later time?"

"Hmmm"
14112111111111111111121111.title: You enter her subconscious

To your left, you're curious and want to go as far as you can.
141121111111111111111211111.content:
"I can't believe I'm being offered a direct pass to her reproductive system".-you think. You tell her that you want to see it. Lugia smiles, and makes the scene vanish. You walk around the subconscious until you find the entrance, and exit. You're back in the hall, and wonder how to get to your destination. "Walk to the end of the hall, there you'll find it". Lugia tells you.

You start walking, trying to focus on the recent encounter. You're ecstatic, and can't believe that you're the first human to get so close to a legend, much less to such a known one. It is something you're proud of, but you don't want anybody to know, it is your own secret.

The path is the longest you have walked in the time you have spent inside Lugia, but you're too busy with your own feelings and thoughts you don't note it. To you it seemed like mere seconds, but it actually took you an hour or so to reach the end of the hall. When you realize that you're done with your trek, you are in front of the last entrance in the hall. You look at the signs around, looking for the one that lead to her reproductive area.

Soon you find the entrance you're looking for, and eagerly open it. It lead to the common tunnel, and at the end of it is your target. You enter through the sphincter, and look around. You're in a very large tunnel, more illuminated than most places you had seen. Looking to your left, the light is brighter, while at your right the tunnel seems to darken.

"I see you arrived!" you hear Lugia "To your left you'll basically go to the edge of my reproductive system. Normally it isn't advised to approach there as I'm normally flying, but in this moment it is perfectly okay. To your right is the "core" of this area. There I'll give you a better explanation of what I can show you here."

It doesn't take you long to decide to which side to go.
141121111111111111111211111.title: Let's check it out!

1411211111111111111112111111.content:
You went for the right side of the tunnel, deeper into Lugia's private. The path is wet and slippery where occasional puddle of sticky substance stands. The walls are heavily ridged and you have no doubt about the function they perform. A good 10 minutes later, you arrived at a huge sphincter that you estimate to be 40 feet tall. Seeing the large size of the entrance, you dare not to imagine about what will happen if a male Lugia is nearby. The sphincter is currently sealed tight with no obvious way of enticing it to open. At first you touched it like any other ring of muscles you encountered in Lugia, but that didn't work. Numerous other methods are tried like punching, massaging, and bumping but still, the entrance wouldn't budge. Finally, you tried climbing the massive structure to reach the center, where you hope a pinprick hole will allow you enter the uterus. After much slipping and falling,you managed to reach a nook where you can finally stand. Much to your delight, there is indeed a tiny hole for you to enter. 

Without hesitation, you entered into the uterus, highly excited about learning a Pokemon's private. The first thing you noticed about the chamber is its auditorium-like size as evidenced by the echo of your voice. On the ceiling, you can see a massive structure that looks like a globe with countless veins running through it. On the structure, you can see many egg-shaped orbs that glows with a fluorescent purple.  Organic light fixtures that resembles small wall lights emit light blue radiance. There is a thin layer of liquid covering the floor that gives the entire place extra sparkle. The general feeling is that of ambience and peace. Light smell of the ocean dominated your nostrils; although you doubt that the smell may be something else entirely. 

"Welcome to my reproductive area.", you heard Lugia said, "In here, you will learn many things about the mating behaviors of Lugias. My uterus can be considered a separate area in its own right."

Lugia told you that in here there are several places like the "Sample" Collection area,  the Egg Storage on the ceiling, and many more. Plus Lugia told you that there are more extraordinary experience at the end of the tour.

"So where should we start?", you asked.

"Wherever you wish to see first.", the Pokemon said in a slightly seductive tone.

14112111111111111111121111111.content:
You think for a second before deciding what to do first. "How can I reach the Egg Storage?" you ask.

"Look around for a staircase. It should help". you hear Lugia. You obey and walk around, trying to step carefully , so you don't cover yourself with the liquid on the floor. After a while, you find a wide staircase on one of the sides, made of the fleshy materials you are used to see. You climb the staircase, until you reach the top. In front of you there is a walkway. You start to walk slowly, noting that there are no handrails or something that could help you, so you try not to look under you, you have the feeling that falling won't hurt, but still would be scary.

You finally reach the structure on the ceiling, which contains the eggs. You enter the structure and look around. You are surrounded by many big orbs, you accurately deduct they're eggs.

"As you can see, this is the place where I store the base for my eggs. When it is time, my body takes one of these eggs through a chute in the ceiling and transfer them to my uterus, filling it with my own genes. The male will give his genes too, and I'll keep the egg inside my body for near a week before laying it. During that week the egg will multiply it size until it is much bigger than it is right now". In that moment you note that the egg isn't as big as you thought. You could climb one.

"A new Lugia will be born after many weeks, identical to its parents. I...haven't been part of this process yet, but I hope I will. Mating hasn't been succesful yet, but I'll keep trying".

Lugia finishes her explanation, and you exit the structure. You walk through the walkway again to the staircase and descend back to the floor. "That is one of the interesting things about my reproductive system. Where do you want to go next?

"I'm currently more interested in learning about the extraordinary experience you mentioned a while earlier.", you said.

"You wanna see it so soon?", Lugia said with mock surprise, "I never knew that you are the kind who wants to get to things quickly. Alright then, go further down the uterus and you will reach my most personal part, and only you get to see it."

You entertained yourself about what is in store for you at your destination. Could it really be the place where you can feel something beyond the physical? After what you've seen in Lugia's subconscious, you wouldn't be surprised if you experience the cosmics. You wasted no time in finding another tunnel in the uterus to take you to Lugia knows what. When you finally reached the deepest part in Lugia's body, you found yourself in a room that is similar to the personal bedroom you sleep in, but this one is far more elaborate and ornate. Strewn on the soft floor are endless heaps of precious stones, coins, and jewelries. When you take a closer look at them, you can recognized some of them as diamonds with different colors. The rest looks like Matters that are non-existent in the world. Some of them are the most beautiful things you've ever seen. You picked up a gold coin to study it. The coin felt heavy and was minted with designs that you can make no sense of.

"Welcome to my private chamber, where I guard all the lost tales about me, all the precious gems I've collected throughout the millenniums, the gold coins of ancient civilizations that worship me, and where you, my dear human friend, will be spending the night with me."

"uhmmm"

"I see that you are too surprised for words.", said Lugia with a little laugh, "Lie down on my bed, it will be so much easier communicating that way."

1411211111111111111112111111111.content:
You obey. This room is different than any other place you have visited, and Lugia knows better than you about what could happen here. The bed is as soft as the one in your guest room, and soon you're looking at the ceiling of the chamber, decorated with more carvings and writings.

"It is obvious you're the first human to see something like this. Every legendary Pokémon has a chamber like this deep within their bodies, often hidden in places where nobody would look. I had the only entrance in my reproductive area, as I felt it wasn't a place you would visit in your first days. Now I fully trust you, and I'm willing to share with you every secret of my life and powers. Do you want to hear my stories? The chamber is full of them, and every single coin and gem is a reminder of a story."

"I want to know more, Lugia. Let's do it" you say.

Lugia starts telling you about her life, since she was born centuries ago. Her voice envelops you, and you almost feel like you're in front of her, looking at her while she tells you about her early years. It is an interesting story, and a few hours later, when you feel you're falling asleep, you wish you could stay listening for longer. In the morning you're back to your guest room.

Over the course of the next two weeks, you keep returning to the private chamber and sleeping there, while Lugia flew to that place where you could return to normal. The stories are long, but Lugia and you link more with every word, and feel closer, much closer than any legendary Pokémon has been with a human.

Lugia lets you keep one coin or gemstone every night, and you soon have a small collection of expensive jewels, meaning that you would be rich when you returned to normal. It is still nothing compared to the treasure inside Lugia's chamber, but you're satisfied.

When the stories are over, you are amazed of Lugia's experiences. She has told you everything about her life, trusting you with every detail, even those of a more private nature. You return to the private chamber, this time to tell Lugia your own story, not as interesting as hers, but she seems to like it and listens to you carefully.

Three weeks after the first time you entered the most secret part of Lugia's body, there was no reason to return, at least for now. Lugia said that she was moving the entrance to another part of her body, and that she would tell you when there was something else to say. She isn't going to be upset if you stumble upon it, though.

The next morning, you wake up. You had been exploring around in these weeks and knew almost every part of Lugia's body, with a few organs left, more precisely, those that you considerated unpleasant or uninteresting. You complete your morning routine, and notice that something is different. You ask Lugia, and soon she replies:
1411211111111111111112111111111.title: Continue

14112111111111111111121111111111.content:
"There is another legendary Pokemon nearby.", Lugia replied, " I could feel its powerful presence around us and I'm not sure whether it's friendly or not. One thing I'm sure is that this Pokemon has power on par with mine."

Having heard Lugia's explanation, you are left to wonder who exactly is this Pokemon. While thinking, you decided to head for the Observation Deck at Lugia's head. It was a location you discovered in your previous week of adventure. It was a huge circular chamber with a 360 viewing window that allows you to get a panoramic view if the area surrounding Lugia. Although you forgot how the Pokemon did this, you remembered her saying something about her eyes having ability to see through the back of her skull and being capable of seeing 20 miles far. Over the last few days, you have used the Observation Deck for various things ranging from sightseeing to stargazing. 

Upon arriving there, you immediately began looking at the skies surrounding you for any signs of the legendary Pokemon. At first, there is nothing other than the usual clouds and mists. Then, a bright golden sphere of light appeared on the horizon. You squinted you eyes on the unknown object in an attempt to discern its shape. But all you can see now is a globe of light with a trail of rainbow behind it. 

Gradually, you can see the form of a pair of wings and a long tail. Initially, you guessed that it may be another Lugia, but its body shape is wider and its beak larger and longer. The unknown Pokemon seems to notice Lugia flying near it and turned its direction right toward you. By the time the Pokemon arrived in front of you and Lugia, there is no mistakes that it was a Ho-oh, a rare Pokemon like Lugia herself.

Ho-oh's body glistens with various color of light that radiates from its multicolor feathers. The Pokemon look directly at Lugia and you for a full minute before giving a loud screech. Lugia gave a similar lower pitched call in the Pokemon's language. 

Lugia sensed your confusion about what they were talking about, so she provided translation for your through telepathy.

"Lugia, what a coincidence for us to meet again. What is it that brought you here to my domain?", Ho-oh said.
14112111111111111111121111111111.title: "There is another legendary near. Want to

choices: Ho-oh snatches you, imprisons you in his body and flies away
Lugia closes her mouth and tries to continue
141121111111111111111211111111111.content:
"I'm just passing through, Ho-oh. I won't be here for too long" you hear Lugia reply.

"Why the hurry Lugia? It isn't like you have to do something important right now, do you?". Ho-oh says mockingly. You feel Lugia is starting to turn defensive, maybe because she doesn't want Ho-oh to know about you.

"I have to get to the shrine, there is business I have to do. It isn't something you need to know."

"How rude of you! I was sure you would be nice enough to tell me, but seeing that you don't want to, I'll have to find out by myself." At this point, Ho-oh looks directly towards Lugia's eyes, and to an extent, your own eyes. Lugia tries to move, but Ho-oh blocks the way. Soon you hear words again.

"I feel a different presence here besides yours, Lugia. And it is curious, it feels like it is...inside you." he says. You feel Lugia torn between admitting your presence or denying Ho-oh's words, so you take control of the situation. "Why don't you tell Ho-oh about me, Lugia? Maybe we'll be able to continue if you do" you tell Lugia. Your host seems indecisive, but then tells Ho-oh about you. She doesn't say a thing about what you have done, just that she picked you up in the forest and wanted to return you to normal. Ho-oh listens curiously.

"I see. A tiny human. I had never heard of something like that before. I'm not sure how I feel about this, Lugia. This can't be good for you." Behind his words you can fell that he isn't happy.

"There is nothing wrong, this human is a friend now. I want to help."

"Can I at least see the human? I want to make sure you aren't in danger." Ho-oh replies.

You feel the floor under you moving, and Lugia brings you to her mouth using her psychic powers to create a tunnel directly under you. She is annoyed and wants to end this as soon as possible. She sticks your tongue out, and you have the first direct sight of Ho-oh. The legendary bird is smaller than Lugia, but you was still tiny in comparison to him. You can't avoid feeling overwhelmed by the sheer size and obvious power of the Pokémon.

Ho-oh looks at you, thinking what to do. He is still unhappy about you, and you clearly see that something needs to be done. You consider telling Lugia to close her mouth, but before you can react...
141121111111111111111211111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111.content:
You are shuddering from both the cold wind kicked up by both Lugia and Ho-oh's flapping wings and from the other Pokemon's equally chilling stare. The look he gave you gave you a bad feeling. His fire red eyes burned into you with laser-like precision. The more the Pokemon looked at you, the more hostile he seems to get. Then, without warning, Ho-oh suddenly grabbed you with his beak and flew out of reach for Lugia. You screamed out loud, knowing that you are now swinging from thousands of feet up from the ground, completely at the mercy of Ho-oh. The sudden movement even caught Lugia off guard, causing her to momentarily fall before regaining her balance mid-flight. After righting herself up, Lugia looked at Ho-oh with both surprise and anger.

"Ho-oh! What is the meaning of this? Give him back to me right this instance.", Lugia shouted.

But Ho-oh ignored her plea and stared at her. There is nothing you could do but watch helplessly as the scene unfolds.

"Lugia, you have grown a bit too trusting of humans as I see it. Don't you know what will happen when he reveals all of your legendary secrets? ", Ho-oh said coldly, "You seem to have forgotten that you are a Legendary Pokemon yourself; you're meant to distance yourself as far away from humans as possible.You are supposed to be mysterious, a mere legend throughout the millenniums and ,in that regard, you have failed."

"I know the ancient rules alright.", Lugia said defensively, "But I believe that this to be an exception. As I told you before, I found this human shrunken and helpless in a forest. I did what I believe to be right and kept him in my body for several weeks already until I can find a way to return him to normal. That's certainly something you haven't done before."

You can feel Ho-oh giving a muffled gasp with you in his beak.

"If that is true, this human knows way too much about you by now.", Ho-oh replied, "You are now taking a very dangerous route, Lugia. What if the humans one day decide that they are going to catch you or worse, kill you to obtain your powers? What if this trainer one day decide that it will be in his interest to hurt you?"

"That is not the case here. Something about him tells me that I can trust this trainer. We've talked with each other for countless times and understood each other. He even admitted to liking me.", Lugia rebutted, "Now, give him back to me and leave us be!"

"I'm afraid I cannot do that. Even if that is true, this human still cannot be trusted and is a present danger to you.", Ho-oh said as-matter-of-factly, "Frankly, I think you should just forget about this human and move on."

At this point, you can see uncontrolled rage building up within Lugia as her eyes glow blue as she shoots an energy blast in the direction of Ho-oh. The brightness of the beam caused you to close your eyes. As it got closer to Ho-oh, the Pokemon immediately summoned a protective field which completely deflected the beam. Opening your eyes, you see that Ho-oh is unscathed while Lugia is looking at the Phoenix Pokemon menacingly with her still glowing eyes.

"My, my, Lugia. Why the hostility here?", Ho-oh taunted, "I'm just trying to keep you safe from all humans. Is that how you thank me? You should seriously reconsider the next time you fired at me. I believe you know of my full potential."

Lugia remained speechless as she briefly looked at you, sadness apparent in her eyes.

"Give yourself some time to think about it. I'll be keeping this human for now.", said Ho-oh.

After saying that, the Pokemon tilted his head up and opened his beak, causing you to slide down onto his tongue. He closed his beak, trapping you in darkness as you slide down toward his slimy throat. You felt yourself falling toward the chasm, but you fainted from disorientation before you landed.

Once Ho-oh is sure that the human is securely imprisoned within him, he gave his wing a quick flap and flew away, leaving a shocked Lugia behind to figure what to do next.
1411211111111111111112111111111111.title: Ho-oh snatches you, imprisons you in his body a...

14112111111111111111121111111111111.content:
The first thing you remember when you wake up is what happened. You open your eyes and look around, scared of the recent events. Now you are at the mercy of anotherPokémon, who clearly is hostile towards you. You seem to be in a big organ, and looking back to the few facts about anatomy you know, and the fact that Ho-oh leans more towards having the organs of a bird in his insides (compared with Lugia, who had more known organs), you deduct that you must be in Ho-oh's gizzard. Knowing the danger, you crawl until you're leaning on the wall, and try to think.

It is obvious that Ho-oh is a problem. Now you're trapped inside him, and looking around, you know what is the biggest difference between him and Lugia. While Lugia's stomach was completely empty, a sign that she didn't want to hurt you, Ho-oh's gizzard has some pools of strange liquid around, acids you suppose, a clear sign that he doesn't care about what happens to you, if you die or not. You have to be careful if you want to live, but you're confident you'll be able to. You're still anxious, though, and think about Lugia, and what she could do to help you. You spend a long time there, watching the walls drip acids and trying to be in a dry area. Soon you hear Lugia's voice in your head. You're stunned, you must be miles away from her yet she still can communicate with you? You try to reply, and you are relieved that it works.

"We have a connection. I can feel where you are, and I guess Ho-oh didn't let you out. I have a plan. After that we can talk for some minutes before I'm forced to stop." she explains to you.

"Wouldn't Ho-oh hear you? I'm inside him!" you inquire.

"Ho-oh doesn't have any psychic powers. He won't know. Are you okay? Is there any danger for you?"

You explain to her your current situation, making emphasis on your location inside Ho-oh. Lugia tells you to put your hand on the wall, and you obey. Soon you feel an energy going through you and into the wall.

"I'm passing my powers through you. This will weaken Ho-oh, not enough for him to be inoffensive, but enough for him to be forced to land. While he is weak I can reach him and fight, but I don't promise I'll win. He is much stronger than me.

"So what can we do?" - you ask, not knowing what could happen.

"As I see it, there are two options" - Lugia replies."The first one is that you could try to escape by yourself from Ho-oh's body. Don't ask me how, I don't know. Explore around and find a way. After you're out, I can use our connection to find you. I'll be able to find you, it doesn't matter where you are.

"Uh...I don't know. From what I see there are only...three paths here in the gizzard, not including the way I came."

"The second option is that you wait inside Ho-oh until I reach him. I'll fight him, but as I said he is stronger, and due to your size I don't know how you could help me. But you'll find a way, I know" - Lugia says. - "Please tell me your decision, I have to stop the connection, this is weakening me."

You ponder as quick as you can. Escaping by yourself sounded hard, as you didn't know where to go. and the second option, a fight, well, sounded more exciting, but you wanted to help and make sure that Ho-oh lets you out, and seeing your size you are clueless. You make your decision.

"Lugia, I'll..."
14112111111111111111121111111111111.title: Within Ho-oh.

141121111111111111111211111111111111.content:
"I think I'll try to find a way to get out of Ho-oh first. I don't think I want to be in here for too long.", you said.

"Alright then. Please be careful when going around in Ho-oh. Who knows what he had in store for you.", Lugia said, "Sorry, I have to disconnect for now; the psychic signal is getting weak. Just try any routes you find in there....there must be one.... that'll take you out......."

Lugia's voice died down within your head, replaced once again with the gurgling of stomach acids around you. Compared to Lugia's  palatial and beautiful interior, Ho-oh's innard is far darker and more organic, bearing more resemblance to an actual body. Determined to make it out of this 'prison' alive, you tried taking one of the three paths available to you. The tunnel you took climbs at a steep grade and is made worse by the fact that virtually every surface in here is covered in slime. You constantly slipped and fall head over toes trying to stand straight. Thinking that you might eventually bruise your entire body, you resort to crawling on your belly, advancing inch by inch toward the place the tunnel takes you. After painstakingly moving up for forever, you finally saw lights above you. It was a welcomed sight for you. This must be another opening in Ho-oh from which you can use to escape it. Reaching the ledge of the tunnel, you stood up and started running toward the source of the light.
