In the midst of your joy to supposed freedom, you suddenly bumped your head against something hard. You fell on your back recoiling in pain as if a sledgehammer struck your head. You also hear Ho-oh giving a loud screech, apparently sensing you attempted escape.

"Did you think I would be foolish enough to let you easily escape me, little human?", Ho-oh said chuckling, "I have already closed off all the possible exits you could take. And for your information, you aren't even at an opening!"

Ho-oh laughed mockingly at your failed escape. 

"Even if you make it out, are you really stupid enough to jump from millions of feet up in the atmosphere, human?", Ho-oh chortled.

You right yourself up and looked around you. True to his words, you realized that you are in fact in a small chamber. The thing you bumped your head into is one of two large openings with a thick layer of slimy glass-like film covering its entirety. You can see Ho-oh's wings along with his beak here. You tried to touch the surface of the stuff again which caused the chamber to momentarily darken.

"Ow!", Ho-oh screeched, "Hey! You better stop doing that to my eyes or else I'll make things even more miserable for you like sending you down there for "cleaning duty" or......Back to topic, since you managed to get here.....why don't we have a little chat while I indulge in some 'joy-flying', human."

You saw the entrance behind you sealed shut and disappear completely. Suddenly, you felt your feet being strapped down by cords that emerged out of the floor. You have little choice but to talk with your captor.
141121111111111111111211111111111111.title: "...find a way to escape".

choices: "Why don't I start, uh, working now?"
"What kind of duties will I have in your body?"
1411211111111111111112111111111111111.content:
"Now be a good human and listen to what I have to say, okay? Not that you have another option, haha!"

You look around, trying to see a weak spot from the cords. It is impossible, so you decide to pay attention. Maybe you could talk and convince him to let you out. No, not even in a million years.

"You humans are a painful species. It is true there has been some progress thanks to your people, but at what cost? You all are too far from your original purposes, living peacefully with every other living being, included us legendaries! I don't mean that Pokémon battles should stop. What people does is collecting Pokémon, just to keep them in some place while only a few are free to fight. And most of times, they're released back in the wild! I have seen many Pokémon getting caught, having illusions of being useful but then getting released, without even being part of a battle.

It happened to me too. I was rather interested on being part of this, the human that caught me didn't seem bad. The first thing was filling that Pokédex thing with my information. Then the next thing I remember is spending months in a field, far from my trainer, under the supervision of some human scientist, a professor. It wasn't that bad, but I was hoping that my trainer would return and finally take me to battle. He came back, but the only thing he did was releasing me.

I left, and returned to my normal life. Again, a free legendary. But I was very upset that I was discarded, I'm one of the most powerful Pokémon and was only caught to fill a Pokédex. From that moment I made sure that the other Legendaries knew about this. From then some have been caught, and some has stayed with their trainers, battling. Others was released, but so far I'm the only one to resent that. And finally, a few was caught, and then victims of experiments. That was the last thing I wanted to hear. I promised myself that I would make sure humans would stay away from the legendary Pokémon. And I managed to convince the rest. That many decades ago.

It worked for a long time, and everybody was satisfied, until you was shrunken and Lugia found you! I wouldn't have minded if the only thing she did was changing you to normal, but she had to tell you about her, show you her deepest secrets, and be excessively close to you! I had never thought it would happen, and I doubt that you would have acted like you did if you had stumbled upon Lugia in your normal size! Surely you would have at least tried to catch her."

Ho-oh stops, clearly needing to breath. You observe, and note that Ho-oh is descending. Lugia's powers had worked. Ho-oh landed, and continued talking. Another thought crossed your mind, you don't know what you would had done if you had your normal size and found Lugia. You didn't want to think about it.

"I'm keeping here with me until I make sure that you'll not approach a legendary. I want you to stay away, and to forget that you encountered Lugia, and forget everything you had seen and heard. Understand?"

"Yes...I do. I...that was a very tiring and kind of cliché speech, you know" - you say, before being interrupted.

"Shut up. I don't know how long you'll be within me. It depends on how much do you know. The more you know, the longest and hardest your life will be. Let's see."

More cords tie your head, and you are forced to stay there while you feel pulsing through the cords. They keep constricting your head, until you're finally free.

"You...you have seen too much! Now I know everything you had done inside Lugia, and I don't like it!" -Ho-oh yells.

You brace yourself for the impact of Ho-oh's words. Surely he is about to say what he'll do with you...

"Don't expect any commodities here! You'll have to do stuff for me, keep my body working, and help me to complete my body processes. After I consider you had enough punishment, I'll take you to the shrine and return you to normal. Then you'll go away from us forever! Understood?"

You're kind of scared. You don't like the sound of it. Ho-oh is definitely somebody to fear."I have to escape soon, how long will I resist?" -you think. Then you have an idea. "I may as well, do what he says. In some moment, he'll be careless, then I'll escape. It is matter of time. I just have to wait for the opportunity..."

"Yes...Ho-oh. I understand." -you say.

"Okay. You'll be going to your room. No bed for you, but at least you'll be warm, I'll make sure of that. Or maybe, too warm."

Ho-oh opens a passage near you. You look at it, and decide to start your plan. Knowing what you'll be forced to do could help, but being in the place where you'll do your new work would be good too.

"Ho-oh, I would like to ask a question..."

"Okay. Just one". -he replies.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111.title: A Long Lecture

14112111111111111111121111111111111111.content:
"Why don't I start, uh, working now?", you asked, "I have no way of escaping you and I'm completely at your mercy. Is there anything I could do for you now?"

Ho-oh pondered for a while.

"Are you trying to impress my with your submissiveness, human? Unfortunately, I have to remind you that you will need to do more than that to please me. I'm still not forgiving about you knowing about the secrets of the legendaries..... Listen up, I have planned out a system that might work out. During your time in my body, you will have to continuously maintain my body and obey every one of my commands if you want to live. After completing a task I assigned you, you will be given stone tokens, with the amount depending on the type of work you've done. After collecting a certain amount, you can use those tokens and exchange them for free time, food, and other things. If you failed to perform my order, you will be fined heavily. Any attempted escape will be ground for two days in the bowel. How that sound, huh? DO you accept it?!!"

You tried to take in Ho-oh words. Although you dislike the idea of having to serve your captor, there is little choice but to comply. Secretly, you hope Lugia would quickly find Ho-oh eventually.

"Alright. I accept it. Now, tell me how should I start?", you answered.

"That is one brave answer from you, human. Since you're so eager to start work, why don't you start by cleaning out the grime from my eyes. They are giving me lots of blurry visions and pain lately.", Ho-oh said in a dominating voice.

"You better start now, human, or else you're sleeping in the intestines.", Ho-oh commanded as he released the cords on your feet, allowing you to finally stand.

You looked at the two eye panels in front of you. Both at least 35 feet tall and with thick slimy dirt and debris that accumulated around the edge. The rest of the pane is filled with smudges and dust. In some places, you could barely make out the blurred view of mountains and cliffs.

"But how am I going to clean them? It's too tall for me!", you exclaimed, "This is just---"

"Quiet!", the Pokemon barked, "You'll be provided with the necessary tools to do your job."

A long cords similar to the one that tied you up dropped from the ceiling and circled itself around your waist. A sponge-like object materialized on the floor which you picked up. The cord lifts you to the very top of the chamber right next to the eye.

"Start cleaning! You got two hours to finish it.", Ho-oh said.
14112111111111111111121111111111111111.title: "Why don't I start, uh, working now?"

choices: You are going to try to escape tonight.
You are going to wait for a better chance.
141121111111111111111211111111111111111.content:
You grab the sponge and start to rub it in front of you. It is a tiring job, and it feels like it isn't going to be quick. The dust and the smudges are very adhered to the surface of the eye, and in some points you have to rub harder to remove them, making Ho-oh yelp in pain. You feel a strange satisfaction every time your host expresses his discomfort, but you don't do it often. The edges of the eye are the hardest parts, as you have to practically squeeze the sponge between the surface of the eye and whatever tissue is up there. Debris and other things fall on you, and you soon are as dirty as the eye.

The cord tied to you lowers itself gradually, so your only work is to rub. While you're cleaning, you start planning your escape. You have a few ideas, but none of them seems good enough.

"What is sure is that I won't escape through the eyes" you think. Soon you have cleaned half of one of the eyes, and can see outside. Ho-oh seems to be trying to fly, but it doesn't matter how hard he tries, he seems to be unable to fly. "That is a good sign. Where are you, Lugia?"

You finish one eye, and the cord instantly lifts you again to the top of the chamber, next to the other eye, you start the process again, feeling your arms tired. You lose speed, and worry that you may not finish in time. When you less expect it, Lugia talks to you again.

"Where are you, Lugia? I'm still here, my only progress was bumping against the eyes." -you say in your mind, sounding annoyed

"I'm very sorry. I can see Ho-oh, but there was an unexpected problem while I was coming. Poachers in a ship. I was shot and stunned, and they used a strange machine on me. Now I have some sort of chip on my skin. I managed to escape, but now I can't use any of my powers besides telepathy and similar. I can't remove this chip by myself, it is on my back, my wings can't reach it, and it is ingrained to my skin."

"There should be a Pokémon or something to help you!" you think desperately.

"I'm afraid not. This is Ho-oh's territory. In this island...we're the only two living beings. The nearest land is miles away, and I don't want to stay too far from you."

"Then what can we do?" -you're almost crying. You had hoped for a quick rescue (with Lugia distracting Ho-oh in a fight, escaping could have been easier), but now you were in deeper trouble.

"I can still fly. Two options: you escape, I pick you up and we fly away as fast as I can. Or...you convince Ho-oh to let you out." -Lugia replies.

You explain that there is no way Ho-oh will let you go. You're done with half of the other eye, and you get an idea. From your point, you can see Ho-oh's beak.

"Maybe I could escape while Ho-oh is sleeping, right? Through the beak" you say, excited.

"It is worth trying." -Lugia ponders. "I'll stop the conversation. I'm tired."

Once again, Lugia left you by yourself. Soon you're done with the eyes, and you notify Ho-oh

"You took way too long, human. Three hours and half is an excessive time for such a simple task!"-you hear him yell. You are terrified. "I should punish you for your inefficiency!"

You gulp. You have no tokens, so being fined isn't an option. Would that mean...

"A-A-Am I sleeping...on your colon tonight?" you mutter. Ho-oh doesn't say a thing for some seconds, then talks. "I would say yes, but I forgive you this one time, just because this was the first task and you did a nice job. Next time I won't be so forgiving! It will cost you fifty tokens to calm me if this happens again!

You sigh in relief. The hole in the floor opens again. "Now go to your room! I'll let you out when it is time for your next task. You're not a bad cleaner, I may as well command you to clean other parts of my body!"

You jump into the hole, and fall to the smallest chamber you have encountered since you was shrunken. There is almost no space, and it is empty, just a pile of ten stones on a side, tokens for your work, you guess. It is also very hot, and soon you're sweating. You lay on the floor, and think. Waiting for Ho-oh to sleep...and then exit through the beak...

You stay in your room for an hour. Your clock says it is already dark outside. You hear Ho-oh calling you again. "Human, time for your second task! Go through this hole!" A tunnel opens on a side, and you enter, not having any options. You had taken a decision.
141121111111111111111211111111111111111.title: Cleaning Time

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
While you went through the tunnel, you planned to make your escape tonight; this could be your only chance. The tunnel Ho-oh created stretched on for some time. When you reached the end of it, you find yourself looking at a pair of large skeletal joints that are connected to a thick beam of spine. The other end of the joints extended all the way to the walls until they disappeared into the flesh. The joints are moving in synchronization with each other.

"Well, human. You are now at the point where my wings connect with my body.", Ho-oh said, "I want you to do a quick check to see if there is something wrong with the joints. Ever since capturing you, I've had a very hard time flying. Since I'm currently on the ground, give it a quick checkup and report to me if anything is wrong. Understand, human?"

"Yes I do.", you answered confidently. Secretly you are laughing at Ho-oh for failing to realize that Lugia has drained some of his powers. You decided that you should pretend to check on the joints and bones for problems. You started by surveying the sockets, they are huge; easily the size of large trucks. You checked the veins and tendons that connects them, making sure that you are doing a convincing job for Ho-oh. After looking at the spine and cartilage for a few more minutes you report your finding to your captor.

"As far as I could see, there is nothing wrong with your wings or bones. I tried to check for some types of injury or strain, but there are nome. I think you are just exhausted from all the flying.", you said.

"Is that so, human?", Ho-oh replied, "Then, I guess I'm just a bit over sensitive this time. I know you wouldn't have the nerve the sabotage my body. If you do get such ideas, in that case, you will endure the worst of my wrath and I will enjoy every moment of it..... Alright, enough talk, return to your room and get some sleep. You're getting five tokens for your effort. I'm getting some rest, too."

Although you momentarily shivered at Ho-oh's mention of his worst wrath, you take comfort in knowing that you managed to outright fool a Legendary Pokemon. Ho-oh's inability to intercept psychic signals also played a role. Once you returned to the room, you lie down and wait for the right moment to initiate your plan. Soon, you feel Ho-oh positioning himself for sleep and later, you can only hear soft snoring.

You got up and started moving carefully and slowly through the passage to the eyes. There are times when you have to stop out of fear that Ho-oh woke up. When you got to the chamber where you were tied up, the surrounding is now very dim due to Ho-oh's closed eyes. There is only a sliver of pale light coming in. It's a good thing that there is moonlight today. You tried to look around for the passage into the beak, feeling the rushing of air around you as the Pokemon snores on. Using the direction of the wind, you located a small hole large enough for you to crawl through between the eye panes. The ground eventually became hard like plastic and you could see lights ahead. You are just moments away from freedom. The wind in here is particularly strong. After crawling for a minute or two, you reached an opening in the beak. You lift your head out and felt normal cool air for the first time in hours. You smiled and laughed. Looks like Ho-oh isn't that much of an intelligent Pokemon after all.

Suddenly, you felt the beak moved and you turned back to see....
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: You are going to try to escape tonight.

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The next few seconds seem to be in slow motion, at least to you.

You turned around, and now you are directly in front of Ho-oh's eyes, both focused on you, rage building in them. From the corner of your eye, you barely see a white and blue head, peaking from behind some trees. You recognize it as Lugia, and she starts approaching slowly, not noticing that Ho-oh is awake.

Then reality hits you, and the moment is gone. Ho-oh lifts his head and launches you to the air, while you spin in the air, you note Lugia is going back to the trees. You reach your highest point, and you start to fall to Ho-oh's open beak. The impact against the tongue leaves you stunned, and you barely note when you're swallowed. You are disoriented until you crash against the floor somewhere. You look around, and recognize the avian stomach.

"I warned you human! What was you doing outside my body?" Ho-oh yells. You try to think, but not a single convincing lie comes to you. "I-I-I"

"You was trying to escape, and I won't tolerate that kind of actions! You should be glad that I didn't kill you when I captured you!"

You lower your head, intimidated by your captor's fury. "Do you remember what I said I would do if you tried to escape? You just earned two days of punishment in my bowels! You'll sleep there, and when you're not needed you'll stay there until I call you again!"

You try to convince him to forgive you, you tell him you will do anything to avoid it. "No chance, human. You don't have fifty tokens. Now go to the other side of my gizzard and enter through the lowest hole." he commands you.

Sighing, you walk, avoiding the pools of acid and half-digested mush. There is a bigger amount than the first time, and this reminds you that you haven't eaten since the morning. You locate the hole, and manage to sneak through it.

"Start walking human! I'll tell you when to stop." -you hear the order. Not wanting to make things worse for you, you obey. After a few minutes, you're optimist about your punishment. The small intestine is almost spotless. And it doesn't smell different than any other place you have seen within Ho-oh. "Maybe being down here isn't that bad" you think.

After half an hour of walking, you're starting to worry. The intestine is still clean, but you are afraid Ho-oh will make you walk deeper into his bowels. You're relived when Ho-oh talks again.

"Okay. Go to sleep now. You'll need to rest." you happily obey. You search for the softest spot, and lay down. You try to sleep, but a few minutes later you notice that you have moved from where you was. You go back to your point and lay down, but a few minutes later you had been dragged down again. After this happens again, you protest.

"What are you doing awake, human? Sleep, you won't be allowed to rest when you're working." -Ho-oh says. You explain the situation. "What did you expect? My body still has to process while I sleep. Sooner or later you'll arrive to the place you deserve. I would had made a shortcut to my colon, but I didn't think you would be stupid enough to try to escape" - he says with clear malice.

You resign and try to fall asleep as fast as possible, you don't want to be conscious when you arrive to the large intestine. The natural movements of the bowels are relaxing, and you finally manage to fall asleep. You only remember waking up for a few seconds, the enough time to note that you're still in the small intestine, and see a large sphincter, approaching at a steady pace. You black out again, hoping it is a dream.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Ho-oh eyes looking at you

choices: Don't do it. You don't wanna upset Ho-oh
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You woke up and find yourself in dark, smelly location. Looking around, you see white liquids and solids mixed together in a disgusting melange. Memories of yesterday came flooding back: the attempted escape, Ho-oh waking up, Lugia among the trees, and your eventual punishment of living in the bowel. You tried to move, but you find your hands and feet tied by cords on the floor and wall. Flailing you arms and legs had no effect on it.

"I see that you are awake now, human.", Ho-oh said, "I tied you down just to make sure you won't try to escape again. How is thing down there?"

"It's.....", you tried to say something but you don't know how to answer, afraid of giving the wrong response to Ho-oh.

"There is no need to say anything.", the Pokemon smirked, "You're gonna be in my bowel for two days whether you like it or not. Since you're there, why don't you help around by cleaning the surrounding a little bit?"

You dreaded the grimy job that
 awaits you. Cleaning Ho-oh's intestines is the worst thing you endured so far. You started to seriously regret making that escape attempt.

"Listen!", Ho-oh ordered, "You will be scrubbing every inch of this place. Then, you have to move my wastes to the end of the intestine where I will take care of the rest. With this being a punishment, you will have to move everything by your hand.  You got what I'm saying, human?"

"Y....yes", you said, resigned.

"Good, start working. You got four hours to finish you job. And to prevent you from attempting another escape, I'm putting something that I can locate you with."

The cords around you loosened and you plopped down into a puddle of white liquid. You felt something wrapped itself around your wrist and tightened itself. When you looked at it, you discover that it is a piece of flesh that has attached itself to your body. It made itself into a watch-like device.

"The thing on your hand is a locator. If you tried to leave my body, I will know at once. It also functions as your clock, timer, and token recorder. One more thing, if you did something wrong, I can discipline you with electric shock with that locator. Now, off to work, human."

Getting onto your foot, you started with the wall by removing the droppings on them. As you pried the slimy fece off, you can see the digested remains of berries, fruits, and plant parts in them. The smell got worse the more dropping you cleaned off. In a matter of minutes, a small hill has formed on the ground. You carried a heap of the stuff and take them to the end of the intestine. Along your way, you see that you have more places to clean. A five minute walk later, you reached a large closed opening on the ground. This must be the anus, you thought. You threw the waste into the recessed hole and returned to get more. The process repeats itself several hundreds time along the length of the large intestine.

The work is grueling and labor-intensive but somehow, you managed to finished your job thirty minutes ahead of the deadline. You are now covered completely in droppings and smell just as bad. You called out to Ho-oh.

"An adequate effort, finishing 30 minutes earlier than expected. So you can be a useful human after all. For your effort today, you will be given 25 tokens, but they will be used to pay off your fine. You got 25 tokens more to pay."

You sighed as you saw your reward deducted toward the fine. You started walking away from the anus to return to your sleeping place. Out of the corner of your eye, you noticed another tunnel that split off from the large intestine.

Are you going to take it?
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Start of the Second Day

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
"I cleaned every inch of this place, I should have a small reward at least.". With that thought you decide to distract yourself from your situation by exploring around. You enter the tunnel and try to deduce where it would lead. There are no clues on the walls, but this tunnel seems to be part of the intestine, as there are marks of waste along the way. Deeper into the tunnel, the path seems more clean. You keep walking, looking at the locater. You also take your human clock off, seeing that you won't be needing it. Ho-oh must have noticed your movements.

"Where are you going, human?" he asks.

"I just wanted to explore around. It is okay, right? I'm still in your bowels, or at least pretty near to them."

Ho-oh seems to think for a second, before replying. "Okay, go around. You're free to explore my colon as much as you want, as long as you don't go anywhere else without my permission."

Now that you aren't breaking any of Ho-oh's rules, you continue your path. There isn't much to see in the tunnel. When you start seeing finally the end of the path, you are forced to stop. "Enough, human. This is as far as you can go. One more step and you'll be disciplined with an electric shock."

"What is over there, Ho-oh?"

"You'll see by yourself later, human! Get back to my intestine."

You definitely don't want to experience the pain of being shocked, so you turn back and start walking back. Along the way, you notice something that you hadn't seen before. There is a patch of swollen tissue on the floor, almost as big as you. You crouch and observe, and then gather courage to touch it. It feels scaly, very different than the texture of the flesh around you. "What are you doing? That doesn't feel good." you hear Ho-oh. You press the patch harder, and Ho-oh lets a pained yelp. "Stop that now!"

You stand up, and continue your way. Along the way, you think about that. "I could take advantage of this on some way or other...". You have a sudden burst of inspiration. "This could work for a escape." you think. Of course, after the events of last night, you decide to be more careful, and to spend more time planning, until everything is perfect. You arrive back to the colon. To your left you can barely see the anus, now empty the space near it. Not having anything else to do, you walk and sit on the floor near this area, as you suppose that soon the rest of the intestine will receive more waste, and you hope it'll take a long time before that waste arrives to your actual point.

You think until the locater on your wrist says it is noon. You have a general plan, one that might actually work. It will take some days to complete, but you're confident it'll work. So far you think about using multiple distractions at the same time.

"Lugia fighting with Ho-oh could be one, and causing pain using that sensitive point in the tunnel could be another." You plan to place your human clock on the patch, then program any function of it to vibrate in a few days and cause pain. Hopefully Ho-oh will send you to check what is wrong, and then..."I leave the locater there so Ho-oh thinks I'm working, and then I look for a way out." You frown, realizing the main obstacle for now.

You have to break the locater, so it isn't adhered to your wrist. Your hands are unable to do it. And you have only the rest of the day and tomorrow to do it and leave the human clock on the patch, as you won't have an excuse to return to this part of Ho-oh's anatomy after your punishment is over.

Your thoughts are interrupted. "Human! I have noticed you have been in the same place for a while. You aren't planning to get out through my back door, are you?" You say you was just resting. "Doesn't matter. You won't starve to death, come and eat something. I don't care if you don't like it, you'll eat."

You stand up, and look for a path. Ho-oh shows you where to go, and soon you're in front of another entrance.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Take the tunnel and explore

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The entrance to the new location opens. You look at the room and studied its feature. The chamber looks like the stomach you were initially in but it has a lot more features. There are several large tank-like structures the lined one side of the room. They have some degree of transparency enabling you to see that there are substances in them. The sound of liquids churning about echoes throughout the room. You can see large fleshy tubes that are connected to all of the tank, ending at a lone platform in the center. 

You walked your way toward the center. When you got on the platform, the flesh suddenly transformed and grabbed you. The floor around you bend and distort. As you learned before, any attempted struggling will only make things harder for you. There is nothing you can do but submit yourself to the legendary Pokemon's plan. In a few moments, a chair materialized along with a small table. Tendons from the chair are holding you in place firmly. You hear Ho-oh's voice ring out from above.

"Well human. Welcome to your eating area. Those tanks you see there are where my food supplies are preserved. The things I ate will go through my stomach first to be processed and sent here. Those foods are usually meant only for me. But since I have to keep you imprisoned for a long time to come, I'll have to share some of them with you.", the Pokemon said, "In case your wondering, those will be the food you'll be eating; if your don't like them, well too bad they will be the only thing you'll be getting here. Also, since you are still on punishment, you can only eat low-grade food today. And yes, it'll cost you 1 token for this meal. Please put your 'locator wristband' on the table."

As Ho-oh said that, you places your left hand on the table. You see the display indicating that a token has been deducted from your account. A tube came down from above to the front of your face.

"It's time for you lunch, human. You will find my own food mix to be the most delicious.", Ho-oh said, "I've combined berries, fruits, meats, and various plant leaves to make it nutritious for you."

Before you could complain about the content of your lunch, the tube latched itself onto your mouth, sealing it completely. Then, you saw liquid contents starting be pumped toward you. You closed your eyes, dreading the flavor of Low-grade food mix. The moment the mush landed in your mouth, you believed that you have tasted the most repulsive thing you've ever known. It's sour and at the same time extremely bitter. You wanted to gag from the taste but the food kept on pumping down your throat. You believe that Ho-oh is probably enjoying every moment of this force feeding.

After a torturous 3 minutes, the flow finally subsides. The tube detached from your mouth and returned to the ceiling. There are still some remnants of the mush in your mouth,causing you to cough in reflex. A slight burning sensation lingers in your throat. Ho-oh snickered at your reaction.

"I see that you didn't quite like low quality food here, human.", Ho-oh said, "You better be thankful that I didn't feed you my refuse. If you want something better, you better start showing me your best behavior from this point on. Am I clear?"

You weakly said "yes", feeling pretty much sick and disorientated.

"Now that the food problem is solved, it's time to continue your next assignment: Go back up to my eye chamber. You'll be attending some private lessons."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Lunch time

choices: You are in an incorrect place.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
"Private lessons? What does that mean?"

"Don't ask, you'll see when you get there. You better be fully awake, as I won't tolerate you not giving your full potential once you're there!"

You sigh and decide to see where this will take you. It isn't like you had other options, though. You look for a way out of your eating area, and try to remember how to get to the eye chamber. You knew practically nothing of the paths inside Ho-oh's body, and didn't want to get lost inside such a hostile captor. You decide to ask Ho-oh for directions, and much to your surprise, he does guide you. You sense that he is bothered by your lack of knowledge.

Soon you arrive to the place you are looking for. The two eyes are as bright as you had let them yesterday, and much to your relief, Ho-oh is still in land. You wonder for how longer he'll be calm about this. Looking around, you note a difference. Now you can see some sort of table in middle of the room, illuminated by the light from outside. There is nothing on the table. You stand near it, and wait for Ho-oh to tell you what these private lessons are.

"Listen: you're going to be inside me, and I expect you to serve me well. You won't be able to do it if you don't know about my past, my body and how I work. You'll attend these lessons every afternoon, unless there is something more urgent. You'll have to memorize everything I say, as I won't say it twice. I'll check your progress with a test at the end, depending on what I'm teaching you. Understood?" -you hear the explanation.

"Yes". It isn't as bad as you think it could be.

Ho-oh somehow deposits a few sheets of thin paper-like tissue on the table. Looking at them, you see any diagrams and maps oh parts of Ho-oh's body.

"I want you to memorize every path. I won't give you directions to any other part of my body, you have to learn to move by yourself. If you don't arrive quickly to the place I tell you, you'll receive punishment in the form of electricity thought the locator on your wrist."- Ho-oh says. You groan at this, as you feel that this is just another excuse to make you suffer. Why couldn't he open the paths for you?

You start checking the maps. It is a tangled mess of lines and blots, and at first you don't seem to understand them. Time passes, and the chamber starts to get darker. Soon it gets too dark for you to distinguish between the many paths inside Ho-oh.

"Enough time, human. Now I'll check how much you learnt".-your host says "It is an easy enough task: you'll get back to my colon by yourself. I won't help you in any way. You have one hour to get there, or you'll experience how being shocked feels."

The display on your locator blinks, and you see the hour starting. You run towards the entrance of the eye chamber, and try to remember the correct paths. In your mind Ho-oh's body seems like a labyrinth, so you're a bit nervous. After running through endless tunnels for half an hour, you're in front of a sphincter that could lead to your goal. You breath deeply, in case you're right and you're received by the foul air inside.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The other side of the sphincter is dark and damp. Even though you're holding your breath, a foul odor still finds its way into your nostrils. You became slightly nauseous and started gasping for more air, only to exacerbate the smell. You walked into the tunnel just as the sphincter began to reseal itself. Without any doubt, you have arrived at Ho-oh colon. You heaved a sigh of relief.

"41 minutes. Considering this is your first time traveling down alone, it's quite fast.", Ho-oh said, "You have memorized your lesson well, human. Right now, I'll be up flying soon after such a long time on ground. Until I give you your next assignment, take your brief rest now."

Fear struck you, Ho-oh will be flying soon? How is this possible? Didn't Lugia mentioned that the power drain will take days to recover? You heard muffled sounds of feathers flapping followed by momentary weightlessness. The two possibilities you can think of are: the effects of Lugia's power drainage is starting to wear off or Lugia badly underestimated Ho-oh's power; after all, they haven't really encountered each other for centuries. The ground in the colon shakes violently as the Pokemon spread his wings for takeoff. Although flying and falling numerous time, Ho-oh managed to propel himself upward with more efforts. As the Pokemon soared high, you can feel a constant rumble beneath you. You started to get worried about Lugia since she still has difficulty flying and telepathy severely limited by the energy absorbing device. How is she right now?, you wondered. Will she be able to find me soon? Oh no! Does this mean that Lugia is left behind?

Just as you are about to be overwhelmed, you heard a weak voice in your head.

"Oh no! I never realized that Ho-oh has dramatically improved his own stamina.", Lugia's voice said., "Things are getting out of control now."

"What should I do now? With Ho-oh now up flying, we would be out of contact range soon!", you said panicking.

"Don't worry about me. I'm more worried about you. Looks like we might have to use some more extreme measures to deal with him." ,Lugia said.

"Extreme? As in attempting to kill Ho-oh?", you asked.

"No. What we're going to do will be far more different. Listen here. I'll have to make it brief. We're going to lose connection very soon...According to legend, it was said that a human is potentially able to assume direct control of a Pokemon when they are within their body."

You listened intently.

"The method differs from each Legendary Pokemon. Once the necessary steps are done, the human will be able to control the Pokemon as if it were a car or a plane."

"How will I be able to do it?", you asked.

"I don't know. The methods are lost to time. But try looking.......I believe....you'll find it......"

The connection between you and Lugia weakened and broke off.

You sat and reclined yourself against the wall thinking about the intensive task that Ho-oh will give you. Occasionally, you would see remnants of digested food flow down from the ceiling and through other tunnels elsewhere; all those will eventually end up at the anus you visited last time. You closed your eyes to take as much rest as possible.....

*25 minutes later*

"Attention, human. I've got a new task for you.", Ho-oh's voice echoed.

You slowly woke up from your sleep and make sure that you're ready for whatever the Pokemon demands.

"Remember that tunnel I showed you earlier where I asked you to turn back?You are now permitted to enter that area. Go there and wait for my instruction."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: You reached your destination.

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You can't believe you're getting another task. You had planned to sleep. But now you had to do something before being allowed to rest. You stood up and walked all the way through the large intestine, trying your best to ignore the contents of the place, and hoping that the entrance isn't blocked by anything. You seem to be lucky, as you are able to find it. You enter the tunnel, and try to get over with this quickly. Soon you reach the swollen point you had seen before, and you realize that the destination is near. The tunnel seems to get brighter with every step, and soon you're in a small round room, seemingly filled with many screens.

"Okay, you're going to have a bigger part for now. I had to get to another place, but due to not being able to fly I have less time to waste. I'm going to fly as fast as I can, I'll need to concentrate on that, meaning that I would be unaware of everything around me. This is where you enter, human. You'll keep an eye on every screen. They are showing what is around me in every direction my eyes can't see. If you see anything I should be aware of, you must tell me. Got it?". Ho-oh explained.

You mutter a few words of agreement, and look for a place where you can watch every screen at the same time. There is no place, so you find out you'll need to keep moving. It is already dark, and you're starting to feel sleepy. There is nothing outside, just clouds and sky. There isn't anything or anyone, not even Lugia. You feel hopeless, and think about what she had said about a way to control Ho-oh. So far you hadn't seen anything that could point to it or anything that isn't normal, besides that odd point you had seen before. You don't know if it is a room or what it is, and you don't know enough about Ho-oh's body to have a theory. You leave it aside, and try to think of other possibilities.

In some moment, you fall asleep. You're awaken by a violent shock, coming from your locator. You yell in pain, and Ho-oh laughs at your pain. "Stay awake, human!". You decide to distract yourself, and think about how you could leave Ho-oh's body while you're controlling him. Maybe you could make him stop so Lugia can dominate him?

A few hours later, Ho-oh finally tells you that he'll rest. "You can go to sleep now." he says. You don't say a thing, and just walk all the way back to the bowels. Once you're there, you look for the cleanest place you can find, and settle down there. Before you fall asleep, you try drastic measures and grab some of the slime of the intestine to try to make your hand slippery enough to remove the device on your wrist. After a while of trying you have progressed, and now it is stuck on your hand, like a clamp. You hope that it doesn't hinder your performance in whatever tasks there are tomorrow. You fall asleep, but you note the cords appearing around you, just like last night.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Next Task

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You woke up the next day to rumbling sound of the walls around you. Today will be a slightly better day for you as you finally finished you punishment. You hope that Ho-oh will give you better accommodation, if only a little. You slowly got up and start making your way to the entrance to the colon. Once you reached the opening, you reminded yourself that you better obey the Pokemon for the time while you look for a way to control him.

"Morning there, human. How was the colon for you the last two days?", Ho-oh asked, "That should teach you not to ever try escaping. If you dare do it again, it'll be far worse. Now let's have some breakfast shall we."

You made your way to the eating chamber again. Initially, you expect another round of force feeding and gag-inducing mush, but Ho-oh gave you actual berries and water this time around. Even though food and liquid were still delivered through a tube, the flow was much slower and intermittent allowing you to eat properly for the first time. After having your fill of breakfast, you proceed to the eye chamber to hear Ho-oh's next order.

The rising sun shines brightly through the two eye openings, casting a golden hue on the sea of clouds outside. Ho-oh seemingly glides casually in the sky. You shielded you eyes from the brightness and made your way to the table in the center. The maps are still where you left them. 

"Alright, human. Your first task today will be taking a complete tour of my body. At each location, I will give you an explanation of the function of each. So, you better memorize them well. As an aid, I'll be providing you with something to take note."

A thin, translucent membrane appeared along with a stylus. 

"Now, be on your way. You got 5 hours."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Start of the Third Day

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
Your first task for the day reminds you of the time you spent inside Lugia, the first days, exploring just for the joy of exploring. But now you have a more important task. This is a perfect chance to look around and try to find your way to the controls. You take the maps and step ouside the eye chamber, and plan your task. To save time and get over with this quickly, you decide to visit the palces in order, starting with the head and descending deeper into Ho-oh's body until you're done.

While you're going towards your first destination, you write everything you know about Ho-oh's digestive system, in case he intends to check your notes when it is over. You already spent much longer that you wanted in those parts of his body, and didn't intend to return to any of those places in the next few days. Yu also examine the maps, trying to find any clues as to where the controls to Ho-oh could be located. There are many promising voids on the maps, but there are still mny options. You expect to explore them, after you remove your locator. Ho-oh wouldn't react nicely if he finds out that you're walking around without his permission.

You arrive to the first of your destinations, and the most obvious place for the Control Room, the brain. If it isn't there, then there should be at least some clues in his brain.

You enter and look around. It is a large room, more like a hub. Ho-oh starts talking.

"I see where you decided to start. Take a good look around yourself, as it is forbidden for you to enter here. And I doubt I'll ever need you in this area, as I'm perfectly capable of dealing with anything that could happen on my brain. So pay attention and then get out of here.

Even if it is part of your tour, I'll show you only one part, as the rest are restricted areas. Go to the left, there you'll see some sorts of library of everything I know."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Tour

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You complied with Ho-oh and took the opening to your left. The walls of the tunnel resembles frosted glass, allowing you to see many of the other off-limit chambers in the brain. After looking around for a while, you continued on toward your intended destination. The room you entered has pink, translucent shelves arranged in a sunburst pattern with a lone table at the center of the room. On the shelves are block-like objects that are color-coded and marked with a written language that you can't understand. You curiously touched one of the blocks only to receive a light jolt from the locator. You withdrew you hand and yelped.

"Hey!", Ho-oh barked, "Don't you touch anything before I explain them, human! Even though this is the only part of my brain you are free to visit anytime, some information are still off-limit to you. Namely, you will not search my personal memories and anything regarding other Legendary Pokemons; especially Lugia. Am I understood, human?"

"....Yes", you said nervously.

"Good, then. Listen up. The boxes contains information that you can access directly. To use them, just pull them out of the shelves and take it to the table at the center. There, you can open the box and view the contents, which are encoded on thin sheets of membrane like papers. Once you finished, put all the sheets in the exact order you found them and placed the box back where you got it. I do not want to wake up and see my memory collection in a mess. If I caught you doing that, you're going to face far more than a simple shock."

You only listened and quietly complied with Ho-oh's demand. It seems that Ho-oh want to hide something from you. Is it possible that the Pokemon has more secrets than he is willing to divulge?

"In case you cannot understand ancient Pokemon language on the boxes, I'll do you a little favor of rendering them understandable."

Immediately with a flash, all the inscriptions on the boxes became legible English words.

"Take an hour to look around before we continue on to the next part of my body. Be quick!", Ho-oh demanded.

You look at the selection of boxes around you. The shelves are so numerous and filled with even more boxes. Searching for useful information will take some time here. You spent the next 10 minutes looking at anything interesting in the area near you: "Battle Records, Maps, Flight Paths, Captive's Info and Current Activity, Body Functions"

The last two items interest you greatly. What could Ho-oh possibly record about you? What kind of function does the Pokemon's body contain? You pulled out the two boxes and took them over to the table. You intend to do a little more research on your captor. As you opened the box containing your information, you hope that Ho-oh didn't somehow figure out you plan......
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Follow his words.

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
There are just a few sheets of membranes, all of them filled with writing. You take the one in top, and note that it has recorded what you have done since the beginning of the day. Not wanting to dwell on stuff that you already know, you go straight to the point and search for something that could indicate if Ho-oh knows what you're doing.

The first one has details of your first encounter with your captor, and a summary of your punishment. You note that there is nothing about how long you'll stay inside him. There are another sheets that contain information about your escape, and the plans Ho-oh had for you if you disobeyed his orders. And in the last one you had checked, there is a part that calls your attention.

"Still unable to fly. Human checked the joints, found nothing. Didn't seem like I was sabotaged in that moment. Wait thirty-six hours more. If unable to fly, then interrogate human. Use force to obtain information if necessary."

You don't like the sound of Ho-oh using his strength to obtain information from you, and think that maybe Lugia's powers wearing off was pure luck. You browse the sheets again, but it doesn't seem like Ho-oh has a definite idea of your plans, nor about Lugia.

You put all the sheets back in the box, and put it back in the shelf. You return to the table to open the Body Functions box. Much to your surprise, it is almost empty. "I thought there would be more stuff in here." -you ask.

"You're supposed to assist to private lessons. This box contained everything you would study in the next hours, I removed the information so you don't know a thing. When you're done everything will be back." -he replies.

You sigh, seeing that you'll have to play according to his rules. You browse the only sheet in the box, looking for anything that could work for your plans. It is useless, but you realize you need to learn what is in the rest of the brain. The information should be in here later. Maybe the controls you're looking for is in another part of the head. You take the box and place inside the box the stylus and the paper with the few notes you had written.

"After I'm done with the so-called tour I could say that I forgot my notes in here. It is a good excuse, right?" you think. You place the box back in the shelf and notify Ho-oh that you're done with his brain.

"I thought you would take longer than that. Then get moving, there is still a long road. Get out of my brain!" he yells. You exit the brain, and start walking through the neck to the nearest system you can find, your next destination.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You travel down Ho-oh's neck to the next entrance. Once you reached the end of the neck, you found another entrance to the side to enter. You entered and encountered a chamber with a large spinning disk that is slightly above the floor; suspended from the ceiling with tendons attached to a fixed center. The sound it gives off is reminiscent of the din that a computer might give off. Its placement allows the disk to swing around the room in every direction in the same way a tire swing would. You take closer look at the apparatus, which is giving off seemingly random blue sparks. Secretly, you are hoping that this isn't some kind of torture contraption that Ho-oh has set up for you.

"Alright, human. You arrived at the second destination. This is my magnetic 'orientation-generator'.", Ho-oh said, "This is what allows me to always know the directions I'm flying and my body's orientation relative to the ground. Without it, I would be lost and utterly useless as such a majestic Pokemon. In addition, the organ also provides me with some capability to make electricity for my body's needs and, in the current case, your punishment if you disobeyed me."

You silently gulped at the last sentence.

"But I figured that by now, you would've learned to obey me and be my good little human after all those punishment you received; they'll get worse with each subsequent violation you commit.", the Pokemon smirked. 

You only nodded quietly at Ho-oh's intimidating words. Staring at the spinning disk, you briefly had the idea of suddenly disturbing the device to confuse the Pokemon to buy you some time to find the body control, but logic tells you that it would be unwise. Making the captor Pokemon madder isn't on your agenda. 

"Hey, human!", Ho-oh screeched, "Stop idling around and get out of there. We still got more places to go. Now move!"
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You take a look at one of the maps you have, and look for a path that could give you a clue of the controls. You make your decision and enter through one opening at the side. It doesn't take you long until you get to a huge chamber, which doesn't look like an organ. Mainly because you can see organs above you.

There are two moving sacks, increasing their size and then reducing, with a steady pace. There are also many tubes, all of them connected to a large blob on the ceiling. It doesn't take you long to realize that you're looking at the outside of the lungs and the heart.

"Why are you outside? You are supposed to observe from the inside, human!" Ho-oh yells at you. "Okay, forget it. Everything you see is basically the motor of my body, and it has been moving for more than a thousand years. Not even you could stop it. You may have supposed that the heart is delicate but with your actual size it is impossible that you'll hurt it in any way.

"Is there something I should know?" you ask, hoping that Ho-oh slips and says something you shouldn't know, but you don't have many hopes on that.

"Nothing! What could you do inside my lungs or heart? You're supposed to help me with my body, but there are parts I can deal with by myself. I thought you were smarter than this!"

Looks like you aren't in luck today. Either Ho-oh is remarkably careful, or you're making bad decisions in the tour. You sigh, and decide to stop focusing on looking ways to sabotage Ho-oh's body or his plans for you. Maybe you'll see something while you focus on the task at hand. The brain still seems like the best option to know more, though.

"Keep going! I said you had four hours to complete your so-called tour, and you still are in the upper half of my body. If the four hours are over and I ask you a question about a place you didn't visit and you can't answer...let's say that you won't sleep tonight until you learn your lesson."

You don't say a thing, but you're annoyed. You check the maps again and enter a path that goes to Ho-oh's abdomen. You have no idea what you could encounter in the area you're entering, but everything is getting hotter around you and you're sure that the destination isn't going to be a relaxing place such as the one you encountered inside Lugia's body, when you entered in a similar tunnel.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
As you traveled farther down the tunnel, the temperature around you grew hotter and hotter with each passing moment. Already, Ho-oh's body is unbearably warm but now this felt more like a furnace.   If a comparison were to be made, Ho-oh's body is a inferno labyrinth compared to Lugia's gentle interior. By now, you are wondering where the rest of the body tour would take you to. You continued in the tunnel until you reached a large room where it's even hotter. Around you, there are several tall towers of golden flames that extend toward the ceiling. Ahead, there is a round podium like structure with stairs for you to climb. When you reached the top, you are face to face with a large pool of molten metal. The heat emanating from the amber mixture is enough to distort the air in the chamber. On the edge of the pool stands a large statue of Ho-oh with his wings spread wide and head held high. 

"This is my Foundry Chamber, where I store melted gold to make weapons and artwork for other Pokemons.". Ho-oh said, "A human like you will find it strange as to why this place exists in my body. Well, I was the one who developed and perfected the art of forging in ancient times. I'm not called the Gold Pokemon for nothing, you know."

"So, you can make virtually any kinds of things here?", you asked.

"Of course I can, human!", boomed Ho-oh, "I can make anything from the hardiest spear to the most intricate carvings known to Pokemons. Although I once made artworks for humans like you, that was the distant past; several thousand years ago. If you want to get me to make you some things from my gold, that you probably won't have the chance of seeing, I assure you, human. Alright now, get on with your tour! We haven't got all day!!!"

You promptly exited the chamber and back onto the main tunnel way.

"You may find the next destination a far more interesting place."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

choices: You resign and decide to get done with this now.
You try to convince Ho-oh to let you do it after the tour.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
"Why?" you ask, trying to look interested. It is hard for you to be excited when Ho-oh is showing you the wonders of his body, and you may never see them again. The Foundry was by far one of the most impressive things you had seen, even if you don't want to admit it.

"Because besides it being something good, you'll do something for me!"

Just fantastic. Now you was going to work, and judging by Ho-oh's words, you won't know what it is until you get there. You finally got to the second-to-last entrance. Looking at the device strapped around your hand, you have a little more than an hour and half to finish the tour. You enter the new destination, and you certainly didn't expect to encounter Ho-oh himself!

Besides Ho-oh, the room is completely empty. And the projection reminds you of Lugia's subconscious. You almost compare this place to your past experiences inside your friend's body, but you stop in time after thinking that it may anger Ho-oh.

The representation in front of you, still bigger than you (you can't reach the beak even if you extended your hand), looks at you indifferently and talks to you. "I'll say it once: every Legendary has the same powers to an extent. We all have a tiny figure of ourselves that represents our actual state. Those who are strong psychic powers can move this "avatar" outside the room, or make it act as part of their subconscious. I can't do that, so it always stays here. This may be the only time you visit this place, and I have more work for you!"

"You could interact with "me" and it would be like if you were in your normal size and outside my body. You'll now start cleaning every part of the outside of my body until there is no debris between my feathers or any kind of dirtiness in any other part. When you are done, you'll visit the last part of the tour"

"What is the time limit?" you ask.

"Zero! This is part of your tour! Do it now and finish the tour before time is up! I have warned you what will happen if you fail, so you better get started!" Ho-oh's representation barks before approaching to you and lowering his head, clearly expecting you to start cleaning. Its eye is as big as half of your body.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
As Ho-oh continued to stare at you with his brilliant red eyes, you got a feeling that any signs of disobedience will definitely get you something worse than electric shock. Although only a 'representation', the thing could probably inflict physical harm on you just as the real Ho-oh could if you're outside. Seeing that you have no other choice, you resigned yourself to start cleaning this 'unreal' Ho-oh. You begin by tidying the feathers on the Pokemon's long crown, carefully setting the ruffled feathers into a neat pattern. You tried to remove any dirt that are stuck between the feathers on the head and neck.

"Now, give my beak a little polishing. Then, give my wings a thorough cleaning. After that, start on my body, tail, and my talons. I expect them to be gleaming by the time you're done.", Ho-oh ordered.

Seeing that you have nothing else to clean with, you remove your outer shirt and began wiping the gold beak with it. A brownish layer of grime started to come off the surface as your wipe across it. Occasionally, you would look up to find Ho-oh keeping a tight eye on your every move. You can tell that Ho-oh is enjoying every moment of this service. After spending a few minutes on the beak, it shimmers in the faint light of the chamber. You looked at your shirt which is now completely soiled with unknown dirt. That was one of your favorite shirt and you've used it as a rag for cleaning a 'representation' of Ho-oh stained with who knows what.

"Hey!", shouted Ho-oh, "Who told you to stop? Get back to cleaning me, human!"

You quickly resumed cleaning. The wings are quite difficult to clean. As you found out, Ho-oh has specifically demand that you work carefully on the glistening golden plumage, only brushing them in one direction and carefully remove all debris layer by layer. He also told you that any feathers accidentally bent out of shape during cleaning will mean getting shocked in addition to have your tokens deducted. Hearing the punishment, you took extreme caution on cleaning the wings, cleaning the feathers gently and slowly.

Cleaning both wings took you 35 minutes. So you quickly went to work on the talons. Both of them are covered in a layer of grime. You wiped them with the soiled shirt, cleaning all the parts of the leg and taking extra effort in cleaning the claws. You make sure that all the claws are polished sparkling white then you went on to work on the tail, straightening and cleaning the feathers there. When everything is done, Ho-oh look even more majestic than ever, in your opinion. You see the Pokemon scrutinizing at all the details of his body; even went as far as to count the feathers on his wings to make sure that you haven't broken any.

While the Pokemon is checking your efforts, you were quietly thankful that Ho-oh didn't ask you to clean the area around his back-hole.

Finally, Ho-oh finished his inspection look at you firmly. You prepare yourself for any thing from high voltage shock to physical pain. But instead, he still stood there looking at you.

"I will count your effort as 'acceptable'.", Ho-oh said, "Although some feathers on my wings are slightly misaligned, you did quite an adequate job of polishing my beak and talons. If I make you clean me a few more times, I think you would make a perfect, personal body maintainer for me, human."

The tiny hint of rare approval by Ho-oh made you feel slightly better, even if only a little.

"Don't indulge on my words for too long, human. You're still considered a liability to me. Whether that changes depends entirely on your action.", Ho-oh said firmly.

"Now, you still got one last place to visit as part of the tour. Get going and travel down! You'll see what I have in store for you."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: You resign and decide to get done with this now.

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You get back to the main path, and enter the last option there is. You don't know what could be next, but you hope that after doing an 'acceptable' job in your last task Ho-oh will have mercy on you. You only have twenty minutes left in your timer.

You get to the end of the tunnel, and enter. The room is pitch black, and you can't see anything. You barely can see your hand, even when holding it in front of your face. You can hear the sound of liquids falling somewhere. You carefully walk forward, until you feel your feet being soaked with something. You are getting increasingly annoyed, you yell at Ho-oh, telling him to turn on the lights or something.

"You're boring, human! I had dimmed the lights because I wanted you to have problems. But if you really want it, then I'll do it". Ho-oh replies indifferently. The lights around you are turned on, and you see that you are standing in a clear stream of water. Looking around you, you note that you are in a small and curved room. On the side far from you there are veins on the wall, and there is a liquid of indescribable color dripping slowly from them, forming a stream going to a part you can't see. On your side, there is only a chute on the ceiling, and you seem to be on a shallow pool of water, just covering your ankles.

"You're inside one of my kidneys! How is that for the end of your tour, human?" your captor laughs at you.

"There are other places that would have been better."-you reply back, and you instantly receive a shock, coming from your locator. You yelp in pain.

"Shut up! There is a reason this is the last stop. You'll have to answer a few questions about my body, and if you don't get enough score, your punishment will be greatly amusing for me! Before we start, you have to wash yourself! When was the last time you took a bath, human? Stand under the chute!" -Ho-oh demands.

You would have said something rude about how your actual state was the consequence of cleaning Ho-oh's eyes and body, and spending so many hours in his colon, but you had received enough shocks for the day. You obey Ho-oh, and you are instantly doused in water. You and your clothes are soaked, but you don't feel cold, mainly because the inside if Ho-oh's body is too warm. At least you now are clean. You also notice that the force of the water removed the locator that was stuck in your hand. You pick it up and store it in your pocket, not wanting Ho-oh to notice that you don't have it on.

Ho-oh then proceeds you to explain the functions of the place and the rest of his urinary system, and notifies you that with that concludes your tour.

"Now you'll answer ten questions about my body. You have to get at least eight questions right. Get to the other side of my kidney, and stand in a platform you'll see. There is only one."

You walk to the other side, and see the part of the kidney you hadn't seen. The stream of what you guess is Ho-oh's urine crosses the kidney until it reaches a hole in the floor, forming a small waterfall. Much to your despair, the only platform is directly in front of the hole. You cross a bridge that leads to the platform, and wait for Ho-oh's instructions.

"I'll say it once. Fail, and I'll push you through that hole. You can check your notes. Are you ready, human?" you reply you are ready, and the questions start.

"How many different sections are inside my lungs?" Ho-oh asks, and you can feel clear malice in his voice.

"I...don't know. I didn't see that!" -you protest.

"Tough luck human! This is your first wrong question! It isn't my fault that you didn't check enough places, I'll ask you stuff!" -he mocks you.

You are enraged. This is Ho-oh torturing you, but you try your best to answer the questions. Most of them are about places you hadn't seen, and you manage to guess correctly. Still, at the end you manage to answer five questions right.

"Unacceptable!" - your captor says cheerily. "You deserve this!" The platform you're on starts tilting, until it is vertical. You grab to the edge, you're hanging directly above the hole, and beg to Ho-oh. You don't want to go any further. Somebody had once told you that birds don't have a bladder, and you don't want to check that by yourself. You tell Ho-oh that you'll give him the tokens you earn in the next week, you make promises, and other things you wouldn't do normally.

Your only hope is that Ho-oh listens to you.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Last Part of the Tour

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
Holding only ledge of the platform with a single hand, you repeatedly pleaded Ho-oh to forgive this one time. However, the efforts were useless.

"Silence, human!", Ho-oh snapped, "Since you have failed my test, it is time that you endure a much more extreme form of punishment. Presumably, you will be far more willing to follow my instructions carefully once I'm through with you. Heh Heh."

You heard Ho-oh's mocking laugh ringing throughout the chamber. Your hand is already strained from holding yourself up for the last few minutes. Inevitably, the moment came. You lost hold of the platform and tumble toward the hole beneath. Falling into the hole, you are immediately surrounded by warm urine. Some of it went into your mouth, where it left a bitter and obnoxious aftertaste. Almost immediately, a sucking force began to form underneath you and dragged you into the urine. You are pushed through a winding tube, deprived of oxygen. Dizziness ensued as you are taken through a labyrinth, twisting and turning. Then, you see a circle of light in front of you. You deduced that you are about to reach the anus. This is bad!, you thought. Is Ho-oh about to drop me from several hundred thousands feet from the sky? Just how bad could it get? Oh, no..no.no.......

The moment finally came. In a swift action, you were expelled from the hole with the remaining urine. You feel yourself in an immediate free fall, plunging downward in a stomach-turning spiral. You could barely open your eyes in the strong wind around you. The sun was just hanging on the horizon, casting an orange hue upon the sky and clouds. Normally, you'd enjoy this spectacular view. This time, it could be your last. You thought about what would happen to you afterwards. What would happen to Lugia? Before you resigned yourself to what could be a fatal plunge, you suddenly saw Ho-oh, as large as ever, circling around you. Initially, you figured that the Legendary Pokemon is loving every moment of the "front-row seat" he has in witnessing your end. But Ho-oh started directing his wings toward you.The beating of his wings created a gale which lifted you upward. You came face to face with him. His eyes still filled with rage as he gripped you with his talon.

"Do you like the feeling of an endless fall, human? I sure hope you do. Because you failed to answer my questions correctly, enduring an hour of free plunges will serve as your punishment this time around. Feel happy that I'm not letting you die.", Ho-oh said, "Enjoy......"

There was a particularly sinister tone in the way the Pokemon uttered the last word. Ho-oh once again released you from his talon You continuously felt yourself falling for several thousand feet only to be propelled upward by Ho-oh's wing-generated gale and left to free fall again. With each 'round', you grew increasingly disorientated, your stomach churned, and you feel that you are about to throw up at any second. You felt yourself being whisked up and down like a rag doll. Each time you managed to catch a glimpse of Ho-oh, he only flashed a smirk in your direction, indulging himself in seeing your fear and obvious discomfort. The process repeated itself for an hour. After countless free falls, you felt numb and barely on the verge on consciousness. On the final fall, Ho-oh circled down below you and opened his beak wide. The last thing you saw was the Pokemon tongue and then everything went dark.

*a few hours later*

"......"

You slowly started to wake up. Your vision is still blurry as you tried to look around the dim surrounding. When your eyes got focused and adjusted to the darkness, you found yourself back in the eye chamber and by the look of thing, it's night already. The faint light from the half moon shone through the eye windows, casting a ghostly white aura in the room. Ho-oh is still flying, but higer than usual

"Ah. I see that you have finally woken up, human.", Ho-oh said, "How did that free-falling work out for you? I bet you will follow my instructions and do exactly as I ordered from now on."

"..yes, Ho-oh......", you said, your voice barely audible.

"Well, then. I consider you to have learned your lesson well. Now get to sleep. We have a lot more things to do tomorrow.", Ho-oh said.

You remembered the locator in your pocket.....what to do next?
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Ho-oh refuses to listen.

choices: Rest of the brain/respiratory system/circulatory system
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You are fed up with Ho-oh's behavior. You promise yourself that you won't rest until you find a clue of where the control room could be.

Seeing how the tour was over and how Ho-oh told you to go to sleep, you suppose that asking him to let you go to his brain to retrieve your notes would be a stupid thing to do. You decide to follow the given instruction and wait until your captor is asleep before daring to sneak into such a critical part of his body.

You reach your room, and are received with the not-so familiar room, with a very low amount of tokens on a side. Checking the locator, you see that Ho-oh has taken back most of your tokens. This adds to your rage, and gives you courage. You stay on the room, trying not to fall asleep, until you feel that Ho-oh is likely to be resting. You decide to start your new quest.

You place the locator in the floor, in case Ho-oh checks where you are. Then you carefully start to walk through the many paths inside Ho-oh's body, until you reach the brain. Your captor doesn't seem to have noted anything, but now the hardest part is coming. You look around the first room, and find the path to the library you had visited earlier. The chamber is silent and dark, so you wait a moment to get used to the darkness. Soon you're able to see. The markings on the boxes are still in a language you can understand. Looks like Ho-oh was careless! And you're happy to see that you can read the boxes Ho-oh had forbidden you to read.

You take a few boxes and place them on the floor. Bodily Functions, in case the controls are in a system. Legends Mythology, as it may give you a clue. Ho-oh's Powers, to see if you can disable them. And a box containing information about Lugia, you want to communicate with her.

You browse through the last box you chose, and are unable to find anything useful, at least about talking with her. You however stumble upon a small tidbit of information, hinting the location of Lugia's control room, apparently somewhere near her Private Chamber. Remembering that the only way to enter to Lugia's Private Chamber was through her reproductive system, you hope that Ho-oh's body controls is located in a different place.

You place the box about Lugia back to its place, and focus on the other three boxes. All of them (including the Bodily Functions box, which was almost empty in the morning) was full of membranes with writing on them. You take your time to read carefully every single sheet, and thanks to the third box you learn that Ho-oh's powers are linked to the control room too. The second room told you that Lugia's words are true, there is a way to control Ho-oh as long as one is inside that room. And you manage to find the information you're looking for in the first box. It isn't the exact coordinates of the control room, but it tells you in what area this is.

You take mental note of the paragraph:

"Besides the normal functions this system has, there is a part near this system that would override my brain and allow somebody to control my body. For safety reasons there is only one way in, and I'm likely to feel if there is an intruder in the area. But what are the chances of a guest stumbling upon this room?"

You put the boxes back to their places, but before placing the last box back you take a look to the title of the sheet you had found the information you memorized, which told you which system it was. You smile, not knowing if you're happy or not.

You head off to search for the control room. You take a path leading to Ho-oh's...
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The path you took takes you to other parts of the brain. You remembered the information ont membrane sheet:

"Since the brain is the vital part of my body, I suppose it will be the most apt location for the control room. The risk of an intrusion are quite low as the current human captive I have was given explicit instruction to only use the library. It is clear that the human won't risk his chance of electrocutions or torture under my watchful eyes. But in the event someone does enter the control room, I will encounter a complete loss of control of my body. I will be nothing but a prisoner in my own head and a mere voice to my 'hijacker'. This is a scenario that I will absolutely prevent from happening. I will use absolutely all methods necessary to keep that from ever occurring."


Ho-oh seems to record his own analysis a lot, unknowingly give out valuable information that way.

You eventually returned to the hub that connects all the other chambers in the brain. Looking around you, you estimated that there are at least six other access points. Although the Pokemon mentioned the control room to be in the brain, Ho-oh didn't elaborate exactly which route it is. Looks like I have to have a look around here, you thought.

You tried the first route nearest to you. The tunnel takes you to a much smaller version of the library you just used. There is just one shelf and a few boxes on it. They are not labeled in anyway. What kind of secrets does Ho-oh have that it's necessary for him to leave the data unnamed. And for some reasons, the boxes glow pink instead of the blue that you are used to. Now, things are getting really interesting. Curiously, you removed one of the boxes and set it on a table nearby. You removed the thin membrane sheets and gazed upon the content. What you saw shocked you beyond belief. Before you, there are several pictures of various Pokemons engaging in explicit activities.Their privates in full display and looks of lust on their face. The photos are mostly Legendary Pokemons including Ho-oh himself and, to your surprise, there are a few of Lugia's. As you flipped through more of the membranes, you saw that Ho-oh imagined himself with far larger prowess and virility, engaging with other female Legendaries. There are some pictures of himself in an anthropomorphic form. Even more appalling, Ho-oh took the time to compose love poems of his wildest imagination:

Descending from the blue heaven,
I encountered a glorious Pokemon.
I closed my wings upon her,
Causing her a lovely shudder.
I shoved my spear of fire,
A Legendary bliss far higher.

You are at the same time surprised and weird-out by the pictures. What in the world is this? Ho-oh's private PlayPokemon collection? Whoa, he sure has a strange side that he didn't show to you, you thought. His fantasies are sure bizarre.
