Floatzel's chamber is far larger than Lugia's and looks more like a museum than a room. The ceiling are dotted with glowing crystals that illuminates the chamber with a soft turquoise light. The floors consists of tiles with carvings of ancient writing systems. Mountains of pearls are stacked in neat rows like building blocks and are categorized based on color and size. The smallest are the size of grains while the largest is the size of a beach ball. Virtually every visible color is available for you to see. Besides pearls, there are also golden amulets, a six-colored gemstone, coins made of diamonds, and many more. Floatzel is giving you a tour of his treasure chamber, explaining how he got each artifact and what does it do. He used only his voice to guide you through this palatial place. As you listened carefully to the Pokemon, you wondered if Floatzel's power has to do with all these things he has. It definitely has something to do with his treasures, you thought.

Just then, you reached a door that is made from solid bone and there seem to be no way to go through it. A sign above says "Restricted Area/ Entry only by Floatzel's Permission".

You tell Floatzel that you reached the door and wait for him to open it to his most priced collections.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Floatzel is awake

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The door opens slowly, and you glance at the inside. It only has three objects.

"Here you go. This place will be always open for you, whenever you want to see my treasures again you can come back" Floatzel says proudly.

You enter the place, ready to be shown the collection. To this point you are amazed that so many valuable things are inside a Pokémon. It wasn't so strange inside Lugia or Ho-oh, after all they are huge and have a lot of power, but this is a common species that you have seen many times. You wonder if your own team has treasures inside them.

You focus on the collection. The first one is something you have given to some of your own Pokémon, a Mystic Water. It isn't something beautiful, but maybe Floatzel knew it would increase his strength, why else would he have this in this site of honor? Seeing it was nothing special, you walked towards the second treasure, so Floatzel didn't note your main interest.

It was much more interesting, a small statue of crystal of your host. This time Floatzel talks to you about how he obtained this when he "entered a village full of humans and managed to steal it from the hands of the most powerful opponents he had encountered". You suspect it was a lie, but it was an entertaining story. Then you finally see what you wanted to see.

Lugia's Pearl is at the other side of the room. It is much more beautiful than the hologram inside Lugia. You understand that most would want to have this pearl. "This isn't any pearl. This one belonged to a legendary Pokémon whose name I don't want to say. This was one of the sources of her power, now that I have it with me I can defeat her. Since I have this pearl inside me I'm much more powerful than before. Awesome, right?"

You say a lot of compliments towards Floatzel. A while later, you exit the place, noticing that the door is still open. Looks like Floatzel fully trusts you. You contact Lugia and tell her you found her pearl. "I'm still thinking about what to do. We should avoid a confrontation. Without it...I can lose"

You take the hard news stoically. Lugia tells you that she'll contact you soon. Meanwhile...there is something you would like to talk with Floatzel. When you return to your room you ask:

"Floatzel, if I ever were going to leave your body...would you let me go?"
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Inner Temple of Floatzel

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
Floatzel remained silent for sometimes before answering.

"Why would you suddenly ask about this, human?, Floatzel said.

Knowing that saying that you wanted to Lugia would be instant trouble, you said a half-truth.

"I kind of missed life as a normal-sized human. I wanted to return to being a trainer on an adventure, to meet new Pokemons, and to battle new trainers.", you replied.

Again, the Pokemon took some time to formulate his thoughts.

"I understand your feeling perfectly. But leaving my body so suddenly isn't going to resolve your size problem at all. I have no idea how to restore despite my training under 'her'.", Floatzel said calmly, "Plus, don't you think my body has a lot to offer you? Isn't it safe in there?"

"Yes, I agree with you about that and I have to thank you for letting me stay in your body the last few days. I never actually knew that Pokemons have such interesting interior until I came across you.", you said, "And your body sure does provide a lot of stuffs I didn't really expect in an Pokemon at all. But I feel that something is still missing here. I think it's a lack of interaction with people in general. Talking with them, sharing your thoughts, and knowing each other better. To me, that's what allows happiness to exist and friendship to blossom."

Outside, Floatzel listened intently to the human. He knows that feeling well, the one he has kept to himself for such a long time. One he was unwilling to revisit. As he listened to the human continue on how he missed his friends and his other Pokemons. Floatzel felt a something that he hasn't experienced since that day.

"I know that feeling perfectly.", Floatzel said with some tone of sadness, "A much as I hate to admit it, I haven't talked much to anyone since I left Lugia after she trained me. In a somewhat similar situation to you, I used to be good friends with Lugia and she really liked me in return. We used to talk with each other and laugh together. As a Legendary, she saw my potential during a wild battle some years ago. I was a young Buizel back then. Lugia sensed that I was different from other Pokemons and took me under her wings taught me about all the things she know about Pokemon powers. The room and all the things you see in me are the result of those trainings."

Now, it's your turn to listen to Floatzel's story. This is a rare opportunity to hear from Floatzel's point of view. You have a feeling that there is more to the story than Lugia was telling you.

"We trained hard everyday and I constantly endured long lessons and difficult moves that required numerous level of concentration. But in the end, I always managed to surprise Lugia with my performance. In return, I earned her recognition as a special Pokemon and she treated me more and more like a close friend than a student."

At this point, you started feeling bad about Floatzel.

"Everything was fine until....that day..." Floatzel said with melancholy, "Lugia said that I had finally attained the highest level that a regular Pokemon could achieve and that anything beyond that would overwhelm any Pokemon other than a Legendary. I tried to convince her to teach me more of those things, but she refused, saying that it would endanger my life. I got mad at her and fought with her with the very moves she taught me. I defeated her, yelled things at her that hurt her deeply and left. Looking back at it, I kind of regret breaking off contact with her and losing my only friend here."

The more you listened to Floatzel's story, the more you are convinced that you need to stay a little longer in Floatzel. There is no doubt that the event was traumatic for the Pokemon. You couldn't imagine the feeling of being alone for years at a time. Leaving him now would probably make the problem worse, and possibly even endangering Lugia if Floatzel reverts to rampage from anger and loneliness.

"Just promise me....you won't leave my body.", Floatzel said with pleadingly, "I'd hate to re-experience that isolation again."

"..........Alright, compared to my problems, I think staying longer wouldn't do much harm.", you said.

"Thanks.....", Floatzel said emotionally, "Let's get some rest, shall we?....."

You said good night to Floatzel and lie down on your bed. You contacted Lugia and told her about what you heard and your decision to stay a bit longer with Floatzel. You signed off and let those thing sink in for her. Maybe.....there are still ways of resolving the split......
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: A Conversation with Floatzel

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You spend the rest of the day thinking. If you find a way to end the conflict peacefully then everything you have gone through would be worth it. You wouldn't only return to your normal size, you also would make the two Pokémon friends again. Of course if there was so many negative feelings then it won't be easy. You wonder how long it'll take you.

You had changed your opinion about Floatzel, and it was so fast you didn't even notice. You felt that he was deeper than you thought at first. Floatzel showed concern for the first time, asking you several times what was going on, as you stayed in your room for the rest of the day, thinking. You knew it was out of fear of you leaving.

"It is funny. I have gone from entering without Floatzel knowing, to try to find a way to get the pearl out, to now try to find a way to solve this. My life sure is convoluted" you think before you fall asleep.

The next day you are awoken by a sudden contact from Lugia. She had tried to call you before, but you had refused to say more about your intentions. She had expressed her support, but also said it would be very hard to convince Floatzel to give Lugia a chance. This indeed seemed the hardest thing to do. And after they regained contact, what would they say? They wouldn't be friends again just because they talk to each other. There must be a way.

"Okay Lugia, what now?" you say, annoyed at the rude wake-up call.

"I wanted to make sure you knew what you are dealing with. Despite your efforts and actions, it is possible Floatzel won't trust you if he finds out you are inside him because of me. I thought it would be good to remind you. You're a good person, but don't let that get you carried away"

You say thank you and decide to set the base of your plan. You're not sure of the path to take but you think you know what not to say. After breakfast and the usual morning routine you request an audience with Floatzel. He reluctantly accepts. Knowing the importance of the conversation you're going to have, you enter the private conversation room.

"The reason I'm here Floatzel is because I think there is a way to solve this whole fight and make you feel good again. I'm willing to find a way, and I'm trying to do it, but I have to ask you: would you be willing to try to reconsider being Lugia's friend?"

Floatzel seems to think for a while. You patiently wait, knowing that if there is a negative answer you'll have to work harder to convince him that this is worth his time. Finally Floatzel replies "I'll try". You smile and talk before your host has a chance to backpedal.

"Good. Then it is settled, I'll try to get you peace, in all senses" you say "First than all I'll need a way to communicate with Lugia myself. Can you find a way? Preferably without leaving your body"

"I can do that. What will you tell her? I doubt she'll want to talk to a random human, specially if it is...inside me"

"You don't know her like I do" you think. Then aloud: "Trust me".

"Fine. I think it'll be ready tonight, it'll need a lot of special things. What will you do while it is finished?"

"Is there some way I can help? I know it isn't easy for you"

"Well, there are a few problems but I can solve them by myself. If I need you I'll contact you. For now feel free to explore around" he says, but before you leave the room you hear something more "Wait! Would you like to come out? Maybe it can be tiring to be inside somebody for so long. Maybe you could spend the rest of the day outside my body."

You think for a moment. This reminds you of an experience you had with Lugia, a long time ago. The details are hazy, but you remember Lugia had gravity or something. You doubted Floatzel had that ability.

"How would that work?"

"You...come out...then stay outside. For your safety you shouldn't be outside my cave so you'll stay inside my den. You're free to explore my home, or explore the outside of my body, whatever you want. After all, I'm as fun on the outside as I am in the inside!" he says cheerfully. Then in a more serious tone "I'll be careful with you if you want to be on me"

You think that you would need something to do while you wait for a way to supposedly communicate with Lugia. Floatzel can't know you already have a way. "Sure, why not?" you say while going towards the mouth.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Next Day

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You exited Floatzel's mouth and felt the sea breeze rushing through your hair for the first time in days. When you're fully out of the Pokemon, he asked you whether you would like to stay in his cave or stay on the outside of his body. You gave yourself some time to think about it. While staying at Floatzel's cave could be a relaxing experience, for now, you prefer to stick with Floatzel both for safety and more exploration. You told him about your decision. Once he heard it, Floatzel picked you up with his cream-colored paw and brought you up to his face. The features of his face looks like massive hills and valleys. It is now that you realized how imposing Floatzel look when he is standing at his full height.

"So, you'd like to be with me, right?", Floatzel said, "Although my exterior isn't as interesting as my inside, you'll still find it worth exploring. And don't worry about falling, my furs will cling to you wherever you walk on my body."

Then, Floatzel brought you downward to his midsection and showed you the orange marking on his belly. He placed you onto the marking and you adhere to it like velcro.

"Alright, now you're free to explore the outside of my body. No matter which direction you decide to travel, you will always remain secured to my body. Have fun!", Floatzel chimed.

You started walking around the body of Floatzel. The first part you can across is the belly button which looks more like a crater from your perspective. Looking down into the hole reveals a tangled mess of fur and other debris. You enter the crater and explore the environment. The scene looks like something out of a science fiction movie; organic ground, tufts of fur here and there, and patches of dirts. Some of the patches even look alive with organisms. This isn't surprising considering the fact that microbes do exists in every part of the body. Although reviling, you find the belly button interesting, but nothing out of the ordinary in the crater.

You made your way out of the belly button and continue with your exploration. Walking further downward, you discovered......
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Going Outside

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You keep walking downward, until you notice that the ground is starting to tilt. The ground is also covered in fur different than the rest of the body, it is thinner and shorter. It doesn't take you long to realize what you have stumbled upon. You look around, like hoping for a confirmation. The position of the ground of the cavern (which you barely can see) and the snout, very high in the opposite direction, are enough hints for you. You have walked right into Floatzel's crotch.

"I didn't expect you to get there so fast!" you hear Floatzel's voice "Curiosity got the best of you, didn't it?"

You don't know what to say, it is an awkward situation and you're not sure of how you should react. You also hope that Floatzel doesn't get any unfortunate ideas, at least while you're there. "I...was just walking"

"And what a destination! Keep exploring if you want to"

You consider the situation. You got here, you may as well leave. Turning back is a boring option, though, and you want to avoid it. So your only other option is to go through this area until you're out. You start walking to go around the cock, noticing that this is another reminder that your actual size is insignificant. It'll take some time to leave this area behind. You're stopped right in your tracks by Floatzel again.

"I thought you would be more fun than this! How are you expected to enjoy my outside when you don't even take a chance to explore?"

"It is that...okay, what do you mean?"

"Exercise yourself while you have fun exploring. You have the possibility to climb my penis to its top and you're choosing to walk around. That is no fun!"

You groan at Floatzel's attitude. This is starting to seem like nothing happened yesterday. Maybe you can get something from this..."Okay, if I do it what do I win? I better get some kind of prize or something"

"I'm giving Lugia a chance. One would think that is enough prize. But if that isn't enough then I guess I can give you another incentive. Just...do it and tonight you'll find something in your room"

You shrug. You may as well get over this as fast as possible. While you return to the base of the cock you think about what you'll do after this. Maybe you can try to reach the ground of the cavern, descending via the legs. It is a possibility. You reach the start point, and look towards your goal. It won't be something that will be done in a few minutes.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: An Awkward Location

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You started climbing the edge of Floatzel's dark phallus, eager on making it toward the top and quickly get yourself out of this awkward situation. The skin on the penis was rough enough for you to hold on with your hand. With it extended to full length, you can feel the pulsing thumps of the veins beneath the skin. The climb was slow and steep. Occasionally, you caught glimpse of Floatzel's head looking down and smiling at you. Why is he making me climb his privates?, you thought, Did he really think such prank task amuses me or is all those stories he told me last night feigned? You continue to scale the penis with significant efforts.

An hour later, you at last reached the peak of the cock. The 'crown' you're on has a light orange color and feels firm underneath your feet. Despite its location, the penis only has the very faint smell of heat and urine lingering in the air. You couldn't believe it, you climbed a Pokemon's cock and managed to avoid any body fluids that you could get on yourself; luckily, Floatzel knows better than to cross the line.

Floatzel tilted his head downward and found the human standing on the top of his cock. He is amused by how fast it took the human to scale his entire length. Though the human might be slightly disgusted about this mission, Floatzel only meant this as a little diversion from the whole reconciling with Lugia situation.

"Congratulations, human!", Floatzel exclaimed, "You made it to the top and earned yourself a reward that I sent to your bedroom."

You managed to smile for the first time since the task started. Feeling better, you explored the area of the crown a bit more and found yourself looking into the hole that leads to the depth of the cock. Suddenly, the ground trembled and you lost your balance.....oh no no no no no, you thought, please don't fall......But it was too late as you felt yourself falling down into the dark confines of the tract.

Unbeknownst to the human, Floatzel has observed everything that happened. He only gave a smirk as the human will eventually stumble upon the most secretive location in his body. Floatzel promised himself that this will be the last prank for the day on the human. Then, the Pokemon return to searching the right frequency signal to communicate with Lugia.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Start climbing

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You slid for some time until you finally land in a new chamber. The ride was rough, so you need some time to recover.

When you finally have enough energy, you stand and look around you. It was unexpected. You know where you slid, but the place you're in isn't one you expected. How many things are connected in this area? You're in a small round chamber, full of boxes. You approach one of the boxes and open it. You can't believe the content.

There are many sexual devices inside the box, and all of them with Floatzel's trademark colors. You don't remember the last time you felt this uncomfortable. "What is this place!?" you yell, staying as far as you can from the rest of the boxes.

Floatzel laughs at your reaction. "Surprise! I bet you didn't think you would see a place like this"

"And I didn't want to! What is this?"

"A place in case you in some moment express an attraction towards me that goes beyond being mere friends"

You are astonished. "What?"

"I wish I could have seen your face? I think there is a camera in one of the boxes, why don't you point it towards your face?"

At this point you catch that Floatzel is messing with you. You restrain your reactions so he doesn't get any fun from you. Soon he stops messing with you, and he finally says in a more serious tone.

"I didn't know stuff about you so I created many things in case you turned out to be, well, somebody who would seek a deeper relationship with me. I thought it would be a good prank to make you fall here, that is why I made you climb all the way up there. And what a nice result!" Floatzel laughs.

A bit calmer, you explore the boxes more. Some of the content makes you blush against your will, since some of the objects you find are of such nature you can't avoid feeling awkward just by seeing them. But it is still interesting that Floatzel felt the need to create all these things.

When you're done checking around, you look for the exit. The only way out is the same tube that brought you here, and luckily for you, it has some ridges you can use to climb. You start climbing through the narrow tunnel, until you reach the main one where you can stand up. Behind you there are paths towards the bladder and the testicles, but you don't feel like daring to go to any of those places. You start walking towards the exit, wanting to get out.

"Why the prank?" you decide to ask.

Floatzel doubts a moment before responding. "I feel that I told you too many things yesterday. I have to correct my behavior in some way! In the next days you can expect to be a victim of some pranks, and I'm sure you won't like all of them. But I promise you this is the last one for today. By the way, I'm still working on the communication for you. It'll be ready soon. Meanwhile feel free to keep going wherever you want"

You see the end of the path in the distance. You think about what you can do. Maybe you could ask Floatzel to show you around his cave, or maybe you could do an U-turn and start climbing his body to his head. You hope you won't encounter other surprises until the day ends.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Floatzel-phile's Corner

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You exited Floatzel's penis and breath a sigh of relief. Certainly, you won't be visiting the place again for some time. You started to walk back up toward the body while thinking about what to do next with the Pokemon. Going back into the mouth doesn't seem like an interesting option nor is exploring the body from the outside. So, you decided to remain outside a little longer and tell Floatzel that you wanted to explore his cavern a little more. Upon hearing that, the Pokemon used his paw and picked you up. He placed you upon his snout and began returning to his large cavern.

"I haven't really showed you the full size of my home, so hold on tight. You will be amazed by how beautiful it looks on the inside.", Floatzel said.

With that said, Floatzel walked deeper into the cavern until the surrounding became too dark for you too see. You held on tight to the fur on the snout as it trembles with each step the Pokemon takes. You told Floatzel that you can't see anything in here but he tells you that he would eventually reach the destination.

After walking in the dark for five minutes, light began to appear in the distance of the cave. When Floatzel arrived at the source of the light, your mouth was completely agape. Before you was a cavern entirely made of blue crystals and gems. The walls and ceiling are giving off a ambient glow that you find strangely comforting.

"Welcome to my secret spot.", Floatzel said, "While I don't normally show this place to others, I'll make it an exception for you. Whenever I have things to think about this will be the first place I visit; I find the crystals to be soothing and serene. I hope you find it the same."

"Incredible....", you blurted out, "how did you manage to find this place?"

"Actually, it was Lugia who created this place as a training ground for me. This cave is located near the center of this island, which was used to indicate its importance.", Floatzel answered.

"Did you two really trained in here?", you inquired.

"Yeah, we did. Back then, we spent days in here, focused on nothing but improving our powers. Sometimes, when we discovered new moves, we always test it on the walls here as they are designed to absorb energies.", Floatzel said.

".....Looks like both of you had great times together.", you remarked.

"It sure was......", Floatzel replied sadly.

When you turned back to look at Floatzel, you noticed some traces of tears in his eyes. The glow of the crystals gave his eyes an ethereal feel as he focused his gaze on you.

"Do you think Lugia would be willing to talk to me after what I did?", Floatzel asked.

"I'm sure Lugia would understand if you apologize and make amends with her. It's never too late to do that.", you said confidently.

".....Thanks for the support, human", Floatzel responded, "Ummm, would you like to renter my body to explore it? I still got places to take you. And I know just the location to treat you for lunch."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
"That sounds good" you reply. Before you know it, you have been brought to Floatzel's mouth. This time you had the emotion of being swallowed willingly. Before you didn't have the chance to experience it, but now you have to admit it is a very strange experience, albeit scary. Due to your size you don't even touch the walls of the esophagus, but you enjoy the free fall. The end of the fall wasn't as good though. You fell into the familiar pool of acid-free stomach content.

You resurface, still disgusted by the concoction. You ask for Floatzel for the path towards the place he had talked about. He instantly opens one of the sphincters in one of the lower floors, and directs you towards it. You walk and enter, it doesn't take you long to arrive towards the place. When you arrive you recognize it. It is the same bar you had visited in the first day of your invasion of Floatzel's body.

"I remember this place. I have been here, before you knew I was inside you. I was looking for food and found this"

"Oh. It doesn't matter. You can still have lunch here. I don't know how you got food from here without me noticing but it won't be as good as what I'm going to cook for you. Sit near the counter"

You obey and wait for the food. Sure, before you know, you see in front of you the best dish you have seen during your stay inside Floatzel, and it does taste better than the rest. You take your time to enjoy every bite, while talking about trivial stuff with Floatzel. You are thankful for his food, although tired of the seafood. You like it, but not everyday.

"Now that this is out the way human, let's start with your plan. I have everything ready for you to contact Lugia. I'll be listening every word too and she knows it. Say what you want and good luck"

"Okay, but from where will I do it?"

"Stay where you are" A strange machine appears in front of you. It has a microphone, and while you're looking at it a bulb turns on.

"Go ahead. Start talking, we'll listen to you. Say who you are as she doesn't know a thing about you"

You nod, and think for a moment. When you organize your thought, you start to deal with the feud.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Zel's Fine Bar

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
Before you talked into the microphone, you mentally use the ear device to remind Lugia that you are about to communicate with her from Floatzel's body. You told her that the Pokemon will be listening and that she needs to act as if she had never met you. With that said, you started speaking into the mic. This is gonna take some good efforts to keep up the illusion.

"Umm....hello? Can anyone hear me?", you asked.

"Huh....wha..? Who is speaking with me telepathically?", Lugia replied.

"Hi! Good to hear you reply. Is this Lugia I'm speaking to right now?"

"Yes indeed, stranger. I am the one and only Lugia, Guardian of the Sea and Islands. The Protector of the Good. Who is it that dares to speak with a Legendary in such direct manner?", Lugia said with a forceful tone.

"......um..Listen, this may sound utterly preposterous and ridiculous but I am a human who is shrunken without an appatent reason in a forest. After some challenges, I managed to find Floatzel, a Pokemon who was kind enough to provide me with way to speak with you through his communication system."

"WHAT IS A HUMAN LIKE YOU DOING IN THAT CREATURE'S BODY? How did you end up there? AND WHAT DO YOU WANT FROM ME, HUMAN?!", Lugia said projecting her voice loudly.

"I.....just..."

"Answer me!!!"

"..please....I'm only here to talk about your relationship with Floatzel. He told me the only way to restore me to normal is to talk with you, Lugia, about your past apprentice. You're the only hope I got."

"WHO TOLD YOU THAT?!! No one is supposed to know that except between us. I have no interest to talk about that vile Pokemon, human. Consider yourself unfortunate, you'll have to live with that thing forever."

"I really needed your help!", you said with fake emotion, "I have to return to normal. I got a life and friends back there. Aren't you supposed to be the benevolent Legendary in our myths? Or, are those myths false and you're contrary to what you claim yourself to be?"

"How dare you question a Legendary like that?! If I ever get my wings on you, you would thought that inferno is a blessing compared to what you're about to get."

"*gulp* Please let me explain. Floatzel told me stories about you. And I learned that things aren't smooth between you two."

"And what does a human like you need to know that for?", Lugia demanded.

"Floatzel said he wanted to have a talk with you again."

"......Alright, human, get that Floatzel on the line!!! He certainly needs some more lectures from his old mentor."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Start talking

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You look at the device in front of you, waiting for Floatzel to start. You knew he is listening, but you still say. "Come on, start"

Floatzel remained silent. "He is afraid of talking because he knows that he has done wrong" you hear Lugia. "You aren't helping, Lugia" Lugia pretends to be offended, and gasps something along the lines of "That human better watch his words"

Finally Floatzel starts speaking. "I'm here because the human insisted that this should end, if it weren't for that I would never think of giving you a chance!"

"Oh, so it is my fault! Listen, it is you the one who tried to be too powerful to be good. You're the one who caused this. Now listen to me"

Lugia tried to lecture Floatzel, but your actual host kept interrupting the Legendary Pokémon. You are staring in disbelief at the device you use to talk, surprised at the rate the conversation turns into a disaster. You try to intercede in some parts, but the bickering discourages you. You're also surprised to hear Lugia so annoyed and upset, you never thought it would be possible. You finally grew tired of this.

"Okay, sorry to say this but you two are acting in a very childish way. Stop right now!" you shout as loud as you can.

They either stopped because the surprise of hearing you talking like that. You take the opportunity to continue:

"I think that we aren't going to get anywhere through this. You two should meet in person as long as you refrain from attacking each other. Will you two be able to do that?"

"I know I can. It all depends of Floatzel" Lugia says. Surprisingly, Floatzel doesn't say a thing.

"Good"

"But you're doing this for your own gain, human. I know that!"

You don't know how to reply to that. You know Floatzel is going to listen to this, to know how you'll return to normal, now that Floatzel has the pearl. If you answer wrong, then he can turn against you. "I have a device that will allow me to return to normal. I'm doing this because...I don't like this problem"

You don't know if you're being convincing. Floatzel makes a positive comment about you, so you're relieved.

"Okay...let's reunite tomorrow in the afternoon. Is that okay, Lugia?" you hear Floatzel say. You know he is restraining himself not to say anything offensive. Lugia expresses her agreement.

Once everything is settled, Floatzel takes away the communication device. Once it is out, he says everything he didn't tell to Lugia, you're glad that nothing Floatzel is yelling now will be heard by Lugia. That would ruin everything.

You return to your room, ready for anything. But when you enter, you see something new. You remember it was the surprise you had won before.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Conversation and Conditions

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The first thing you noticed about the bedroom is that it has become a lot more opulent than it previously was. When you first entered this room, it was an extremely simple and rudimentary in function. But now, the walls are decorated with pictures of Floatzels and the flooring was changed into thick fur carpets that resemble those shaggy rugs you saw so often in actual hotel rooms. What was previously a small single bed is now a large, ornate bed covered with satin sheets. The colors match those of Floatzel's fur. Four bedposts with carvings of the Pokemon now overlooks the bed you're on with a gentle smile. On the other side of the room was a bookshelf with several books neatly stacked with each other. When you take a look at the titles of the book, you blushed when you realized some of them are from the store in Floatzel's cock.

Outside the room, you can still hear faint snippets of the Pokemon's cursing about Lugia. It's probably best that you leave the Pokemon to his own device for the time being. You continue to walk around, checking out the new features of the room. It seems that you even have your private restroom and shower now, eliminating the need to visit the eye chamber. The ceiling now contains an all encompassing screen that can simulate certain environments. You tried several options which include star-filled view of distant galaxies, upwards views of forest canopies, underwater, and many more. At last, you settled on the galaxy one.

You prepared to lie down on the bed when you noticed a large box placed near the center of the bed. The container itself is not marked in anyway; there's no indicator of what's in the box except that it feels heavy. You didn't hesitate to open the box and discovered a beautifully-crafted Floatzel plush. Everything about the figure looks realistic and that you can easily mistake it for the real Pokemon if it weren't a miniature model. You found the gift to be really interesting to say the least. But sometimes these sort of gifts makes you wonder if Pokemons ever exchange presents with each other as a form of courtship. If they do, are there any rituals or customs they observed?

You shook off the thoughts of those questions, before you ever had the chance to fill in the details about 'rituals'. You started wondering whether Floatzel and Lugia can truly reconcile with each other. Although it was irrelevant to returning you to normal size, you just can't allow such conflict to go uncorrected. Occasionally, you felt that the Pokemon is self-centered and really a prankster. But you also got to see Floatzel's soft side the other night, which he seems to hide from Lugia very often. If only he had shown this side during the conversation, things could've gone much easier.

Suddenly, you felt a shadow towering over you and turn to find Floatzel at his regular size looking at you from the room entrance. There is an indescribable expression on his face as he made his way toward you, finally sitting down beside you on the bed and started speaking.

"It seems that you like your new room and little gift pretty well.....Sorry about that outburst with Lugia. Some things she said just make me lose my rationality rather quickly.", Floatzel said.

"What do you mean?", you asked the Pokemon.

"As you can see, every time I met Lugia, it feels like my thoughts and feeling 'have a brain of its own'......in other words, I lack control over myself.", Floatzel said with a frustrated tone.

".......it's alright. I also have some problems you encountered so far so I pretty much understand your feelings.", you said, "I could even help you if you needed it."

"Thanks....", Floatzel said quietly, "Besides an apology, there is another reason that I came here for you."

The Pokemon looked at you, awaiting your response.

"I'm sorry......", you asked perplexed.

"All this time, I find you to be the kind of friend I always long for. You are one of the rare kind who I could related to despite differences. And since we still got some times before we meet up with Lugia, don't you think we gotta use our time a little more wisely?", Floatzel asked with a hint of suggestiveness.

"But.....you know.... I'm not into that...kind of stuff.", you said.

"What? We aren't doing anything close to that! What were you thinking? It's just a little experiment I wanna try out", Floatzel exclaimed

The Pokemon leans in closer to your face until your nose touches his soft snout and you can only see the mesmerizing pair of large, brown eyes. You tried to look away from them, but something is grasping your mind, allowing you to focus on nothing but his eyes. A series of color flashed from them and gradually changed into images. You can see yourself and Floatzel walking in a forest, talking and smiling. This reminds you of the movie Lugia showed you days ago (maybe she also taught Floatzel this strange trick).

"How about a little virtual game with me? It's something that Lugia and me used to play together. It something we called 'Interactive Vision. Think of it like a "chain-story"; I add my story and you add yours. Wanna start now?"
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Surprise

choices: You plan the meeting with Lugia
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
"Let's try"

You think you understand how the whole game works, so you say you're ready. The images in Floatzel's eyes turn into pure white blotches, until soon they form new scenes. One has the beach you had seen for a few seconds before entering Floatzel, while the other one has a forest, similar to the one you was exploring before you shrunk. An image of Floatzel appears on the beach, while you see one like you in the forest. You take some moments to learn how to give commands mentally to the image of the human, while Floatzel explores the beach, clearly waiting for you.

When you have learned the basics, Floatzel starts talking. He starts narrating a story, in first person. "I walk around, waiting for the human to approach the beach". Then he stops, while the image of the Pokémon obeys his command. You follow his example. "I manage to find my way out of the forest and into the beach".

Much to your relief, you can see that you are doing this correctly. You reunite with Floatzel on the beach. "I ask: "What are we going to do?"

"I say "I'm going to show you the underwater world!""

"I can breath underwater. I approach the edge of the water" you say, while Floatzel at the same time narrates his action, which matches yours. The images now are standing at the edge of the ocean, ready to swim.

Floatzel and you spend an hour or so taking turns to narrate the wonders of your underwater journey. You had the brilliant idea of creating a sunken ship, and Floatzel narrates a whole story based on that. Soon your eyes to get tired, and request Floatzel to stop. He interrupts the story, which was close to ending. "We can finish the story here"

You compliment Floatzel for the experience and the success of the experiment. He is boasting at the awesome story they created. "Maybe we can do this again, whenever you want" You smile, unsure of what to say. You doubt you'll do this again with Floatzel.

"See you tomorrow" he says and leaves the room. You wait until you're sure Floatzel won't interrupt you. There is something you want to talk with Lugia.

"Lugia...what are we going to do tomorrow? In the afternoon you'll meet with Floatzel. How do you think this will go?"
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Floatzel Eye Story

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
Lugia took a few minutes to reply to your question, presumably trying to at least figure out how she should talk with Floatzel after going separate ways for such long time. The 'kick-off' meeting has already left a sour note between the two; what was supposed to be the first step turns out to be a major stepping stone. Lugia tried to come up with a clever script and speech. She scoured every file in all the corners of her brain. But, no matter how hard she thinks, the search for answer within her mind always comes back as blank. Heaving a deep sigh, Lugia began to speak.

"Frankly, I can't think of a preferable method to handle the meeting.", Lugia said with a fainted tone of defeat, "It's just that we haven't really gotten along well in the last meeting, as you probably witnessed yourself. Partly, I overdid my acting and started saying things based on raw emotions. I guess you're right. I did acted in a childish manner toward Floatzel. Now, I made things worse than it was. I don't know if Floatzel is willing to talk to me or whether I could ever muster enough courage to hear what he has to say about me."

Lugia's reply took you completely by surprise. After being with her for such long time, this is the first time you've seen her so vulnerable and defeated. You wanted to assure her everything will be fine and that the actual meeting tomorrow will proceed smoothly. But even you began to have questions whether or not the earlier meeting made things worse. If yes, how are you supposed to correct it? How is it going to affect your journey to normalcy? You did your best to talk Lugia about the problem.

"Lugia, you know, Floatzel also told me something similar about him having poor control of his emotion. It's just my guess but I'm not sure, I think that both of you had just assumed the worst in each other, instinctively blaming others instead of tackling the issue. Floatzel is probably going through similar struggles right now. This is going to take some time but things will definitely turn for the better."

"How could you be so sure?", asked Lugia.

"Because.....I believe in your ability. I know this is difficult to believe but after exploring the worlds in your and Floatzel's body, I discovered that Pokemon are far more advanced and feeling than I realize. There are treasures and ideas within that demonstrates your uniqueness, much like how character can define a human.", you explained.

"....that some deep stuff you're saying.", Lugia exclaimed, "You don't need to give such a long winding reason for me to inderstand your intention, that is, you really love me this whole time. There is no need to hide your feeling now, I know that you are genuine about your feelings and I felt more than happy about that. Really. Your words gave me the slightest boost that tomorrow might just work......Well....looks like it's a bit late right now. Get some good rest 'cause tomorrow's the big day. I certainly hope that things will go as you said it would."

You said good night to Lugia and ended the transmission with her. You prepared yourself for sleep and found a folded piece of paper.

It reads: let's meet at the helm (control room) first thing in the morning.

You placed the paper on a night stand and lie down in your bed and dimmed the lights, falling asleep quickly.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: You plan the meeting with Lugia

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The next morning, you visit the place you was indicated. It doesn't take long before Floatzel tells you why he wanted you to be there.

The control room isn't any different than the last time you had visited it. Floatzel was already moving. He greets you, and then tells you why you're here.

"I need help, human. I'll need you to control my body for a while. I'll teach you some stuff" a small microphone appears on the controls, in front of you. "Test it"

You move closer to the microphone, ready to do what Floatzel says. -"Testing, testing, what is this for?"-After a second, you can hear what you said, but with Floatzel's voice. You are surprised with this.

"Well done human! Now please take a look at what is going to appear at the side" A pile of the membranes you know are used as the equivalent of paper inside Pokémon appear at a side of the room. Taking the first one, you see that it is a brief summary of the rocky relationship Floatzel had with Lugia during all this time. The rest is a detailed description of Floatzel's side of the whole feud, and much to your surprise, it has less rancor towards Lugia than the story you had heard some days ago. He even included a profile about Lugia, and although it has clear indications that Floatzel still thinks he is right and Lugia is wrong, this version is more fair.

"Read it all, please. I'll need your help"

You start reading, page by page. You had already known most of the story, but now there are some details you didn't know. You are sure that Floatzel hid them because he thought it wasn't going to make him look good, as most details that are now in the summary talks about his feelings and loneliness. Looks like he was trying really hard to keep a facade towards you.

While you're reading, a thought crosses your mind. Why would Floatzel tell you to do these things? There is a possibility...

"Floatzel...are you wanting me to talk to Lugia, instead of you doing it by yourself?"

Floatzel stays silent for a moment before replying. "Yes".

You leave the membrane on the floor. "I won't do it. You need to rebuild your friendship with Lugia by yourself. She won't trust you if she ever knows that it was me who talked with her, and not you"

"But I'll screw up!"

"It doesn't matter. Just think before talking, try your best"

Floatzel stays silent for a while. "Okay. You're right"

When you're about to leave, Floatzel speaks again. "Something...I feel that I shouldn't have shown you about my feelings if you weren't going to help me as I wanted. I feel like...I revealed too much"

You don't like how this sounds. "What do you mean?"

"I can't erase your memory so I'll be satisfied if you have a bad experience! I hope there will be no rough feelings after this" Floatzel says naughtily. Then the floor opens under your feet. You fall through a slide, a very long one, at least from your perspective. Soon the ground evens out, and you are thrown through the end of the slide. After you fall to the floor, the slide seals behind you. You turn around and try to open it, but you are unable to do it.

Then something hits you: there is an unpleasant smell in the air. You turn to your right, and see a large closed sphincter, something huge. Light filters through the center. The environment seems oily, and the smell is everywhere. You are suddenly afraid of turning around, as you know you won't like where you are.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: A Morning at Floatzel's Helm

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The strong smell still persists around you at unbearable levels. It is clear to you that wherever Floatzel has sent you, the Pokemon is playing an awful prank on you. Judging from what he said before he transported you to this foul-smelling place, Floatzel seems a bit upset that you refused to talk on his behalf. But if you we're to help him, it defeats the entire point of the meeting. Unamused by the Pokemon's antic, you try to call him.

"Alright, Floatzel.", you said loudly, "What is the big idea with this? If this is one of your pranks again, I telling you that it isn't funny."

Floatzel remained silent.

"If you think this is a way of getting me to do the entire meeting for you, you are seriously mistaken."

The Pokemon still didn't say a thing.

Great!, you thought, either he didn't hear me or he was deliberately ignoring me. Without any choice, you looked around your new environment to get an idea of where you are. On the opposite side of the sphincter is a long passage way that extends deeper into Floatzel's body. The bad smell seems to be emanating from the tunnel from occasion warm breezes blowing toward you. You took the tunnel and went further into it.

The smell got stronger and stronger until it became virtually unbearable. A few more minutes later, you found yourself in a small chamber that is featuress and oily like the tunnel. There are a series of unreachable openings on the ceiling that are dripping with more oily substance. Just as you covered you nose in disgust, you noticed several dark lumps of solids that clings to the walls and ceiling. A closer inspection reveals them as the source of the smell and are soft, slimy, and slippery. Hold on........The revelation dawned on you like a lightning strike; you are in Floatzel's rectum.

You are usually tolerating of Floatzel's prank but, this time, he really crossed a line. Just as you are about to complain, a large groan vibrates throughout the entire chamber. Mushy liquids began pouring through the openings. Solid wastes plop down like hail, striking you like wet earth. The chamber quickly got filled, leaving you with little room to move around. The walls suddenly contract squeezing you back into the tunnel at astonishing speed. With each contraction of the tunnel, you move closer to the sphincter you've seen earlier. At this point, you are hoping that Floatzel relief himself on soft grounds otherwise you'll be injured badly.

With one final push, you passed through the sphincter with the rest of the wastes behind you. You felt yourself land on soft sands with a loud thunk. When you looked up, you saw more wastes coming out Floatzel's anus, burying you up to your head in his feces. You pried yourself out of the warm mess and found Floatzel looking down on you with a satisfied grin on his face.

"How do you like the trip down there?", the Pokemon asked.

You shot a glare at Floatzel and look as sternly as possible.

"Oh, why the stare? I just need to give you a reminder about how not to hurt Floatzel's feeling.", he said with a faked sad tone.

"You could have told me back there at the control center.", you exclaimed, "There's really no need for this."

"Okay, look. I probably let my prankster side got the better of me again. Is there any way we could talk this over?", Floatzel asked.

"You. Are. In. Major. Trouble.", you said slowly, "Now, open up your mouth, I would like to return to my room."

"....What are you going to do now..?"

"....nothing", you answered as you entered the mouth.

The Pokemon was left speechless on the beach. Floatzel thought to himself that his prank might have gone too far for the trainer to take. The Pokemon remained where he was, staring aimlessly into the distance.

Little did he know the human is about to take on a sweet revenge on him.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: A Nasty Prank

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
First, you stay true to your word and return to your room. You want to take a good shower to erase every remain of your experience. While you do that, you mull for the way to get your own revenge on Floatzel. The prank had gone too far, mainly because it was unexpected and really nasty. After a goof half hour of scrubbing, checking again and muttering your own anger at Floatzel, you step out of the shower, with a plan in your mind.

You start walking towards the control room once again.Once you enter, you stand in front of the controls, and Floatzel has noticed your presence. "I thought that you couldn't come here without my permission"

"Don't you think you owe me something after what you made me go through?!" you almost lose your control once again, just thinking about that. Floatzel stays silent, noting that you do have a point.

Once you're sure that you won't have any other objections, you put your plan into motion. You grab the controls, and moments later you have full control of Floatzel's body. You plan to place Floatzel in peril, you don't know how, then save him at the last moment after he has panicked and tried to take the control back. You're sure it fits what he did to you.

You command Floatzel's body to walk around, trying not to make Floatzel suspect your intentions. It is too bad that you overreacted when he asked you that when you entered the control room. You find a trail that goes deeper into the forest. At this point, your host decides to ask: "What are you doing?"

"Trying to relax. Don't worry about it" you say, trying to appear calmed. You finally find what you was looking for. There is a cliff. Based on what you see, it is about two stories high. If something goes wrong, this will at most give Floatzel some bruises, no more, but you're sure you can handle this. You start running towards the cliff. Once you can see the edge, you are ready to move the controls so Floatzel suddenly does some kind of backflip, so he doesn't fall.

While Floatzel's body runs, you can hear him telling you to stop, or he would take the controls back. Then you do it. You pull the controls back. Floatzel jumps back, and you lose your footing and fall. At the same time, Floatzel regains control of his body.

When you stand up, you realize that you did it perfectly. Floatzel isn't falling, and he is visibly shaked by the experience.

"What was that?!" you hear your host ask.

"Payback. I made you feel something similar to what I felt. Now we're even"

Floatzel stays silent, clearly not knowing what to say. He knew that a confrontation would turn this into worse, so he decided to not to say a thing and try to end this peacefully.

"Okay. We both went too far in our actions. I'm sorry" After a moment, you say the same thing, realizing that you as well went too far. "I started this, so I should give you something...here. Come through this"

A hole opens in the floor, in front of you. You jump in it, promising yourself that if this takes you to the rectum again, hell will break loose.

You land in middle of a sticky liquid. The chamber you're in is dimly illuminated, and you can't see the walls. You feel yourself slowly sink in it, until it reaches your chest. A borderline sickeningly sweet smell fills the air, which you deduce is coming from the substance. "Where am I?"

"Promise me you aren't going to freak out. This place is for you to relax. To let yourself go and forget what you just went through"

"Yeah, but what is this place?" you ask, feeling yourself more relaxed now.

"You may know that some Pokémon and animals have glands with a fluid that identifies them to other members of their species, these glands being connected to parts you may not want to visit again. Well, you're inside one of those glands"

You're oddly indifferent to that. Maybe it is the effect of the atmosphere.

"This wasn't made for guests, but I think you needed it. After you calm down, follow the tube down there. Once you're inside it, I'll redirect it so you don't end back in...well, down there. It is empty now but I doubt you'll want to see my rectum again"

You nod. In about an hour, the meeting should take place. Maybe you should stay here until it is time...
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Assuming Direct Control: Payback

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You remained within the gland for some time, taking in the sweet scents wafting around you. After a few minutes, you felt that you are calm enough to begin moving around a little. With the substance covering you up to your hip, you find moving around to be slightly difficult. You began thinking about how the meeting might go. You wonder what will Lugia do to deal with Floatzel. Will she ask him to do her a favor to prove that he's genuine? Will Floatzel willingly accept her terms? What worries you the most is that the meeting will somehow go wrong; you can't even imagine the results. You can only hope that things will go as planned.

Eventually, you got bored of being in the gland and requested Floatzel to direct his path to the control room. The Pokemon obeyed and opened up a path for you to take. You walked the the tunnel, reaching the control room in just ten minutes.

The room is now slightly different. More decors are included in the room to make it look more accommodating. The brain walls are replaced with blue colored membrane while corners are rounded out. The control panel for Floatzel is still intact, but now contain more interactive screens and buttons. The stacks of paper are no longer present. You take that as meaning that Floatzel mustered the courage to do thing himself. The screen in front of you depicts the meeting spot with Lugia along with a countdown that shows 15 minutes remaining. You can tell that Floatzel is nervous based on the heart rate and emotion graph on one of the panels. Before you could say something, Floatzel spoke up.

"Welcome back to the control room, human. I wanted to apologize for my abrupt request that you do the meeting in my place.", the Pokemin said politely, "However, I have a new assignment for you. I need you to help me monitor all the status screens during my meeting. When I get too tensed, you press a few buttons to redirect the blood flow. In certain instance when I'm too nervous to speak, you can use the microphone to temporarily speak for me. Don't worry about that part, I have a word prompter handy for you to read my thoughts with. If I got agitated for whatever reason there is, just set my voice to mute and press the tranquilizer gland button. Is the plan fine with you, human?"

"Hmmmm...That definitely sounds a lot better than your old plan. But you still have to do the majority of the meeting yourself. Got it?", you asked.

"I know that.", Floatzel said as matter of factly, "Okay, the meeting will start very soon; in about 8 minutes. Do you want to familiarize yourself with the controls again?"

"Good idea. Always be prepared for a meeting.", you told the Pokemon playfully.

Both you and Floatzel spent the last few minutes practicing and rehearsing the controls and key points of the meeting. When the time finally came, you saw a figure in the sky flying toward you two. The shape was unmistakably Lugia in her fully extended form. You marveled at the graceful way she flew toward your spot, landing just a few feet way from Floatzel. With her blue eyes fixed on the Water Pokemon, you can feel authority beaming from them.

"This is it", you told Floatzel, "Let's get started."

You swore you heard a faint gulp from somewhere behind you as you sat down at the controls and watch the screen.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Continue

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
There is tension in the air, even you, a spectator of the whole deal, are nervous. Lugia is staring at Floatzel with an odd expression. It is supposed to be a harsh expression, but you can see something more, and you feel that it is directed towards you, maybe because she knows you'll be watching all of this.

They stare at each other, before Lugia started the conversation. "Okay. Are you really willing to forget all of this?"

"Yes"

"You understand that this can't just be left behind. Your actions has caused many problems, Floatzel"

This is all sounding like a scolding from a mentor towards its mentee. With each line, you can note that Floatzel is getting progressively more nervous and frustrated at the same time. You know that if this keeps going, Floatzel could start saying things he'll regret later. You remember what Floatzel had asked you to do. You press the buttons he had indicated would calm him down, while Lugia is still talking. You look at the screens around you, and effectively, it seems that you did redirect the blood flow and made Floatzel be calmer overall.

"What do you have to say?"

"I agree with you about most of the things you have said" Floatzel says in a civil way. You sigh in relief. "I realize that I have done the wrong thing by trying to be more powerful than I should be"

Lugia smiles. She seems pleased to hear that. Then she adds: "Nice. I reckon that I have acted in a way I shouldn't have. You deserved more respect from me, and I'm sorry for my own wrongdoings"

Judging by the content of the screens, Floatzel is more relaxed now, but he tenses when Lugia continues.

"You have something that belongs to me, don't you?"

"Eeeeeh..."

At this point you press 'mute' and talk for him, in case he screws up. "Yes. I took it in a lapse of bad judgment. I'll return it"

When you give Floatzel his voice back, he apologizes for taking the pearl. "Excellent! What happened to that human that was inside you? Is it still somewhere in your body?"

"Yeah, he is around. Why?"

"Well, if you give me my pearl back maybe I could do something for him. He was pushing for this meeting. I think it should get a reward" You have a good feeling what your reward will be...

"This was all its recommendation. I agree"

"Nice. I would like to talk to him, meet him for a day or something. I'll give you some privacy, so you can get the human and the pearl out of your body" she says before flying to a few meters away. When she is gone, Floatzel talks to you.

"Thank you for your help, human. I'm sure that I wouldn't have been able to do it without you. It will be...hard to let you go but I can do it. Come to my mouth, I'll get the pearl out of my body by myself"

You leave the control room, ready to leave Floatzel's body.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Meeting Begins

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You walked through the tunnels and made your way to Floatzel's mouth. The moment you stepped onto the beach was one of relief and freedom. You felt proud about resolving the dispute between Floatzel and Lugia. Turning back, you see Floatzel standing up to his full height and hear an audible rumbling sound coming from the Pokemon's belly. Then you see the pearl coming out of Floatzel's mouth, landing securely onto his paw. The Pokemon bent down again and handed you the pearl.

"Here you go, human.", Floatzel said, "This thing will probably help you with getting back to normal. Again, I really want to thank you for resolving our problems."

You can see genuine emotion written on Floatzel's face. You also felt a pang of sadness when you looked deep into those watery brown eyes. This is it! You finally got the pearl to return you to your real size. You felt happiness, real happiness for the first time in months. The past several days you spent in Floatzel sure took a turn for the better. Originally a quick mission to retrieve the pearl had evolved into amending the tie between two old friends. You felt proud of your contribution and Lugia definitely has kind words for you.

"That was nothing, Floatzel. You should thank yourself because you did most of the meeting yourself. I just gave you that little push and it's enough to get the momentum rolling.", you said.

"You''re right.......I did it and now, Lugia and I can finally return to being close friends again. You should bring this stuff back to Lugia, you shouldn't really keep her waiting. I'll be standing right here to see how stuffs turn out.", Floatzel said.

You smiled at Floatzel and told him that you will talk with Lugia about how to reward him for his honest apology. Then you slowly carried the pearl to Lugia, who is waiting behind a large boulder.

When Lugia sees you, a bright smile spread onto her face. It's a smile of pride and confidence.

"I can't believe that you can get Floatzel to change so dramatically in such a short time. And more importantly, you got my pearl back. I couldn't think of a better thing to say now.", Lugia beamed.

"It really was simple, I just convinced him to share his thoughts with me. After listening to his stories, I realize that his relation with you can still be salvaged. So I planned this whole thing and you played along so well.", you said.

"Since we have everything we need now, what do you plan to do now?", Lugia asked.

"I think we should also give Floatzel a reward. Although I have to admit I assisted him in some parts of the meeting, he did most of it himself. I believe that we could do something for him. Also, returning me to normal size can wait a day or two."

"I see, you can enter your personal room for the time being. I still got some questions to ask Floatzel.", Lugia said while opening her mouth, "I still have some curious questions to ask him."

"Got some rather personal question to ask me. If you wanna listen to it, drop by my brain chamber. As a little bonus game, wanna do some of the questions for me? I always love to see Floatzel say something silly. Call that a good old-fashion Lugia prank.", Lugia chuckled.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Going Outside

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You take some minutes to think at first. This should be a nice way to mess with Floatzel for the last time before...possibly not seeing him again. Or at least for some time, maybe someday you can return to this place with your normal size and see him again.

You walk towards the brain chamber, wanting to listen what Lugia will say to Floatzel. Much to your surprise, you find that the few days you spent outside Lugia made you kinda forget the path. When you finally get to the correct place, Lugia had already started teasing Floatzel. Obviously the newly created friendship has made Lugia all cheery, and it shows in her tone. When you enter the room, she stops talking. "There is somebody who wants to ask you a few questions as well, Floatzel"

"What? Who?"

In that moment, a contraption similar to a microphone forms in front of you. You take your chance with the first line you can think. "Already forgot about me?"

Floatzel stays silent for a moment before replying. "Of course not! What are you doing inside Lugia?"

"She wanted to meet me a bit more. But let's not talk about me. So tell me, are you going to be the host for another humans?" you say with the best tezasing tone you can make. While Floatzel stammers to reply, you quickly add "But nobody would be as fun and nice as me!"

"S...Sure, I guess so"

"Remember all the good times we had! Okay, changing, is there something you hadn't told me about a certain somebody who may or not be listening to us right now?"

"Who are you talking about?"

"Why, it is Lugia of course! I wonder if there is something beyond admiration and respect.

You swear you could hear Floatzel gasping in horror and Lugia chuckling softly. "Of course not! It is just...ah...uh...why do you have to ask that?"

"Because you have such a nice color when you are blushing, that is why"

"You'll never see me like that"

"But I can imagine it. It is a great mental image, don't deny it!"

During the next half hour, Lugia and you take turns asking the most awkward questions you two can think. Floatzel manages to insert a few jabs towards you and the legendary Pokémon, and soon the conversation ends. You return to your known bedroom, deep inside Lugia. You find a Pokémon you recognize on the bed, sleeping. You had forgotten about Vaporeon.

"She had a few adventures inside me too, as I lead her through the same steps you had taken inside me. She is a nice Pokémon"

You don't want to wake up Vaporeon, so you carefully lay on the bed near, and soon you fall asleep.

There is very few time to spend inside Lugia now. You decide that the first thing you'll do tomorrow is to plan what you will do before returning to your normal size at the very end of the day. You fall asleep
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: Personal Questions and Pranks

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The morning came about like any other one you spent in Lugia. But it is your first truly "free" morning that you have completely for yourself. Still, there is a lingering sadness that you are about to return to your normal size and will have to return home. You thought for a moment about the time where you first met Lugia, the countless adventures in her body, the ordeal with Ho-oh, and finally finding a new side to Floatzel. You decided that it is best for you to make this day as normal as possible because you also don't want Lugia to feel too sad. You got out of your bed and traveled to the eye chamber to eat your breakfast and see what Lugia want to do today. Much to you delight, the Pokemon has your favorite food placed on the table with inviting decors. You ate all the food without hesitation, feeling happy for the Lugia and yesterday's resolution. As you sipped the last of the berry juice, Lugia began to talk to you.

"....Well, it looks like today will be the last day for you at this size.", the Pokemon said sadly, "Once I use the pearl on you, you will return to your normal size. While that's good for you, it also means that you won't be able to enter my body anymore."

"Yeah, I know that....but I can't stay like this forever.", you explained, "I still got gym leaders to battle, new friends to meet, and new Pokemons to catch. But even if that's the case, I will still find ways to visit you or enter you if possible."

"If you are concerned about the pearl being a one-way spell, there is no need to worry about that. ", Lugia whispered, "Let me tell you a little secret. The pearl I possess allows the bearer to enlarge and shrink a living being at discretion. The original reason that I created it is for me to be able to stow treasures and other stuffs in my body without putting on too heavy a load. And you might be wondering why I am sharing this information with you: the reason I guess you were shrunk in the first place is because of Floatzel who happened to steal that pearl days before I met you. He must've been playing around with it and unknowingly aimed it's power at you. I should've figured that out earlier."

"You mean.......", you tried to produce a sentence, "You mean that this entire journey over the past few months is all thanks to Floatzel?!!

"That probably is the most likely case.", Lugia said.

"My........so he's the one who enabled me to meet you!", you said with realization, "I never thought I would say this but I gotta find a way to payback that fellow for allowing me to meet such a beautiful Pokemon like you, Lugia."

"Hahahaha, oh, you!", Lugia blushed, "You're just too sweet."

"Thanks for the compliment.", you said boastfully, "Well, we better get the day started if we want to get anything done. So any idea what we can do, my dear Lugia?"

"I was thinking about this for a long time. You once said that you love me no matter the species I am. Back in that personal bedroom when you're with me, it felt that as if we are somehow destined to meet each other, to love as equal. You told me how you yearn to fly, to experience the freedom that a Legendary Pokemon has to herself. I want to make this the most memorable one of your life. Here's what I want you to do and it will be the first time I ever allowed a human to try. My dear trainer, I would like to give you the honor of flying me. And if that's isn't enough, I'll show you something more than that 'eye movie' back then. Now, just find my control chamber and let me be under. your. complete. control."
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Last Morning

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
You're speechless. It is true that when you visited the control rooms of the other two Pokémon you have been inside of...you wondered where Lugia's control room would be, but you never thought she would give you free access to it. You're about to go, but then you remember that you have no idea where it is. The head? Possibly.

"Let me guide you..." Lugia says. You're guided by her words, up to her head. Your hunches were right. Soon you're in front of the opening that leads to the inside of the room. When Lugia opens it dramatically, you're amazed with what you see. Lugia's controls are far more complex than the ones you had seen so far. Maybe Lugia's psychic traits are the cause.

You stand in front of the main controls. "You're free to do whatever you want" You take the controls, with only one thing in mind: flying. With Lugia's size, this must be a different experience. You make Lugia start flying, and you're amazed to see how smooth this goes. It is a surreal experience, being able to see how Lugia's body moves in one of the screens, knowing you're the one who controls it. You fly all over the land and over the sea, going miles away.

While you're flying, Lugia talks to you affectionately. "You'll miss me, won't you?"

"Of course I will" you say, while making Lugia dive into the ocean. "I was thinking...how often will I be able to see you?"

"Not often...but twice a year would be good. Who knows, maybe you could take a little vacation at a small size once in a while...whether it is inside me or inside another Pokémon"

You can't believe that you now have the possibility to spend some time inside Lugia or possibly others when you need a long rest. What would people say if they could hear it?

"Yes, I would like that!" you answer while Lugia majestically soars over the surface of the water. You continue flying, while Lugia is...almost flirting with you. The flight is very calm, and you are enjoying it immensely. Lugia's talk makes it even better.

Almost an hour later, you make Lugia's body land in the small expanse in front of her home. Then the legendary Pokémon regains control. "This was awesome" you say sincerely.

"I'm glad you enjoyed the first activity of your last day inside me. Want to go to the next point? The movie. I assure you it'll be nothing you have seen before. Be ready to be impressed"
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Love Flight of Lugia

choices: The Lugia speaks directly to you
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
Lugia instructs you to head for another chamber that she has prepared for you to watch the movie. She promised that the experience will be something new and original. You follow her directions and arrived at a large room somewhere in Lugia's back. As expected the large room contains a tall screen that takes up the entire space at one side of the wall. Large trumpet-like fixtures adorn the walls and ceilings which you assume are speakers. A lone seat is found situated on a inclined slope that faces the screen. A closer inspection of your seat reveal that it has numerous holes where you can insert your arms and leg into. Strangely enough, the shape and styling gives you the impression that you will be sitting on Lugia's belly. You wasted no time in making yourself comfortable.

"The seat I made for you will allow you to feel and smell stuffs from the movie.", Lugia explains, "The film I directed will be presented with ultra high clarity and immersive sounds. It is also an interactive so you can make choices in the movie that I have preset for you. If you feel hungry in the middle of the film, you can pause the film by pressing the blue button on the armrest and grab some foods from the snack bar I set up in the corner of the theater. If you have no more questions, just sit back, relax, and enjoy."

The lights in the room darkened as the screen before you comes alive. The title of the film is called "Blue Flights" and by the look of it, it will be a romance story. The movie begins with Lugia flying alone in the night sky. There are tears in her blue eyes that shows profoundly in moonlight. In that instance, you can feel wind blowing past you hands and legs and the faint scent of salt sifting into your nose. Lugia sang a sad song about how she wanted a companion, someone to love her. The way her snow white wings flap, her tail flutters, and the look on her face really gives you an idea how hopeless the Lugia felt. Her voice was extremely beautiful and you felt touched by it. There is a unexplainable charm.

After flying for some more shots, the Lugia landed within a thick forest and gaze longingly toward the full moon. Unexpectedly, the Lugia on the screen turns around and looks at you.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Movie

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
"Where would I find one...?"

You feel that this line was made directly for you. You feel bad for the Lugia in the screen, and at the same time you feel that this is all a metaphor of Lugia's actual life. You think that sooner or later...ah. There it is.

When Lugia turns away to look beyond the screen, you see a tiny object in the ground. It seems like...a tiny Lugia. Could it really be a metaphorical representation of you? Who knows.

"What is an inoffensive being like you doing here in the forest at night?" she says with a sweet tone. The tiny Lugia flutters around, trying to run away, but the big one takes the little one carefully. "Why don't you stay with me for a while?"

You keep watching the movie. It is obviously a representation of your adventures so far, but turned into actions in the movie. There isn't a single shred of a view of the insides of anybody here, but it is obvious it is parallel to your own actions. You see the tiny Lugia getting kidnapped by Ho-oh, and after that arc finishes, you see it trying to retrieve a pearl from a Floatzel's grove.

Lugia has a way to make the most simple scenes exciting or touching to you. You haven't watched a single part where you have been indifferent. But then you notice...the movie doesn't seem to be ending yet, and what you're seeing right now, is the tiny Lugia returning to normal. What goes from here isn't related to your adventures. Does this mean that the rest is...Lugia's own creation, just like the beginning?

Now there are two Lugias in the screen. You watch expectantly, ready to see what the rest of the movie is. You know it is the climax of the movie, but this could also tell you something Lugia feels. You are not sure what you'll ay, but you're willing to listen to her.
1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.title: The Lugia speaks directly to you

1411211111111111111112111111111111111111.content:
The female Lugia began to tell the now normal-sized one how she, after months of being with him, began to have feelings for him; desiring his company. She went on to say that the ordeal she faced made her reconsider the true role of a Legendary Pokemon: that is, protection of not only the sea you live in, but also love.
