"You should relax. I thought you may need some time to just sit and let it go before you explore. After all, there is still time. You have a nice handful of hours left in your day" Dialga replied.

You nodded, accepting it. Maybe it is really for the best to actually just hang out, finish your drink, maybe talk a little. There was no hurry to get anywhere. Besides, with your training, your job (which you weren't sure if you wold continue doing) and the nights, you wouldn't have very much time left in the next days.

You slowly drank the contents of the cup, while watching the TV. Apparently it was a screen to see outside. Dialga was in a different dimension than the one you had seen when you were outside of him. It looked similar to your own, but it had several things that hinted it wasn't the dimension you knew.

***

"It is amazing what those little bugs can do for one when it doesn't involve being eaten" Raikou said, finally shrunken along with Suicune. There was also an huge fruit in front of them. Suicune had brought it, and one of the Joltiks was kind enough to create a small hole in it where the two legendary Pokémon could hide while Dialga ate the fruit. Raikou was looking around, clearly amused by the change of size, while Suicune was already entering into the hole. "Will you stop fooling around and get in? Dialga can get here in any moment. I told him to come"

"Relax. Don't you think we would feel if he did?" Raikou replied, with the tone he always used when somebody else didn't realize something obvious.

"It isn't only for that. We also need to discuss what we'll do inside"

"You mean you got me to do all this and you didn't even have a concrete plan?"

Suicune was clearly taken aback by those words, her attitude momentarily extinguished. Raikou continued "If it weren't because this is a trip that will be great for my own knowledge about Dialga, I wouldn't be part of this"

"Get in here. Now" Suicune said, starting to lose her patience.

***

You had been watching the TV, from time to time exchanging words with Dialga. He had commented that Suicune had wanted to talk to him in person, and that he was walking towards the meeting point. You had warned him that it could involve one nasty payback from Suicune, but you yourself were curious as to what she would do.

Dialga finally arrived to the place, but neither you or the dragon saw Suicune anywhere. You were about to comment that maybe she was hiding to unleash her water powers on your host, but then he talked.

"Looks like she had to leave on an emergency, but she left that fruit as some sort of apology"

"Oh?" That really seemed suspicious. "Be careful. Who knows what that fruit may be spiked with"

"You're being too paranoid, human. She may be disgruntled with me, but she wouldn't try" You had a much different opinion of Suicune.

***

"Be ready, Raikou, he is here!" Suicune whispered. Raikou seemed frightened, despite being calm earlier. Maybe he was just realizing the magnitude of what was about to happen. "Remember what we discussed. Also, remember to not to touch anything. We want to cause him pain, but not to leave lasting wounds or something grave"

"I should be the one to say that" Raikou muttered.

On the outside, Dialga leaned down to eat the fruit. Raikou and Suicune braced themselves for the ride.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Operation Enter the Dragon

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Suicune and Raikou felt the fruit being lifted by the Temporal Pokemon with tremendous speed, causing both Pokemons to brace themselves to the wall. But even that was useless against the sheer strength of the now-giant Dialga. The swishing action caused several more cracks and holes to form on the flesh of the hollow fruit. Both Suicune and Raikou became increasingly covered in fruit pulps and thick strands of Dialga's saliva. Even inside the fruit, they could still feel Dialga's powerful tongue rolling and playing with them. The Aurora Pokemon was soon hoping for an end to the dizzying spin within the fruit. Shrinking down was one thing that escaped Suicune's mind when she meticulously plotted her scheme. And it's currently one of the least desirable way she wanted to go. She dislikes Dialga with a fiery passion that's better suited to a Fire Pokemon in contrasts with her auroral exterior. But Suicune still wanted to get even with him and confirm for herself the existence of the shrunken human. This better be worth the effort of entering this jerk, she thought.
----
Outside, Dialga tasted at the fruit in his mouth hungrily. mmmm...This fruit really tastes good. So sweet and smooth, better than any I've eaten so fa r. Wonder where Suicune got this from; such a delicious apology gift. Seriously, I never expected Suicune to be so generous with me. Normally, she would've already frozen my groin before she would remotely even think of apologizing. Did she finally realize how mean she's been all these times? Maybe she decided to be nice to me for a change. It might even be a sign that she's having feelings for me. Those dimensional adventures are probably growing on her. Soon, she'll probably drop that hard exterior of hers and reveal the benevolent and kind Pokemon she is. Suicune, you are such a strange girl! Dialga swallowed the entire fruit without giving it much thought. When he gave it one last lick before sending the food down his throat, the Pokemon tasted something warm and furry but he didn't give much thought as he send the fruit to his stomach.
------
Suicune felt the fruit slowly descending as if some force is slowing the fall. She asked Raikou about it. The Electric Pokemon explains that Dialga can control the force of gravity within his body according to need. He often uses this to slow down the tons of food that he takes in.

"How did you know this?", Suicune asked, "You can't possibly have been in his body before."

"Actually, I secretly observed Dialga every chance I got when he visits our normal dimension. A lot of his behavior can be inferred by his activities throughout a single day and from what he told us and others.", Raikou answered, "Trust me, he is one of the most 'unique' subject I've come across. Combine that with the info he confides to me as a friend and we have a database. Dialga's power consists of the ability to regulate time and existence. Much of the world we see now is an indirect result of the countless little fights between Dialga and Palkia. They used to fight over trivial stuffs like who gets to eat first or who should be guarding the world on a given day. It's during those fights that both of their power collided several times to form the land we walk on and perhaps, you and me. Things are a little better now, but they still fight on occasions."

".....Strange yet intriguing", Suicune whispered.

" Not only that. What I find most interesting is his relation with Palkia. That Pokemon is a tad more irresponsible and petulant in using his abilities than Dialga. With much of the space time duty falling on Dialga, Palkia got bored quickly and started using his powers for random stuffs. He caused the destruction of mountain ranges, oceans, and other stuffs merely because he wanted to try out his powers. These two still don't get along really well as Dialga often have to clean up after him for every misuse and Palkia always has an innovative way of justifying his so-called pranks. The alleged shrunken human is most certainly another such incident. Observing Dialga is a difficult task and I've come close to being discovered numerous times. I know that it will endanger my friendship with him but as a Pokemon who's dream is to pursue knowledge, it's a little risk worth taking."

"Raikou, I think you're going into bookworm mode again.", Suicune said flatly, "Could you ever speak a complete sentence in Pokemon for once or even talk about something other than knowledge and science?

"Knowledge controls everything, Suicune. Speaking of that, do you think we'll get to meet the human? I have tons of questions to ask him.", Raikou said.

"Depends on whether Dialga is telling the truth. Even if he does exists, we don't know where his loyalty lies.", Suicune replied with a tone of doubt, "We'll see if we can get him to our side."

A 10-minute ride later, the fruit descended into Dialga's stomach with a splash into the water. Both Pokemon climbed out the hole and walked to the edge of the stomach where there are several holes. With glowing blue stripes and metallic linings. The stomach was more like a metallic tank than flesh.

"Eeee, what has Dialga been eating? All I can see are slimes, metals, and random colorful stuffs. His interior is sure worse than what's outside.", Suicune cringed in disgust.

"Actually. This is what digested food look like in the stomach, even yours.", Raikou explain as matter of factly.

"Stop being smartass with me!"

Suicune went ahead and took a closer look at one of the goes.

"......Okay, looks like we for many holes to choose from here. We aren't sure where they may take us to.", Suicune said, "So I think it is best if we split up and find our way through Dialga.", Suicune said.

"But....I don't think that is such a good idea. What if something happens to any one of us? You see, we aren't sure what sorts of protection system Dialga has set up in here. If we trip one of those, the consequences are unknown. It's best if we stick together. Plus, we need to safeguard the wellbeing if the shrunken human. I don't want anything bad to happen to him.", Raikou commented.

".....Fine. Just let me handle this myself. You aren't known for your sense of adventure or bravery anyway . I really understand your concern, Raikou, but playing safe won't really get you anywhere. The more dangerous a situation, the more I want to risk it. And about that human, if he can endure and survive in this excuse of a Legendary, there's no need for concern."

"*Sigh* Suit yourself.", Raikou said. He was slightly hurt by Suicune's implied jab.

"So, you say you are a bit familiar with Dialga, right? Any plans on where we should invade first?"

"If you're looking to inflict the worst pain possible, there are two places we can start at: it's either the brain or the private. No living thing could could endure the feel when either one of those part is hurt.", Raikou said.

"And what if we simultaneously attack both?", Suicune smirked.

".......I don't want to be the one to find out about that. It will be the most traumatizing technique ever devised. But if that's what you planned to do, I suggest that you can head to the brain to do the freezing while I head down to give the 'batteries' a good recharge. What do you think, Suicune?"

"Perfect. Let's get moving. Raikou, you head through the last hole while I take the first. I'll also look for the human for your research along the way."
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Entering. Suicune and Raikou's POV

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Suicune and Raikou walked each to their respective paths, doing their best to avoid touching the stomach contents. Suicune entered without a single doubt in her plans, while Raikou seemed like he would take his time to get to his destination.

Maybe it was Suicune's impatience, but to her it seemed like the trek through Dialga's body was one of the largest in her life. Besides, she didn't really like the place, and it kinda bothered her that it was possible that, inside her, it was the same. She wanted to be done with what she came for, and get out of there as soon as possible.

From time to time, she received messages from Raikou. Apparently he was enjoying greatly the whole thing, and always informed Suicune about curious stuff he encountered or glimpsed on his path. The Aurora Pokémon ignored those messages, frustrated that her partner wouldn't focus on the important point of their visit.

Finally, Suicune arrived to a dead end. In front of her she could see a much more illuminated hall, which could only take to the head. Suicune smirked, satisfied. However, there seemed to be some sort of invisible protection that didn't let her enter. No matter how hard she tried, she couldn't find a way to enter.

I'm stuck

Stuck? How is that? Where are you?

I'm here at the brain, but I can't enter.

I supposed this wouldn't be easy. We're talking about practically the most important part of this Pokémon, leaving the time powers aside. I would be more surprised if you could just enter

There must be a way for me to sneak in!

Maybe once I start with my part of this plan, the defense on the brain will diminish enough for you to make a quick entrance. The sudden shock of it happening should be enough. Heh, I said shock, because you know, I'm going to-

It could work. Are you where you're supposed to be?

Yes. I'm ready. This isn't a place I'd like to spend a vacation in, but I can't complain. I'll start now. Be ready to enter the brain, if you can

Suicune got herself ready to sprint towards the barrier, then she realized she had no idea how she would know when Raikou started shocking the dragon's private parts. Suddenly, everything shook violently. At first she was startled, but then her instincts took over, and she ran forwards. She crashed against the barrier, but with some effort, she managed to slip in.

I'm in.

Dialga definitely noticed what I did. I think he fell down.

Continue every once in a while. I'll do my own part

Things definitely weren't looking good for Dialga.

*****

You were walking through one of the many passages inside Dialga, when you felt the violent convulsions his host had. After tumbling around, confused, you finally decided to call Dialga.

-"What did just happen? You could have warned me first!"

-"I-I-I just felt...agh, I don't know how to describe it!"

-"Is there something wrong?"

-"I felt sudden pain in my...in my...eh..." Dialga doubted for a moment. He clearly didn't expect to be telling the human about this kind of problems -"In my reproductive system"

You stayed silent for a moment, assimilating what your host said. -"Want me to go check if there is a problem?"

When Dialga doesn't say a thing, you continue: -"I'm supposed to be solving your problems here. If there is something I can do, then let me do it"

-"Okay...go ahead" Dialga seemed something touched by your words. You were taking this seriously. You start walking, when Dialga once again seems to stammer in pain. You grab a wall just in time to avoid falling again. -"More pain?"

-"I have the worst migraine in seven dimensions now!"-

Now a headache, and from the looks of it, a very strong one. Could Dialga have a disease or something? -"What feels more urgent?"

-"I don't know which one is worse...both are equally painful!"

Now you got two places to check, each one in almost opposite sides, and with very different functions. You clearly had to decide which emergency you would clear first. Another cry of pain from Dialga made it clear it had to be quick.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: The Beginning of a Revenge

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
The pain that Dialga is enduring is excruciating. At this point, the Temporal Pokemon has been reduced to cringing on the ground and shouting out what sounds like obscenities in his language. Although he repeatedly insist that he can't explain what caused his privates and head to start hurting so much, you suspect it had something to do with that fruit Dialga ate. I warned him that there is something funny about a fruit that's left on the forest ground, you thought. Random fruits left out in the open for no reason (despite Dialga's belief that it Suicune's apology gift) aren't a good sign. You suddenly began to worry if Dialga had eaten something poisonous or perhaps another perilous attempt by Palkia to "amuse" Dialga. Another groan of pain echoed throughout the body, snapping you out of your thoughts.

"Dialga, I think that your pains has something to do with that fruit you ate.", you said.

"....the fruit?......", Dialga barely acknowledged, "But I tasted nothing wrong with it. Is it...... infested with some molds...ugh... or something?"

"This is serious, Dialga.", you warned, "The fruit you ate is possibly poisonous. I'm not clear about what's toxic to Legendary Pokemons but it could be fatal if the poison is not promptly neutralized."

"Poison does not affect my body. I'm mostly metal and temporal material, remember?", Dialga said.

"If it's not poison, then I'm not sure what could cause the pains."

"......SUICUNE!", Dialga screeched, "It has to be her. That sly...aghhh ....must've decided to play some nasty trickery....ahhhh. Come out. I know you're watching this somewhere."

"But....Why would Suicune do this? It's doesn't sound like something a Legendary Pokemon of her status would do. Even though you previously mentioned that she is distrusting of you and brash at times, I has no reason to believe that she would attempt something so dangerous.", you said.

"You've...never..ughhh seen her......aghhh...true color. Suicune's a lot more calculating....than she seems. Why would...you do this to me, Suicune?"", Dialga moaned. When.....I find her, that tomboy's going to...cosmic limbo. How I wished I had locked her in the 11th dimension for kicking my rear end that one time.

Calculating...plan.....The grand plan for Dialga....Payback!!!..., you suddenly had an epiphany.

All the dots are connected and you realized that this is a part of Suicune's grand scheme; her ultimate big revenge against Dialga for ruining her reputation and his unsolicited advances. You remembered that Suicune told you to be prepared for something big. This got to be it. After all the troubles he had caused for the Aurora Pokemon, Dialga deserved every single moment of this. Recalling what Suicune instructed you to do, all you have to do now is feign ignorance and play along with her and intensify Dialga pain.

"Let's not throw wild accusations around first.", you said as calmly as possible, "Before we find any evidences that this is Suicune's doing, we'll assume that this is just a very bad case of headache and groin pain. Just think about it, maybe she genuinely left the fruit as an apology without knowing that it's tainted. Or she failed to take into account the differences of Pokemon physiology. That is, what is a delicacy for Suicune might actually cause a stomach upset for you."

"....You have a point.....ugahh.", Dialga replied begrudgingly, "As much as I hate it, you make sense sometimes. I'll just forget about Suicune for the moment and temporarily accept this "apology" she left me. So, where are you checking first?"

"Okay, let me go check out your privates first.", you said, trying to sound concerned.

"But......it's kinda the place you wouldn't want to be. It's just my reproduction organ that also functions as a power source.", Dialga said while blushing.

"The problem down there could be worse than in your brain; a migraine is a common occurrence everyone has once in a while. But if it hurts down there....things could be very bad. It could jeopardize your chance of finding a mate.", you added.

"*gulp*....no....oh please no....", Dialga whimpered, "Not my reproductive system.... It's not even used once..........An eternal life without a mate and pleasure is the worst possible thing...."

Or maybe the best thing for the Pokemon race. You have no idea why but Dialga's cry sounds like music to your ear. Maybe it's because you're just a bit sadistic or you find comfort in the fact that you are administering justice. You know that Suicune would love to see this play out and she'll be the happiest Pokemon right now if she's beside me.

"Please.....ugh....stop the pain....", Dialga cried, "I don't care if....... Suicune or some other random Pokemons is behind this. Just find......a freaking way... to make it stop."

"Don't worry I'll see if I can find out what's the problem down there. I'll do whatever I can to fix it.", you said with a smirk while Dialga wailed at the next wave of pain. Or maybe, I should add to it......

You started the walk down the path that leads to the lower half of Dialga's body.
------
Down at the reproductive organ

Hey, Suicune. How's thing going up there?

Oh my....this is so priceless, Raikou. You just missed Dialga crying about losing his legendary balls. The most melodramatic yet.

Glad to hear are plans are having effects. So what exactly is the next part of our plan?

As for the next step is to find a way to control Dialga by overriding his brain. I plan on giving a him a taste of his own medicine.

I would say that runs a greater risk of being detected by Dialga. And do you even know how to control Dialga?

Stop worrying! I'll learn along the way once I get in the brain center. Plus, I having so much fun up here. Checking out all the apparatuses and stuffs. Most of all, I confirmed the existence of the shrunken human by looking at some memories. But here's also something very interesting I found. Dialga seems to have this human under constant surveillance. All I need you to do is intensify your voltage on his balls and give'em a good jolt. I bet it'll be enough to cause a system crash up here.

Ow! Sounds painful.......wait, what surveillance?

Yea, this weirdo has records of all the human's locations, thoughts, dialogs, and what he's seeing right now. He's heading down to investigate the pains we caused. The screen for the human is showing a tunnel or something.

Kinda intrusive but also cool if you ask me. I always wanted to explore a Pokemon's deepest thoughts. Maybe I can start with you, Suicune.

What was that?!! You're inviting me to freeze your balls as well, right? This freak is enough of a problem already. Get back to work.....

Whatever you say. Hope your plan doesn't actually cause actual harm to either Dialga or the human.

-------

You continued down the path that leads to Dialga's private. If the bundle of wires along the wall is any indication, you're pretty close. You wondered how did Suicune inflict pain at two places at a time. An admirable feat for her. Soon enough, the walkway opens into a multi-floored chamber. Circular in shape, it houses two large transparent cylinders that glows blue. The wires from the walkway connects to both ends of the cylinder. No doubt those are Dialga's batteries, literally, for lack of better description. As you circled around the room, you heard the distinct buzz of electricity that seems out of place for the location. That must be the cause of Dialga's throbbing pain, you thought, Is something wrong with his power source? You quickly walk around the cylinder, closer to the source of the sound.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Making a Choice

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
You slowly approach the sound. It is making you nervous. Judging by the amount of sound, the electricity could be fatal for you. You want to at least know what is wrong before you do a thing. However, you definitely don't plan to reveal that Suicune is the culprit behind all of this.

You suddenly see a quadrupedal figure, with yellow fur, an odd purple mane and a mask-like face, using its powers against the batteries. You really didn't expect to see Raikou shrunken, much less inside Dialga, and much less doing something like causing severe pain in the nether regions of the dragon.

"I knew it was true! Suicune just confirmed it, but it is good to see by myself that there is a human living inside Dialga" you hear Raikou say, when he finally notices you.

"What are you doing here?!" you whisper, trying to not to be heard by Dialga "I thought Suicune was the one behind this"

"Suicune is in here, too. She is carrying her revenge. I'm just helping her"

"Revenge? I was right, after all!"

"I suppose you'll stop us now" Raikou says, while stopping using his electric powers. You move your image to hint that you won't. Raikou's eyes widen, surprised.

"From what I have heard, Dialga deserves this. In that case, I want to help. However, it is also my responsibility to make it stop"

Raikou seems to smile. He clearly didn't expect your attitude towards all of this. "Okay, I think I know what you can do. Near here I think I had seen a lot metallic rods, possibly for maintenance matters in this place" he says, while looking at the opposite direction. You faintly see an huge stack of rods. "I know how my electricity works, so this is what we're going to do:

Take several of these rods, and stick them into the base of these cylinders. Once you have done that, I want you to go around Dialga's reproductive system. Stick rods in vulnerable spots, such as flesh, or similar.

Once you're done, I'll channel some electricity into several of these rods. If I do it correctly, the electricity should be going back and forth between all the rods scattered in the system. I won't even need to continue streaming electricity, the cylinders will provide a good amount of it. I need to rest"

You nod.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Meeting Raikou Again

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
"I understand, Raikou. I will"

"Nice. I'll notify Suicune about your help. After you're done, maybe we could talk before we meet her. We have some time before she finally manages to prepare herself for what she'll do"

You nod once again, and grab the rods, and start with your part of the plan.

Suicune, good news: the human is on our side

Yeah, I have been observing it from here, and I heard it all. I was surprised

If you heard it then...Dialga could know about us and him?

Doubt he is paying attention to anything, with all the pain. Serves him right!

We'll be here for a while. Continue with your part

I'll try to delete the recordings about what the human has seen and heard since we came. Dialga has no right to be monitored like this

Will you tell the human about this?

...I'm not sure
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Continue

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
You picked up one of the rods on the floor and carried them over to the base of the cylinders. As easy as it sounds, it still took you a lot of efforts to move just one of the lengthy rods. They must have weigh twice as heavy as your are. The slippery surface of the floor isn't making it any easier. You looked at Raikou who is eying you curiously and trying to observe your every move. Despite the Electric Pokemon's stoic expression, his glimmering ruby eyes revealed his barely contained excitement. You can almost see sparks of electricity swirling with admiration in them. Looks like Raikou wants to do some research on my behavior and activity., you thought, It feels kind of unnatural being watched the whole time. But I couldn't blame him for his curiosity, I mean.....how often do you get to meet a shrunken human? With this new found alliance with Raikou, giving Dialga a miserable time will be far simpler. As much as you wish you could help him out of this, you decided that it's best to let things run its course. The Temporal Pokemon has dug himself into this hole and caused his own problems to snowball into its current unmanageable state. There is little sympathy you could give him. Plus, you could also get a good kick out of Dialga's upcoming woe.

You look around the base and found an excellent place to embed the metallic pole; right between the cylinders at a point where the pole can touch the wirings at both ends. You placed it there and make sure that it fits securely where you wanted it to go before going back to get more of the poles. Each time you carried one over, a strong sense of satisfaction brought a smile upon your face. You placed the poles in a crisscross pattern to maximize the areas touching the cylinders and inflict the most damage once Raikou puts electricity through them. The space around the cylinder were soon crammed full of the rods that it resembles a dense jungle gym more than a reproductive organ. You started to look for other areas for things to stick into. Despite the metallic interior, you still spot several soft parts that resembles flesh and a boxy structure connected to the two cylinders. Whatever that thing is, it must be important for Dialga. Those must be some kind of energy delivery system or regulator for a Pokemon with various electronic stuffs lying around in his body. What will be Dialga's reaction if we managed to destroy his reproductive ability and his opportunity for offspring (if he ever finds a mate....or even exists)? Will he cry and be melodramatic like he typically does? Or will he go supernova and wipe out everything? Even if that results in Raikou, Suicune, and me being sent to dimensional inferno, it will be an answer worth finding out and know forever., you thought jokingly. Without hesitating, you rammed a couple of rods into the fleshy parts and surrounded the box with all the poles you have at hand.

The whole operation took about an hour to complete. You let Raikou know about it and told him to unleash the strongest currents he got.

"Don't worry about that, human. You don't have to tell me how to do it", Raikou said confidently as he charges himself up, "I have saved the perfect voltage for this occasion for quite some time and now..... please stay back a little and let my lightning show commerce!"

You immediately see a glowing, white-hot bolt released from the clouds mane on the Pokemons back. The light generated temporarily blinds you as the ear-splitting sounds of thunder rumble overhead. With your hands over your eyes, you can make out the silhouette of Raikou directing the powerful bolt toward the rods you've set up with a fierce roar. It was a sight to behold! A Legendary Pokemon unleashing his full potential before your very eyes. You couldn't tell if you're standing in awe from the scene or from the stray electricity that has numbed your body. The moment the electricity came in contact with the rods, the spark jumps over all of the chamber and made the poles glow yellow. A loud buzz echoed throughout the chamber, creating a ominous fizzle, droning, and popping sounds. You dropped down and crotched in an attempt to avoid being affected by the electricity. You faintly smiled as your heard a familiar voice in the distance crying loudly in pain before being cut off.
______
On the outside, Dialga was puzzled by the lack of response from the human. An hour has passed since the human promised him to relieve the pain in his groin which has only gotten worse since. Despite numerous repeated attempts, all efforts to reach the human has failed. When the Pokemon tried to activate the Human POV, Dialga realized his surveillance software in the human has also gone a bit glitchy because he couldn't see through his eyes or read his thoughts as if someone has disabled it. For a moment, the Pokemon feared that the human has discovered his covert monitoring. Dialga performed a system check and found the software to be in perfect order. It must be some electrical interference, he thought. He sighed and reminded himself to give Suicune a piece of his mind once the ordeal has ended. As Dialga wondered about what the human is currently doing, an immense pain shot up from his body and toward his brain. He didn't have time to react to the sudden spasm in his groin.

"AH....... [**DIALGA SYSTEM OVERLOAD**] ---Error 4851++++ =initiating safe mode= &/&&$$$&,& Please input reboot time_
______
When you opened your eyes again, you see the electricity among the poles have become self-sustaining and actively arcing over each other. Raikou stood a couple of feet away from you with a wide smirk on his face.

"You looked 'shocked', human.", he commented at your flabbergasted face, "I bet you've never seen such a huge thunder like that before. I bet this shock has knocked Dialga out. The electricity will be self-sustaining and can only be stopped by me. It took nearly all of my reserve power but I'm proud about this feat."

".......You should've warned me that your thunder shock will be this intense.", you said, "You could've electrocuted me and who knows what will happen if it goes that way."

"Heh heh, sorry about that. But that sure shows you 'the dynamics of electricity and it's effect on the reproductive system of a Pokemon'."

"Is that a new research topic that you came up with or is it the beginning of another cheesy pun?", you asked with an eyebrow raised.

"A little of both I guess.", Raikou said, "Anyway, I guess we're done here in the groin. Time to meet up with Suicune at the brain."

"Let's get going then. Better not keep a lady waiting.", you said smirking back at the Electric Pokemon.

"I agree....", Raikou whispered while trembling slightly, "Never be on the receiving end of Suicune's wrath."

The two of you left Dialga's reproductive organ with the electricity still going strong.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Doing your part

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
"We have a long way to go from here to there" you comment, as you look around and choose the path you think would lead you quicker to the brain. At first you thought of using the capsule, but seeing how Raikou and you messed with the electricity in the body, using it may not be a good idea.

Raikou nods, but seems to be thinking about something. "What's wrong?" you ask

The big feline didn't reply.

Suicune, I have been thinking about this, and I think the best would be to tell him about what Dialga is doing

If you're willing to take that duty off my shoulders, go ahead. You did a good job down there, I should have free reign now. I have deactivated deleted the surveillance since we entered, but unless Dialga himself deletes the function, it'll keep happening. I'll take control of Dialga's body and do it myself. Then I'll continue with my own fun, just what he deserves for being such an asshole

Raikou and you had walked silently for a while. This isn't how you expected some time with another Legendary would be.

"So...have you enjoyed your time around here? Have you explored a lot?" Raikou seemed to want to start a conversation.

"I haven't gone everywhere, there are a lot of places I haven't visited or don't really plan to visit, but it has been an interesting experience" you reply, and you really mean what you said.

Raikou gives you an strange smile, or something similar. You aren't too sure about his expressions. "How has Dialga treated you?"

"Well, he has been a nice host, and we get along nicely" You decide to hide the fact that he gave you powers. It didn't seem like something to spread around.

"Hmmmmm...there is something you need to know about Dialga. He has been monitoring you very closely, maybe since you entered"

"What?" you didn't understand what he said.

Raikou then proceeds to tell you everything Suicune had seen up there. You are aghast at the revelation. How could Dialga do this to you? And why? You're shocked, but you can feel the rage bubbling inside you. Dilga indeed deserves everything that is happening now. You promise yourself that you're going to help Suicune and Raikou to get out without Dialga noticing, and to cause Dialga all the inconveniences that you can before they have to leave.

"I think we're finally getting there!"

You look ahead and see an entrance. If you picked the right road, it should be the entrance to the brain. Raikou enters first. After some seconds, he peeks back into the tunnel. "Yes, it is here. Suicune must be around"

You enter, and observe around. The steel walls aren't welcoming, and there are several tunnels, surely branching to different functions. You hear sounds coming from one of them. After getting to the end of the path, you find Suicune in front of a strange machine.

"Yes, this is the place I wanted the most. Time to do it" she says to nobody maliciously. Then she notices Raikou and you. "Hi human. Surprised to see me?" she talks in a more friendly tone.

You nod, and feel the need to assure her that you're on her side. "I know, Raikou told me. Glad to have you on board. You arrived just in time to see me do this"

"What'll you do?"

"I'll control Dialga's body. Do something first, then mess around. You'll see"

And after saying that, she stepped on a platform, part of the machine.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Traveling to the Brain

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Once Suicune stepped onto the platform, the machinery in the room whirled to life. All sorts of buttons and levers lit up. The platform containing Suicune formed several purple vines that adhere to her paws and body. When the vines started to brush against Suicune, the Pokemon gave a faint shriek. One of the tendrils extends itself to the front of her muzzle and grew into a bulb. You are reminded of the motion capture shirt with the microphone that you once saw in a documentary about movie production. Judging from it's appearance, it will function similarly. Several screens in front of the Aurora Pokemon began depicting views from the outside. You can see the forest and Dialga lying motionless on the ground, right where he ate the fruit.

You shifted your gaze toward Suicune whose legs and body are now covered with vines. It somehow makes you think of a spandex. You shook your head and chided yourself for that thought. The controller she's using is completely different from the one you played with days ago. You're hoping that Suicune knows how to use the thing otherwise Dialga better ready himself for a bumpy ride. She seems to notice you watching her and gave a confident smile in return. Something about that grin assured you that Suicune had everything worked out.

"Hold on to your butts, boys.", said Suicune with a glint to her eyes, "I'm about to take you all on a joyride. Today, you are all about to witness the first ever Pokemon-jacking in history. Dialga will rue the day that he ever crossed me. He can only watch in horror at the things I'm about to unleash on him and he has no ways to stop it. We're going to give him a threshing that he deserves so much. And you two "

Raikou gave a holler of approval while you quietly watch on from your spot.

"Now, why do these disgusting looking vines do, they're probably ruining my coat. I had about enough with these things...... I'm not exactly sure how to control this weirdo so you boys can look around here to figure out his brain while I play around with this.", she said casually.

"You got it.", Raikou acknowledged with a faux salute.

"I guess I'll be looking around to see if there is anything that I could do then.", you said. You quietly hoped that Dialga won't suddenly restart himself and catch you all red-handed. But the thunder shock in his 'jewels' should keep him in check for some time.

With that, Suicune started moving her legs, causing the chamber to rumble. On the outside, the motionless body of Dialga started stirring. It looks as if Dialga is trying to stand up with all four legs spawned out, with his head bent at an awkward angle. To a spectator outside, Dialga look rather like a puppet being manipulated by an inexperienced person. For Suicune, it is like learning to walk all over again. Hey the hell are you supposed to control this thing., Suicune thought as she fidgets around on the platform. The Pokemon caused Dialga to clumsily drag his feet around, making walking more like crawling. After several tries, Suicune managed to make the Temporal being stand up wobbly with her best effort. Finally, she thought, I got this hunk of useless metal upright. Just then, the Pokemon noticed a little bulb near hear mouth and wondered about it's function. Suicune tried speaking something into it and heard her words in Dialga's voice. Perfect.

"Hey look I'm Dialga, the most awesome legendary Pokemon in existence. I'm also a jerk to Suicune because my thing is too small for her. And for that, she always rejects me", she said sarcastically, "I hereby apologize for all of my past actions to everyone that I have pranked, for the sake of all Pokemon. I hope she'll accept my apology this time after she's done electrocuting me. Ouch.."

The joke had Raikou laughing on the floor while you gave an uneasy chuckle.

Seeing that both of you are enjoying her little show, Suicune smirked and continued speaking.

"I also have no respect for the human's privacy; I monitored and read all of his thoughts and memories. Since I've done this, I should allow the human to browse my memories as well. But I can't, the human will see all of my weird and risque fantasies."

That elicited a louder howl of laughter from you. Despite the somewhat disturbing nature of those "confessions", Suicune has a way of making it a lot more funny.

After making a few more jokes, Suicune decide that it's time for something serious. That's just the warmup, Dialga, I have far more tricks up my sleeves for you., the Pokemon thought.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Suicune controls Dialga

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Dialga started to awaken. His internal processes slowly reactivated, and he felt the drowsiness fade. Then he noticed that he was walking, albeit clumsily.

"Eh? What is going on?" Dialga wondered aloud. Then he heard a voice talking. Much to his surprise, he realized it was his own.

"Look who woke up! About time!"

Dialga gasped in surprise. He soon realized what it meant. Somebody had hijacked his body! Could it be...the human he had sheltered?

"No, I'm not the human. That creature must be somewhere around your groin, looking to what caused all that pain. Oh, also: my fault for that" his voice said mockingly.

"Who is this?"

"Take a guess!"

Dialga named the first name he could think "Palkia?"

His voice laughed. "Palkia?! I'm almost offended! But sure, if you want to think it is Palkia, then fine"

"Get out of my head and my body! And don't dare to hurt me or the human..."

"Ah, so you care about the human, how nice of you. However...I saw something very interesting around here. You have been monitoring the human, haven't you? Don't lie! I can see it!"

Dialga was speechless for a moment. His voice continued. "It would be a shame if the human heard something about that. The big dragon, invading the privacy of a human's mind. Something I didn't expect!"

"Okay, look, I'm turning it off. Just get out of my body and don't say a thing about that to the human". Dialga reconfigured his mind, deleting the program that monitored the human. He didn't notice that it was showing that the human was walking through the halls of his brain. "There, it is gone. Now please get out?"

"No, this is a very comfy place. Besides, I'm just starting with this controlling game. I want to have some fun first"

"Why are you doing this?!"

"You have wronged me too many times, Dialga. It was time for revenge"

Dialga tried to stop his body from moving, and while he did that, he thought about who could be controlling him. It didn't sound like the human and Palkia at all, that was for sure. After seeing when the pain started, and the personality of the invader...he had a very good hunch of who it was. He proposed himself that even if it were Suicune, he wouldn't refrain from punishing her for the invasion.

"Listen...I'll get you out of my body, and it'll be the way you deserve, the most ungraceful way I can think. I'll make sure of it"

"I'd like to see that. Now shut up and enjoy the ride!" the voice said, before Dialga's body started to acquire speed.

*******

In the halls of Dialga's brain, Raikou and you heard all the exchange. You couldn't avoid admiring Suicune's bravado. Raikou, on the other hand, was getting more nervous.

"That sounded like Dialga was serious about it...I shouldn't have came here. Surely Dialga wouldn't...force us to go out with..." he muttered, disgusted

"I have been there, and it wasn't nice, true. But relax. You two have me here. I'll help you two to get out of Dialga"

Raikou cheered up after these words, returning to his more calmed personality. "Good. Got any plan?"

"I doubt you'll escape in the next few hours. It is almost night. We'll try to escape when Dialga is careless. Surely after Suicune stops controlling him, he'll add defenses to the brain. We may be unable to do anything in here" you say, looking through an entrance. You're looking for Dialga's memories. After what he had done, you felt it was only right.

"Then how do you think we'll get out?"

"Dialga's body has a lot of entrances, which may be used as ways out. A way that doesn't involve any effort from Dialga would be good. Meanwhile, stay with me, you and Suicune should stay close to me."

Raikou nodded, approving the plan. "I hope it doesn't take long. I have a few concerns, if Suicune and I are forced to be her"

You don't reply, still focusing on your own search. "What will we eat? I doubt that Dialga will give Suicune and I nice food"

"We'll see when it is time"

"And if I feel the need to run like thunder, how will I do that? I haven't seen any good place for that yet"

"Again, when it is time it'll get solved" you say, a bit more annoyed.

"And what if nature calls? We can't just go anywhere. It would be unhygienic and a bother"

"Quiet now" your patience was starting to run out. You hoped that being with Raikou for a day or so wouldn't be like this "I think I found the memory bank. Want to come?"

Raikou nodded.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: From Dialga's POV

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
How you discovered the way to Dialga's memory bank couldn't be simpler. From unknown reasons, the Pokemon left directional signage for all parts of his brain. Arrows and flashing lights are placed along walls and on the floor. The signs are written in Pokemon and English along with a pictogram. You commented on why would Dialga leave such vital information out in the open for visitors to see. Doesn't that defeat the purpose of keeping the data bank safe? Or was he expecting you to visit the brain or something. Raikou remarked that Dialga is probably careless and perhaps too complex a creature for his own good. He probably can't even browse through his own brain without getting lost, hence the directional signs. You laughed at the possibility and imagined Dialga with a lost expression while mentally searching about how to deal with Suicune. That will be something I'd pay to see., you thought, It would explain his constant long pauses.

When you and Raikou arrived at the doorway to Dialga's memories, you are greeted by a wide metallic door. Affixed to the door is a sign: Important! Vital Data Inside. Do Not Enter Without Authorization. Raikou facepawed at the obvious notice. You approached the door and expected it to unlock. Instead, it remained firmly in place. For half an hour, you attempted to find ways to open the door but it wouldn't bulge. There's no buttons, no levers or anything to indicate how to unlock the door. After a fruitless search, you tell Raikou to contact Suicune and see what she could do. Raikou agreed and told Suicune about their current situation.

-----

Dialga felt powerless as he hopelessly watch himself move around in the forest. Within a few more miles, he will be heading up a mountain. The Pokemon can almost guarantee himself at this point that Suicune is the manipulator at helm. Embarrassment and anger flooded his mind. How could a mere Aurora Pokemon take control of one of the most powerful Legendary in existence? Did the human allowed this to happen to me? Was I betrayed ? I won't be able to find out now since I just deleted the surveillance software. She sure got guts! If Arceus finds out...... Dialga's thought was interrupt by his own voice speaking again.

"Hello? Are listening to me?", his voice asked, "I always knew that you are short on attention, but I didn't know it's this bad."

"What is it? It seems that you're having great fun controlling my every move. Hope the dimensional prison I'm preparing in my rear end won't be too uncomfortable for you once I get my hands on you.", Dialga spat.

"I have serious doubts that you'll be able to do that to me. It takes wit and brain to do that. Something you seriously lack.", his voice mocked, "Anyway, mind telling me about how I can access your memories? I sure love to look at the dustbins you have in there."

"What?!! First my body, now my brain? You just can't help it, can you? You just want to do whatever you can to make my day worse. And no, I'm not telling you. You can't just go around and ask a random Pokemon for his memory, you know!", Dialga shouted, "Don't you have any respect for my privacy?"

"Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't know that you are concerned about that one right that you apparently denied the poor human.", the voice replied sarcastically, "I've seen a lot of his information you've collected up here. You seem to have a voyeuristic interest in his whereabouts and thoughts, am I right?"

Dialga's heart stopped and his face went pale....Shit shit shit.....What should I say now?.....The human can't possibly know......

"I'm only doing that for his own safety.", Dialga defended himself, "If you're in my position, I bet you would do the same."

"Unfortunately, I wouldn't consider reading a person's private thought and monitoring their movements through their eyes to be essential to safety. It sounds more like you're trying to get whatever knowledge you can extract from him without his permission.", his voice continued.

"Yeah, fine. I'll admit that I was kinda curious about the human. But wouldn't Raikou, that nerdy friend of ours do the same if he encounters the human? He seemed pretty excited when he's on the messenger with the him.", Dialga retorted.

"The difference is: Raikou would've asked before doing such invasive observation. If the human declines, that's it.", his voice calmly said.

Dialga remained silent, a rage building up within him.

"Alright, it's nice talking with you. I gotta get back to making you miserable. By the way, I found a little switch here to unlocked your data bank. You're still indiscreet as always, leaving all these buttons within my reach. Hope you won't mind me taking a peek at what in here."

Suicune flipped the switch with her paw and made a glass monitor pop up on her platform. The monitor shows the human and Raikou at the memory bank. The screen provides both a live video feed and audio to her platform. Suicune can perfectly hear their conversation. Let's see what fun the boys are up to., she thought.

At the same time, Dialga is sweating bullets.

I'm done....... Done for sure! Why haven't I reconfigured my brain when the strange headache came?.... She'll see everything now. How I wish for her to run me to a cliff.....Hopefully Arceus won't demote me for this if I'm not disintegrated first....

--------

An audible click came from the door and they slowly opened up. You heard the little conversation between Suicune and Dialga. You felt a lot better as the Temporal Pokemon is about to get a generous dose of his own medicine. What is it that Dialga don't want us to find out about?, you thought. He sounded like he has some hidden stashes lying around his brain. The room you and Raikou entered was dark and warm. You could hear a low din that echoed throughout the chamber. Raikou was the first to venture deeper to check things out. Without warning, blue lights turned on by themselves and illuminated the room. With a better grasp of your surrounding now, you try to get a grasp of the sight.

The memory bank is a large vaulted chamber that covered entirely with glass panels of various different size. If you were to compare this to an art gallery, the magnificence sure exceeds that of the National Museum of Sinnoh. You and Raikou couldn't help but stare at the palatial wonder before you eyes. You ventured closer to the walls to have a better look at the glass panels. When you stepped in front of one of them, it displays words and images as you passed by them but you didn't give them much attention. They range in size from a notebook to that of large windows. You glanced down for a while and discovered that the floor, too, is made from glass. Beneath the see-through floor, an enormous galaxy-like object swirls gently while giving off a cold azure glow. A lone ladder in a corner leads down to the object.

"Those panels must be an individual memory of Dialga. This place must contain millions, if not trillions of data.", you said to Raikou,"I'm not so sure about that thing down there. But I bet it has something to do with his power. To be on the safe side, let's not go there."

"Since we're here, are you planning on getting back to Dialga for spying on you?.", Raikou smiled, "I wonder where should we start?"

"Well, since this is the brain, I bet we can learn a lot about Dialga's background and stuffs like that. But first we'll have to look around."

"Yep. And I think I know where should we start.", you smirked ominously.

After much looking around, you and Raikou found a section of the panels labelled as "Suicune Collection." One of the panel reads "The Aurora Affair: A Temporal Romance."

"Let's see what kind of weird thoughts Dialga have for Suicune up here. ", you said.

"Won't Suicune be mighty pissed if we stumbled upon some sick fantasies involving her?", Raikou asked worriedly.

"Oh, come on. She wouldn't know a thing here. What we see in here, stays in here.", you assured Raikou.

"If you say so.", Raikou said nervously, "I hope this doesn't end with us as ice statues in her cavern."

You touched the "The Aurora Affair: A Temporal Romance" panel without further delay.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Dialga's Memories

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
As soon as you touched the panel, a bright light blinded you. You covered your eyes, startled, and when you removed your hand, you saw Suicune in front of you. "Wow, when...oh...true..." Suicune didn't move or anything. Everything stayed static.

Looking around you, you seem to be on a meadow. You don't see anything odd, so it must be your dimension. Suicune is sitting in front of you, with a vacant expression, possibly because the simulation hasn't started. At your side, Raikou is examining the surroundings. "This is a quality simulation. If I didn't know better, I'd think it was real"

You hold back a snappy comment, and words start to sound in your mind. They're basically instructions to how to use the simulator, but they are so confuse and odd that you don't understand a thing. You suppose it must be just a reminder for Dialga, and nothing more. You do manage to find an option to watch the last session. "Want to see what is this thing, Raikou?"

"We came here, so we may as well go all the way" Raikou replies, approaching you. You do the steps to see the last session.

Dialga starts to materialize where you are. You get out of the step before the Pokémon fully turns solid. Dialga seems like he got slightly improved than how you remember him, bigger and stronger physically. Suicune doesn't look different, however, her eyes look full of life now.

"You look good in this fine morning, Dialga"

"Same to you, Suicune. It was around time you accepted my invitations"

"How could I resist such a strong and handsome dragon?" Suicune flirts with an overly sweet tone.

You're very amused. Suicune is so out of character that you seriously can't believe this is Dialga's image of her. Raikou is watching with an expression you can't decide is enraged or barely containing laughter.

You watch as Suicune and Dialga exchange increasingly sickening and syrupy compliments "Is this really what Dialga does in his mind?" you manage to say, trying hard not to laugh. The image of the serious and somewhat aloof Dialga you had when you first met him was fully destroyed now.

"He is a dork, trust me. At least it isn't that bad, just embarrassing"

The date continues, and this time food appears in front of the Pokémon. They couldn't contain their cliché compliments, most towards Dialga, even with their mouths full of food. You remember a few of the most embarrassing ones, with the intention of telling them to Suicune...yet you doubt about doing it. Could Suicune really leave Dialga and you and Raikou intact if she knew what you were watching?

When the food is over, Dialga and Suicune stand, and start walking. You two follow them, while they walk leisurely. You exchange a few jabs with Raikou towards Dialga, while they go. At some point, Raikou says something you didn't expect.

"I don't like where those two's conversation is going"

You listen back, as you had been distracted with your own conversation to notice what they said. What you hear makes you feel really uncomfortable. "Have I told you what I have dreamed so many times, Dialga? That you would show me your talents, and I don't mean any talents" she says.

"Why not here? Anywhere is a good place for it"

"Yeeees...let's do it"

You start walking towards the opposite direction, not daring to look back. Maybe it was your somewhat perverted mind, but you only could suppose what would follow. "Let's go, Raikou. If we watch more and Suicune finds out, then we'll need to hide a thousand feet underground.

"Better to be safe than sorry, eh?" Raikou says, understanding.

You and Raikou walk to the starting point. On the ground there is a small disc of light. In the distance you can hear howls of what could be pleasure, or Dialga getting gutted. And since Dialga wouldn't do that in his own simulator...you remove those thoughts out of your mind and touch the disc.

The light once again blinds you, and you both are back to the place in Dialga's memory bank.

"Was that worth it?" Raikou asks you. You think for a second. It went more or less as you expected, but the dialogue and the content itself was priceless. You definitely wasn't going to tell Suicune, but maybe someday you'd tell Dialga about what you say, just for the sake of seeing his reaction.

"Yes, it was worth it"
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Dialga's Awkward Date Sim

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Dialga is now traveling through a dense forest while his controller continues to lead him to who knows where. This is the first time that he had felt so frustrated with everything; he is a prisoner in his own body and unable to access any of his powers. His memory is being read, the human nowhere to be found, the pain in his groin still going strong, the lists just get longer. The further he thought about these setbacks, the more anger he felt at the Suicune. The Pokemon pictured her in his brain with a wide, victorious grin while parading his body around like a new toy for all to see. Dialga could only dread the reactions he will receive from Palkia and other Legendaries once this fiasco goes public. They'll surely laugh their heads off about me being controlled by another Pokemon. And to add salt to the injury, it's Suicune. I seriously doubt that I be able to regain my credibility.

"Nope. You're credibility is completely done for, that is, if you still have any left. Also, I would love to see the jokes about you hurled around the Pokénet. Serves you right.", his voice chimed in.

"ARRRRR, could you please keep your filthy mouth shut for a few minutes. Can't you see I'm in an awful mood right here?", Dialga growled.

"Why should I stop when I'm having so much fun? You said that to me when you're pranking me in every, single dimensionally-possible ways. How does it feel now that the shoe is on the other foot?", the voice replied, "And technically, you just asked yourself to shut up so do me a big favor and zip that freaking black hole up!"

"No. I won't just step aside and let you recklessly drag me around. I tried to be nice to you since you've got control but you still tried to push my buttons. It's time I let you know who's in charge here.", Dialga snapped.

"Ooh. And how would you do that? Try and drag me into another cosmic limbo?", his voice cooed.

"...When I get my claws on you, I'm gonna-- ", Dialga was cut off mid-sentence.

Dialga tried to say something but his mouth wouldn't bulge. Not because he ran out of snide remarks, he literally cannot move his mouth. He even couldn't vocalize a single sound. It's locked shut. As Dialga is fumbling to get his mouth to work again, he heard a familiar female voice speak in his head. The toyboyish tone grating his brain ever so hard.

"You're gonna what, huh? ........I didn't know that you had an audio output jack plugged in here. Mind if I remove it? I can only wonder why you would include such a functionality but it sure saves me the trouble of having to listen to your incessant whining and threats.", Suicune said.

".........."

"Awwwwww, don't be sad. I thought you wanted me to shut up so I did you a favor. Well, here you go.", the Aurora Pokemon jabbed.

"........."

"I initially thought about going easy on you, but you're attitude made me reconsidered that offer. Don't get mad at me for this. It's you who has problems. Hahaha without that loud mouth of yours, you're pretty much useless."

Dialga suddenly exploded with rage and mentally shouted virtually all forms of Pokemon obscenities. He wished he could obliterate Suicune this instance. But all of those thoughts are futile. For Suicune, his anger are merely displayed as words on the platform screen. At the moment, the entire screen is filled to the brim with bold letters and other non-discernable symbols. It really pleases her to see Dialga so helpless and at her mercy.

>>Suicune!!! You b&$&h ass, I'm gonna screw you silly! You messed with the wrong Pokemon!!! You're going to be fucking mine!!! Those little pranks are nothing compared to what coming to you!

"Now, temper temper..... I never knew you had such interesting vocabularies.", Suicune exclaimed, "You could be the champion on the PokeBoard. Heard they got all sorts of nasty comments there. Oh wait, they might not even welcome you there.

>> I'm truly mistaken about you, Suicune.......Dimensional prison is too kind for a control freak like you!!! Now give me back my damn control!

It's not going to happen. You and me have a lot to settle. So why don't we start with little something called "The Aurora Affair: A Temporal Romance" stored up here?

>> no.........it can't be *gulp* I don't know what you're...ta..talking about! Is that a novel you've written about me?

Sensing the change in Dialga's tone, Suicune pressed forward.

Hmmph. Stop playing stupid with me, Dialga. I've seen it all on the screen. What's all that 'lovely-dovey' simulation in the memory bank all about? Me, finding you handsome and strong? Not in a trillion years! And that whole scene in the cave.......Now that's something I find rather disturbing and unpalatable."

>>Fine! I got those thoughts for my own enjoyment. Males need their personal entertainment, you know. I bet you got some about me yourself, kissing and entwining with my...

Quiet!!! You just don't understand, do you? If you think I'm going to be all sweet and flirty with you after seeing that sick fantasy of yours, well guess again idiot!!! I wonder what else my partners will dig up?

>>Partners? YOU!!! You got the human to do this didn't you, Suicune? You corrupted his mind and made him do your bidding! That traitor.....

He, in fact, support my plan to his own volition. But that won't be of concern to you anymore.

>> Wha...What do you mean?

Dialga suddenly got a major headache as he finds himself sprinting toward a wall of rock with a particularly jagged protrusion aimed right at his groin. He isn't slowing down a bit.

>> Nononononoono......Suicune, please no.....
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Dialga's PoV, again

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
"Human, come here"

You walk over Raikou, who is examining one of the shelves of plaques. You had been checking the most recent past, while Raikou checked earlier ages. "Did you find something interesting?"

"Maybe. Check this"

He was looking at a plaque that was called "First Meeting - Suicune". "This is a chance to possibly find out why Suicune has so little patience towards Dialga. Want to confirm it?"

It could be good, although you don't have the same interest Raikou has. You're more interested on seeing Suicune's reactions when meeting Dialga. You touch the memory, and the light once again blinds you. You really don't like it, and decide that you will cover your eyes next time, you hope to not to forget.

When you recover your sight sense, you're in a some sort of forest clearing. There are trees and plants arranged in ways that just can't be natural. Everything has a mystic aura, and there are a few Pokémon around. You recognize several of them. All of them are Legendaries, that is for sure, but there are several that you had never seen before, probably because they're from places you have never heard about, or are Legendaries that are now extinct. Dialga is between the trees, you can't see what he is doing.

"I remember something like this" Raikou says "This is when a new Legendary is introduced to the group or given big responsibilities. This must have happened long before I joined". Effectively, Raikou is nowhere in sight.

In that moment, all Pokémon gather in a circle, in the borders of the clearing. All of them have a solemn expression. In the distance, you can see a figure walking towards the group. There is a smaller figure floating at its side. When they approach, you recognize Suicune and Mew.

"Where's the boss?" Palkia asks when Suicune and Mew reach the rest. Mew floats around freely before answering, apparently thinking a lot. "Busy doing the usual stuff. I was told to continue with the ceremony, and I'll do a good job at it, don't you think? I'm ready for it!" Some of the Pokémon seem to doubt it. Suicune is barely containing her excitement. Who knows for how long she had been waiting for this moment.

Suicune stands on the center of the circle, looking proud. "Suicune. You have been called here to be given a new purpose. Are you ready to hear what's it?" Mew says, sounding surprisingly serious. You suppose there is more sides of her than you thought. Suicune replies saying she is ready.

"Then your task will be to be one of the guardians of Johto. You'll run all over the territory, with your main responsibilities being the water bodies and the cold regions of the territory. You'll start with the task given tomorrow. Is it understood?"

"Yes" she says.

"Then with this, we declare you're fit for the job, and officially welcome you into the group of Legendaries. Welcome"

Mew floats away, to the edge, while Suicune looks around, while the rest of th Pokémon muttered some words of welcome or nodded towards her. When she looked at Dialga, he didn't do any of those things. Just looked at the forest behind Suicune, as if there were something in there. Soon the curiosity was too much, and Suicune turned around.

A big blob came out of the forest, as if it had been fired by a cannon. Knowing Dialga, it probably was. The blob exploded on Suicune, covering her in red tint. She fell down due to the impact, while Dialga smirked, obviously containing his laughter. Several of the Legendaries were laughing, and very few remained stoic. Suicune looked at Dialga, furious.

"Sorry. Tradition" That was all he said. He was acting almost exactly like when you had met him. Mew approached, giggling. "Calm down, Suicune. Most of us have gone through something like this. It is always something new in every ceremony" she kept giggling. Suicune definitely wasn't amused. You could notice that she was saving that grudge, and surely, in the present, she still remember that moment with all the fury she had.

Raikou once again felt the need to comment "I did go through something similar, I fell into a pit of mud. It took me days to be clean". He was talking almost with nostalgia, he didn't hold any ill feelings towards Dialga.

In that moment, you decided it was time to get out of there. You looked around for the disc, and covered your eyes. Seconds later, you were in the memory bank.

"So that was the first moment Suicune hated Dialga, right?"

"Yes. And he hasn't done a lot of things to make her change her opinion" Raikou said, matter-of-factly.

You try to think over this, but then a loud yell reverberates in the place. It sounds worse than anything you had heard in that day. Raikou seems to be very concerned about this "That really sounded bad. What is Suicune doing?"

You don't stop to wonder about it, and walk to the exit. Whatever it is, just judging by the sound, it was something that went too far. You had to get Suicune out of the control room quick, before something really bad happened.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Back in the Memory Bank

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
You and Raikou rushed as quickly as possible toward the control room. The loud scream out of nowhere has greatly unsettled you. There is no way of telling as to what happened but something in your guts tell you that someone was hurt. The yell sounds a lot worse than the ones Dialga gave when his groin was in pain. You went through a list of possibilities, did Suicune made Dialga do something humiliating? Did she finally had enough of him and decided to settle things herself? You tried your best not to think in the latter direction.Don't worry., you attempted to reassure yourself,It can't be anything worse. It just part of Suicune's revenge. She wouldn't overdo it.

"I really don't like the way this is going. Although Suicune hates Dialga down to his very being, she would never do something to actually hurt him," Raikou said worriedly.

"I'd like to think so too," you sighed, "But, did you hear that scream?! It doesn't sound like the fun kind of scream. That's the kind you would give when your life is in danger."

"Whatever she's doing now, we must stop her immediately," Raikou said.

The two of you finally arrived at the control center to see Suicune at the platform with a smirky expression on her face. She has eyes fixed on the large screens in front of her. One of them depicts the Temporal Pokemon's body lying on the ground writhing under tremendous pain. Fragments of rocks are strewn on the ground around him. You can see scratches and bruises along the underside with the area around the reproductive organ looking particularly bad. Another screen is filled with words of all sorts. There are dialogs of some sort between Suicune and Dialga. One of the last lines on the screen is Dialga begging Suicune to stop what she's doing. After that, an error message that the Pokemon has fainted and would require some times before he could be rebooted.

"Oh yeah, look at you! A moment ago you're all boastful and confidant. I thought you said that you could easily handle me. Turns out that you're a wussy! How do you like them pranks now?" ,Suicune victoriously proclaimed.

Raikou was the first to rush toward Suicune.

"Suicune!!! What the hell are you doing?" Raikou exclaimed.

The Aurora Pokemon spun her head around and looked at both you and Raikou with an unnaturally cheerful smile.

"Hi there. It's so good to see you boys back," Suicune said with a sweet smile, "Did both of you have fun?"

"Ummm....Suicune. That's not what we're asking you," Raikou said in a serious tone, "We heard a loud scream coming from Dialga. We're kinda worried about you, you know. What happened?"

"Oh, it's nothing, dear. I just taught Dialga an important lesson in respecting a female Pokemon. But he somehow got overwhelmed by my extreme lecture methods. Don't worry about him, boys. He'll be up again in a day or two," Suicune continued in a saccharine tone.

"Don't you think this is going a bit too far?", Raikou asked, "I get it that you hate him, but there's no need to make Dialga childless by messing up his dick."

"Ahahaha not at all, my Raikou," Suicune chimed, "Dialga always claimed to be that handsome and powerful Pokemon who I'll fall in love with. So I decided to give that theory a little test."

Hearing Suicune talking so syrupy eerily reminds you of that gross-out memory you saw back there. You tried your best to repress that scene from the surface of your mind. You shook off the creepy resemblance as a mere coincidence. But the atmosphere remains ominous.

"Did Suicune always talk like this when she's extremely happy?", you whispered to Raikou.

"No. She never talked like that before. Suicune wouldn't be caught dead with that kind of voice. I'm truly concerned about her," Raikou murmured back.


"What are you guys talking about?", Suicune smiled as she moved her face closer to you two.

"Ehh, nothing. We're just wondering about what made you such a happy Pokemon," you said.

"Oh, silly human. Now that's a simple question," Suicune said, "I just defeated Dialga at his own game! Of course I'll be cheery. By the way, did you boys find anything interesting on your little stroll?"

"Ummm...we went to check out Dialga's brain anatomy," Raikou blurted.

"Hmmm. That's funny I thought you guys told me that you wanted to visit the Memory Bank. Dialga must have awesome stuffs stowed in there, right?", Suicune beamed as she stepped even closer. Her face very subtly darkened.

Raikou and you are getting sweaty and nervous.

"We found... nothing but times-wimey.... stuffs.," you said shakily.

"Yeah. It's not interesting enough for you to know. So we instead talked about male things. Stuffs girls wouldn't want to know about," Raikou added sheepishly.

"Well then, let me take a guess? Are you boys talking about something called......'The Aurora Affair'?" Suicune said smoothly.

Shit, how did she know about that?, you thought.

"What's that?", you asked, on the verge of a heart attack.

"I bet you boys had a lot of fun watching that," Suicune growled.

At this point, Suicune sweet smile started distorting into something unreadable. Raikou has a very fearful look on his face when he looked at you.

*gulp*

"This is the part where we.......RUUUUUUNNNNNN!!!!!", the Electric Pokemon yelled.

You sprint at full speed along with Raikou toward the exit. But before you had any chance of reaching it, you felt something wrapped around your feet and made fall onto the floor. You saw a white ribbon-like object slowly tying itself around your feet, body, and arms. A quick look at Raikou revealed him to be in a similar bind.

"Going somewhere, boys?", Suicune said coldly as she dragged you two back to her, "I saw everything you guys did there the moment that door opened. That means you probably know the reason why I hated this idiot so much!"

The Pokemon positioned you and Raikou in front of her raging, crimson eyes.

"Suicune, no!" Raikou pleaded.

You are too afraid to even utter, completely paralyzed by the Pokemon's glare.

"So what should I make you two do?", Suicune smirked sinisterly.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Continue

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
"I know...why don't you two pamper me for a while? I have nothing better to do until the big dragon wakes up"

"What? Pamper?" Raikou says, confused, but you can sense some fear.

"Yes. Raikou, go, bring me food. I'm getting hungry. You know what I like, so you better not bring me anything you know I'll hate" Suicune released Raikou, who bolted towards the exit. A few seconds later, he re-entered shyly.

"But I don't know where to get food!"

Suicune rolled her eyes, and gestured to behind Raikou. From the distance, you think you saw a tunnel opening. "This should lead your way. Go" Raikou once again left the place. Then the Aurora Pokémon turned all her attention to you. You gulp, nervous about what she could tell you to do.

"You used to take care of Dialga from the inside, didn't you? Wake him up. I'm not done with him yet"

"When will you be done?" you ask, truly concerned about Dialga's well-being. All this revenge thing has gone way too far.

"When I get tired, which won't happen soon"

You get released as well. You look to the side, near the controls. You walk to it, and start fiddling with it. You're sure that what you're doing won't wake up Dialga, but if you don't look like you tried then who knows what would happen to you. Around ten minutes later, Raikou returns, rolling around big amount of food., You observe how he brings it to Suicune, and she examines it.

"Could be better, but I suppose that there is nothing better. At least you didn't bring me anything terrible" suddenly she turns towards you. "Are you done, human? I'm getting impatient!"

You fear your own life when you reply "I-i-i-i-I'm sorry, Suicune, but th-there is nothing I can do. He'll have to wake u-u-up by himself..." you close your eyes, afraid of looking at Suicune.

You don't feel any pain or anything. You expected to be attacked, but when you opened your eyes, it looks like she is containing her frustration. "Ugh. You really can't do a thing, but I hope that your next tasks are at least better"

You want to yell Now What?, but you don't feel like dying in that moment. "What's it?"

"Feed me. And you, Raikou, try to do what the human couldn't do. Maybe some shocks can awake Dialga"

Raikou and you changed your positions. He now was pouring electricity over several wires, while you took the food, tore it in pieces and gave them to Suicune in her mouth. She insisted on making things hard for you, maybe what you two watched in Dialga's memory was something she really didn't wanted people to know.

"For how long will we have to...service you?"

Suicune doesn't reply, just continues eating what you give them. She doesn't say a thing until you're done, and even then, looks like she ignored your question.

When she was about to talk, Raikou told Suicune that he was unsuccessful as well.

"Nothing to do, then. I'll have to wait until he wakes up. I'm tired of being in this spot."

She got off the platform. You hope it means you two are free as well, but Suicune destroys those hopes "Ah, and you two stay with me. You're not free to go yet"

She has opened a path, and when you three get to the end, you're in a room you had never seen before. It is decorated on what you suppose if Suicune's taste. On a side there are two small mattresses in the floor, which you suppose are for you and Raikou, and a big bed-like thing for Suicune.

She climbs her bed, and looks around. "What time is it?" You look at your clock and reply. "Ah, it is almost time for me to sleep. But before, there are two last things I want you to do for today.

Raikou. I want you to keep a watchful eye to see if Dialga wakes up before it is time. If he does and you don't tell me, my revenge will be as big as the one I'm carrying on Dialga" she says threateningly. Raikou seems about to faint due to his fear, but he leaves to patrol.

"Human. I want to sleep. But before that, groom me. I can't sleep well if I'm not clean and tidy" she fills a nearby recipient with water, and passes it to you. "There you go. And make sure to do it right"

You take the bucket, grimacing. You need to think of a way of stopping Suicune. Suddenly, you remember something. Dialga had given you some small temporal powers! But...were they enough to help you? You doubt that at your actual state, you could do a thing. You're tired and want to sleep.

You decide to get over what Suicune asked you, then go to sleep. You promised yourself that tomorrow you would make sure things were right again.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: "Serving" Suicune

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
