Gira0523: Leave it to me! I'll keep that little idiot far from you, you take care of the human and Suicune

-"I don't need anybody to take care of me"- Suicune grumbled

-"You do and you know it"- you replied before typing.

H. Trainer: Thank you so much, Giratina!

Gira0523: No problem, human. Make sure to not to cause a mess inside my friend!!! and with that, Giratina disconnected. You breathed in relief.

-"That went alright. We can count with him"- Raikou said.

-"Good. Now that we have another dragon involved, let's do something else, alright?"- Suicune said before leaving. You wondered what was up with her, but leaving that aside, there was something more you needed to ask Raikou.

-"Now what wil we do, Raikou?"-

-"I'll try to get everything straightened up before Dialga distorts everything. I think that for now I can do it by myself"-

-"Will Mew return later?"-

-"I don't know how long it'll be before she's back, so why don't you take some time to relax?"-

Relaxing seemed good to you. The day so far had been pretty hectic, first with Suicune's games, and then with you knowing that Dialga was trying to get you into trouble with the rest of the legendaries. -"I will. Any suggestions?"- you asked, hoping Raikou had some quiet and calm place in his body where you could rest.

-"There's something, but it won't be calm at all"- Raikou says. You sigh.

-"As long as it keeps me busy then it won't be bad"-

-"I noticed that Suicune got you through a series of tests earlier! Would you like to do the same to her? You'd still go with her, but just as a spectator"-

-"The same to her? You mean a game like she did?"- the idea didn't seem that bad to you. It'd be good to be on control for once -"But I don't know your body well enough to trace a good route"-

-"I could help with that. I have several possibilities, you choose one"- and with that some folders appeared near you. You took one and took out the contents, which were a map and a list of organs. You checked the name of each route, and picked a few that interested you the most.

Gross-out Route: you won't want to visit any place like these, ever
Aquatic Route: Swimming through different organs without a stop
Resistance Route: A highly-intensive route that will tire you out
Scenic Route: More like a maze of fur, walking through Raikou's hide

-"These all seem interesting, but I'm not sure Suicune will accept"-

-"You have to make clear you challenge her to do it. She won't refuse if you do"- Raikou promised. Accepting his words, you finally decided on which one to take. -"Raikou, I have made my choice. Please tell me all about this route"-
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Group Chat with Giratina

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Hmmm... What route should I make her take? Decisions, Decisions... All routes sound like pretty good choices for tests. Well, Suicune is the kind of girl who's a bit competitive and arrogant at the same time; she's willing to take any challenges as long as she believed that she could win. And like any other people with similar characteristics, Suicune definitely wouldn't settle for anything less than humiliating her opponent like she did to me last time. Speaking of that, I'm still kinda upset that she dragged me all the way down there in the middle of the night. The Gross-Out Route seems like a good payback. Now, in order to make her participate in a similar test, I have to find a way to make her take the challenge without arousing her suspicion. This could be my chance at embarrassing her. All that's needed is a little subtlety.

"Okay Raikou. Let's make it the Gross-Out Route for her then," you said.

"Are you sure about that, human? That's kind of mean," Raikou asked with an uncertain tone, "I really don't want this to become some sort of tit-for-tat between you and her. Please reconsider."

"Tit-fot-tat? Nononono... We've gotten over that phase already! Besides, I think Suicune can handle a little grit if she's as tough as she claims to be. She absolutely loves friendly competitions and so do I. Tell me, what do you have along that route?" you replied.

Raikou heaved an audible sigh. The Pokemon seemed unconvinced about your statement. Come to think of it, Suicune and I aren't exactly at peace yet...

"Listen carefully, human. The Gross-Out route will take you through my intestines, bladder, and ends at my testicles. The test will be more about endurance because you are being carried around and encountering all the gross stuffs. It's as awful as the name suggests. Suicune will have to journey through all of those places for her to win. Are you reaaaalllly sure about this?" Raikou asked inquisitively.

"Yep! What is there to worry about? You think she can't handle the tests you've got?"

"No. I'm confident that she'll be able to tackle them. I'm just not sure how she'll react especially after how Dialga also played these games on her."

"What did that guy do to her?" you asked.

"From what I understand, after being turned down by her for several times, Dialga finally had enough of the refusals. He had evolved from simple jocular pranks to total obsession with Suicune. Everyday he tracked over her incessantly, sent her mysterious messages, trapped her in new dimensions, mentally spam her mind with unwanted thoughts...all without significant progress. One day, Dialga had the idea of luring Suicune into his body to play her. He camouflaged himself as the entrance to her cave through both mental trickery and planning. Poor Suicune, she never realized what she walked into. I never made it there in time to attempt to save her from the upcoming disaster. That nimrod trapped her in his body to undergo those "love story" tests to make her love him which are nothing more than pestering her endlessly. I'm thinking that Dialga was probably trying to break her down in an attempt to get some feelings out of her. She spent three weeks within Dialga's little world before escaping only when she went along with his cliched scripts long enough for him to get 'way over his head' and fainted as a result. Suicune never precisely told me what happened in there but she said it's absolutely petulant and utterly laughable. Remember the Dating Simulation we saw back there? It's probably as pathetic as that."

"Hahaha...sounds like something Dialga would do...out of desperation," you laughed.

"Right. We need to be a little more careful with our pranks lest she equates us with him. If she does, we are in one heap of a trouble," Raikou said.

"Mmhmm...we should never go down that route again. But on the other hand, you really have to stop worrying so much. You need make your voice heard more often. Just a little advice based on my experience: if you keep doing things her way, Suicune will get even more assertive on you until the point you're basically her servant (which I think you're getting dangerously close). You told me that you are getting tired of always being pushed around by her and goaded into doing her bidding. Don't you ever think about doing a little comeback against the girl? I bet deep down you always wanted wipe that smug smile off her face for once."

"Huh? I would never thought about Suicune in such a hostile manner. I would never do that to a friend."

"Well then, time to change that, Raikou," you smirked, " Let me ask you: Do you remember how she treated you ever since you knew her?"

"Suicune and I first met at the Legendary Council when we were appointed into our roles as protectors of our respective realms. She was exactly the way she is right now and frequently got into trouble with the council. As part of a Trio, I have to be with her and Entei whenever we roam Johto on adventures...Come to think of it, while Suicune isn't vicious, she does get on my nerves sometimes. I've answered every beck and call she'd ever made, stuck by her side everyday, and get dragged around on adventures...and I haven't gotten anything really good in return."

"See! This has virtually become the rule: No matter the species, tomboys have a thing for dominating the males in their group. If you are her friend, don't friend usually help each other out?"

"Perhaps, a little "harmless" fun wouldn't hurt too much," the Pokemon grinned. This is definitely my chance to negotiate some better perks from her.

"You and I are now in the same league, bro."

"Hmm... but if this gets us into any trouble, you'll owe me a new pair of 'batteries' if Suicune does anything to them."

"Alright...I bear all responsibility for whatever happens from this point. ...Now, finalize your plan for the Route while I get Suicune over here. It's time to put the shoe on the other foot."

Suicune...the Gross-Out route will be perfect for you... heh.... heh.... heh....
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Gross-Out Route/Aquatic Route

choices: The First Part of the Route
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
You walked to your room, where Suicune was lazing over her bed. Barely containing your excitement for what you expected would be a great way to get even with her, you got her attention -"Suicune, let's play a game!"-

-"Not now. I can't think of any right now"- she had the impression you were asking her to think of one.

-"I already got one. Remember what you did this morning? There's one for you too"-

Suicune got off her bed when she realized you were talking of a group of challenges for her. She was pretty interested, so you threw the folder with the information on the floor. She opened it and glanced to its contents, including the map and the description. She didn't make any comment until she was done reading. Finally, she chuckled. -"Whose idea was this? Yours or Raikou?"-

-"Why do you want to know?"-

-"So I know whose ass to kick"-

You grinned nervously. You weren't going to throw your host under the bus. Besides, if she started to hurt him from the inside, chances are that you'd be affected as well, so you decided to take the full blame. -"It was all my idea. He's merely giving his body as the grounds for this"-

Suicune was amused by this -"I didn't think you'd have the guts to challenge me, much less such a...curious route"- she passed the folder back to you -"And what's my incentive?"-

-"Incentive?"-

-"What do I get if I win? And what do you get if I lose?"-

You thought for a moment. You hadn't considered it, Raikou and you were satisfied with she going through the route. The Aurora Pokémon seemed to take advantage of your lack of foresight, because she quickly added -"Oh, I think I know what would be good"-

-"What do you have in mind?"-

-"If I lose, then we'll be even and I won't bother you anymore. Never again"-

That seemed...kinda a letdown, but you weren't going to refuse. However, you insisted that she added Raikou to the losing condition. She conceded that if she lost, he wouldn't be bothered again.

-"And if you are successful?"- you asked, hoping that it wouldn't be weeks of serving her. Much to your relief, and strangely, she said she didn't want anything if she won. -"What? Are you serious?"-

-"I'm serious. Why would I brag on your face that I beat you? No, I have a better plan"- she spoke slowly, you were starting to get a bad feeling -"I'll accept this challenge with only one single condition: you're coming with me"-

-"I am?"- you had hoped you'd be able to watch from the distance or something, alongside Raikou.

-"Yes. I was with you while you struggled with my own tests, it's only fair you stay with me"-

-"...You're saying that so you have chances of making me have a bad time when you can, aren't you?"- you realized that chances are that she would find a way to make you suffer a bit, even if she was the one to complete the tests.

-"Oh, you're right about that! And trust me, I believe I'll be capable of passing this with flying colors AND make you realize this was a bad idea, at the same time"-

-"He accepts"- Raikou intervened. You glared at the ceiling while Suicune laughed.

-"Somebody is anxious to see me go through this! Let's do it. Get ready, human, this will be fun"- and with that, she left the room. You stayed behind for a moment. This hadn't gone exactly like you expected.

-"It's too late to change the route, isn't it?"- you were sure you wouldn't be able to fend off Suicune during the whole thing. The perspective wasn't pretty, judging by the places to visit.

-"It is. Be careful, human, she won't play nice"-

-"You're lucky you don't have to be with her"* you grumbled.

-"I'd like to see my own insides but I can't. It'd be interesting. I should learn to make an image of me"- he trailed off, before returning to the right topic -"I'm ready. Suicune won't have a walk in the park"-

-"I trust you have everything planned. Let's get this over with"- you took the map, and saw Suicune waiting for you a few feet away.

-"Finally! I hope you didn't expect me to get there by myself. I don't even know where to start"-

You sighed and looked at the map, finding the closest route to the bowels. -"It's that way"- you pointed, but Suicune shook her head.

-"You'll be going ahead of me. I'll follow you. Make sure everything is safe before I enter, please"-

You really didn't like how everything was going.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Suicune's Epic Test

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
"This. Is. Bad!!!" you thought nervously as you led the way. The perfect plan has been totally disrupted and you haven't thought of a backup. You chided yourself in part for being so shortsighted and naive to the point of forgetting that Suicune can be just as resourceful and cunning. She had totally played your cards against you and you now find yourself at the short end of the stick. You could feel Suicune smiling mockingly behind your back, savoring the despair that you are feeling as you walked closer to the Route. Despite the reassurance from Raikou that he'll go tough on her, you now have to worry about the same challenging obstacles that was originally meant only for her. There is no doubt that she figured out that you and Raikou are behind this ruse to humiliate her and that someone's is gonna pay the price.

You and Suicune quickly reached a closed circular opening. A sign on the top reads "To Intestines" in bold yellow letters. A secondary sign affixed below it reads "CAUTION! Slippery floors and walls ahead!."

"Here we are, Suicune. The start of the route," you said dejectedly.

"Good. I take down whatever challenges you have for me. You'll see," she remarked confidently.

"All we have to do now is to touch the opening to start the game," you explained with some uneasiness.

"Say, you aren't looking too good, human. Are you having second thoughts here?" Suicune grinned from ear to ear, "You are always free to make a 180-degree turn back to your bedroom if you can't handle this."

"No...I'm perfectly fine, thank you very much," you replied sarcastically, "What about you, huh?"

"You really aren't good at hiding your feelings or dodging questions. The look on your face tells me otherwise, human. I've seen that expression on my opponents countless times: you're just afraid. Don't worry! I'll win this game for you and let you relish my sweet victory...that is, if I have any left for you."

"Enough talk, Suicune! Don't gloat about something you haven't accomplished yet," you said annoyingly.

"Hmmph... I'm not gloating as you like to put it. I'm simply being confident and optimistic. You're the one who needs to take your own advice. Or perhaps I need to remind you two who's in charge here."

"Well, I'm not going to make that easy for you, then. I'm going first."

"Be my guest. I like to take my time slowly."

Being with Suicune can be really testing especially when she's being all stuck-up. You just aren't going to sit behind and watch Suicune get all domineering on you; the precise opposite of you and Raikou's original goal. You sighed and gathered your courage and stepped forward to touch the opening. There was a little hand print-like recess upon the flesh for you to touch. The moment you hand came in contact with it, the tight muscles loosened and a strong gust of wind came from behind you and Suicune. The suddenness caught both of you off-guard and swept you off your feet and paws. You landed face first while Suicune fell on her belly with her legs outstretched. The force of the slip made you slide toward the opening. You desperately tried holding on to something but due to the slime covering the floor, your efforts are futile. Seconds later, all the could be heard were the shrieks coming from you and Suicune.

It was a long plunge downward...but that doesn't really matter to you now as your stomach turned and churned at the lack of gravity. It felt eerily similar to the one you felt when you jumped down Dialga's throat, an experience that you would rather quickly forget. You briefly wondered what has happened to him and whether he is actively hunting for you. But with Mew and Giratina behind your back, it's unlikely the Temporal Pokemon would be making any return soon. The former had promised to train you in the little temporal power you've been given, adding another layer of reassurance that you would know what to do in the event Dialga showed up.

Oomf! You landed hard on a soft surface which still hurts a lot despite the elasticity it provided you. You righted yourself up and look around. Slimes, half-digested food masses, pink walls covered in more slime. Yup! This is the small intestine. Far above, you heard Suicune coming down. The Pokemon has been shrieking for the entire fall, a far cry from her usually composed demeanor. Your eyes widen when you realized that Suicune is about to land right on top of you. It was too late for you to move as you helplessly watch her form nearing you. Her entire weight came crushing down on you like a boulder. Pain was the only thing you felt before blacking out...

-------

Meanwhile, Raikou felt the two inhabitants landing in his intestines. He had decided to rest in a nearby cave and informed Mew about his new location should she return. Minutes passed and Raikou still didn't feel any movements coming from the two and got worried about his friends. He quickly did a search for the human and Suicune finding that their hearts are still beating, merely passed out from the fall. Raikou felt bad for the human. He was supposed to be enjoying this little act of sadism against Suicune together. But due to the drastic change in the last 10 minutes, the human will unfortunately be a collateral victim now.

Sorry...but the plan still has to move on.

Once he's sure that the two are fine, the Pokemon began the process of initiating the next step of his game.

This will sure spice things up. Sorry, human. I'm afraid that you're in for the ride. A collateral damage.

Raikou released an herb from his storage chamber to encourage bowel movement and metabolism and waited silently.

-----
Darkness and numbness is all that you're feeling. Your world still feels murky. There is a sense that you are floating, drifting in this vast emptiness. The feeling was strangely soothing and relaxing despite the feeling of unexplained urgency.

"Hey!!!! Wake up human!!!" a voice barked.

You tried to shut that voice out of your hazy mind but it continued to call you. Then something shook you violently on the floor, forcing you to slowly come back to your senses. With your eyes now opened, you saw Suicune still on top of you glaring at you with her penetrating red eyes. Her paws are pinned upon your chest with her claws slowly digging through your shirt.

"Get up! You're pinning down my tail, you clumsy!" she growled.

You found that you are indeed lying on her ribbon-like appendages and quickly helped yourself up. The Pokemon shot you a death glare as you tried to dust off yourself in this humid environment if that's even possible.

"Look what you did to my tails. They're all wrinkled and dirtied," she said in momentary sadness as she nuzzled them, "I'm starting to wonder if this was your idea to begin with."

She doesn't look too happy with the arrangement Raikou had planned for her. Suicune eyed the greenish slime covering the intestine walls and the half-digested food mass around her and scrunched her nose in disgust.

"This is just gross!" your friend scowled.

"We're at the small intestines, Suicune!" you offered with a satisfying grin, "What did you expect? A clean, sterile hallway?"

"Watch it! I'm in a very bad mood right now. I suggest that you don't make it worse; I might take it out on you, human," Suicune glared and flicked you with her paw.

"Well, if you say so. But it looks like there is no way out of this besides completing the challenge as scheduled. So I advised that you better get used to it."

"Arrrrgh..."
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: The First Part of the Route

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
"Okay, where to go? I don't see any indication"

As you didn't understand it, you asked her to explain that. Soon you understood the problem: to both of you, both directions of the intestine looked very similar, but the destinations were different. One led to the stomach while the other led to the large itnestine. You supposed that, judging by the route's intention and the location of the second part of the route, the large intestines were the place to go to. But if Suicune picked the wrong direction, you'd be returning to the stomach, leading to waste time, at the very least. You hoped that nothing else would happen in that scenario.

Suicune decided a direction and started walking, mumbling to herself irately. You followed her, trying to calm yourself down. You said to yourself over and over that everything would be fine and that Suicune would have the worst part of the game, but you knew that at some point she'd be able to make you have a bad time.

The environment around you didn't help to calm you. There was nothing soothing in the slime dripping down the walls or in the groaning noises that resounded through the intestine every once in a while.

"We screwed it up!" Suicune shouted in alarm, and ran to the opposite direction. You froze in the verge of a panic attack when you saw that there was a wave of sludge going towards you. Judging by the color and the pieces of food you could see, you knew that it could only come from the stomach.

The moment Suicune passed near to you, she stopped and pushed you to the ground before running away. You stood up as quick as you could, only to find that in those few moments the sludge had got nearer, way faster than you had expected. You weren't sure you could outrun it. Sure, it was to be expected that at some point you'd get dirty, but you wanted to delay that moment as much as I could.

You started running as fast as you could, trying to keep the distance from the sludge. Suicune had an advantage over you, as, maybe because of her affinity towards ice and water, she could handle better the slippery floor and the puddles strewn around, unlike you. You fell to the ground several times, each time feeling like the wave of sludge would catch you. Thankfully, it didn't happen when you expected it.

Somehow, soon you managed to put some distance between the sludge and you. When you were sighing in relief to that, you turned around another one of the countless bends you had gone through, and saw Suicune sitting in front of a huge sphincter, as if contemplating the possible daunting tasks that could await her behind it. "What are you waiting for? Get in there!" you shouted, understanding her reticence. Not a lot of people would enter a creature's colon willingly.

"I...I'm not sure..." Suicune wasn't boasting in courage like she had been in the beginning. You felt satisfaction to see her like that, but a groan from the intestine reminded you that there was something incoming.

"Listen, there's no more option. You either enter there willingly, or you enter with a mess of semidigested food"

"Only if you come with me" Suicune replied very softly. She looked at you almost pleadingly "I can't do something like this alone".

That's when you understood some of her behavior. She hadn't brought Raikou with her just for kicks when she went into Dialga, nor she had made you come with her in the route just to get revenge of you for suggesting it to her. It was more because she needed somebody to be with her in those moments. She didn't feel like she could do it alone, and she'd do anything to have somebody else with her, even if it meant making them go through stuff they didn't want to experience.

You almost regretted starting this thing in the first place. And you knew that if Raikou had heard her, he'd regret it too. But there was no way to make him know about this until everything was over. You could only hope that whatever Raikou had planned, you'd be able to help Suicune to endure it.

The sludge advanced towards you, snapping you out of your epiphany "Yes, let's do it" you shook Suicune. She changed fastly into her confident state.

"Here we go. Just this once, I'll go first" she said, running towards the sphincter and not even waiting for it to open completely. She jumped through the hole that formed there. You followed her, having to wait. When it was open enough for you to enter, you did so without wasting time.

You wondered what Raikou could have planned for Suicune in his colon, but you did know that it wouldn't be nice. You also remembered that the second stop, the bladder, was pretty much near the backside of Raikou, so chances are that Suicune and you would have to trek for quite a while.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Continue

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
The smell in the Colon was worse than the small intestines. You knew that such a location would inevitably smell like this but this is far worse than you imagine. It's a malicious cross of natural gas and nose-irritating chemicals. You heard Suicune gasped and gagged at the odor and felt a bit sorry for her now that you are slowly regretting even starting this challenge. The place was dimly lit, making any further attempts to continue very dangerous. Just then, something in the corner of your eye caught your attention. It's a wall-mounted communication device with a glowing square button labeled "Press Button to Confirm Arrival." You pressed the switch and immediately heard switches and circuits clicking and whirling to life. Service lighting from the ceiling flickered on, allowing you a good view of the place for the first time. Repugnant was the only word you could come up with. The flesh of the colon is a sickly dark purple with greenish slimes forming trails that dangled from the ceiling. A casual look at the wall tells you that its better to leave the substances untouched. Another cause for concern is the metallic rusty catwalk that's somehow here. It's narrow and just large enough to accommodate your width and from the thick rust upon it, Raikou hasn't been maintaining it for a while.

The only good thing about the colon is that it's twice as large as the small intestines. But even that roominess is rendered nil by the presence of solid wastes on the walls. There aren't just food wastes, there are also remnants of broken test tubes and organic specimens from Raikou's past experiments are strewn over the floor.

We're not just in a colon. This is a biological supersite. This will get me genetic mutation once we're through!

Suicune didn't look at all pleased with the arrangement. She's trying her best to put on her confident grin but failed to hide the cringe that is showing through.

"This is far worse than I thought," you murmured to her, “Raikou really set the bar high with this one.”

"Thanks for stating the obvious... So tell me again, how the hell did we end up in my friend's colon?" Suicune asked derisively.

“Perhaps Raikou is simply returning what little courtesy you gave him and me. You know, guys always likes to team up,” you jested.

“Excuse me?” The Aurora Pokemon's expression turned into frown as she stared at you with suspicion.

"Whoa...Don't look at me like that. It's not my fault that you ended up here. If you have an issue with this, tell Raikou. He's the owner of this place."

Suicune narrowed her eyes further at your statement.

"Let me get this straight. You and Raikou are pissed because I dominated and owned both of you at games and in life. So, you two figured that you gotta do some counterattack to save your manliness lest you be remembered as several of the guys I've beatened. Did I cover everything?” Suicune said.

“In a way...yes. That's one of the reasons why he planned this. And I may have a little input into his decision. Sorry,” you said sheepishly.

“Hmmm....I'm surprised....Not!” she scowled, “Boy, am I glad that I dragged you along for this ride. You really think that I'm naive enough to believe this little “friendly” challenge you proposed was not a thinly veiled revenge plot, hmmm? You're truly a poor liar, human; your body language literally telegraphed me your intention this whole time.”

“That's true. I'm never good at deception. But this is mostly Raikou's idea. I'm kind of sorry that I dragged you into this. I never intended to hurt you or anything. I assume that Raikou would feel the same if he hears you out. Anything I can do to make you feel better?”

“I'll give you some advice alright, if you want to make my mood better, I suggest that you find a way to get us out of here....now,” Suicune literally growled the last word.

“Sadly, it's too late to turn back now."

"Too late? So...you mean we have to go through all this?" the Pokemon asked with a worried tone. She bend down and looked at the many abandoned canisters and paper notes and scrunched her nose, "Ugh, this is too much for me to take in all at once."

You nodded silently while looking at Suicune. Her expression is somewhere between 'screw that, I'll charging forward' and 'I give up.'

"No....there is no way I'm going into Raikou's bowel. No freaking way!" she said firmly, "Lets get out of here, alright?"

"I wanted to, Suicune. But the only way would be heading down. Though I'm not even certain if it's wise to head down, it's the only choice we got.” you explained.

“Great! Not only are we trapped, we are also the first being to explore my friend's ass.”

Right after Suicune's groan, a chime sounded from the device on the wall.

"Hello, human and my dear Suicune. Welcome to part 2 of your challenge," an intercom speaker on the wall device said. Suicune stormed over to the device and shouted into the mic.

"RAIKOU!" Suicune screeched, "You are freaking nuts if you want us to go through this?"

The Pokemon motioned her paw toward the large intestines.

“Why? Didn't my small intestine offered you a hint of what's coming up or are you just that ignorant about the bodily process?”

“Not dumb enough to realize that you and the human planned this schtick together. We'll get to that at a later time. Right now, get me out of your colon, you weirdo. I want out of this!”

"Sorry to hear that, Suicune. But you only have two choices here. You can finish the challenge or you can forfeit the challenge and I'll just bring you back to your room...but as a condition, you will stop bullying me and give me everything I want.”

“Down your colon. No thanks. I'd rather be in Dialga's weird world than go through this.”

“Hmmmm... is that so? I was planning to give you and the human some handsome rewards for finishing the challenge? Looks like that won't be necessary,” Raikou baited.

Suicune's expression softened substantially when she heard Raikou mentioned rewards.

“What kind of rewards, huh? Better not be some kitschy trophies or medals or random souvenirs. Oh, and don't tell me you're giving the human another one of your toy plushies. They don't even look like you,” Suicune remarked sarcastically.

“Nope. It's gonna be something way better. I assure you that it will be of great interest to you both. But I'm keeping that a secret for the time.”

“You best have something for us once this is over, you hear me Raikou? If you dare to fib me.....well, you get the rest.”

“Right, I promise you. Good luck and may the best win.”

With that, the communication station went silent again.

“Ugh...Stupid Raikou...” Suicune muttered, “Alright, human. Guess we have some trivial incentives to go forward.”

The Pokemon turned noticed that she is standing right beside you the whole time and blushed momentarily when she realized how close she had unknowingly gotten to you.

“Huh? Is there anything you need?” you asked when you felt her fur brush against you.

Suicune leaped away from you with a squeal.

“None of your business okay. Raikou had something for us once we win this game.”

“What is it?” you asked.

“He didn't exactly say what is it only that it's interesting for us both. I wonder what could it be?”

“Only one way to find out.”

Suicune scanned you for a few seconds before yutning her attention to the deeper parts of the colon.

“Eww. I wonder what Raikou has been eating lately to create this mess. He should have stuck with absorbing lightning powers; that's what his type is meant to do. Ever since he started his research, he sure started acting more like humans. Come on, there's no use staying here!”

You and Suicune went deeper down the colon, finding the wastes and stench to be very stomach turning obstacles.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Hesitation and Uncertain Offer

choices: He decided to not to do it while they were there
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
While you were walking you were really glad that the catwalk was there. If it hadn't Suicune and you would have needed to walk through all the muck on the floor of the colon. Judging from what you see, the mix of solid waste and the remains of Raikou's scientific work could be likely to give you a nasty disease if you fall in it.

Even then, your blessings weren't perfect. The catwalk itself was so narrow Suicune and you had to go in a row. She had forced you once again to go ahead of her, but if she wanted to change places then you'd have to dangerously stand at the edge of the catwalk, unless you crouched on the floor and let her walk over you. And the smell was still a problem. Your eyes were slightly watering, and you wished you got used to it real soon.

-"Raikou really needs to do maintenance here"- you commented while you saw a part of the catwalk fall apart. You jumped over it -"I thought everything inside him was organic, I don't think all Pokemon have these structures in their colons"-

-"Of course they don't. Raikou always had this fascination with beings inside other beings' body. Have you heard about it?"-

-"No"- you wanted to make a conversation to distract your mind from the place you were in -"Tell me more"-

-"There's not much to tell, that's simply how he is. Some of the legendaries know about that trait of his and we don't think much about it. Giratina once tried to indulge him, out of curiosity. As Giratina is pretty big, they thought Raikou could get in and stay for a while"-

-"How did it go?"-

-"Arceus had to be called to dislodge Raikou out of Giratina's esophagus and get him out of the dragon's body-"Suicune laughed pleasantly -"Arceus was so stunned, and Giratina and Raikou so embarrassed, they all attempted to keep it as a secret, and now you know they weren't successful"-

You laughed too. It was amusing to hear about that, and you wished you had been there. Suicune continued -"Since then I think Raikou only has focused on his fantasies of hosting beings inside him. I had brought him with me inside Dialga because I thought he'd like it"-

You and Suicune continued talking in an effort to forget the challenge you were in, but after a curve you had to focus back on the problem you were in -"The path is blocked"-

Strangely, the path wasn't blocked with a wall of feces, as you would have expected from a place like this. It was half of a chestnut shell. It went from side to side of the colon, resting directly on the catwalk. It was impossible to climb it, as it had several tiny spikes protruding from its exterior, and not only that, it also had several longer spikes, getting dangerously close to the walls of the large intestine. You approached, bewildered -"...Now what?"-

-"Raikou! Chestnut shells aren't edible!"- Suicune shouted behind you, trying to get a reply

-"So you found it. The lining of those shells are made of a compound that revitalizes mind and body and is said to allow one to go beyond any limitations one previously had. Swallowing it despite the spikes is not easy"-

-"I'm not going to eat from anything I find here, if that's what you're insinuating. I want this to be moved aside"-

-"I can't do anything. You still have to continue ahead if you want to win"- and after that, Raikou didn't reply anymore.

-"I can't believe it. Simply wonderful"- she grumbled, looking hatefully at the chestnut shell.

-"I suppose we'll have to move it"- you proposed, carefully searching for a part without spikes of any size.

-"But to where? We can't move it to one side, and I'm not going to get onto the floor to walk through that!"- she pointed at the horrifying mess of waste that now seemed to be a few inches thick.

-"Then we only have the option to move it forward. Let's push from here"- you found a spot that wouldn't hurt you, and started pushing with all your strength. It barely moved, but when Suicune fired Ice Beams to the shell, the combined strength of both helped more -"Yeah! At this pace we can get this done"-

So you and Suicune continued pushing the chestnut shell forward. It was an exhausting task, and it didn't move as fast as both of you wished. The sooner you got out of the colon, the better. Moving it down another curve was something that took both of you around twenty minutes, because the shell always seemed to get stuck on the walls. There was also another obstacle, the thickening sludge that was Raikou's waste. It had now reached levels just barely under the catwalk and started to appear on it, difficulty the shell's movement. Besides you had to move to avoid stepping on it.

-"This is disgusting"- Suicune understated, after firing another Ice Beam -"I don't want to ever be in a place like this again"-

-"How could this have gotten in here, though?"- you said, pushing the chestnut shell -"This thing wouldn't have fit through the small intestine. Has Raikou had this lodged in here for a long time?"-

-"I'm tired, I am in Raikou's colon, I touched his waste, the smell is going to stay in my fur for weeks, I want to tear your jugular off and give Raikou a wallop he won't forget for the rest of his legendary life. I'm not in mood for conversations"- she growled. You judged more prudent to not to say another word for now. After a while, Suicune spoke again.

-"How long will we have to be pushing forward this thing?"-

-"I only see two options"- you replied -"Either until we find the path to the next task of this route, or until the end of the large intestine. Knowing the point of this route, I'd say they're both the same"-

-"Are you saying we'll get into Raikou's rectum?"- Suicune cringed -"What's next after this?"-

-"The bladder"-

-"Great, more bodily waste. Let's get this over with"-

-----

Raikou was laying on his belly, relaxing on the ground of the cave. He didn't need to check Suicune and the human's progress, he could easily feel it. It had been difficult and painful to bring the chestnut shell from the storage to his bowels, and now the spikes caused him some discomfort, but it served to pinpoint his guests' location. Right now they were around 4/5 done. He shifted uncomfortably when he felt the walls of his large intestine getting prickled again.

He hoped they'd finish soon. The sooner he got that chestnut shell out of his body, the better. For a moment he considered expelling it while Suicune and the human were with it, at the end of the road, as an added challenge for them. While he was thinking about doing it or not, Mew arrived

-"So here's where you are! Giratina managed to hold Dialga off, but he has realized you changed locations"-

-"Does he know we're here?"-

-"He doesn't know, but he'll find out at some point. You can't run forever. Dee-al-ga must continue his training too, if we want him to be able to fight back at least a little. I'll go in"- she localized the human before Raikou could stop her. She doubted for a moment -"Raikou, did you realize that they're in...well..."-

-"I know where they are. Don't worry about it, they're...training themselves"-

-"Alright. I'll return later, then"- and with that, Mew left without making any further comments. Raikou watched her leave, and once again felt the chestnut shell's spikes. He made his decision about what to do when they got to his rectum.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Trek down the Colon

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Raikou decided that it's probably the best not to expel his bowels while the human and Suicune are still present. Not only would it be a very mean joke, if Suicune's previous threats are anything, he could find himself with several broken fangs and her rump sitting on top of his face. Suicune would then...The Electric Pokemon shuddered at the intrusive and bizarre thoughts. Raikou's attention snapped back to the waves of stinging sensation of the chestnut moving closer to his rectum. Ow......Owwww.......OWW... It was getting more difficult to hold back his tears as the pain grew in intensity. Despite that, this actually good news because, if memory served him right, it was probably stuck in there for at least a week. He has a huge load to drop off once Suicune and the human are out of the way.

Note to self: Never directly eat chestnuts without cracking the shells lest you want to have an awful constipation. I hope Mew isn't too creeped out.
___
Down in the colon, Suicune and you pushed the chestnut down the remaining length of the intestine without talking much. The further down you went, the drier and smellier the path seemed to get. The lack of lubricants on the wall made pushing all the more difficult. Raikou's grunts echoed through the flesh; apparently, it wasn't too comfortable for him.

A grueling half hour later, you and Suicune finally pushed the chestnut shell to the rectum where a wall of wastes has already accumulated and solidified. It's an irregularly shaped chamber with dark pulsating walls. A pool of greenish water filled with more waste sits a few feet away from where you're standing. The chestnut floated upon its surface for a moment then slowly sank into the mess. Both you and Suicune lean against the sides, too exhausted to notice how dirty it was.

"Well, I guess that will solved Raikou's constipation."

"Don't feel sorry for him. It'll teach him some common sense which he seem to be deficient in," Suicune rolled her eyes.

"Well, it's sorta mean of you to put it that way. I would say that he's more of the curious kind who likes to take things slowly. But I'll admit, his acumen does need polishing," you said.

"Hey, I was the one doing all the work here and you call me mean?" Suicune grumbled.

"You mostly teased me and Raikou into doing things your way. If that's what you considered work, you obviously did a stellar job there."

"Whatever! You could say that he has the habit of over-dedicating himself to research. Say, I wonder if he ever gets any accolades for all this hard work he's been doing other than from Giratina."

"I've seen a bit of his work and was a willing subject of a little project of his. If he were a human scientist, there's no doubt that he would've gotten mountain loads of awards by now. I supposed he's got a lot of data to share with people."

"I don't think it's too wise to give him ideas about taking his works to humans. And I don't think people are prepared to attend a lecture by a Pokemon, at least not yet," Suicune said.

"The professor back at my hometown would've love to hear from Raikou. He's really into Legendary Pokemon studies and would be thrilled to hear information straight from the mouth of one. Raikou kinda reminds me of him," you smiled.

"In that case, at least he's got one guy who will listen to him. But he'll probably be bored out ten minutes in. Hahaha...," the Pokemon laughed haughtily.

You heard Suicune muttering something about how humans are a strange species as she walked around. There's something that's been lingering on your mind for some time. It was a question for Suicune. The Aurora Pokemon has been acting really funny around you lately. She really likes to stick with you a lot of the time and always find ways to tease you in a jocular manner. Coupled with that little burst of emotion back at the small intestine, you started wondering if the Pokemon is trying to get closer to you. You took a deep breath before firing off the question.

"Umm...Suicune, there's something I've been meaning to ask you."

"What is it, human?"

"Remember how you acted back there when we were escaping from that huge sludge? You suddenly went all emotional and stuff..."

"Curious about that little piece of my soft side, huh?"

"Yeah, kinda like that. Why did you suddenly act all emotional? It feels really out of place for your personality."

"That's....," her face softened briefly before hardening again, "...none of your business!"

"Well that's obviously not true. People or Pokemons don't just randomly display such strong emotions so openly. That happens when someone needs help or when a person has a cru...."

"Don't you dare finish that sentence, human. I know where you're going with that," Suicune interrupted with a stomp, "I'm not the romantic kind so forget it. Sheesh! As if it isn't enough that I'm stuck with two incompetent fools for friends."

"Sorry, Sui. Anything I could do to make you like feel better, Suicune and perhaps, get you to like me more" you offered with a smile.

"Well, shutting up and focus at our current problems would be a good start. Wait! What did you just call me? Sui! That's the most awful nickname since Dialga called me his 'little darling princess'."

"But it sounds nice," you answered with fake enthusiasm, "But that still doesn't change the fact that you're feeling something in there."

"What? It's not like I like......oh great, the horrors of Dialga's date sims assaults my brain again. I've got tons of romance dialog crammed in my head with no end to it. Those still give me the cringe," Suicune said with a disgusted expression.

"Hahaha...you look kinda cute when you do that."

"Don't you ever use that word in front of me. I'm cooler than you or Raikou will ever be," Suicune glared at you, a deep blush forming on her face.

"Heh. So it back to tomboy mode again? Alright then, Sui. Lead the way," you chuckled.

"Stop. Calling. Me. By. That. NAME!" Suicune gnarled her teeth.

You ignored Suicune and continued onward. The Pokemon started screaming something about making you her personal servant for a year if you keep up with your crack. Despite her threats, one thing is certain: Suicune has somehow developed feelings for you but still refused to acknowledge it. Come to think of it, you've also kinda grown to like her type of personality despite how she acted toward you. I'll just play cool for the time. I need to see what she's up to.

After feeling that you have rested enough, you found another pipe-like tunnel in the rectum for you to walk on. In contrast with the colon, the walls here are mostly clean and pink. A few steps into the tunnel, a strong scent of ammonia assaulted your nostrils. It's the kind of awful smell that you'd encounter at the Pokemon park or a poorly cleaned restroom.

"Damn! The smell of a male's piss... Yup! We're going in the right direction." Suicune said nonchalantly.

A few minutes down the path, you began seeing trickles of urine seeped out from the walls and floor, merging into a widening river that flows increasingly fast. There weren't any traction for you feet or hand to get hold of.

"Ah!" Suicune yelped.

You turned back just in time to see her lose her footing and send her slipping right into you, knocking you off your feet. Both you and Suicune became entangled to one another as the current of urine carried you down. Even with your head in an awkward position near her rear, you felt Suicune grasping you firmly with her paws. Likewise, you secured your arm around her body. Without any frictions, the tunnel became a slide bringing you unceremoniously into the bladder.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: He decided to not to do it while they were there

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
It didn't take long before the slide ended and you plummeted into the air. You soared though the air for a second before plunging into what at first glance seemed like a sea of liquid. You closed your eyes instinctively, knowing where you had just fallen. Once you resurface, you observed your surroundings.

It definitely was the bladder. It was much bigger than you thought it'd be. From what you could see, you supposed it was a bit more than half full, so there was still a good amount of dry terrain. Along the walls there was a spiral of flesh that ended in the top of the bladder, you suppose it led to some sort of exit. Suicune had already swam to the dry terrain, and was shaking off the urine.

You swam the best you could, struggling to keep your head above the surface. You're not the best swimmer, since you relied on your Pokémon to take you through the water in your journeys. In moments like this you wished you had made an effort to learn to swim.

Once you get to the dry terrain you approach Suicune. She was staring at a button on the wall, just like the one you had seen in the large intestine. -"How many kidneys does Raikou have?"- you asked aloud, looking at the four holes you could see. Maybe under the surface there were more.

-"How do you expect me to know? I suppose there are two, and the rest are from other parts of his body. Who cares?"- she said, pressing the button. Raikou's voice emerged from the communicator.

-"Welcome to the second phase. You have done a good job so far. This is simpler than the first part, and shouldn't take you so long"-

-"Say it quickly"- she ordered impatiently.

-"Alright. In the bladder you should find four transparent spheres. It's simple: retrieve them all"-

-"That is it? Doesn't seem difficult"- you commented. Suicune glared at you, as if now Raikou was going to add more difficulty to the task.

-"That is it. The sooner you finish, the better. Don't take more than an hour and half, I think." And with that, the transmission stopped.

-"An hour and half? That's more than enough. We'll be done in less than half an hour"- Suicune said smugly.

-"Why do we have a time limit now?"- you wondered.

Suicune walked to the edge of the terrain and peered into the urine. -"Isn't it obvious? If this place gets filled then we'll have to stop and leave. Surely when it's emptied the spheres will be expelled too, meaning we lose. Let's get this over with. How long can you hold your breath?"-

-"A minute or so"- Suicune's expression showed it was an unacceptable answer.

-"So you'll be useless. I'll have to do this by myself"- she grumbled, slowly getting into the liquid. You watched her swim to the center of the bladder, then she dived and you couldn't see her anymore.

You sat and waited for around ten minutes before being bored. Suicune hadn't resurfaced yet, so there was nothing for you to do other than looking at the streams of urine that fell from the holes. You grew antsy with each second. There must be something you could do. Raikou didn't say all of them were submerged, did he? Maybe there were a couple in the dry terrain. It was worth checking. You stood up and started walking, roaming around the bladder. After a while you had to accept there weren't any spheres in there.

Annoyed, you looked around quickly. There was a hole near you. You decided to check in it to see if there could be any hidden in there.It'd be kind of clever of Raikou to do that, Suicune wouldn't think of checking there!

You climbed on the hole, fighting the stream of urine that threatened to push you back outside. You ascended, grasping the walls the best you could and trying to keep the liquid from entering your eyes. It was bad enough to be doing that, you didn't need to be blinded too. In your ascent you saw something shine among the stream. It was a clear sphere of the size of your fist. It was lodged into the flesh, but you thought you could get it out. It would mean you'd be in risk of being pulled by the current, but there was no other option.

-"What are you doing up there?"- you heard Suicune calling you. She must have realized you weren't around, so she searched for you until this moment. You avoided speaking and focused on the sphere. In a bout of bravery, you let go the wall and grasped with both hands the sphere and pulled. The sphere and you got thrown back into the bladder, again falling into the urine. You held onto the sphere to ensure it didn't sink, and floated to the surface.

Suicune swam to you and saw what you were holding. -"So that's where it was. I already found the other three"- she said, dragging you to the edge of the dry terrain. There were another three spheres identical to the one you were holding. You put the fourth with the other ones and walked to the communicator.

-"We're done here. We found them"- you stated.

-"Good. Well done, and it really was quick. It was just twenty minutes!"-

Suicune scoffed. -"You understimate my eyesight underwater. It was horribly gross"-

-"Let's continue, then. In the bottom of the bladder, way under the surface, you should see a sphincter. That'll be the route to the third stop. Remember to use the communicator when you get there"- Raikou said.

Suicune once again got ready to dive into the urine. -"What's next?"- she asked, resigned to continue.

-"Um...we're now going into the testicles. I suppose the sphincter down there leads to the urethra, and we'll find the path to the testicles from there"-

Suicune laughed softly. -"So Raikou is sending me to such a sensitive part of his body? Does that sound smart to you?"- You had to agree that it wasn't very smart. Once again, common sense wasn't Raikou's strong point -"Hold onto me. I'll dive as fast as I can to the exit. Take a very deep breath"-

You held onto Suicune while she slowly swam into the urine. Once you told her you were ready, you took a deep breath and were led under the surface.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: A Swim in the Bladder

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Suicune took you to a deeper area into pool of urine, searching for the sphincter that will lead to the testicles. Though your vision is blurred by the yellow hue of the urine and slight stinging in your eyes, you could still roughly make out the pinkish bottom of the bladder. Suicune stopped and scanned her environment before swimming deeper. You eventually made out the darker shade of an opening several feet ahead and notified Suicune by tapping her back. The Pokemon looked back at you and saw you motioning toward the sphincter. She gave a quick nod and paddled faster, aware that you might exhaust your breath in a short time.

Upon reaching the sphincter, it intuitively opened up. The Pokemon swam through the opening before it closed up again. She turned back to check on you and immediately widened her eyes. You face doesn't look right and your body is flailing slightly. Suicune dramatically increased her speed when she realized that your face is turning pale from the lack of oxygen. You felt every muscle in her body moving to transport you as quick as possible to the end of the tunnel, the urine around you rushing by at a breakneck speed. You paid no attention to your surrounding; you focused all your energy on conserving the little oxygen remaining in your lungs. Oh no! you thought as you started seeing stars and flashes at the edge of your vision. Suicune. you can do....it.

Suicune did her best to swim as fast as she could. Darn it, I can't get any faster with all the extra weight the human has placed on me. Her lungs could hold far more oxygen that a human could do but even that is running short. She felt her muscles straining and aching. The pain briefly prompted the thought of giving up and just let it be over but Suicune banished it as quickly as it arrived with her will. After another minute of swimming, the Pokemon saw bright lights ahead of her, indicating the end of the tunnel. With a last dash of her energy, Suicune forced herself to swim forward toward the light. Come on, human. Hang on there. I'm not going to let you die like this. I'm not going to give in either. how the heck will I tease Raikou or pull my ultimate prank on Dialga if I end judt like this.

Just when you feel you're about to black out, a loud splash thundered as you felt yourself being thrown in midair and landing on soft flesh with a thud. You instinctively gasped deeply at the presence of fresh air in the environ. You've never felt so much relief at the presence of oxygen; the emotion bordered on euphoria. There was another person panting even more loudly right beside you.

"*pant* How's that.....for a......quick swim, huh human?" the voice said with a heavy strain.

You looked toward your right to find Suicune lying on her back with her legs curled up and her chest rising and falling. Her furs are all matted and disheveled; even her eyes looked a little bloodshot.

"You...... made it, Suicune. Thank goodness...... I thought I was a goner," you tried to say while panting.

"Hahahaha," she laughed raspily, "I'm not much better now.....heck, I'm so gonna tell Raikou....to make some body "modifications" after he pulled this schtick....."

"I think...I agree with you on that one, Sui. Raikou kinda overdid this one."

"Argh......you won't.....stop using that nickname, will you?"

"No plans for that...."

Suicune gave you a look that sends shivers down your spine.

"I'll keep note of that, human.....Anyway, we've gotten to Raikou's....testicles...."

You and Suicune took a full five minutes to regain your breath and energy. Sure enough, the walls in this area looks flabby and loose in an almost cloth-like fashion. A couple feet from you is another communicator device affixed to a thick vein. Beyond that, you saw a pair of humongous ovoid structures hanging loosely from the ceiling. They are held in place by thin veins that crawls up from the floor in a fashion similar to stalagmites and a thick tube that interconnects the two testicles before disappearing into the ceiling. By estimate alone, each of those balls are at least 10 times your size, perhaps large enough contain a full-sized Pokemon stadium. Because Raikou was resting in the cave, it caused the light purple balls to skew slightly to the right. Everything looks anatomically right save for the electric arcs can be seen passing between the two structures which can be entered through small openings that can be reached by walking on of the veins.

When you've seen enough of the new location, you headed over to the communicator.

"Hey Raikou, we're here," you announced to the device.

"Awesome! Welcome to the place where all life begins. I was wondering what's taking you two so long," Raikou's voice cracked from the speaker.

Suicune perked her ears up at the voice and marched up to the device.

"I'll tell you why!!! You made us take that long winding urine-filled tunnel. We almost drowned there and you're not even aware of it?!" Suicune barked.

"Ah... Don't be mad, it was all part of the test. I thought you're good enough for that. Am I sensing that you've reached your limits?" Raikou said apologetically yet with a sarcastic jab.

"No! Let me be clear with you: Because of you, we are now covered in smelly urine, exhausted, and feeling a bit nauseous. Plus, I have absolutely no intention of dying in you dick. Let me just remind you where we are now, what I am capable of and the precious warnings I gave you," the Pokemon said in a dangerously low tone.

"Alright man...I'm sorry...I probably didn't thought that out well enough.... Easy there, Suicune. Don't do anything rash now," Raikou said sheepishly.

"Too late for that!" Suicune smirked and fired off an ice beam toward one of the testicles hitting it spot on. The effects of the blast made the entire chamber jerk violently.

"Yeeeeouch!!!" Raikou screeched, "You really did it! You froze my testicles!!! By Arceus, how could you do this to me? There goes my children and mates! Nononononononono......Now, how am I supposed to explain this to my friends and parents?"

"Oh quit the melodrama, will ya? I merely chilled the surface a bit," Suicune said jocularly.

"What?" Raikou quickly stopped his wailing and rubbed his scrotum as if to warm it up. He realized that it's still in one piece and functioning, albeit a little shook up.

"Hahahahaha...I've never seen you squeal like that. Priceless!"

"You're the worst, Suicune" the Electric Pokemon fired off.

"Thanks for the compliment. On your next offense, it'll be popsicles for real," Suicune scoffed, "So what should we do here, Raikou?!"

"Simple, you get to visit the interior of my precious jewels. One contains the "Sperm Bank" while the other is the home of the "Fantasy Fulfillment Resort."

"What in the world are those?" you asked.

"The Sperm Bank is a collection of my seeds in various stages of developments kept for research and further enhance of my offspring. You can think of it as a production and research center for any for my potential mates. Pokemon genetics is a really fascinating thing and you two are in luck. I have several successful results to show you. Plus, I'm currently undergoing a radical experiment in there that might require some cooperation from the human. If you want to, you can also interact and play with the specimens I have."

You glanced momentarily at Suicune when you heard what Raikou said.

"Okay...that sounds interesting enough," Suicune remarked, "What about that resort?"

"The Fantasy Fulfillment Resort is the place for you to relax and fulfill anything you want. There are many amenities offered there. I have some nice stuffs for you inside as a reward for making it this far into the challenge."

"Uh-huh...I'm a little skeptical of that, Raikou. How are we supposed to relax here?" she said.

"You'll find out soon enough. So what will it be?"
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Journeying into the Third Stop

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
What followed was a very strange experience. As you had gone through a near-drowning to get there, you expected whatever you found to be good, so you decided to check Raikou's work. You notify Raikou it, and are told to follow a path that ascended towards one of the testicles. You entered and was instantly blasted by the atmosphere. It was warmer than the rest of the body, and you supposed it had something to do with the function it supposedly had.

-"Let's get done with this as soon as possible. I don't want to be here for too long"- Suicune growled.

-"Who knows, it could prove to be interesting. Let's take a look"- you said, although part of you agreed that spending unnecessary time in there wasn't something you wanted to do.

The place was smaller than you had thought it'd be. What you found was a staircase that descended deeper into the testicle, until you entered a room that held a strange assortment of machines. You couldn't guess their function, but those wouldn't look out of place inside Dialga. -"What are those?"-

-"Those machines practically control my own genes, and help to simulate the results. I also have gathered different genetic codes from different species I have met during my life"-

-"I'm not one of them, right?"- Suicune was getting tense.

-"Of course not. I wouldn't dare. Everybody who has given me their genes have done it voluntarily. Would you like to cooperate?"-

-"I won't"- that was Suicune's answer. Raikou wasn't fazed by the negative answer.

-"What about you, human? Would you like to help?"-

-"Um"- you weren't going to get into a mess without knowing exactly what it was -"What would I have to do?"-

-"I'll need a sample of your genes. It'll allow me to analyze what your species is made of, then I'll start combining it with my own to determine how viable it would be to form offspring with a human"-

-"Would you really do that?"-

-"Honestly I wouldn't. It's mere curiosity. I promise that the results wouldn't even get out of the room I'll assign it, and it'll be completely stable, not a deformity. It's just an experiment"-

You sighed. The concept of the experiment had some interest to you too, you wondered what its results could be, but you still didn't know what it entailed for you -"Okay, what will I have to do?"-

-"A sample of your blood should be enough. Approach the machine closest to you and I'll do the rest"- you nervously obeyed. As soon as you got close to the machine, a mechanical arm emerged from the top, carrying what looked like a needle and a small capsule. You took a deep breath, getting ready. You barely felt when the needle got in contact with you, drawing the needed sample. The capsule returned to the machine, a buzz filled the room. You rubbed the sore spot, and looked around, as if the results were going to appear instantly.

-"It'll take a while until the specimen is produced. Meanwhile, why don't you take a look at the specimens I have tried already? You'll be amazed, I promise. Just go downstairs if you want to take a look"-

You guess that you may as well go. After all, part of you has gone through the same process, so now you could check what Raikou has done in the past. It could help to prepare yourself to what the end result would be.
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Sperm Bank

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Viewing the results of experiments that Raikou had done before is a very enticing thing. The prospects of seeing 'hybrids' of Pokemons might seems a little unsettling at first but it also greatly piqued your curiosity. There is that strange part of you that want to see the specimens no matter how bizarre they might be. What are the chances you are gonna see a Raikou–(insert Pokemon name) combination in real life?

"Hey! You wanna see the specimens, human? Or are you just gonna stand there and zone out?" Suicune suddenly asked cockily.

"Sorry, Suicune. Guess I was a little shocked about Raikou's experiment. Let's get going," you said.

"Don't get your expectations up high, human. I bet half of those crossbreeding experiments resulted in something pretty weird. Be prepared for "Raikou's Spectacular Freak Show!"

"Hey! You better take that back! My experiments are not freak shows" Raikou fired back, "I've dedicated a large portion of my time for such research and I am confident that the results are worth showing."

"Are you sure, Raikou? I do recall you telling me that a particular genetic experiment between Mew and you ended rather badly. You kinda traumatized her with that creation, remember?"

"That was years ago and that's just one mishap. Do you know that I had to apologize to Mew for nearly two weeks before she's willing to shrug that off?" Raikou said, "Since then, I have discovered some of the secrets of Pokemon genes and the process which a life form came to be. If you had gave me a sample of your genes, I could have created something that would 'wow' you."

"Combining traits of a ditzy egghead and the dominant leader. That's a big no-no in my book. What in Arceus' name were you thinking? I knew you long enough to know where you're taking this; you'll make me your personal Rattata for whatever reproductive studies you're doing. Gee, wonder what the offspring would look like?" Suicune jabbed.

"It'll be just fine. After that failure, I haven't created any abnormality; just new prototypical creatures. As a researcher and scientist, I assure you that it has a 99% chance of success. We might even be on the verge of creating a new Legendary that's exceed us both in strength and stamina. With that said, have you ever plan on starting a family, Suicune? If you just give me a single strand of your mane, I can show you a..."

"No.....just no..." Suicune interrupted, "You are crossing a very dangerous line here. I don't plan on doing that just yet. And if you recalled where I am now, you really wouldn't want me to deprive you of that same joy, would we?"

"You aren't gonna do any better without my help and you just won't admit it. It isn't like your assertiveness is the real reason you never found a mate," the Electric Pokemon rolled his eyes, "You know, Suicune. You really get on my nerves sometimes."

"That feeling is mutual," Suicune smirked, "Anyway, you better have something worth my attention down there. Or you may just find a pissed off Suicune to deal with in your testicle, ready to render your punishments."

"Oh, man...Can't we just focus on something other that my balls every time we have an argument? It's getting really old..." he sighed.

"That'll depend on how worthwhile your exhibits are, dearie," Suicune chirped.

After the two Pokemons finished their jabs, Suicune marched toward the stair with an annoyed look.

"Come on now, human. No use in standing there," she said.
________

The stairs toward the lower level is narrower and steeper than the first one you and Suicune descended. The lower level looks similar in size to the first one. As with the upper level, a huge array of machinery is neatly organized into stations The difference is that numerous glass windows are built into the testicle walls and standalone cases occupied the floor. In each of the display, you could make out something moving within but you're still too far away to really discern them. Whatever in those displays are definitely alive.

"I still can't believe you let Raikou get a sample of your blood. Who knows what he'd create out of that?" Suicune whispered.

"I just wanna give Raikou a little help with his research. What harm is there to that? It won't get out of this place anyhow."

"The thought of him doing some crazy experiments with your genes just doesn't sit well with me," she said.

"Well, you can blame that on his never ending curiosity. Let's just humor him for a while, Suicune, " you grinned.

"Huh...But aren't you gonna make his bookworm mode even worse?"

"And that's the fun part of it!"

"Here we go...why am I sticking with these two again?"

You led Suicune toward one of the display cases that house a medium-sized bird Pokemon with Raikou's body color. Two little fangs protrude out of it's orange beak and black stripes streaked through the plumage. The Pokemon is perched on a metal bar while it preened its wings which has claws on them. When you two approached the specimen, the creature turned and looked at you with a pair of violet eyes and fluttered it's wings which generated a mini thunder storm. A plaque affixed to the display showed that it's result of a hybrid between Raikou and Zapdos.

"Wow!"

"Pffft! That's nothing really special, human."

As you moved on to the next display case, you saw something that looks like a golden sword shaped into a lightning with black details around the edge. A circular and motionless eye is located at the center of the cross guard. Upon seeing you, the thing hovered closer to Suicune while emitting an indescribable yet melodic ringing. The sounds reminds you of a glass harp and the celestial space; it was a beautiful being. This time the plaque explained that it's a Raikou–Unown hybrid.

"I wonder how Entei is gonna react if he sees this," Suicune said grinning.

"Hopefully more amused than upset," you added as you moved on.

"I hope for the latter sometimes. I do wanna see if his flame really burns up everything," she said absentmindedly, "But this does look a little more interesting than the last one."

Another display contains a golden-colored Mew with ruby red eyes with a electrical plug for a tail. The Mew dashed around excitedly at the sight of you and Suicune. It seems that even the personality of the original donor can be replicated here. The specimen reminded you that real Mew is supposed to train you soon for your duty as the human in their legend and the upcoming fight with Dialga. You wonder where that sorry excuse of a Pokemon is doing now. At this point, you just wished that Dialga would just give up the chase and head home to whatever dimension he came from; you were having so much fun in Raikou that you almost forgot about him. Hope that Dialga would postpone his plan a little longer.

You and Suicune viewed a few more specimens: a Porygon in the shape of a Raikou origami, a Diglett covered in electrical spikes, a Skitty that looks like a miniature version of the Electric Pokemon and many more other you can't really tell where they came from.

"I never thought that such genetic experiments are possible, but you Pokemons sure proved me wrong."

"As long as your happy with these little parlor tricks, I'm good," Suicune smiled, "I'll admit, these are somewhat interesting for my taste."

"Nice to hear that," you said, "I'm getting curious as to what my specimen would look like."

"Awesome only by Raikou's standard, but probably still decent enough to be acceptable by mine," Suicune said.

"Awwwwww...what's that? You just can't admit that Raikou trumped you in at least one area. Heh Heh," you teased.

"Hmmmph...," Suicune huffed and glared at you, "You are so gonna get it."

A few more minutes of random chats and teasing later...

"Alright, you're specimen has been successfully created. It's one of the most awesome creation I've seen. You gotta take a look at it."
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: Raikou's Specimen

choices: You decide to go back to your bedroom
You decide to go with her
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
Suicune and you continued the path, passing in front of empty exhibits. Apparently the new creations were done in the lowest floor, so when you found a staircase descending into the darkness you followed it.

There was barely illumination, you could only fuzzily distinguish the edges of the objects. -"Can you see anything, Suicune?"- you asked, supposing her eyes were better fit to see into the almost non-existent illumination.

-"Follow me"- you heard her say. She wrapped one of her tails around your arm and pulled you through the floor, until you reached a marble platform. Suddenly a light shone from the ceiling, making the platform glow.

-"I'll now present you the result of the most recent experiment!"- Raikou said with enthusiasm. You waited expectantly until you heard soft steps from somewhere in the room you were in. Soon a figure entered the platform, allowing you to see the experiment.

It was a naked blond man. He was more human than Pokémon but he didn't look like he was related to you, and there were several traits that indicated there was something strange and unnatural about him. Slender and elongated yet oddly fit, you were half-expecting to see him crouch and jump from the other side of the room towards you. He looked perfectly capable to do that. Speechless, you stepped back. -"Uh, he's impressive"-

-"He is!"- Raikou replied -"I'm proud of this creation. A shame he can't be real in the sense of him existing out there"-

The experiment approached to you. -"Hi there"- you say nervously. The experiment didn't reply, he only examined you intensely.

-"He can't talk. Maybe in the future, but right now he only has the most basic survival instincts"-

-"At least it isn't a freak like the rest"- Suicune muttered.

-"I already said they're not freaks! But this time I achieved a very stable specimen. All the practice I had pays off now"-

-"What will you do with him?"- you asked. In a sense this was your offspring, you felt oddly protective of him. You approached, extending your hand to touch him. He recoiled away from you, snarling. It was possible that with some time he'd show more feral behaviors, but so far it wasn't that bad.

-"I'll let him live in an exhibition and I'll teach him to enhance his human capacities. Right now mentally he's more like an animal than a human. Maybe after a while, when Suicune and you aren't inside my anymore, he'll be my companion. He can help me so much with my work from inside myself..."-

Raikou started murmuring the possibilities the specimen had as an assistant, while Suicune and you left. The specimen had gone back into the shadows, you just hoped he'd at least be comfortable. Suicune was pensive, possibly impressed by what she had seen.

-"I had never realized how serious Raikou is about his experiments. I always took him as an eccentric nerd but there is...passion, after all"-

-"I thought it had been obvious from the beginning"- you replied

-"In hindsight it was. I simply didn't take him seriously"-

Suicune and you returned to the main floor, where you could see the entrance to the testicle. -"So now what?"-

-"Well this was the last stop from your challenges. You were supposed to let myself take a sample of your genes to create a speciment of you but you didn't comply, Suicune. You lost"- Raikou stated.

-"What?!"- Suicune was furious. After what they had gone through that day, to inadvertently lose like that...it was unfair. Suicune looked as if she was going to unleash her fury on everything around her.

-"But since the human helped me to create what may be my most valuable experiment...I may count it as your win"-

-"You will? What about the reward?"-

-"That's up to you to take it. You may go into the other testicle and indulge yourself in your fantasies, if you want. You earned it"-

-"It's not much but I'm not going to reject a reward"- Suicune said, walking towards a passage -"What about you, human?"- The truth is that you didn't feel fully comfortable with letting Suicune and Raikou know about your innermost fantasies. You hurriedly made an excuse.

-"Uh, being inside another living being was my fantasy, and I'm in it right now. I don't need to do anything else"-

-"Are you sure? I'll be going, then. See you later"- and she entered the passage. You watched her leave, still indecisive if you should go with her. After all, you ent through the same things than her. The reward was technically yours too.

Did you decide to accompany her?
1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.title: The Humanoid Raikou

1451111111111111111111111111111111211111.content:
You watched as Suicune walked further away from you, leaving you behind to contemplate your choices. In the meantime, the Pokemon started up the set of gelatinous stairs that lead to the entrance of the Fantasy Resort. Upon reaching the landing, Suicune grinned and winked at you and beckoned with her long, wispy tail as if daring you to follow her. That little mischievous display obviously meant to goad you into making a decision. The choices are clear here: you could either head back to your bedroom and spend the night alone or you could take some risk and enter the resort with Suicune, facing whatever that may be inside.

The Pokemon was deliberately teasing me to go with her. Is she trying to catch a glimpse of my personal fantasies? But she already knew about my thing for endo-exploration. That leaves...oh my... she wants me to see hers. Well, maybe I should stick with my old bedroom and let the girl enjoy whatever devious dreams she might have.
