1542222222222.title: Perhaps a Gardevoir?

15422222222221.content:
"w-wha?" you groan as your head feels as if it's on the verge of exploding. With a low grunt you massage your temples with eyes clenched close hoping to ease the pain. "what happened?" you mutter to yourself as you slowly attempt to open your eyes only to have the sun momentarily blind your vision. After a second attempt you soon find yourself gazing upwards at the clear blue sky looming high above. "h-huh!?" you mutter in complete confusion as you get up in a sitting position. Just how on earth did you make it outside of all places? The last you remembered you were fast asleep at home on your comfy bed.

"Are you feeling well?" a soft female voice with a hint of English accent asks out of nowhere. Immediately, you jolt up and turn your head about in an attempt to find the speaker. Just who was it that was with you?

"Behind you." The voice spoke once again. Taking her advice you quickly turn your body around only to gaze upon a completely shocking if not magnificent sight. Looming before you was what could only be classified as a Gardevoir, a ginormous one at that. Her green like hair adorned the top of her head as her crimson eyes were glued down upon your tiny form in a rather calm gaze. Unlike normal pokemon however, she carried a much more human like appearance, as hinted by the rather feminine figure and chest. "are you unharmed?" she asks in a soft tone as her head gently tilts to the right.

Your mouth was sent agape by the sight of the ginormous pokemon, but not wanting to seem rude you try your best to regain a rather calm composure. "I-I-i'm fine." you reply while clearing your throat.

"that is a relief to here." she says giving a long sigh as her right hand moves slightly below her neck. You were more confused than shocked by her reply overall. Just why would some strange pokemon, especially one that towers dozens of stories above, you be so concerned about your well being?

"err...no offense Mrs...?" now that you think about it, you really didn't know what her name was.

"You may simply call me Gardevoir." she says before slowly getting up and giving a curtsy with her dress. As she does this, a blush and rather confused expression draws upon your face. Well it certainly does seem like she is eloquent both in speech and attitude.

"Pleased to meet you Gardevoir." you reply unsure of just how to present yourself to the gargantuan pokemon.

"the pleasure is all mine." she says before ceasing her curtsy and returning to her kneeling position. "It seems you are generally curious as to how you ended up this size, but more importantly...why I was watching you." she replies as your eyes widen in surprise by her words.

"h-how did you know-"

"I have very keen psychic abilities." She replies as a warm smile begins to form upon her face. "and to answer the question about why I was watching over you. Well...I just felt inclined to." she replies as a small shade of red began to appear on where her cheeks.

"Inclined?" you say as your brow raises slightly in confusion. "you mean, you just felt like you needed to watch over me?"

Slowly she nods her head. "In open fields like this, there are plenty of dangers about." She states. "other pokemon can be wandering about, some that could easily trample or harm you." News of this easily send a nervous shudder running up your spine. She was absolutely, one hundred percent correct. If she wasn't here for you then there was no telling just how much longer you would have lasted all alone.

"Thank you Gardevoir." you say with complete honesty. "If you weren't here, well...I don't know what would happen to me."

"Not a problem little one." she replies giving a small giggle to follow. Her smile soon began to fade away though as her warm gaze turns into something of slight worry. "But...I'm afraid you being all by yourself would only put yourself in more danger." she says whole heartedly.

"well...you do have a point...but...what do you suggest?" you ask curiously as a blush began to form on Gardevoir's face by the question. awkwardly, she raises her hands on her knees as she began to twiddle her thumbs back and forth.

"w-well..." she stammers. "y-y-you're more than welcome to stay with me." she says as her eyes avert to the side.

"Really?" you blush slightly from the request as your head simply nods in response. It did seem like the safest choice overall. "alright then." you reply. "so...are you going to carry me the whole time, I mean I don't want to be a burden or anything?"

Gardevoir nods her head in response to your question. "oh! but of course."

"well then, how are you going to carry me?" you ask curiously. "hands? shoulder?....top of head?" you reply as your fingers gestured to each mentioned area. Gardevoir's eyes gaze down upon your form as her blush only seemed to grow deeper.

"n-not exactly." she says only to confuse you by the answer.

"huh? what do you mean?" you ask.

"well...I-if I was to carry you by say my hand or head, there could be a high chance that you will get injured if I encountered another vicious pokemon." she replies.

"Then...what do you suggest?" you ask curiously as her blush was now a deep shade of red.

"w-well...rather than outside...h-h-how about..." she stammers as her shoulders began to hunch up slightly. "..the inside?"

"Inside?" you repeat only to finally get what she was saying. "w-wait! y-you want me to go in your body!?" You couldn't believe it. was she planning on eating you alive!?

"p-please don't worry!" she pleads extending her hand out slightly in hopes of calming your nerves. "I promise you will be safe inside me!" she says soon getting down on her knees and hands to have her huge head loom right above you. "With my psychic abilities, I insure that you'll be unharmed so please....trust me." she asks in a pleading tone, almost as if she was begging you to let her do this.

As confusing and awkward as this request was, you were reluctant to agree with her words. On the other hand though, she was the one who insured you were safe while lying unconscious. After weighing down the choices, as well as feeling a twinge of guilt by her expression, you soon nod your head. "a-alright then." you reply.

Immediately, a great smile forms on Gardevoir's face as she nods her head. "thank you." Within seconds, she soon stands up giving you a chance to gaze up at her full form in awe. "now then...how will you enter?" she asks while still gazing at your tiny form.

"e-enter?" you repeat confused by her question.
15422222222221.title: Yes, yes, YES!

154222222222211.content:
"Well, it's pretty simple." Gardevoir responds, pointing towards herself. "I have four potential, er, 'entrances' for you, two on top and two on the bottom."

"W-which ones?"

"Let's see..." She pauses briefly. "At my top, you could enter through my mouth... Don't worry! No chewing! I'd swallow you whole! Promise!" She added urgently, noting your added worry. "And if that still seems unappetizing (she giggled at her accidental joke), I could always let you enter through one of my nipples." She lifted up the green top of her dress a bit, making you wish you could see down it.

"And the bottom?"

"For that, first you'd get a peek under my dress." She flapped it a bit, causing you to blush again. "Second, you would have to choose between my petite butt cheeks, or my lovely vagina." You felt yourself blush more at that last option.

"So then, my little human," she says somewhat concerned as she leans down towards you, "How would you like to... enter me?"

15422222222221111.content:
Seeing as how entering her body through the other supposed...'entryways' seemed rather undignified, you ultimately decide to go in through the normal route. "w-well...how about we keep it safe and you simply swallow me?" you ask Gardevoir in an embarrassed and clearly nervous tone.

Above Gardevoir simply lets out a small giggle, though whether or not it was derived from your answer or the way you replied was questionable. "no need to act so bashful human." she replies in a calming tone before gently kneeling down onto her knees mere yards before you. Even in a knelt position, you couldn't help but gaze up in awe at Gardevoir's massive form. While she was the equivalent of a sky-scraping tower at full height, even knelt down her height was comparable to that of a multi-storied building. As you gaze upwards at the huge shadow cast over you, you see a amiable smile quickly forming upon the pokemon's gargantuan face. "Are you prepared to enter me little one?"

The question did seem nerve wracking upon first hearing it, but after heeding her words earlier you slowly begin to nod your head in reply. "r-right." you speak in a loud enough voice for her to hear you. "but...just how exactly am I going to...well go in through your mouth?" you curiously question her. As if in reply, Gardevoir lets out a small chuckle before you suddenly find your form being raised upwards from the ground. Immediately, you turn to investigate the cause of your ascension, only to discover Gardevoir's immense green fingers plucking you from the back of your shirt. In only a matter of seconds, you soon find your miniscule form before the presence of her vast face. "w-well...I guess this will do." you announce as if answering your question from earlier.

For a brief moment Gardevoir does nothing more but stare at your body with her crimson eyes. After what seemed like a half a minute, she finally spoke. "I can sense you are nervous about this." She states as your body gave a small shudder by the accusation. While you were indeed a bit edgy about the upcoming event, you honestly hoped she wouldn't sense it so quickly.

"w-well...I'm a little jumpy." you admit wholeheartedly. "To be honest though...this whole thing is kind of like...well, an amusement park ride." you reply finding the whole situation easily comparable to an attraction at a theme park back on earth.

"An...amusement park ride?" Gardevoir repeats your statement with a confused expression overtaking her face.

"Y-yeah." You reply once again. "whenever there's some huge attraction...especially one that looks terrifying, people will normally have a huge nervous reaction when waiting to go in. Though usually that nervousness quickly dies down once they actually get on the ride." You proclaim while still gazing at her huge red orbs.

Gardevoir continued to stare at you still quite bewildered by the explanation before finally breaking out in a fit of giggles. "I see." she says with an acknowledging nod. "so you're afraid of entering me because of my daunting appearance?" She asks with a slightly cocked head.

"W-what!? n-no!" You quickly retort while shaking your head side to side. "what I mean to say is-" Before even finishing your explanation, Gardevoir's giggles soon turn into a fit of laughter, as if she was planning out the whole reaction outcome of this conversation.

"Just a joke Little one." she says while gently covering her mouth daintily with her free hand. A shade of red began to fill your face as you too couldn't help but chuckle at her successful ploy. Once the small outburst concluded, Gardevoir soon begins to slowly raise you closer to her face. "Are you prepared to enter me?" she asks once again to which you reply with a simple nod. Acknowledging the answer, Gardevoir soon began to open her mouth only to reveal the pink cavern that resided within. "H-hello? Wake up! Wake up!"

Urgh... It's not every day you awaken to the soft voice of a lady, nor with such a splitting headache. You slowly rouse yourself from slumber, even as your whole body aches and tells you otherwise-

However, once your eyes open, you find yourself adrenaline-awoken by what laid before you. The only thing coming out of your mouth was a steady string of "OhCrudOhCrudOhCrud"s, as you tried to back away from the humoungous Tyrunt that stood before you.

Slowly, you calmed yourself down and tried to make sense of all this. "Wait... Wait... So... I was saved... By a giant... female... Tyrunt?" you asked, hyperventilating.

"W-well, actually, just a normal-sized, female Tyrunt," she replied. At your newfound look of shock, she added "Um... I guess you aren't normally that size, huh?"

"No!" You shout, beginning to pace, "I don't get it! I was perfectly fine last night! Nothing weird that I can think of! And yet somehow, I've gotten stranded in the forest, at the size of a mouse, in front of a dinosaur pokemon, and-"

"Whoa, whoa, whoa, calm down, please!" Tyrunt pleaded, holding out her tiny arms. "L-look, how about I take you in until you figure out what happened? I can promise you a nice shelter..."

"What?" At the promise of shelter, you perked up, excited at the idea of having a roof over your head. "Really? Where?"

"Er... Well..." Tyrunt put a claw to her chin, as if deliberating how to say what she wanted to say. Eventually, though, she decided on being blunt:

"It's inside my body."

Your face contorted once more into that of fear, and she quickly worked to defuse it. "No, no! It isn't that bad! All of my friends have gone inside of me multiple times, and all of them turned out fine! I-I don't even digest food the same way you humans do! I wouldn't even offer this if it wasn't safe! Don't you trust me?"

You look up at the massive theropod, and see tears beginning to leak out of her eyes. You figured it would be best to trust her words- after all, it didn't seem like you had any better options right now. "Alright, I accept."

"Yay!" That seemed to cheer up Tyrunt almost instantly, judging by how she was shaking her tail. "Okay, how about you choose where you want to... well... climb in."

154322.content:
The creature tower over you, standing at a height of 2'7", though for you, that may as well be a few hundred meters. Blue dominates its color scheme, with the exception of a few darker spot here and the cream underbelly. Its clawed foot comes crashing down next to you, emitting a quake that sends you onto your back. Looking up, you see it looking down on you, its deep red eyes meeting your own, its huge ears twitching in the afternoon breeze, seeming to focus in on you. You stare at each other for a few minutes, before finally, you hear its soft, feminine voice say, "Are you... a tiny human?"

You deduce that you've been discovered by a Nidorina. You nod nervously as she picks you up in her gigantic paws, examining you closely. "What on earth happened to you, little guy?"

Upon hearing the concern in her voice, you slowly start to calm down. "I don't know," you squeak. "I felt dizzy all of a sudden and passed out, and when I woke up, bam, I was shrunk." You look around every which way in hopes of finding anything that could possibly relate to how you got like this, but all you see is your bag on the ground and the giant Pokemon who found you.

"It isn't safe out here, there are a lot of hostile Pokemon roaming around here this time of year who would love to have something like you as a snack. You're lucky I found you first. A Zangoose or something would have been a nasty surprise."

"I guess you're right," you say. "What am I going to do now?"

Nidorina rubs the little nub where her horn would be, thinking deeply about the situation, soon arriving at a possible, if not interesting solution. "I have an idea, but..."

Your ears perk up upon hearing those words. Did she think of a way to get you back to normal? Or at the very least, keep you safe until you find a way? Your hopes skyrocket as you eagerly ask, "What is it, what is it!?"

"Well, it's a really weird idea. You sure you want to hear it?" You say yes, thinking nothing could be weirder than what's already happened today. "Well... I was thinking... maybe you could... live inside of me?"

You are taken aback in surprise. Not only was this giant Pokemon friendly, but it was offering to help you after being shrunk for unknown reason. But nothing could prepared you for her ridiculous suggestion. "You're suggesting I live... in your body?" Her beautiful blue face slowly turned a bright red as you repeated her words. "But won't your stomach acids digest me?"

"Oh, no," she reassured. "I'm an herbivore, my body is designed to digest plants and berries. My acids aren't strong enough to hurt you in any way."

You ponder the situation for several minutes while Nidorina continues to stare at your tiny body, patiently awaiting your answer. On the one hand, she's right. You're in a dangerous situation with all the wild Pokemon running around, and there is no guarantee the next one you meet will be as friendly as this one. On the other, living in a Pokemon's body? That's the weirdest thing you've ever heard! But... she is the one who offere, and it's not like you have any better options at this point... What the hey, you have nothing to lose, you decide to go for it.

"Alright, I'll do it." You could almost see the joy in Nidorina's deep red eyes, making you feel good in thinking you made the right choice. "So, do I just let you swallow me?"

Thinking for a brief moment, she answers, "Well, there is that, but..."

"But...?"

"I guess you could also enter through my butt or... my... you know..." she says while looking down at her crotch. You both blush in embarrassment at the idea.

After some careful consideration, you look up at the poison giantess and say, "Okay, I'll enter through your..."

15433211121.content:
Your nerves suddenly freeze momentarily as you manage to hear an odd voice emanate from right besides you. Of being shrunk wasn't terrifying enough, being in the presence of something you don't even know was sure to do the trick. Nervously, you begin to turn your head to the source of the mysterious speaker only to notice a huge orange wall of fur blocking your view. "w-w-wha!?" you stutter completely stupefied by the view before your eyes. Right before you was the face of an absolutely ginormous vulpix head. It's great amber eyes the size of a huge billboard were entirely focused on you as her huge black nose stood mere yards away from you. As you remain perfectly still in awe and shock of the sight, you manage to feel hot gusts of breath escape from her great nostrils as her massive right ear gently flicked against the side of her three ringed red bun.

At first, silence emanated before you two before the odd voice once again breaks the silence. "Hi there." says a friendly female voice that was almost the equivalent to a young woman. To your ever growing surprise, you soon recognize that the owner of such a strange voice was non other than this gigantic vulpine pokemon.

"y-you..." you stammer trying to let the words escape from your mouth. "y-you...just talked!" you blurt out with shock filled eyes.

The Vulpix simply cocks her head to the right upon your question and overall action as a small laugh escapes her face. "Of course I did silly. I mean, I am a pokemon after all." she giggles.

The response did seem to overwhelm your mind with confusion. If she was indeed a pokemon, shouldn't she only be able to repeat her name and nothing else? Regardless, you quickly decide to shake your head throwing the question out of your mind. "e-errr...sorry, but I'm a human." you say, unsure if she couldn't distinguish your odd form right off the bat. Apparently, it was clear that she had no idea as to just what you were by the confused expression and tilted head.

"A human?" She repeats in a stupefied tone. "b-but...humans are much more bigger than you." she retorts.

"y-yeah." you nod your head in response. "We humans are much bigger in size... But, somehow I ended up getting shrunk out here somehow." you explain, still wondering just how you managed to end up at such a size.

"Awww, you poor thing!" Vulpix says while giving a small yet audible whimper. Her sudden response over your situation catches you off guard momentarily. You never would've expected some stray pokemon to be so thoughtful towards a human...especially a tiny one at that. As you gaze at her with slightly wide eyes, you can't help but notice a warm smile emerge upon her orangish face. "w-well...maybe I can help?" she insists.

"Help?" you repeat unsure by just how she could be able to assist you. Despite this uncertainty, you definitely needed whatever help you can get, especially considering the fact that there could be more pokemon out there who wouldn't see you the same way as this vulpix does. Slowly, you muster a smile before nodding your head ever so gratefully. "thanks, I would really appreciate that." you reply as vulpix's smile only seemed to grow that much wider.

"Alright then." she says with a nod. "Now...I'll need you to trust me." Those words alone send a great surge of suspicion as you raise your brow in confusion.

"huh...what do you mean?" you ask still not entirely not sure by just what she meant by 'trust'.

Vulpix's smile soon fades slightly as her perked up ears also begin to descend downwards. "it's not safe out here." she says with concern in her voice. "but, I know a way how I could protect you from any dangers out here." she adds as your confusion only begins to grow much more.

"H-How?" you reluctantly ask.

"well..." She remains silent briefly before finally speaking again. "by, keeping you inside me."

The response was enough to send a great terror filled chill course down your spine. "w-what!?" You shout absolutely shocked. "y-you mean, you want to eat me!?" all previous thoughts of this pokemon being thoughtful are quickly tossed aside as you feared this vulpine would be the end of you.

"C-calm down!" she says with a startled expression. "My body won't hurt you." she quickly adds which does little to ease your tenseness.

"w-what do you mean?" you stammer still nerve wracked by the notion of getting eaten.

"I mean, I can control my body." she states. "Vulpix's are able to control their bodies because of the heat we produce inside." she explains. Just then, you quickly begin to remember the fact that vulpixes exhale flames on hot days due to the inner flame within them.

"H-How can I trust you?" you stammer still finding it hard to take her words for truth. With those words spoken, her huge face soon inches it's way towards you causing you to clench your eyes in terror. While you were expecting to feel the odd texture of her tongue about you, to your surprise the only thing you manage to feel is a soft warm surface rubbing against your side. Once you manage to open your eyes once more, you soon discover her huge snout gently nuzzling you.

"Don't worry" she says in an assuring tone as she continues to rub her fur against you. "I have no reason to hurt you...so why would I do it all of a sudden?" she asks. Now that she mentioned it, she did have a point. With a long sigh and small shudder you turn to gaze at her closest eye.

"It won't...hurt will it?" you ask finding it hard to believe that you were actually going along with this ridiculous idea.

The Vulpix simply retracts her head while shaking it slowly. "Not at all." she says with a small smile on her face. Oddly enough, you couldn't help but return one right back at her.

"a-alright." you say while letting loose another long sigh. "but...If you're tricking me, I'll make sure to give you the worst stomach ache possible." you threaten which only seemed to cause her to giggle. Now that you think about it, if she was indeed lying about all of this, you had absolutely no idea what you would do inside her.

"Fine by me." She replies before slowly lowering her head and parting open her massive maw. As you stood before the vulpine pokemon's mouth, a huge gust of her hot breath escapes and immediately blows past your form, messing up your hair in the process. You soon find yourself gazing within the pink fleshy portal that was her massive mouth. Sharp white stalagmites and stalactites adorned the upper and lower outer edge of the organic cavern as her huge pink tongue rested patiently below. With further inspection you manage to notice strands of her saliva trailing from teeth to teeth and even globs of the liquid adorning the surface of her mighty tongue. All the way at the end stood her great gaping throat, that slowly pulsated as if awaiting your entry.

With slight reluctance, you slowly enter your foot past the lower fangs and right onto the slimy surface of her tongue. To your surprise, your foot sinks slightly upon the slimy squishy surface as you slowly place your other foot inside as well. Carefully, you begin to traverse the slimy surface as humidity soon begins to bombard your entire form. Right as you managed to make your way onto the center area of the huge tongue, your whole world was soon cast into darkness as the vulpix slowly closes her mouth. Shocked by the sudden darkness, you slowly try your best to ease your tension within her maw. Just then however, you suddenly begin to lose balance as you feel her head beginning to shift ever so slightly. In no time at all, you land upon the tongue's squishy surface getting drenched in her rather sticky saliva. Just as you were about to raise your head to shake off the dizziness from the fall, you immediately feel your entire form being raised up slightly before being embraced by another squishy surface. Unlike her tongue however, the surrounding walls about you feel as if they were tugging your body deeper within before the sound of an audible 'GULP' filled your ears. The only possible thing you could do now was wait for the descent down her huge throat.
15433211121.title: The Giant Firefox

choices: Head up towards the heart and lungs
154332111211.content:
The descent downwards seemed to drag on for several minutes. The pulsating walls of flesh surrounding your body slowly begin to squish and compress your body as they continue to pull you even deeper down vulpix's mighty throat. In what seemed like a matter of minutes, the tunnel of flesh soon brings you upon a large fleshy ring that slowly quivered before you. With wide eyes, the ring quickly begins to part as the walls give you one final push straight through the squishy portal. Once your body was soon shoved fully through, you soon found yourself momentarily freefalling before landing with a loud splash in a pool of warm liquids. immediately, you swim up before letting out a loud long gasp of air. To your ultimate surprise, the innards of the organic chamber oddly contained fresh air, almost as if it was taken directly from outside.

Once you manage to fill your lungs with a plentiful amount of air, you soon turn your heads to gaze upon the large organic pouch that was vulpix's stomach. Like her throat, the pink walls wiggled and quivered rhythmically as they adorned with a mixture of saliva and acid. All about you, the sounds of loud churning and gurgles emanate from every direction as the continuous beats of her loud heart resided right above you. As you gaze upon the ceiling and walls of the fleshy room, you soon turn your attention to the liquids in which you were floating in. Just as Vulpix said, the acids were hardly having an effect on you. In fact, it almost felt like the equivalent of an odd hot tub due to the surprisingly warm liquids and bubbles forming about the surface.

"Well?" Vulpix's voice emanates from above, though it was a bit more compressed overall. "How is it in there?" she asks in a curious tone.

"Well, it certainly is something." you reply, finding it hard to describe exactly how it's like being inside of some pokemon's belly. The reply was enough to cause Vulpix to let out a small giggle which gently shook the stomach.

"See? nothing to worry about." she says while letting out a small chuckle.

"True." you nod while giving a long ashamed sigh. "Guess you won't have to worry about getting that stomach ache." you say humorously, despite the fact that you didn't take her word from the start. "and...I'm sorry for not trusting you." you quickly add. "It's just...when a pokemon says they want you to go inside them it's just-"

"It's alright human." Vulpix says with a laugh, quickly interrupting with your reasoning. A small smile soon draws on your face seeing as how there was no hard feeling between you two from earlier.

"well...this is rather...odd." You admit while swimming your way to a much more shallower area of the stomach. "I-in a good way though!" you quickly add.

"It must be quite a shock to be inside a pokemon's belly huh?" she asks above.

"You can say that again." you mutter under your breath. "e-errrr...well now that I'm in your body, what exactly should I do now?" You ask curiously. "should I just stay inside your stomach?"

"You could do that." Vulpix replies. "or~ you could go ahead and begin exploring inside." she adds with a giggle.

"Huh?" you quickly raise your head up in confusion by her last statement. "explore? what do you mean?"

"You know, just wander about inside me." she reiterates.

"but...would I be safe wandering about inside you?" you ask with a raised brow. "I mean, you did say you can control your body, but what if I get lost somewhere inside of you or something?"

"Don't worry human." Vulpix laughs at your sudden unease. "Like I said, I can easily control my body. In fact, I could eve track just where you are inside me as well." she adds to your surprise.

"R-really?" you stammer in awe and surprise of this pokemon's unique ability.

"Yup!" she replies in a cheery tone. "now...just where would you like to head to?" she asks as you begin to ponder your new interior course.
154332111211.title: Her insides are fleshy

choices: You decide to brave it and continue
1543321112111.content:
Seeing as how you were already within Vulpix's huge belly, you decide you minus will go further down her digestive system. "well, how about I go deeper inside you?" you call out past the gurgles and heartbeats.

"Deeper inside?" Vulpix repeats curiously." Oh! you mean go inside of my intestines?" she reiterates.

"Yeah, why not?" you ask while raising your shoulders in a nonchalant manner.

"alright then!" her voice booms above you. "Just go further down and then the opening should be there." she instructs.

With a nod, you soon begin to carefully clamber your way down the slimy surface of her stomach walls, while trying to balance yourself upon the uneven moving floors and walls. Upon making it a few yards down, you soon stand before the great lake of bubbling liquids that was her acid. The juices seemed nearly impossible to gaze through, as the green tint prevented much visibility down below. Not only that, but due to Vulpix's immense size, there was no telling just how deep her acid would be.

"err...we have a small problem here." you call out while kneeling before the great body of toiling juices.

"What is it?" Vulpix asks curiously.

"Well...Your acid's blocking the way deeper into your stomach." you explain. "and I have no clue just how deep it is."

"Oh! sorry about that." Vulpix giggles in an awkward manner. "one sec." After finishing with her words, the walls about the stomach soon begin to wiggle and pulsate in a much faster pace then before. Quickly, you grip onto the squishy surface to avoid being shaken off into the acid. As you were hanging on, the loud sound of gurgles and churning fill your ears as you soon manage to spot the lake of acid beginning to descend lower within the organic chamber. Within a matter of seconds, the whole body of digestive juices soon vanishes, with the exception of small pools caught in irregular flesh forms adorned upon the stomach floor. "there we go." she says while giving a small sigh. "did that help?" she asks curiously.

"Yup...that...helped a lot." you nod your head slowly both in awe and confusion over the sudden event. "What happened to your acids?" you ask curiously gazing about the fleshy chamber trying to find out just where they went.

"I sucked them back into my stomach walls." she says in a proud tone. "that way, it will make your path to my intestines much easier." she chuckles.

"But...what will happen to them?" you ask with slight uncertainty, unsure if her action was harming the inside of her body.

"I'll let them back out once you're in the intestines." she states. "so no need to worry."

"a-alright then." you nod your head before carefully continuing your way further down her massive belly. As you were more than halfway down the wall of flesh, climbing proved to be quite the challenge due to the extra slipperiness caused by the acids. After a small misstep, causing you to land upon the squishy floor on your rump, you finally manage to make it to the stomach floor. Once you collected yourself from the sudden descent, you soon scan about the area, before spotting a massive fleshy ring all the way at the end of the opposite wall. "There it is." you mutter under your breath as you begin your journey through the slick surface of Vulpix's belly. After a few minutes of traveling, and slipping on several occasions, you soon stood before the massive ring of flesh that was the entrance to her intestines. "Alright Vulpix!" you call out. "I made it to through your stomach." you assure her.

"Great job Human!" she roots. "now hold on. and you might want to back a way a bit." she insists.

"Back away?" you stammer. "but why?" your question was soon answered as a hot blast of air erupts from within the now parted opening, causing you to be blown back a few feet. With a shake of your head, you quickly turn your head towards the now open sphincter as the muscles about the fleshy ring slowly wiggled. Upon gazing inside, you notice a rather large pink tunnel with wiggling walls awaiting your arrival. Just as you were about to enter, a slight repugnant smell emerging from within soon begins to fill your nostrils. "Eughh." you groan in slight disgust while using your hand to attempt and swipe the aroma away. While the smell wasn't absolutely terrible overall, it was rather unpleasant as a whole.

"Oh, sorry about that." Vulpix says in an awkward tone. "it might be a bit...well, smelly deeper inside my body." she warns. "so, if you don't want to go in my intestines, then that's perfectly fine."
1543321112111.title: Head towards the intestine area

15433211121111.content:
While the scent emanating from within the tunnel of flesh were a bit smelly, they didn't seem too bad. "well..." you stammer still holding your wrist before your nostrils. "It might be a little...err..smelly, but it wouldn't hurt to go venture deeper inside." you admit.

"Alright then human." Vulpix says with an awkward chuckle. "and sorry if my insides smell a bit...well weird." she stammers in an embarrassed tone. With the huge fleshy ring still wide open, you slowly begin to trek your way through the passage way. Upon making it past the muscles and into the pink tubes of Vulpix's intestines, a great surge of heat impacts the front of your body. It was almost as if you were within a huge sauna. A massive, organic sauna that just happened to be inside of a Vulpix that is. Upon taking a few more steps inside, the large opening behind you soon closes with a 'SCHLORP', as if trapping you within your desired route.

"Careful in there, okay?" Vulpix says in a concerned voice which immediately manages to cease your movements.

"W-why?" you stammer unsure if your decision to enter deep inside her guts was a wise one or not.

"Well, it could be a bit bouncy and wiggly in there." she states. "and I wouldn't want you to end up getting dizzy or bounced out of control."

The statement sends a small surge of relief rushing down your body. "*phew*...for a second I though there was something dangerous inside your intestines." you mutter under your breath. "Alright then." you quickly reply back as you try to make your way deeper within Vulpix's fleshy innards. After taking just a few steps further within her intestines, you suddenly discover just how much of a challenge it was to get a steady balance within the moving tube. Each time you tried to set one of your feet down upon the squishy surface, it would either sink down or end up shaking due to the movements of her muscles. After about five experimental steps deeper within the intestines, an odd crease down on the floor suddenly ends up tripping you, causing you to land right upon the pink squishy surface of the walls. Luckily for you, the flesh did manage to break the fall rather easily, though upon making contact a loud giggle quickly emanates about.

"That tickles!" Vulpix voice emanates from above as her small laughter persisted.

"sorry about that Vulpix." you call out while quickly returning to your previous standing position. "I accidentally ended up tripping and ended up landing right on a wall." you explain.

"That's alright human." she says after managing to regain her composure. "Just be careful like I said."

"Will do." you stammer before slowly starting your trek once more. After minutes of walking down the humid tunnel, you begin to wonder just how long it would take you to fully traverse Vulpix's intestines. From your vantage point, the massive pink tunnel seemed to go on forever. Just when you thought that you were nearing an exit at a turn, you were quickly greeted by another long tube to travel through. After several minutes past by, many of which you lost track of, you soon begin to notice that the overall size od the tunnels were slowly starting to diminish. At first, the height of Vulpix's intestines stood somewhere about double your size, however, after traveling deeper within her body you had to kneel a bit downwards in order to fully make your way further within her gut. "It's like these things go on forever..." you mutter under your breath while still trying your best to block out the aroma lingering about.

As you continue your voyage deeper within the intestines, after what seemed like forever, you soon manage to enter into a small pink chamber where two openings lied before you. "huh?" you mutter upon viewing the strange fork in the road.

"Well, looks like you managed to make it past my intestines." Vulpix's voice resonates in a victorious tone.

"Looks like it." you chuckle while gazing upwards at the roof of the chamber. "I didn't tickle you too bad in there did I?" you ask curiously only to receive a giggle from Vulpix.

"I did snicker now and then." she admits past the light laughs. "Anyways, you now have two choices to chose from human. Do you chose the larger path? or do you chose the smaller one?" she asks.

"Well, which one leads where?" you ask curiously as your eyes constantly switch from both openings before you.

"Well..." Vulpix stammers in a rather abashed voice. "both will lead you out...but both go different ways."

Having a somewhat good idea of how the digestive system works a deep shade of red emerges on you cheeks realizing the choices before you. "o-oh..." you stammer awkwardly.

"S-So...the larger hole will lead you to the last point of my digestive system, where you could exit from my...my..." Vulpix stammers as if too abashed to finish her sentence.

"Your...rear?" you ask.

"Y-Yeah..." she mutters with an awkward whimper to follow. "and...you should know where the other path ends..."

With the choices now before you, it was time to decide which opening to enter.
15433211121111.title: Into the depths of the vulpix.

choices: Choose to stay and explore about
154332111211111.content:
After gazing before the two fleshy openings for a brief time, you ultimately decide upon entering the larger path. “I’ll head down the larger one Vulpix.” You call out before beginning your trek into the pink tunnel. As you walk upon the squishy, moist floors beneath you, a sudden shudder nearly causes you to lose balance. “Vulpix? What’s wrong?” you quickly stammer while spreading your arms out to keep steady. “n-nothing human.” Vulpix replies in a rather shaky voice. “It’s just…well, my first time feeling such a sensation within me.” She says in a wholehearted tone. “Wait…you mean I’m the only…well, human who managed to make it this far inside you?” you ask surprised by the reveal. “The one and only.” Vulpix adds with a small nervous chuckle.

As the rapid movements about you begin to die down, you slowly continue your way deeper, making sure not to apply too much movement in your surroundings. After a few more seconds of traversing, you soon manage to find yourself in a huge spacious chamber with light pink walls pulsating all around. As you make your way to the center of the area, you turn your head towards the right to notice a ginormous sphincter adorned against a mass of flesh. Just by the route you chose, there was no doubt what that opening lead to. “Welcome to my bowels human.” Vulpix says in an almost cheery voice, as if to congratulate your efforts. “Well…they certainly are roomy.” You admit with a chuckle as you begin to walk about the confines of her lowest gut. Vulpix simply giggles at your comment, causing the whole area to lightly wiggle.

“So, how is it in there?” She asks in a curious fashion. “Well, apart from being spacious, it’s really pink, slimy, and squishy.” You reply, finding it hard to explain what it looked like in words. “Is it…smelly?” she asks in an abashed tone. “Well…a little.” You answer back honestly. “Though not too bad!” You quickly add causing her to giggle. As you look about, the one thing that you immediately notice was just how clean it was within her bowels. “Errr…Vulpix?” you stammer. “Yeah?” Her voice echoes about you. “Errr…this might sound strange but…it’s-“ “Clean in there?” she states, managing to finish your question. “Well…yeah.” You reply, surprised by how even she knew. “Well, I don’t want my first inside guest to be grossed out.” She states in a thoughtful voice. “Besides. You’re the first thing I ate today.” She chuckles causing you to join in slightly.

“Well Human.” Vulpix begins, managing to catch your immediate attention. “Looks like you did it.” She says in a congratulatory manner. “You managed to make it through the digestive system of a Vulpix. Hooray!” she says in a cheery attitude causing you to laugh and blush slightly in embarrassment. “Well…to be honest it was fun traveling inside your body.” You admit. “Really?” she stammers in surprise. “Well…Yes.” You answer with a nod. “While I was terrified about the idea of being eaten at first, after voyaging inside you for a bit, well, it was a really interesting.” Vulpix remains silent for a second or so as you gaze up in slight confusion. “Well…who says that you’re done wandering about inside me?” She asks in an almost excited tone.

“Huh? What do you mean?” You ask growing confused by her words. “Well, sure you might’ve made it down my digestive system, BUT, there are plenty of other areas you can travel to.” She admits cheerfully. “Wait a minute.” You quickly stammer. “Are you saying you want me to continue exploring inside you?” you ask in surprise. “Well. Yes.” She admits following it up with an awkward chuckle. “This is the first time I managed to talk with a human. Even have one travel inside me” She replies in an awkward fashion. “But…if you don’t want to though that’s fine.” She finishes as if trying to hide a disappointment in those last words. Two choices now lied before you. Do you choose to stay and explore vulpix further, or cease the journey?
154332111211111.title: A trip to the bowels

1543321112112.content:
"I guess I would like to go... up?" you say hesitantly.
"Gotcha" she says. After a second of silence, the fleshy ground starts to shake slightly, and a tunnel appears on the wall right beside you. "There. This should lead you to my chest" her voice booms above.
After overcoming the initial moment of awe, you go over the tunnel and inspect it. It curves upwards at a steep angle, but bony protrusions emerge from the wall that can be climbed like a ladder. You climb for a few minutes, until you reach a point where the tunnel splits in two.
"Vulpix, which way do I go?" you call out.
"The tunnel at your left will take you to my lungs, and the one at your right leads to my heart. Feel free to pick either!" she answers.
Which way to you go?
1543321112112.title: Head up towards the heart and lungs

choices: The top of the heart, to the artery leading to her head
The bottom of the heart, to the artery leading to her lower body
15433211121122.content:
You enter the right tunnel. As you proceed, the tunnel gradually becomes horizontal, and you are able to walk normally again. Finally you reach a gigantic chamber filled with red liquid that expands and contracts periodically, and a transparent membrane protects you from drowning in the liquid. It takes you a moment to realize this is her heart.
"Ah, you arrived" Vulpix's voice echoes above. "So, how does it look like in there?"
"It's beautiful" you say, mesmerized. You take a moment observe the spectacle. The walls expanding as the chamber fills with blood, only to squeeze with all the strength they could muster, sending the blood to run through her arteries at breakneck speeds, feeding the rest of her colossal body then coming back to the heart to repeat. If you looked close enough, you could see the individual cells that floated in her blood, diligently doing their job.
You stood there for several minutes, just watching the heart at work. Eventually though, you got bored. "So, where can I go from here?" you ask.
"There should be two big arteries in there. One at the top that leads to my head, and one at the bottom leading to my lower body." She answers.
"So how do I reach them? There's some sort of membrane in the way."
"Just punch the membrane to break it. Don't worry, it won't hurt me. And remember to hold your breath."
You take a deep breath and punch through the membrane, puncturing it and allowing the blood to flood the bubble you were in. You then swam towards...
15433211121122.title: Right, towards her heart

154332111211221.content:
You began to swim upwards, towards the artery at the top of the heart. Due to the sheer size of the heart, you feared you would drown long before you reached the artery. However, the walls contracted again, and you were pushed along the blood, traveling up her body and crossing her carotid artery. In a matter of seconds you had reached your destination.
         You were pushed out of the blood vessel and landed inside a large, illuminated chamber. Getting your footing on the bony floor, you analyzed your surroundings. Right in front of you stood a titanic, gray ovoid organ. Blood vessels and electric pulses ran on its wrinkled surface. It took you some time to identify it as her brain. Looking around you located the source of the light that bathed the cranial cavity: two oval windows, which you quickly identified as her eyes, decorated the wall of the skull, the light coming from them going out and returning at regular intervals. Her optic nerves, two large tubes that linked the eyes to the brain, extended above like bridges.
         You walked up to the gigantic eyes and realized with awe you could see what she was seeing. Right now she was walking through the forest, occasionally looking around, alert for other pokémon that could attack her. You stayed a moment to appreciate the outside world. You don't know for how long you've been inside Vulpix, but it was nice to see the blue sky again after getting used to the fleshy world inside her.
"Enjoying the show?" Vulpix's booming voice startles you.
"A little, I guess." you answer awkwardly. "So, where are we going?" you ask after a moment of silence.
"It's getting late, and I would like to get back to my den before sunset" she answers.
"Of course" you responded. Vulpixes are diurnal, low in the food chain, and the last thing you needed was for something to happen to your host. After some minutes of walking, she reaches her den without incident, which was basically a hole in the roots of a large tree.
"Home sweet home" she announces as she enters the hole, which turned out to be rather spacious. She curls up in a corner, using her tails as a blanket. "Anyway, sorry about your shrinking. Tomorrow morning we'll look for a way to get you back to normal, okay?" she says, her voice betraying her tiredness.
"Okay. Thank you" you said, grateful.
"Goodnight" she says, smiling.
"Goodnight" you responded, and with that she closed her eyes, and your chamber was flooded with darkness. You moved towards her brain, and leaning on the soft matter, drifted to sleep.
154332111211221.title: The top of the heart, to the artery leading to ...

choices: It's a wild pokémon, wanting to have Vulpix for lunch!
It's a trained pokémon, whose trainer seems eager to catch Vulpix!
1543321112112211.content:
You woke up with sunlight shining on your face. Opening your eyes, you saw through Vulpix's own eyes that she was already awake, and was walking through the forest in search for something. With a yawn, you rose to your feet.

"Oh, good morning. Hope I didn't wake you up" Vulpix says, noticing of your activity.

"Morning" you say groggily, and walked towards the eye-windows. "What's the plan for today?" you asked. Before she could answer, a thunderous roar echoed in the distance.

"What was that?!" you asked, startled.

"My stomach. Sorry, I'm hungry" Vulpix answers blushing. "There should be some berry bushes around here. Ah, found one" she says, spotting a bush loaded with succulent berries. "You must be hungry too" she says as she walks up to the bush.

"Now that you mention it, I am a little hungry, yeah." you answer. "But how am I going to eat? Do I have to go back to your stomach?" you ask, dreading to treat through mountain-sized piles of half-digested berry mush. Through Vulpix's eyes, you saw her pick one of the berries with her mouth, chew and swallow it, with a loud 'gulp' echoing below you.

"Nah. I know a better way" she says before the ground trembles again and a new tunnel opens next to you. "Get in" she says, and you comply.

Following the tunnel, you reach a small cavity, where two rectangles of bone emerged from the ground, one much smaller and positioned near the side of the other, giving the impression of a table with a chair. On top of the table sat a bowl of the same material.

"Welcome to the dining room!" Vulpix announces, feeling your arrival. "The lunch will arrive in a minute" she says as you sat on the bone chair in front of the bowl. Once again you hear her chewing a berry, a loud 'gulp', and from an opening in the ceiling liquefied, chewed up berry mush poured out, being deposited on the bowl. You stared at the contents of the bowl for a moment in slight disgust.

"I'm sorry if this is a little yucky" Vulpix says embarrassed, "but you can't eat a full berry at your size. It's not that bad, I promise."

"It's okay, Vulpix. Thanks" you respond, and scoop a handful of the berry soup. To your surprise, it actually tastes quite good.

"So, how is it?" she asks hesitantly.

"It tastes great!" you answer as you continue to eat, and Vulpix responded with a sigh of relief. As the two of you ate, you talked and learned a little more about each other. Apparently Vulpix haven't left this forest since the day she hatched, and haven't had much contact with humans aside from watching them from a distance. You talked about your hometown and your childhood, but decided to not speak about your career as a pokémon trainer, unsure of how she would react.

Eventually, you two finished your meals. "Alright, now that both our bellies are full, we can look onto your 'little' problem" she says, chuckling to herself at the last part. She moved away from the bush and wander around, while you got back to the tunnel and returned to your 'observation post' behind her eyes. "So, any leads?" she asks.

"No clue. I was just walking when I passed out, and then I woke up at this size." you sat down and started to think. Did you do anything noteworthy before you shrunk? Another loud roar in the distance broke your train of thought.

"Whoa Vulpix, we just ate" you say jokingly.

"It wasn't my stomach this time" Vulpix says in a serious tone, and starts to look around in all direction, looking for the source of the sound. A nearby patch of tall grass shakes, directing Vulpix's attention towards it, and from it a pokémon jumps out!
1543321112112211.title: The next morning...

choices: Vulpix gets up and resumes the fight.
