"I'm here." You announced before making your way towards the eyes.

"Whoa, I can feel you inside my head, right between my eyes. This is so weird!" Your host replied. Looking through the eye-windows you saw the outside world colored in yellow as the sun lowered into the horizon.

"The sun is setting. You should get to somewhere safe before nightfall." You advised.

"I know. My home isn't far from here." She pauses. "Wait, how do you know it's sunset?"

"I can see it."

"See? Like, seeing through my eyes?"

"Yep. I can see everything you see."

"Cool! And a little creepy, to be honest." Vulpix says before she begins to move.

You chuckled. "If there's something you don't want me to see, just ask. I can respect someone's privacy."

"Oh can you? Remember where exactly I found you?" She asks playfully, eliciting a cough of embarrassment from you.

The two of you engaged in trivial talk for the remainder of the trip, until Vulpix reached the entrance to her home, a hole in the roots of a large tree. As she entered the spacious cave she called home, you noted that...
154332111211221122221221111.title: Her brain.

choices: Child(you decide if youngest, middle or oldest child)
1543321112112211222212211112.content: But was she a child of the family, or since most pokemon don't need to evolve to have children, was she the mother of the family?
1543321112112211222212211112.title: She had a family.

choices: One of her family member speaks to her on the way.
15433211121122112222122111121.content:
To your surprise, an alolan Ninetales waited inside the cave, with two other alolan Vulpixes by its side. It locked eyes with your host, giving her a stern glare.

"It's already dinnertime. What were you doing this late out there?" Ninetales asked in a mature-sounding female voice.

"Sorry, mom." Vulpix replied submissively. "I found a, uh... bug pokémon in trouble, and had to help it."

Ninetales softened her glare. "Just be careful next time, it's dangerous out there at night." she sighed. "Your food is on the table. Take a bath before you eat."

Vulpix nodded, and headed to a passage leading deeper into the cave, with the two other Vulpixes silently eyeing her on the way. The passage revealed a downwards stairway made of rock and ice, which she descended into and arrive into another portion of the cave, this one occupied by an underground lake. Vulpix submerged one paw into the lake, before promptly jumping in. Your world dimmed as Vulpix closed her eyes and started to swim idly in the lake.

"So, that's your mom?" You asked despite obviously knowing the answer.

"Hmm." Vulpix hummed, still with her eyes close. "She's really nice, but a little over too protective sometimes. My brother and my sister aren't too bad either. Well, most of the time." she giggled softly, before sighing. "If only you could know them better..."

"And why couldn't I?"

Vulpix remained silent for an instant. She opened her eyes and stared idly at the stairway. "Mom... really doesn't like humans. I don't want to think what she would do to one your size." She said, and a combination of cold and fear sent a shiver down your spine. "My little brother likes to play with small pokémon, but not in a good way. He likes to freeze them slowly and watch them struggle." Another shiver, this one powered mostly by fear. "And then there's my little sister. I don't think she would do anything to you herself, but she definitely would tell mom if I showed you to her."

She seems to have noticed your apprehension, because she immediately changed her tone. "Don't worry, I won't let any of them hurt you! By body is your fortress, remember?"

You chuckled. "Right. Thank you again." You said as Vulpix headed to the edge of the lake.

"Better hold onto something." She said as she exited the water.

"Wh..." Before you could say anything, your chamber started to convulse violently as Vulpix shook to dry herself. You bounced about in her skull before being launched into her brain, where you endured the ordeal by holding onto one of the folds on its surface. Finally, everything calmed down.

"You ok in there?" She asked as she ascended the stairway.

"Yeah..." You replied, fighting off your nausea while climbing down the brain.

Dinnertime was less eventful than you expected. Apparently the rest of the family had eaten before Vulpix arrived, so all she saw when she entered the dining room was her food on the 'table', a large block of ice. Having learned about how your former host shared her meal with you, she similarly produced a cavity where some of her food would be diverged to for you. Your meal was a liquefied mush of chewed up berries, but you were used to it at this point. She didn't dare speak much to you as she ate, as she feared the rest of the family was within hearing range and would find it weird to hear her speaking to herself.

Once she finished her meal, she yawned and headed towards another part of the cave, supposedly to her bedroom.
15433211121122112222122111121.title: Meet the Vulpixes

15433211122.content:
"w-wha?" you mumble in shear confusion as your eyes slowly began to open. In just seconds, you quickly place a hand over your forehead and clench your eyes close as a surge of pain starts to emanate within your cranium. "ugghhhh...what happened?" you groan as your form lies down limply. While you really didn't have much of a recollection before blacking out, you do remember wandering through some sort of forest like area before suddenly passing out. Slowly, you begin to raise your torso upwards into a seating position while gently caressing your head. After a few seconds, you slowly begin to open your eyes once more as your vision finally begins to come to.

As you begin to stare upon your surroundings, your eyes quickly widen in shear shock and bewilderment towards your location. Last time you recalled being in a vast forest filled with a plethora of towering trees and other forms of greenery. Now however you were gazing upwards at some sort of strange batch of towering green plant life, one which you never saw so great before. "w-what the!?" You stammer aloud in complete bafflement before taking a few steps back to get a better view of the strange greenery. Upon closer examination you begin to see many shared qualities the strange plant had with a typical strand of grass, almost as if they were exactly...alike. As you turn your head to gaze upwards and about, you soon discover a shocking sight. Straight above you towards the right was a rather familiar object, a tree. However unlike the many trees you were used to seeing, this one was completely gargantuan in size, surpassing even the height of the greatest skyscrapers, if not doubling or tripling it.

"h-how is this possibly?" your mind mutters aloud as you begin to shake your head in shear disbelief. As hard as it was to swallow, you just had to face the facts. Right at this moment, You're shrunk in some strange forest. As you're brain was busy working on overdrive attempting to process this shocking predicament, your unstable train of thoughts was soon distracted as an odd tremor sent you shaking. Immediately you turn your head about as a huge sense of worry begins to build up inside you. At your size, it was a hundred times more dangerous to be alone, especially in an area filled with now huge pokemon. As you continue to gaze about, the tremors soon begin to get louder, followed by the sounds of explosive 'booms'. It wasn't too long before you find yourself nearly getting sent airborne with each newly created tremor. As you land on your back from one powerful shake, you soon gaze up in shear disbelief at a truly unexpected sight.

Looming high before you was what appeared to be a humanoid figure, though this creature was far from human. What would original be a human head at the top of the figure was instead replaced with that of a vulpine, or a vulpix to be precise. From your vantage point, you could make out an orange pony tail adorned just behind the large bun Vulpixes were known for having. 't-this isn't possible!' you shout in your mind as you gaze helplessly upon the massive anthro vulpix's form. Surprisingly, like an average human being, her body was decorated with a set of clothing. An average light green t-shirt adorned the upper section of her body as a short blue denim skirt was fit on her waist area. By the way she was standing, it seemed her towering legs prevented any view up her skirt, though the idea did cause a blush to form upon your terrified face.

"hmmm...that's strange...it was here before." The vulpix spoke in a voice equivalent to that of a young woman's as she raises her head upwards and begins to sniff the air.

From the ground, you gaze upwards in shock at the massive vulpix unsure what she could have meant. Was she searching for something? more importantly, just what was she looking for? Your question was inevitably answered as her amber eyes soon focus straight down upon you. As the huge orbs were glued to your body, It fells as if your heart was on the verge of leaping out due to the anxiety of the situation. Moments soon pass by as you two do nothing more but stare at each other in silence. The silence was soon broken however as the vulpix lets out an "awwwww!"

"aren't you just adorable!" she coos while giving a small laugh. Your terrified state was soon replaced with confusion as you gaze at her with a lifted brow. In just seconds, she gets down on her knees as her huge head slowly looms above your tiny form. "what are you doing out in an open place like this little guy?" she asks while curiously cocking her head to the side. "are you trying to meet some pokemon? or did you maybe get chased by one? or maybe-" she continuously begins to ask questions while assuming several possibilities.

"e-errr...none of those actually." you reply in a loud voice, hoping she would be able to hear you. Luckily for you, she stops her accusations and cocks her head the other way in confusion. It seemed by this vulpix's strange demeanor that she didn't mean any harm to you, and if she did intend any ill will then she would have done something by now.

"so....why are you out here all alone then?" she asks

"well....I woke up this way." you blatantly admit. The vulpix girl's eyes widen as her right brow begins to raise.

"huh?...just woke up?" she repeats growing confused by the predicament.

"y-yeah." you nod your head. "Last I remember, I was walking in a forest before suddenly passing out. Once I woke up, I found myself here and...discovered you."

"You mean, I discovered you." The vulpix says with a smirk as she points a furred finger at herself.

"Sure...we'll go with that." you reply while slowly nodding your head.

"Well anyways, I think you ended up popping up in a pretty bad area." The Vulpix says in an honest tone. Worry begins to build up inside you once again as you feared that she was waiting until now to initiate some sort of cruel action.

"W-What do you mean?" you ask nervously hoping with all your might that she doesn't intend to harm you.

"Well, this place is a normal passing route for pokemon." she states. "A lot of pokemon take this path, and if you aren't too careful while being so small you could end up seriously hurt." While you were slightly relieved she had no ill intentions towards you, you now had a new thing to worry about.

"that...doesn't sound good at all." you admit as a shudder runs down your spine by the thought of getting crushed underneath some random pokemon's foot.

"but hey! maybe I can help." The vulpix beams in a cheery voice.

"r-really?" you look up at her with wide eyes. "you'd help me out?"

"Sure," she nods her head as she lets out a small chuckle.

"wow...thank you." A great sense of relief quickly rushes down your body thanks to the vulpix's kind support.

"Now, all I need is a way to carry you about so that you're safe." she ponders as she places one of her index fingers under her chin deep in thought.

"well...why don't you just carry me about?" You ask curiously, seeing as how that would be the easiest mode of transport.

"ohnonono." she shakes her head. "you might fall off or slip to the ground." she retorts. In just a matter of seconds, her eyes begin to widen and a smile soon crosses her face. "I think I know a way to keep you safe." she says with a small yet awkward laugh as she looks down upon your tiny form.
15433211122.title: An unexpected meeting with a foxgirl

154332111221.content:
"w-what do you mean?" you stammer, unsure what to make of that mischievous smile on her face.

"well...since it's dangerous to carry you about outside...how about inside?" she states in an odd yet cheery tone almost as if this plan sounded like genuine gold. Unfortunately though, you thought otherwise.

"w-what!?" you exclaim with shocked eyes. "Are you saying you want to eat me!?" you shout in complete disbelief by the off the wall proposal. You instinctively take a few steps back bewildered and terrified by the idea of becoming her snack.

"H-Hey!" she quickly retorts as her smile turned to that of startle. "I'm not gonna chew you up or anything like that!" she says as if trying her best to calm your shaking nerves.

"And that's suppose to make me feel calmer!?" You shout accusingly as your backwards pace began to quicken. Just as you were getting prepared to high tail it away from this huge vixen, a sudden leathery surface blocks your back and escaping movements. Immediately, you turn your head back only to spot her massive padded palm obstructing your escape path. With a shaking body you nervously lift your head upwards to gaze at her huge face.

"I'm not going to hurt you." she says in a rather convincing innocent tone. Yet despite this act, it did little to deter your suspicions towards her supposed scheme.

"well...I don't think digesting something will be pleasant." you retort not buying her act one second.

"who said I was going to digest you!?" she says startled, as if offended by the comment. "let alone hurt you?"

Your tense nature was soon swapped with confusion by the comment. "Wait...what do you mean?" you ask as a scowl forms upon your face. "do you even know how digestion works?"

"Wha?- Of course I do dummy!" Vulpix exclaims as her face contorted into that of annoyance. "and what I meant was that...well, pokemon bodies are quite...weird." She claims as her right hand moves upwards to awkwardly scratch the back of her furred neck.

"Pokemon bodies are...weird?" you repeat growing even more confused by her vague explanation. "care to elaborate?"

"well...it's kind of hard to explain...you see, we have stomachs, lungs and hearts, and -" she went on to name a few other organs.

"That...sounds like an overall normal body to me..." you state as her words only continued to stupefy your mind. If she was really trying to persuade you to let her devour you, then there was no doubt she was doing a terrible job at that.

With an irritated huff and pout, she gazes down at you with the annoyed expression still cemented on her face. "I said it was hard to explain." she counters once more. "and even if it sounds normal, it's far from that." she adds before slowly averting her eyes to the side. "you...you don't trust me...do you?" she asks in a slightly pained voice.

"errr..." you stammer, completely unsure as to how to answer her question. "well...it's just..."

"I knew it." she states before you could even choose the right words to explain your point. "you don't trust me..." Her ears slowly begin to droop downwards as if depressed by the assumption. "and here I thought..." After a second of silence, a long sigh escapes her mouth as she closes her eyes sorrowfully.

As you gaze up at her saddened form, a great feeling of guilt begins to weigh upon your shoulders. The Vulpix obviously didn't intend any harm when you first encountered her, and she was even thoughtful enough to offer you her help. Yet her methods of 'helping' is completely treacherous without a doubt. Seeing as how this vulpix girl was the only being right now capable of assisting you, and fearing that you could easily end up in a worst situation alone, it seemed that the best choice you had was to try and listen in on her proposition...or at least try your best to alter her plan. With a long tense sigh and small shake of the head you finally speak up. "you...said I'd be safe...right?" you ask, still hoping with all your might that her strategy wasn't an easy ploy at getting a snack.

"wha?" her head soon turns to look down at you as her eyes almost looked like they were on the verge of tears.

"I said, if you do eat me...i'll be safe?....right?" you repeat once more. As you finish asking the question, the sadness within her eyes soon switch to surprise as she nods her head.

"Yeah. Like I said, pokemon bodies are-"

"different." you finish her statement as a small shudder runs down your spine. You honestly couldn't believe you were doing this. There was a 50% chance that this whole procedure could end up with you neck high in a pool of acid. Regardless though, you really didn't seem to know any other way of getting about. Even if you were lucky enough to encounter another pokemon after escaping this vulpix girl, that is if you weren't killed first, there was no telling whether or not they would want you as a snack or worse. "So...everything should be alright then?" you ask, still not convinced that you will be one hundred percent safe with this plan.

"are you saying that, you want to-" The vulpix looks down at you growing even more surprised by the further questions.

"yes..." you reply with reluctance. "...Let's go give your plan a shot."

In just a matter of seconds, the vulpix girls sadness takes a complete one eighty as an excited squeal escapes her. "Alright!" she says with complete giddiness. The sudden shift in behavior leaves you completely dazed as your eyes gazes upon her huge amber orbs.

"Were...you just pulling an act this whole time?" you stammer finding it hard for someone to suddenly switch emotions off the bat.

"Well, it did work didn't it?" she asks with a beaming smile leaving you staggered by the reveal.

"w-wha!? b-but..." you try to word out some annoyed remark towards her sly actions but quickly let it slide away with a long exasperated sigh. "So...what now? you just swallow me?" you question as the grin on the vulpix's face began to grow.
154332111221.title: Continue?

1543321112212.content:
"...Well," the Vulpix says, "I don't necessarily have to swallow you..."

"Huh? What do you mean by that?"

"I mean, I could always put you inside me through... Other spots. For instance, you could go through my..." She tugged at the front of her green t-shirt, and her grin becomes a blush as she's too embarrassed to finish the sentence.

Fortunately, you were willing to. "Going through your breasts? How on earth could that work?"

Vulpix yelped. "Hey, like I said, Pokemon bodies are different! And if you don't like that idea," she moved her hands down to rest behind her back, "There're two other ways you could climb in. Although, both of them are on my... Er... Between my..."

She blushed and looked down at her blue skirt, and you made an easy guess where her final two entry points were. "Er, sorry," you apologize, "I mean, if you don't want me to go inside one of those, I'd be fine with-"

"No! No, it's okay, it's okay," She repeated, gazing down with a look of embarrassment practically etched on her face. "J-just tell me where you want to go, okay?"

You almost don't want to do this, considering that you're about to enter this Vulpix girl's most personal parts. But you go along with it anyway, and tell Vulpix that you want to enter...
1543321112212.title: Under her clothes

154332112.content: Ah, Ninetales I see. Any specific gender you want it to be?
154332112.title: The nine tailed fox

1543321122.content: Alright then. One final question, is the ninetales anthro or a normal vulpine pokemon?
1543321122.title: Female Ninetales

15433211221.content:
Dizziness races through your skull as you find yourself lying limply upon a rather rough surface. As your whole skull fells numb from your sudden odd black out, you instinctively begin to raise yourself upwards into a sitting position. "ah man..." you groan as you use your thumb and index finger to gently massage the sides of your temples. After a few moments trying to ease the numbness coursing within your head, with luck the pain began to slowly deteriorate. Seconds later, you begin to open your eyes trying to regain your vision once more. While it did take a few seconds to actually manage to get a good view of your surroundings, confusion and shock immediately envelopes your mind.

All about you was nothing but towering green plant life as well as rather large chunks of supposed rocks below you. After getting a much closer examination over the strange rock like structures below you, you were shocked to discover that it carried a great resemblance to dirt, if only it was enlarged to massive proportion. It didn't take you too long to finally realize that you were somehow shrunk to miniscule proportion in a completely strange area all alone. Just how you ended up in such a place, let alone in such a size was a complete mystery to you. Despite the sudden predicament though, that wasn't the least of your worries. At such a small size, you were easily a target for stray pokemon wandering about. If one was lucky enough to pick up your scent, let alone find you, then that could ultimately result in a disastrous ending to you.

As your head quickly gazes upwards nervously, you quickly scan about hoping with all your might that there was no sign of any stray pokemon at all around you. After doing a complete 360 multiple times, your tense nerves slowly began to ease up as it seemed you were safe. However, just when you thought all was well, a sudden voice from nearby immediately causes you to jump in terror.

"My, what have we here?" the voice of a female sounds out in a rather teasing if not warm tone.

Instinctively, you quickly turn about trying to spot the owner of the voice. Despite your efforts though, the tall strands of grass prevented much of your view around the area.

"A little nervous are we?" she asks following up with a small giggle.

"I..I guess you can say that." you reply in a stammer.

"What are you so afraid of?" she asks in the same teasing tone, mixed with a hint of curiosity.

"Well...apart from being tiny and probably in some hostile area...nothing much at the moment." You answer back, surprised that you managed to find some humor over the predicament. Nearby, the female voice erupts into a small bout of laughter as it suddenly began to trail off behind you.

"Certainly does sound like a scary mess." she chuckles. "Though...how can you be so sure that this place is hostile?" She continues to question.

"That...I'm not so sure about." you honestly answer as your nerves continue to remain tense during the conversation. "Though, how could I not be sure that this place isn't dangerous?" you ask. "more importantly, just how do I know that you won't hurt me?" you add.

A brief moment of silence emerges before the strange voice finally answers. "Well, has anyone attacked you?"

"Not yet..." you return. "...That is...unless you intend to." you say before giving a rather audible gulp.

"Do I have any reason to harm someone who has done nothing ill to me?" She returns in a rather displeased tone.

"No... bu-"

"then you have your answer." She states before you even had a chance to finish your assumption.

With a long sigh, you begin to get annoyed by this word game this stranger was playing with you. "If you want to talk, you could just come out you know?" you speak loud enough to insure she was able to hear you. Another few seconds of silence filled the air before a response was made.

"Will you give me your word?" She asks

"Wha?-" you raise a brow by the sudden odd question. "What do you mean?"

"If I reveal myself to you...will I have your word that you won't run away?" She reiterates.

For a few seconds you remain standing confused by her odd question. However, you quickly decide to agree to her strange terms. "errr...sure." You answer. "I'm already shrunken down to size...what else could surprise me?"

A giggle suddenly sounds off to your right followed by the immediate sounds of loud rustles. Just then, a large tremor immediately catches your attention as you turn your head towards the direction of the source. Within moments, a massive form began to arise beyond the view line of the grass tips revealing a shocking sight. Towering before you was what could only be described as a humanoid ninetales. The top of her cream colored head was decorated with rather long strands of matching hair that flowed down past her back. Her body was adorned in a sort of dress that looked almost oriental in appearance as her right hand carried what appeared to be a decorated fold up fan. Your eyes feel like their on the verge of popping out of their sockets once you manage to finally catch a glimpse of the voice in person.

"What's the matter?" she asks with a small grin. "Too entranced by my beauty?" she teases

"e-errr...well...I wasn't expecting you to look...like a ninetales" you reply as you find it hard to swallow that you were actually talking to a gigantic ninetales.

"well, the world is certainly a strange place." she responds while giving a small laugh.

As you gaze up at this giantess vixen, you cant help but feel uncertain if she was truly a friendly or dangerous person...errr, pokemon to be around.
15433211221.title: A graceful Fire fox

choices: Stay in her stomach until tomorrow
15433211222.content:
You stare in awe as the creature emerges from the bushes. Your jaw was practically on the floor. You fell to your knees, blown away by the sheer sight.

It was a ninetales! A completely normal ninetales. At your regular twice, you wouldn’t even give her a second look… but at your current size, she looked like she was large as a mountain! Compared to you, she looked like she was a kilometre tall! Each of her paws were as big as buildings, and they sent vibrations through the ground with every step, almost making you lose your balance. Her eyes looked like huge, beautiful seas of scarlet, as she silently scanned over the forest. You’re completely frozen in place, staring at her in awe as she walks towards you… only to eventually realize you were directly in her path! At this pace, she was going to step on you!

Your heart leaped in your chest. You wanted to run, but you knew you would never be able to make it in time. For a moment, you thought you were doomed to a fate as a red smear beneath the vixen’s paw. However, the ninetales ends up noticing you just in the nick of time, stopping in her tracks just an instant before she would’ve squished you. You’re awed as she bends down to analyze you, your entire view taken up by the vixen’s massive, beautiful face. “Ah! Hello there, little human. I apologize — I almost stepped on you. Do make yourself a little more noticeable next time, okay?” She says. “You don’t happen to be looking for Venaburgh, do you?”

Okay, now you must be dreaming. Not only was she huge compared to you, but she was talking all of a sudden? You’ve never met a Pokemon who could say anything more than their own name. Her voice was smooth and velvety, and she seemed to speak quietly so as not to hurt your tiny, fragile ears. Still, you panicked. “W-what? Who are you?” You stuttered, on instinct. Judging from the look on her face, you could tell she was somehow able to hear what you were saying. “What’s going on?”

“Whatever do you mean?” She asks, tilting her head curiously. “I am Lady Marissa. Have you not heard of me?”

“Wh… wha…” You said, clutching your forehead in exasperation, overwhelmed by what was happening. “Why are you so huge? I-I mean… why am I so small? How can you even talk!?”

“... all Pokemon in this forest can speak.” She raises a brow. “You… didn’t happen to stumble upon this place by accident, did you?”

“I don’t even know where I am, ‘lady’!” You yell out angrily, at the top of your lungs.

She seems taken aback by this, her ears drooping as a look of concern dawns on her face. “Oh dear.” She gently sits down in front of you, her many tails rustling as she lowered her head to eye-level. “Alright. Do not panic, human. You are perfectly safe. You have simply entered a place where the traditional hierarchy of humans and Pokemon have been… reversed.” She explained, in a calm and reassuring voice. “Upon entering the Forest, all humans are reduced to a miniscule size. You should take a moment to get used to your new scale.”

You try to focus. “How do I get out of here?”

“I’m afraid there is no way out. Not presently, anyway,” she frowns.

“What?” Your heart sinks.

“Now, calm down, calm down! Humans are only able to leave the Forest on nights of a full moon,” she says immediately, trying to calm you down. “The next one should be in just a few weeks from now.”

“Oh great,” you groan, throwing your arms in the air in frustration. “So I’m going to be stuck like this for weeks?”

She sighs. “It’s not all bad. Many humans come to this forest for vacation, you know. Time doesn’t pass normally here; even if you stay in the Forest for years, when you leave, you’ll find that only five minutes will have passed,” she says. “Thus, you can relax here for as long as you desire, without consequence.”

“Yep. Mhmm. Cause that really helps me when I’m a millimetre tall!” You complain. “I can’t believe this? What am I going to do for three weeks, at this size?”

She looks annoyed at your attitude… but then gets a mischievous smirk on her face. “Well, like I said, there’s Venaburgh. It’s full of humans like yourself. I’m sure there’s always something to do there.”

You sigh, relenting. “Alright. Where’s Venaburgh?”

“Close your eyes, little human, and I’ll send you there.”

You raise a brow. “Umm… alright?” You close your eyes, and for a few seconds, nothing happens. Then, you feel the warmth of her meaty breath pouring over your body… and then suddenly, you feel yourself be scooped up something huge and wet! Your eyes snap open as you find yourself adrift in her unimaginably huge maw! Each of her fangs is at least ten times your size… her tongue alone might be a hundred times! Most worryingly was the massive, gaping black hole that was her throat, beckoning ominously to you at the back of her maw.

“Hey! No! Stop! What is wrong with you?” You cry out, but your fear goes unheard. In feels like the entire Earth is moving below you as she slides her tongue back in her maw. You cry in fear as you realize you’re being brought towards her throat! “Oh no you don’t!” You try to ran back up her tongue, but it’s so monumental compared to you, your efforts are in vain. For her, gulping you down is as simple as swallowing a single crumb. You let out one last cry as her tongue folds back, pulling you instantly into the dark confines of her throat, sealing you away from sunlight.

““No, no, no, no!”” You screamed as you slid rapidly down her throat like a water slide, hearing juices flowing all around you as you descend deeper and deeper into her massive body. You can hear her heartbeat for a few moments as you pass through her chest, and then the massive amounts of air passing through her lungs, and then the gurgling and glurping of countless other organs as you slide down her throat. Eventually, you finally reach the place you were dreading the most; her stomach.

You expect to be dropped into a massive pool of acid. Instead, you land on top of a concrete floor. “What the…?” As you sit up, disoriented, you are stunned and awed by what you were seeing. This ninetales… had an entire, tiny city inside her belly! You saw dozens of other tiny humans walking casually along tiny roads and living on tiny buildings, all floating on the sea of acid at the bottom of the ninetale’s massive gut. Instead of roads, they had canals like Venice, with boats floating in the acid like it was no big deal.

You sit there, shivering, unable to even believe what you were looking at. This Pokemon had an entire city in her belly? How was this even possible? This all had to be some sort of surreal dream. Any moment now, you were going to wake up. That’s right. Just wake up…

Suddenly, a young woman approached you, dressed in fancy clothing and wearing a felt hat. “Ah! Hello there!” She smiled, noticing you. “Welcome to Venaburgh!”

And just like that, you fainted…

info.brief_description: You suddenly shrunk and Pokemons wanted to eat you and make you explore their interiors.
info.description:
This Pokemon interactive is concerned with vore and endosomatophilia (fantasy of living in another living thing). The idea is that a trainer suddenly finds himself shrunk to insect-size without any reason. He then realized that the "giant" Pokemons wanted to eat you and they want you to live in them to explore their other-worldly interior.

The Basic Rules:
1. Vore is absolutely allowed. The trainer can enter from any part of the Pokemon's body.
2. The Pokemons have the ability to talk like humans.
3. The Trainer can explore the 'interior world' of the Pokemon. The locations can be real (i.e. stomach, brains, eyes, etc.) or imagined (i.e. rooms, chambers, etc.)
4. Erotic body parts/elements are allowed. This includes cock/anal/un-birth.
5. Digestion is discouraged; the main point is a "Fantastic Voyage-esque" plot.
6. One-sentenced entries aren't appreciated; be sure to make it longer.
7. You are free to add whatever you like as long as it is on-topic and not too short.
8. Enjoy adding to the interactive.
